gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las// lha dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis dogs su byung zhing 'dzin par byed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// de nas ro
ba zhan gshegs pas 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog dang/ de'abu gnyis po dngul rgya dog dang/ dngul bod ces bya ba gnyis po bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed par grub pa dang/ de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu mchog tu rgyal ba 'od ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa dang lhan cig du sum cu rtsa gsum lhar gnas nas babs
de la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas chos bshad pa mnyan nga 'a gyur to// de nas

la bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal do// khyod ma 'ongs par dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangasamed pa snyed 'das pa na

gser 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

gangs rgyas 'ag pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshags pa/ 'jige rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dwagase dang ne pa cher bor/
rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pas rnams nub par gyur pa dang/ de'i tshe 'di'i bu chen po dngul

rgya tig ces bya ba 'joge rten gyi khams de nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu gyur te/ de'atsho de'i ming bsgyur nas rnam dag tog ces bya bar 'gyur zhinge mgo par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas//
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyenang/ ban med par skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi snyems
kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser tog 'od ces bya bar 'gruba'o/ 'de'i de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bstan pa'i chos rnams nubo par gyur pa dang/ 'di'i

bu chung du dngul gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab du 'gyur bas/ 'jage rten gyi khams de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par batshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
pa'i sangs rgyas shige pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ blan med pa'i skyes bu kha la sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsaM 'od kyis
bya bar 'gyur zhes lung bstan to// de nas de'i tsho lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gi// skyes bu chen po gsum po de dag las lung bstan pa'i ng thos/ 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog

yatshes dam pa 'di'i nga thos pas/ sems rab tu dgar ba skyes nas ma nga ra dag cing dri ma med nga ra gyur pas/ dper na nam mkha' lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu pa de dag dge ba'i

rtsa ba de dag yongs su smon pa thugs kyi mkhyen pas byang chub chen por lung bstan nas/ 'di sked du lha'i bu khyed cag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grags med pa stong

'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i tig mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bal 'grub te/ sa rigs kyang mthun/ mong

mthun pa'i 'gyur bas/ thams cad zhal dang spyan rnam par dag cing ut+pa la'i dri'i re ngo zhes bya ba/ mtshan rnam pa bcu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar me bzhin sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'dzag

rten du 'byung ba'i 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// donas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub kyi shodreg lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di ngeg na sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i
gnas nas chos nyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas mno par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par mdzad lags/
bdag gsen lha'i bu 'di deg pha rol tu phyin pa drug phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas dka' ba spyad de/ lag pa dang/ rkang ba dang/ mgo dang/ mge dang/ nang dang/ klong rgyas dang/ g.yog 'khor dang//
bu dang / mas brang dang/ glang po chadang/ rta dang/ shing rta dang/ bran po dang/ ban mo dang/ mngag gzhug brgyad pa dang/ khang khyim dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ nags tshal dang/ gsor dang dngul
dang ba zlumudang/ phyug dang/ rdo'i stong ba dang/ byu ru dang/ man shel dang/ dung dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gos dang/ mal cha dang/ gso sman dag sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'ang

ma thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa gzhan dag ni/ mchod pa'i yo byad mang pos 'das pa'i sas rgyas 'bum phrag khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa stod la mchod pa bgyase

nas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas// bskal pa tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed lon nas/ gdod de'i rjes la byang chub tu lung bstan ba 'thob par 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan

'das lha'i bu 'di dag rgyu rkyen ni gang/ sbyong pa mchog na ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni jo lta bu zhig bsrun/ lha'i gnas de nas 'dare mchis te/ yud tsam zhig chos thos pa nyid kyis/
lung bstan pa thos par gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bkas ngashad de/ the tshom gyi dra ba bcad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ shang gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo/
khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ 'di deg thams cad ni dege ba'i rtswa ba mchog dag pa'i rgya dang/ rkyen dang/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba bsgrubs na// gdod lung bstan/
nga thog pa yin pas/ lha'i bu mang po 'di dag lha'i gzhal med khang mchog dam pa nas 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba'ang sngangs te/ med du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'dame nyan du 'ongs pa yin pas/ chos thos
bar gyur nas kyang/ mdo sde 'di la sems kyis gus pa bskyad de/ ba zlarlayongs su dag pa ltar skyon gyi do med par gyur pa dang/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsum po 'di

ga la lung bstan pa'i denges po'ang thos pa dang/ gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ yun ring po yang dag pa'i spyod ba bsgrubs sa/ yi dem chen po blangs pa'i rgyudang rkyen de'i phyore sa ma 'os pa'i

dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lu bstan pa yonano// de rjesashang gi lha me des/ bcom ldan rangs kyis de skad ces bka' bas pa thob pa
dang rab tu dga' bas mngon par yodertsis par gyur to// gsar 'od dam pa mchog tu mang ba rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal bo las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa 'o//

ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing lha la bka'ostsal pa rogs kyi lha legs par nyon la shAn tu yode la zung zhig dang/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang yone

pa dang khyod la bshad par byago/ gos kyi lha me sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing bsam gyi mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dusazhu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dzage rten mkhyenab/ blan med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom lda 'das nichen/
gtsug phud ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rngages kyi lha mo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang dam pa'i chos nub bar gyur nas/ gzugs bar n gyi chos kyi tsho

rgyal po lha'i debang phyug 'od ces bya ba zhig yodad/ rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis pha ma bzhin dum rnams la rjes su 'dzin par byed do// rgyal po rol yul na tshong dpon chu 'dzin rtses bya ba sman gyi thogeg
la shan tu mkhas pa shis par len lag brgyad legs pa khong du chud ba/ sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal 'byung ba chen po bzhim mthun pa las gyur pa thams cad yongs su skyob cing gso bar byed pa

'ge yod de 'dzigs kyi lham do ra tshe tshong dpon chu 'dzin de la bu chu 'bebasangashes bya ba byed bzhin sdugatsang mdzes pa mang po kun gyis mos pa'i blta bar mos pa/ rang bzhin gyi sems myur ba/ gtsug lag
rnams legs par rtogs pa/ ya gi dang/ ri mo dang/ tsas dang/ grangs rnams mngon par ma rtogs pa gang yang med ba zhige yod par gyur to// de'i rgyal po der yul khams na sems can brgya
stong tshad med ba skad nang bya sdug bsngal sna tshogs kya shes rab tu gablo'i dar gyur pas/ tha na dga' ba'i sems cung zad tsam yang med par gyur to de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs

a sems can brgya stong tshad med pa de dag nad kyi sdugabasngal myong bar gyur pa mthong ba dang/ sAng rje chen po'i sems bskyang nas 'ji snyam du sems can tshad meng bsnyad sdug bsngal ma bzang pas nyon mos

bar gyur te/ bdag gi pha tshong dpon sman dpyad la nyan tu mkhasapa bshes pa'i yan lag brgyud legs par khong du chudade/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa ga byung ba'i sangasna tshogs gseb nus/
kyang rgas khogs ngas lus kyi shas chung dang dmar ba dang/ mkhar ba la brten ma gdod 'gro bas/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rngal rnams su song nas// nad kyi sdug bsngal rnams yongs su spyob

par byed ma nus la/ deng sems can brgya stong tshang med pa steng na nad tshabs chen pos grubs pa yongs su skyob pa'i nus pa med na/ ngeng bag pha sman nga chen po 'i drung du song la nad gso ba'i sman dpyad gsang ba dris

patsapa te gal te shes par gyur na grong dang tsho khyab dang/ grong rdal dag tu song la/ sems can rnams kyi 'od rnam pa gA rdzogs gsos te/ ring por bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon
gyi bus de snyam du bsams nas/ pha'i thang du song ste/ rkang pa la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu bkod de tshigs su bcad pa dag gas pha la 'ad ]
skad ces drase so// bdagarna sems can bskyab pa'i slad// sman dpyad rnams zhu lags na/ byams pa'i yab kyis brtser dgongs te// bdag la bkas rkangeshad du gsol/ ji ltar lus/
na 'jige pa na/ 'byung chen rnams na lephal 'gro'i 'gyur// gzhan yang dus ni gang gi// nad mang rnams na skye 'gyur lags// ji ltar zas skom 'tshal 'gyuran// bde ba dag ni mang gyur
zhing// lus kyin ng na me yi mthu// nyams shang gnod pa mi 'gyur lags// sems can nadan nge zha mchis te// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang// kun 'dus pa yo nad lags na//
de dag ji ltar gso bar bgyi// gang gnang+ge nad ldang// gang gi tshon mekhruseng slong// gang gi tshe na bangag bad kan g.yo// gang gi tshe na kun 'dusu skye// de nas tshong dpon gyi bus gsol ba btag
pa thos pa dang tshagasasu bcad de smras pa/ ngaso rje drang srong snying po yaM/ nad gso dpyad la brten nasaM no// rim bzhin khyod la rab bstan gyis// legs par nyon la sems can skyobs zla ba gsum
na depyad kyi dus// zla ba gsum n dbyar zhes bya// zla ba 'dasum ni ston gyi phyogs/ zla kasalan dgu zhu zhes bya// 'di ni le gachage las brtsams pas// gsum gsum so so'i bshad par bya//
gzhas gse ru'aeke katshulo/ byang nu pa6du/ cu kaM/ dang 655/nya na du/ gsum dang bzhi ni tshe ba'i dus// lnga dang drug pa ma pa'i dus// bdun dang brgyad pa
u ston gyi dus// dgu dang bcu pa grang bar 'gyug/ phyi ma gnyis ni kha ba'i dus// de ltar bye brag shes gyur na// 'gal ba med par sman gtang bya// dusana'adi deg rjes mthun par//
zas skom legs par sbyor byed na// ltagan myur du 'ju 'gyur bas/ nad mang dag na skyo mi 'gyur// dus tshigs gal te log 'gyur zhing// 'byung me bzha ne 'phos gyur la// de tshe gsos sman med
gyur na// nges pa la nad kyi sdug bsngal spyasman pas sa bzhi shes bya zhing// dus tshigs dag kyang shes par bya/ lus kyi khams bdun ga byas nas// 'gal pamed pa' zos sman btang//

ro yi khams dang khrag dang sha// rus dang rkang dang klad rgyas su// nad na 'di deg zhugs pa'i tsho// gsor rung ma rung shes par bya// nang na the dad rnam bzhi yod// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang kun
'dus pa yaM rnyed yon te// g.yo ba'i dus na shes par bya// dpyid ka'i dus nanged kan g.yo// dbyas na rlung nad skye bar 'gyur// ston gyi dus su ma'i nga rgyas// dgunazhi gsum po cig la ldang/
dpyad na tshartsub dro ba bza'// dbyang no snam dro lan tshasbyar/ ston ni grang dang mngar dang snum// dgun rtseb sgyur snum dang mos// dus bzhi po 'di deg tu// sman dang zas skom gang bza' ba// gal

te de bzhin bza' byed na// nad mang dag ni spyi ma 'gyur// thos 'og na ba bad kan dbang// zhu tshon ba mkhris pa'i gyur// khu 'og ldang ba rlung gi debang// dus dang sbyar la da shes bya// nad kyi rtogs ba

shes gyur nas// nang na ji bzhin sbyar gtang bya// nang dbyibs bye brag tha dad kyang/ sngar ni rtsa ba shes par bya/ rlung nad dag la snum bag gtang// mkhris nga la zhen 'khru na bzang// bad kan nang na skyug/
par bya// kun 'dus la rna smanagasuM dgos rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ldang ba kade ni kun 'dus par shes bya/ da lnga'i dus shes gyur kyang// rang bzhi'i dag ngebs pa ba bya// de lta'abelhagA
te sa gyur nas/ dus bzhin du sman dpyad byado/zas skom smanan 'gal med pa// de na sman pa mkhas shes bya// shes pa'i yan lag brgyad rdzoge nas// sman dpyad rnams ni kun sbyad pas 'dareg
la nagasal byas nas// sems can nad na gso bar bya// gtar ba dang na slas snyad dang// lus kyi nad dang 'dre gdon dang// marus dug dang e pa dang/ tshe bsring dang ni mthu sbyang pa'i snganan de ya la
gdang/ d+hAsu tshigeng bzhazhi ba brtagasas// de 'ogarma lam duse rgyun/ rlung mkhrise bdakan bye brag shes// sgom 'di mgo yi skra nang// sems kyi long bzhi'i ma brtan pa/ ga mang rmi lam 'phu
mtho na// nga ni sgrung ga re bshazhi na// gzhon nu skra dkar skye ba dang// rdul gnyer ba mang ba dang/ yang gzhungs lam mi mthong ba// de mi khris ba'i nga bzhi can// chos brtan lus mekam
ladrang/ tshe rtog mgo dang ma zhange na// rmi lam chu dang rdzas dkar mashong// tad kayang bani shes par bya// kun 'dus rang bzhin kun ldan pas// khacig gnyis dang gsum ldan pas/
phyogs gcig lhag par gang mang ba// de yareng bzhokeshes par byos// rang bzhani rig par gyur nas na/ nad bzhi'i smanan gtang bar bya// ra be'i mtshan ma med gyur na//

mo de gsor rung ba zhes bya// dbang pos log pa la 'dzin rung// bla ma sman pa dag la brnyas// nye du dag la khong khron// 'chi ba'i mtshan mar shes par bya// mge yon kha dog dka' 'gyur zhing// lcagazhag

sA zur yo ba dang// rna bar 'khor lo sngo las gyur// mchu thur 'phyang ba ba rmi ba'i mtshan// a ru ra na ma gcig la// bro yaM rnam pa drug ldan te/ smanang 'thems cad la byed pas// nyes med sman rnams

kun gyi rgyal// 'bras bu gsum dang tshab gsum M// sman rnams nang na rnyed par sla// bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar/ 'dareg nad mang gso bar nus// de las gzhan pa'i sman rnams ni// nad dang sbyar te 'byed
par bya// sngar na brtse ba' sams bskyed nas// nor dang le la blta mi bya// sa na khyod la nad gso ba'/gces pa'i don nibestan pa yani// 'di yose sems can gso byas na// mtha' med 'bras bu ba/

pa'i gyur/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshod dbon gyi bu chu 'bebs pha lasaM mngon du shes pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi don gces pa dang// 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa dang// dus shes ma mthun pa dang/

sman dpyad pa'ireg thos pas legs par khong du chud par gyur nas/ bdag nyid nad zab po gso nus ngar roge par gyur pas 1 grong dang 2 grong khyer dang/ grong rdal kun tu khyab pa'i de dang de dag tu song ste

nad kyi sdug bsngal dang ldan par sems can 'bum phrag stong du ma de'i thad du lhags pa rnams la legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas/ 'di skad du bdag na sman pa'o// bdag ni smyan pa ste/ sman dpyad
(lan tu mkhas pas/ nga khyed cag gi nad mang po gsos nas thams cad sos par bya'o zhes smras so// gos kyi lha mo dor ro ma mang po rnams tshong dpon gyi bus legs par tshig gos spro ba bskyod nas

nad gso bar gnang ba thos pa dang/ de nas soms can nad tshabs chen pos btab pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed cig tshig de skad smras pa thos nas/ lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs shang ngo mtshar rmad du byung

ba zos par gyur pas/ rgyu dang rkyen des nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa thams cad sos shing rdzogs par gyur pas nyam stobs rtas te/ snga mkho bzhin du sos par gyur do/ thogs kyi lha med tsho gan yang
nad kyi sdug bsngal shan tu lci nangegasobar dka' ba'i sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyang lhan cig tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thod du lhags nas yang nad gso bar gsol ba btab pa dang/ de'i
tsho dpon gyi bus san gya nom pa dag btang nas thams cad sos par gyur te/ gyis rgya lha ma deb tshong dpon spyi tsus yul khams de kun gyi sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong du ma sos bar byas so/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'-iskyel po las nad thab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'uste bye bzhi pa'o//
'das kyis/ byang chub kyi shing gi lham la 'daskyed ces bka' stsal do// ges kyi lha mo de tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ sngon gyi rgyal po lha' dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams su sem

can nad kyi sreg bsngal dza snyad yod pa dag gsos nas snga mkho bzhin du rtas te bde ba myong bar gyur ba dang/ de'i tshe sems can mang po de dgo nad sos par gyur pa'i phyi'i bsodo zhags kyi las mang dubasags

nas spyanipo rgya chen btang ba la bdag nyidi longs spyod par gyur pas/ thams cad lhan cig tshong dpon gyi bu'i thad du dong ste/ thams cad gus pa bskyod nas/ 'di skad du tshong dpon chen po'i bu bsod nams
kyang dngos po shin tu legs par brgyadad bdag cag la phan btags nas bde bar 'tsho bar byas pa legs so legs so// khyod na yeng dag pa'i bu chen po dang ldan pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po byams pa dang sdong
rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan te/ sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas pas/ sems nagyi nad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa dag las legs par gsos so zhes grong khyer kun tu khyab par de ltar

'tsha bsngags pa brjod pa grubato// rigs kyi lham de'atsho tshong dpon gyi bu de'i chung ma chu'i pad+mar mdzod ces bya ba la bu gnyis yod de de gcig gi mang zhachu rgyas zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni chub mdzod cig/

bya'o// de nas myurabebs bu gnyis khride nas/ mthar gyis grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal rgyu zhange dong ba las dgon pa'i gnas shin tu nyam nga ba zhage 'dus pa dang/ de na pa ba dang/ sbyang kaM deng/

[s ]wa dang/ sprachen dang/ bya rgod la sogs pa gcan gzan gyi rnam pa sha khrag bra zhing 'thung ba mang po phyogs gcig tu rgyug tshange 'phur te dong ba mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de 'di snyam du gcan gzan

'di ngeg rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir phyogs gcig tu 'phur zhing rgyug par gyur/ bdagagis skad cage phyi bzhin du brtag go snyam du bsams nas/ phyi bzhan du song ba las rdzong chen po dgon pa chu skyes zhes

bya ba de na chu thad la thug pas/ rdzong de steng na zhu mang po yod pa mthong bar gyur to// chu 'bebs kyis mthong nas kyang stong cha chen po'i sems skyes pa dang 'derAshange gi lha zhag lus phyed tsam bstan
nas 'disang du legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod na yang dag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya bas nya 'di dag la snang brtsi bas chu sbyin pa sngags so// rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa

ga'i dang ldan pa'i phyi'i chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/ chu 'bab par byed par dang/ chu sbyin par byed pa'o// deng khyod kyis mang ji lta ba bzhin du byos zhoge/ de nas chu 'bebs kyis shing gi lha mo la smras

pa 2 tu rad deg gi gros ji tsam zhig yod/ shing gi lha mos smras pa/ grangs ni stong phrag bcu tshang ba rnyed yod do// mi shes kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bus gras de snyad yod par thos pa dang lhag
par snying rje'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to// de'i tsha rdzong chen po de'ang nyi mas gangs sa chu'i lhag ma cung zad gtsuge lus par gyur pas/ nya stong phrag bcu pa de dag kyang 'am bar sgor zhugs te
lus kyi 'gro ldog byas nas tshong dpon de mthong ba dang sems la re ba dang bcas/ migama'adzums par rjes su 'byung zhing lta bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi dus dngos po de ma thong nas/
phyis phyogs pa'i brgyugs te/ nubatsal bar la dod kyang rten par ma gyur pas/ yang phyogs gcig tu rnam par bltas pa las/ ljon shing chen po zhig mthong ba dang/ stong du 'tshogs nas yal ga dang lo ma

bcad de bsalagrab byas so// gzhan yang rdzing 'di'o tshu gang nas 'ong zhes yongs su btsal ba las chu bo chen po chu skyes zhes bya ba zhage mthong ngo// de'i tshe nu bo de'i 'graman nya mang po yod pas lta blang ba'i

phyi'e chu bo deb gong du g.yang sa chen po yong pa'i gnas su chu bos 'bab tu ma ster bas/ chu dra lo ba'i gnas de'ang shin tu bcos dka' bar gyur/ 'di snyam du gad pa 'di ni shin tu zab cing g.yang sa che bas/

ma brgya stong gis zla ba gsum gyi bar du'ang gcod par mi nus na/ bdag gcig pus ma rnyes pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu myur du rang gi grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal po chen po'i

drung du phyin nas mgo bos rkang pa la phyag byas te/ phyogs gcige tu 'khod nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ 'dza skad dubadag gis rgyal po chen po'i mnga' ris na/ 'bangs la bro nad sna tshogs rtsa mas pa
gsos nas/ thams cad bde bar bgyis te/ mthar gyis ljongs rgyur mchis pa las/ 'brog dgon pa zhig tu mchis pa dang/ rdzong dgon pa ru skyes zhes bgyi ba de'i rkyab bas su nye bas//
0 de na ta stong phrag btsums par ng gdugs kyis bsams pas/ ring po ma thogs par 'gum par 'gyur ba dag mthong lags na/ rgyal po chen po byams pa dang thugs rjes brtse bar dgos te glang po/

che nyashu zhage chab dgal bar skad chage stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis nad pa mang po la srog stsal ba de bzhin ngu nya de dag gi srog gi skyabs bgyid pa lags so zhes gsol to// de nas rgyal po chen pos kyang blon po/

chen po la sman pa'i rgyal po 'di la glang po che byan cig ces bsgo'o// de'i tshe blon po chen pos kyang rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas tshong dpon gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po legs so// khyod bdag/

nyidi glang po che lhas su song ste// yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du glang po che nyashu zhage gdams te khyer la sems can la phan btags nas bde ba thob par gyis shig/ de nas chu 'bebs bu gnyis dang lhan cig

du glang po che nya re'u khride de/ chang pa'i khyim nas rkyal pa mang po g.yar to/ chu dral ba'i gnas su phyin nas rgyal pa chus bkang ste/ glang po che la bkal nas rdzing gi drung du phyin to/ rdzong rganang du blugs pa dang/

snga mkho bzhin du gang zhing rgyas par gyur to// rdzogs kyi lha mo de'ani tshong dpon gyi bus rdzong gi sa bzhi'i 'khor ba'abaltas pa dang/ de nas nya mang po de dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brangs nas 'gram du rgyu bar gyur
to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu yang 'jisnyam du mang po 'di dag ci'i phyi'i bdag gi phyo bzhin 'brang gdon mi ze bar bkris pa'i mes gdungs nas/ bdag la zas slong ba yazhi pas bdag gis sbyin par
(bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ bu la 'di skad smras so// khyod kyis glang po che mchog du stobs dang ldan pa gcige blangs te myur du/

ya khyam du deng la yab tshong dpon gyi bu chu phebs khyom na bzang bung ba'i des po tsho yod pa dang pha ma za ba'i skal ba dang/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran ma dang/ ban pho'i skal ba cu yod pa thamasacad M

kyang bsdus te khyer lashog cig/ de nas bu gnyis phas bstan pa mnan nas glang po cho mchog la zhon te ranges par khyim du song nas/ mes po'i drung du phyin pa dang/ dngos po gong ma rgyas par smras nas/

'tsha byase na bzol rung ba' des po tshu yong pa byas te/ glang po ril bkal nas myur zhinge 'anges par 'jug paT rje nga drung du phyin pa dang de sa chu 'babs bu 'os pa mthong nas/ lus dang sems dga' mgusangs
par gyur te/ zas rnams byas nas rje kun tu khyab par gtor ba dang/ lo rnams zas thob pas thams cad gsashang ma ngo gyur to// yang 'di snyam du deng bdag gis zas yos su btangs/
na rnams srog thob par gyur pas ma 'os par dus kyi tsho yang/ chos kyi za yongs su btang nas/ sems can mtha' yas pa rnams sa par byed par gyur cig snyam mo// gzhan yang 'dzasnyem du'angag
gse dgon pa'i zhigs tshal na dge slong zhag theg pachen po'i mdo klog pa las/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis parIs zab na 'dzin gces pa ston pa'i ng mthong zhing thos/
gzhan yang mdo sde las sems can gang lal zhige 'ad+ha ke'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan thos par gyur na/ mtho rjes su skye bar 'gyur re zhes gsungs pas/
deng bdag rgas nya stong phrag bcu po de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo'ing bstan la/ de bzhin gshogs pa ni 'gatsug phud kyi metshan yang brjod par bya'o//

'dzam bu'i glinge 'ad zhe sems na rnam pa gnyis yod de/theg pa chen po la shan tu mngon par yade skyes pa dang 2yademachis share smod par byed pa ste/de dag kyang mngon par yare skyes pa'i sems 'phel bar byasum

mo//de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu 'di snyam dubadag rdzong gi nang du zhugs te/ nyamang po de dag la mos zab ngoshan tu gya nom pa bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas chu'i nang du zhugs te/ 'di skad ces 'das pa'i ri

bzhazhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ses rgyas 'go pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lhadang ma zems kyi ston pa
sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la ga 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub soms dpa'i spyad pa spyod pon/ bdu ltar thugs ma bzhus ta ka phyags nur

sems can ji snyed pa gang dag rAtsakar dusakyi tshongar mang thos pa ban sha 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyobar 'gyur re zhus bka' stsam do zhes bsgrags so// de nas chu 'bebs kyis rdzong
go 'u de dag chos ba ma gya nom pa'i ng 'di skad du 'a yod pa'i bya'i de yod/ 'ang skyes pa'i phyi'i de skye bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste ma 'ge ba'i skyon gyis 'du byed du byed kyi rkyen chage

rnam par shes pa rnam bshes pa'i rkyen byas mang dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mchang drug gi rkyen gyise'agar thogaba'i rkyen rgyas rab tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/
da pa'i rkyen gyis len pa len pa'i rkyen gyise srade pa/ srong pa'i dbyas skye ba/ skya ba'i rkyen gyis dang/ mya ngan dang/ spyi sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ 'khrug pa 'byung ste//
sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di 'gags pa'i phyi'i 'di 'gag par 'gyur ba ba lta ste/ mthoge pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags bas rnam
saM bgag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tsho
ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas lenang 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas de pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag skye ba 'gags pas sa 'gag/
rga shi 'gags pas mya ngan dang/ sgo sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bakhrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhige 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes
za30 bar do// chos 'di deg bshad nas/ gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzus 'di bstan to// tad+ya thA/ btsan/ btse ni/ ba tsanasaMny+tsani/
saM na/ saMshA naM/ g+ha no/ b+ha nob+ha khen/ snyan / tang shA/ nami no/ namo ni/ na ma no/ sha ti no sha tano/ sha tano de su pra sha nasra pA shano/ sra pAshan swahA/ tad+ya thA/
be rta nabre trani/ bu skrun no// dragano ni/ drag zhazhi/ u pa d+hani/ u pa dzAnaM na u pa d+hi ni swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha bano/ b+ha bano b+ha bano/ sha ta no de sha da no/ sha ti'o ]sham gzhi/
sha mnan/ sha ma zheswAhA/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la tshong dpon gyi bu'i sngon gyi rgyu 'dabastanapa na lha dang mi'i 'khor rnams shin tu ngo mtshar che'o zhes bsngags pa
brjod par gyur to// des rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gseso so nas/ gnas de nyid du mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// legs songashAkya thub pa'i gtso// yan lag bcu gnyis mtshus ldan
pa dam chos mi ge sngags bkas bshad zhes// sngage bsal bsod nams 'phel bar mdzod// bdag cag kyang ni sngags brjod pa// dam pa'i chos ni srung bar bgyid// gang zhig 'gal bar bgyis nas//
legs ba'i rjes su ma 'brang na// a rdza ka ya yal ga bzhin// mgonatshel pa bdun du gams// bdag cag bcom ldan spyan sngaran// rig sngags lan cig brjod par bgyid// dadu b+ho/ hi mo ga te/

bya/ rtagar rAraM/ tsan daraM! d+hIraM/ dzIb re sha ho b+he ra/ pu re pu re gu gu ma tu kho re ma taM/ nga dri mu kha loru g+ha/ mu ru b+ha/ ku tsa mu ru gan+te/ du lung ru du ru pAtse/ a dA sid+d+hi da be ngadape/

chu ste u lho kha rtse/a na le pa b+ha te/ku su ma ba te u su ma bte swA hAkhacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi lha me de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs dang/ bu gnyis kyis rdzong de'i lta dag la ru dang bras

byin nas/ chos bshad de slar rang gi khyim du dong ngo/ 'tshong dpon gyi bu chu'abebs de dus gzhan zhig na ston mo la 'dus te/ ston mo sna tshogs byas nas/ chang gis na ro stanyal ba dang/ de'i tshinya stong phrag

bcu po de dag dus gcig tu tshe 'das nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa de dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gi dego ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gang gis lha'i gnas 'jalegyos par gyur thos bsamAnas phan tshun

gcig la gcige 'daked du bdag cag na sngon 'dzam bu'i gling du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su lhung nas nya'i lus blangs pa la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ bdag cag la chu dang sras bya'i nas/ gzhan yang
'a bdag cag la cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang gzungs kyang bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin gtsug phud kyi mtshan nas kyang brjod pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des bdag

aab/ cag lha'i gnas 'di'i skyes pa yin pos/ de'i phyi'i bdag cag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thad du dong la/ drazhe bab pa'i phyi'i mchod pa bya ba'i thigs so zhes smras so// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu

po de dag lha'i gnas de nas ma sbe bar ga te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du sman pa'i rgyal po chen po'i thod du lhags so// de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de yang theg mthon po'i steng du bde bar gnyid log pa las/

lha'i bu stong phrag bcu bo de dag gis mu tig gi 'phrang ba stong phrag bcu na mego drung du bzhag/ mang stong phrag bcu ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ yang stong phrag bcu ni g.yas logs su bzhag/ yang stong
phrag bcu na g.yon logs su bzhag ste/ me tog man da ra bang man da ra pa chen po'i char pa dus nub tsam du phab nas/ 'od kyis kun snang bar byas te/ lha'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra dbya tA/
snyan pa dag byung nas 'dzam bu'i gong du gnyid log ba thams cad sad par byas so// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang gnyid log pa las sad par grub pa dang/ de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag
gis mchod pa byas nas nam mkha' la 'phur te dong ngo// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyi yul khams su'ang gnas de dang de dag thams cad du/ lha'i me tog pad dam pa'i 'a mngon par phab bo//

lha'i bu mang po de dag sngon gyo gnas dgon pa'i rdzong drung du dong nas/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon pa'i phab ste/ de nas ma snang bar gyur nas// sAr lha'i gnas su dong ste/ de bzhin du ca degal ba

'dod ba lnga'i bde ba dag la longs sbyod par gyur to// rgyal pelha'i debang phyug ga'od kyang nyams pa dang/ bon po chen po de dag la mdang sum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyi'i ya mtshan gyi mtshan ma de lta bu dag snang nga/
'od zer chen po dag kyang bkye bar gyur ces smras so// blon po chen pos smras pa/ rgyal bo chen po mkhyen par mdzod cige/ lha'i tshogs mang po chen po rnams kyi tshong dpon gyi bu chu bebs kyi sdum

zhu tig gi phreng ba 'bum phrag bcu dang/ me tog man da ra ba'amadzen nga' bab pas lus nub tsam du brgyas lags so// rgyal pos blon po la bsgo ba/ tshong dpon gyi khyim du song la/de'i bu bos shage/ blon po chen posaM

bka' la nyanas/ de'akhyom du song ste/ rgyal po'i bka' bzlas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu bkugago deb tshong dpon gyi bu rgyal po'i drung du nib dang/ mdang sum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyi'i/ ya mtshan chab 'i mtshan ma de lta bu byung bar

grub ces pas so// tshong dpon gyi bus smras pa/ bdagags dpyad pa ltan gdon ma 'tshal bar rdzong de 'azhing ga nya mang po de dag mdo sde las gsungs pa bzhin nga tsho'ongs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pas/ de dag sngon lan

thon pa'i slad du ya mtshan che ba'i nam de lta bu bstan snyam bgyin lags// rgyal bos smras pa/ ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyie smus pa/ lhas pho nya 'ga' zhig dang/ bdag gi bu gnyis rdzong chen po'i drung du btang ste/

stong phrag bcu po de dag gam mam 'tsho brtagasamad dam ma med dam mkhyan par 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ pho lha dang de'i bu gnyis rdzong de ba dung du btang ba las/ rdzong de 'a nang na me tog mas nga

bamang bo phung po chen pos gang bar gyur pa dang/ na mang bo thams cad dus las 'das par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang slar myur du log ste/ rgyas pa brgyal po la gsol pa dang rgyal po'ang de ltar gyur pa thos pas rab tu

dga' ba'i grub nas/ sngon de lta bu ma byung ngozhas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar shes/

bya ste// sngon byung batshong dpon gyi bu chu phobs zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid ya go/ tsho dpon gyi bu chu 'dzin zhes bya ba de rnamadzes pa'i tog lazhino// der bu gnyis las bu chen po rgyug shes bya ba de ni deng la rgya reg bya ba nyid

bzhin// de la buchung ngu chub mdzod ces bya ba dan de ngu lagyi 'od ces bya ba nyid lazhin// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od ces bya ba 'di ni byang chub kyi nga ga wA ma khyod nyade yin no// nya stong phrag bcu po de dag ni lha'i

bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag nyid yane'o// ngas sngon nya de dag la chu dang rdzas byin te mi par byas nas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab ma dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par
rgyu de dang/ gzhan yang de bzhigshegs pan chen gtsug phud de 'a mtshan s brjod de bstan pa'i reg ba'i rtse ba de rgyus mtho ris su skyes par gyur pas/ nga nga'i thad du 'ongs nas rab tu dga' ba chos
mnyan ngas/ sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas/ de dag ga mong mas bstan pa yin no// gas kyi lha mo ji ltags sngon srid u0f7aba rnams su 'khor ba na 'khor ritsho/

mas can tshad med pa snyad la rgyanye'apha btags nas/ thams cad me rgyasi blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du khyod cag thams cad kyis kyang nan tan brtson 'grus
kyis nges par 'byung ba yongs su gar nas bgan da par ma bye'o// de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang/ thams cad kyis byams pa dang snying rje chen
so thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad na/ gad bla na med pa'i byang chub rtogs shing mngon du byed par 'gyur ba khong du chud par gyur bas/ 'an tu dang ba'i
sems kyis mngon pa de skyes shang rab tu dgar ba' gyur te// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ tshong dpon gyi bu mu'ababs kyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//
gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo bam po bcu nga/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la lha'i bu stong phrag bcu
bo de ga ga sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen bkas bshad nas/ yang byang chub kyashang ga lha mo dang/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'das pa'i dus kyatsho byang chub sems dpa' lam spyod

na/ chu dang zas sbyin pa btang nas lta de dag gi srog la phan btags pa 'ba' zhig byas pa ma yan gyi/ shan tu 'phangs pa'i lus kyang yongs su btang ste/ de'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa lhan cig blta ba
bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i gnas kyi steng dang/ lha'i gzhas kyi 'og thams cad na mchog tu rnam par rgyal zhing mchog tu btsun pa//
'od zer brgya stong du mas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar mdzad pa/ mkhyen pa thams cad phun gsum tshogs par gyur pa// yon tan yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa des dge slong rnams/

dang/ 'khor mang po rnams dang thabs cig tu pan tsa lang ljongs su byon nas/ nags tshal sa gzhapek+kan tu mnyam la tsher ma rnams med nga/ me tog mchog dam pa dang rtswa 'jam po dag gis kun tu khyab bar
bkram par gshegs to/bam ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// khyed kyis gang 'dra'o drung du ngar chod du stan thongs shage/ de nas tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka'
man nas gdan bting ngo// bting zin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das gangan bshams lags na/'phags pas dus mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das gdan gyi steng du skyol mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang nas/ yang dag pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhagaste bzhugs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag sngon dka' ba spyad pa'i byang
chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus kyi ring bsrel bltabar 'dod dam/ dge slong rnams e gsol pa// bdag cag mthong bar mes lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgyas rab tu brgyan pa/

tshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i phyag gse sa la bstan pa dang/ deratshos chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tugayos par gyur pas/sa gsangahange bye bar gyur pa dang/ bzhi po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten rin po chesna tshogs kyi
@#// drang thab tu brgyan pa zhig mngon par 'phags te byung ba 'khor mang pa kun gyase mthong nas/ ngo mtshar che ba'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhes

ba te phyag mdzad nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba mdzad de slar gdan la bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis mchod rten 'di sgo phye zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' khos sgo
phye ste/ zhi bo che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgrom bu bde po ni mchog dam pas brgyan pa zhig mthong ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad shed rtses gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rin po che sna bdun las bgyis
pa'i sgrom bu ni po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhig gdar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyashe bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis sgo phye zhig/ dems tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka'amanyan
nas phye ba dang/ khams ri bsrol kha dog dung dang me tog ku mu da 'dra ba zhig mthong ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das lagasol pa/ sgrom gyi steng na 'dri srol kha gdam pa gzhan las khyad par du
'phags pa zhig gda' lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis yakar stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu chen po'i rus pa 'di khyer te ge rtsage/ de nas tshe dang ldan kun dga' bos rab srol de blangs
sa bam ldanubs la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhes nas/ dge slong rnams la khyed kyis dka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus shing bsrel bzhag pa la ltos shage ces bka' stsal

nas tshogs su bcad de bkar sal pa/ byang chub sems par yon tan mchog ldan blo// rab dpar brtson pas pha la phyin drug rdzogs// rtag sgom byang chub phu'i na rgyun chad med// btang snyoms chab rtan sems la

ngal ba med// dge slong dag khyed cag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus la gus pas phyag byos shig/ ngebasrel 'ang tshul khrims dang nge 'dzin dang/ shes thab kyi sngo tshod med ba dag
gis yongs su gtugs pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa yin pas shan tu phrad par dka' 'o// de nas dge slong rnams dang/ 'khor mang po rnams kyis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas thal me sbyar te/
mgo bos ring bsrel pa phyag byas nas/ sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung nge 'is bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dgakho mdun du 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa la gas/ sems can kun gyis bsnyen
bkur bgyi ba lags na/ rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du lus kyi rus pa 'di la phyag mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kug be gsus pa'i 'o rgyus gyurd

named pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i khying tshuga mngon par rdzog par sadargyas par gyur pas/ sngon gyi dro'i bsab pa'i phyir deng ngas phyag byas pa yin no// yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// ngas deng khyod dang
'khor mang po'i tho rtsom dang som nyi gcod pa'i phyi'i/ ring bsrel 'di'i sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang la bam ma yin pa yang dag par bshad kyis/ khyed cag legs par yod la byos la sems rtsa gcoge
tu nyon cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bag cag shan tu thos par mos lags na/ rnatshapar phye ste bas bshad du gsol kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi yul gcug gi rgyal po

shing rta chen po zhes bya ba shazhe tu phyag tsang na mang pa/ bang mdzod rgyas ba/ dmag ga depung rab tu dpa' ba/ mang po kun gyis bkur zhing ngag nyan pa/ rtag par yang dag par chos kyis skye bo 'dul ba/ mo rnam

dang zhange rgyas pa/ phyir rgol ba'od gra med pa zhig yod de/ btsun ma dam pa la byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa/mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa'i bu gsum yod de/ bu chen po'i ming ni sgo chen po zhes

bya'o// bu 'bring po'i mong ni lha chen po zhes bya'o// bu tha chungs kyi mong na sems can chen po zhes bya'o// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de rtsa zhing ltad mo lta ba'i phyi'i/ 'a dang nag kun du blta bar rgyas pa dang/ bu/

gsum po de'ang phyi bzhin du dong ngo// me tog dang 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyi'i pha sbangs de kun tu 'khyam pa las/ 'od ma'i tshal chen po zhig tu phyin te ngal bsos so// de nas rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad dudeng bdagan
sems skrag cing 'jigs par gyur/ nags tshal 'di'i gcan gzan ma rungs pa dag gis bdag cag gsod par mi 'gyur lam zhes pas so// rgyal bu 'bratshe pos yang 'di skad du/ bdag na reng galus

la dang po nas 'phangs ba med na/ snying du sdug pa de dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal zhige 'byung du dogs so zhes smras so// rgyal bu tha chungs kyis phu bo gnyis la sas pa// 'di ni lha dang drang srong 'dug pa'i
gzhas bdag la 'jigs dngangs 'bral pa'i mya ngan med// lus semos kun khyab dgo ba skyes pas na// khyad par 'phags pa'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur/ de tsho rgyal bu rnams so so nas rang gi sems
la ci bsams pa'i dengos po dag smras nas/ mthar gyis mdun du song ba las/ stag mo zhig du bdun btsas nas zhag bdun len pa// bu rnams kyise bsor bas bkres pa dang skom pa dag gse rab tu ga'i
ga lus 'di cang nyam chung/ ring por ma thogs par brgya bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang/ rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du/ kye ma stag ma 'di ni bu btsas nas zhag bdulen te/ bu bdun gyis yongs su
bskor bas zas btsal ba'ang ma khom ste/ bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis rab tu gcir bas gdon mi za bar du rnams za bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// rgyal bu nyams can chen pos smras pa/ stag 'dareg/

rtag par zas jalta bu zhig khra/ rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/ stag dang seng ge pha sbyang rnams/ sha khrag dron mo 'ba' tshuge za// de bas gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis//'don 'am chung sel mi nus/ rgyal bu
'bronge pos de skad smras pa thos pa dang/ 'di skad ces smras so// stag mo ni ro'i ring tamachung la/ bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar
tshad par dka' ba'i bras dang skom btsal ba'anus/ su zhage na 'od degag chod du nang gi lus dang srog spus nas/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ rgyal bu chen pos/
smras pa srang bar dka' ba thams cad kyi nangan bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang yang med de// rgyal bu soms can chen pos smras pa/ deng bdag cagan so sos nango ga lus la srid cing mngon ba zhen pa dang
shes rab med pas gzhan rnams la phan 'dogs ma nus kyis/ skyes bu dam pa dag na song rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas rtag par gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyi'i/ rang gi lus khyad du bsad nas sems
can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed/ gzhan yang 'di snyam dubadag ga lus 'di ne tsho rabs brgya stong du mar bar du don med par phul zhing myags te bor bas phan pa ci'ang byas pa med// ci'i phyi'i dang
mchil snabs bzhin du yongs su spangs nas/ bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed snyam mo// de tshe rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag smras nas/ so so nas byamasashange ba babasamA
bskyod de/ stag mo nyam chung ba de la mgo ma g.yeng bar bltas nas/ ring zhig tu bskor te cig car spangs nas dong ngo// de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gses lus srog btangaba'i
dusanang yan te de ri'i po'i zhen/ bdag gis yun ring lus 'di babazung yang/ mi gtsang mnam la rnag 'dzag yade ma 'ong// yo byad gos bras shing rta dang po rta/ ba dang ni me rim gro byas kya
'gyur zhing 'ge chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag rtag tshul dgang dka' srung bar thab tu dka'// rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni// nams kyang bdag 'ab byas pa'i dro'i ma shes// gzhan yang lus 'di mi/
brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa// 'jigs su rung bas dag dang 'dra ba/ mi gtsang bas lud dang mtshungs pa yin pas/ deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas/

skyabashab rgya mtsho'i gru gzings chen po byas te/ 'khor ba yongs su spangs nas nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo// gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na/ 'di nyide'obras dang/

nad ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang/ 'jigasashadzi skyag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no// lus 'di ni bshang gtsa'aba' zhig dang ldan pa/ chu bur lta bur ma brtan pa/ srin bu mang po 'dus pa/ rtsa rgyus
a pa phan tshun 'brel ba/ shin tu yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmages dang bcas pa yin pas/ de'i phyir deng bdag gis lus yozas su sbas nas/ blan med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa yos

su btsal te/ mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang/ mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ 'khrug pa gtan du spangs nas/ 'khor ba rgyun bcad de zhes pa rnams sbyangs nas/ ting nge 'dzazhi dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis phu/
sum tshogs pas bsgomasu sa/ [']sod nams pad+ma steng ang [']nga can pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa sprul pa/ sa ngos rgyus mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi skushAn tu gya nom pa thob par bya'o//
thob par gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi se tshang med pa gtang bar bya'o snyam mo//de'i tshe rgyal bu shan tu brtul ba'i dpa' bsran dang smon lam chen po btab nas/ snying rje/
chen po bsam pas sems brtas shaji phel bar gyur kyang/ phu boganyise skugatsang dngangs ngas bar chad kyi bgags byas nas smon pa ma 'grub par dogs pas phu bo gnyis la gcan gnyis sagshegs
gi/ bdagar zhagasar mams so zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slatshal gyi nang du zhugs nas/ stag mo'i drung duphyin te/ gos phud nas 'od ma'i stong dugazhag ste smon lam 'di dag ba/

lcago bdagan tshos mkhas sems can kun gyi 'i// bla med byang chub gnas nagetur bas na// snying rjechen po'i sems skyong g.yo ba med// skye bos 'dangs pa'i lus zhigatong bar byed// byang chub nang medag du
ba med pas na// blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu sa// khamasagasum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun// deng bdag drangs nas bde la 'god par shog/ de nas rgyal bus ga de skad smras nas/ stag

ma ltogs pa'i mdun du lus bor te nyal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang snyang+ge rdza' gatra byon gyi mthus stag mos ca'ong byed ma nus so// byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong ba dang/
ya ri mthon po'i steng du 'dzegs te lus bor nas 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni/ nyam chung zhing rgya bas bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nasaM las te/ mtshon btsal yang ma red pas// bod ma

skam po'i tshil ngas lkog mar khrag phyung ste/ mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bstan pa dang/ der tshe 'di ltar rlung gse chu bskyod pa bzhin dusachen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa'i gyur nyane'ang

sgra gcan gyis bsgrubes ba bzhin du 'od dang ma ldan bas/ phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas/ lha rnams kyis kyang mi tig ma pa dang sbos mchog dam pa 'char yang mngon par gab pas/ tshal gyi zhing du

kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to/ de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams e dngos po de lta bu mthong pa dang/ rjes su yareng ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sngon chad ma yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo
zhes par sngags pa brjod do/ khams cad kyis skyes bu chen bo legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas tshigs su bcad de sas pa/ skyes bu chen bo longs su skyob pa sIng rjel saA bskyod nas/
bu gcig bzhin du sems can manyam par lta//rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'khrungs med pas// lus skabs 'phongs skyob bsod nams dpag par dka'// sa par rtag bde gya nom gnas thun nas/
'khor ba 'ching ba mang bo gtan du spong// ring por ma thogs byang chub 'bras thob nas// nyer zhi bde ba skye meda mngon rtogs 'gyur/ de'i stag mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa' lkogal
sa khrag zag pa mthong ba dang khrag bldags te sha ma lus par khros pas/ rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so// de nas rgyal bu chen posaMs gsos pa mthong ba dang/ nu bo la snus
u/ sa chen ra klung kun kyang rab tu g.yos// phyogs kun mun nag rta ma'i 'od ma ldan// lha ya me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab nas// 'di ni nu bos nges par lus spus rtags//
rgyal bu ra brang pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang tshigs su bcad de smas pa/ stag mo lus ltogs shan tu nyam chung ba// bkras gzi'i bu phrug bza' dogs mthong nas ni// sems can chen bo
ba bag thos nas// nu bos lus btang dang bdag the tshom 'tshal// de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas/ smra sngags bton te sa nas/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu sar stag
me'i drung du phyin te/ nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal/ rus pa dang skra na kun tu babor 1 khrog babs pas na rjeb tu gyur nas/ sa gzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang/ brgyal nas
rang gi lus kyi gzung ma nus pas/ rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te/ ring zhige len nas dran pa slar thob pa dang/ langs nas lag pa bteg ste rab tu sa nas smre sngags bton pa/ bag cag nu
bo byad sdug mdzes// pha ma gnyis ka lhag par byams// ca phyi'i lhan cig phyir byung nas// lus spangs pa na ldog ma gyur// gal te pha mas dras gyur na// bdag cag la ji skad gdab// lhan cig
sroganitong blan// rang gi lus ni co phye'i bzhag/ de nas rgyal bu gnyis smra bregs bton te ngus nas/ de lagachags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te deng ngo// de tshe rgyal bu tha chungu kyis khrid pa'i

0 g.yog 'khor na phan tshun gcig la yas gtsage 'di skad du/ rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rigs so zhes smras par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo yang tog mthon por stong du nyal ba/
lam na/ ltas ngan pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba bdalta ste/ nu ma [”] gnyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang/ so lhung ba dang/ phug ron gyi phrug gu gsum thob pa las/ gcuge na khras khyab/ gnyis ni dengs

shang skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur te// sa g.yos pa'i btsun mo sa da de/ sams lamya ngan chen po skyes nas 'di sked du smras so// ci'i phyi'i dngan se chen rab tu g.yos// chu klung nags tshal ljon

gange kun kyang 'gul// nyi ma 'od med g.yos shing bsgribs pa 'dra// mige 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yong ma 'dra// snying la mdas phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir// lus kun rab tu g.yo zhing bde ba ci yang
med// bdag gis rmi lam ltas ngan mthong bas na// nges bar sngon med ltas na dngos po yod// btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis la nu zho zags pa dang/ 'di snyam du'adazhige don ma za bar ltas ngan gyi dngos kho

ston pa yazhin sAmamo// de'i nang 'khor ma zhig phyi'il kya mo rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma red de zhes bu rab sbyor pa dang/ sems la ni tu skrag cing 'jigs pa skyes nas pho brang gzheng du song ste/
btsun mo la 'di skad ces smras so// lhatshamkhyen lags sam/ slad rol gyi mi rnams las kun tu so sor btsal ba las/ da dung ma red ces mtshabe chos lags so// de nas btsunas tshig de skad smras pa chos
pa dang/ mya ngan chen po skyes pas sne sngags bton te/ mge mchi mas gang bzhin nga rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po la 'di skang gsol to// lhachen po bdag gas slang rol gyi mo rnams

las 'di skad du/ bdagag bu sdug tha chung sor ces mtshib thos lags so// rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang 'an du skrag par gyur pas/ brnangs bzhin du skye tshig 'ang skad du kyi hung sdug bsngal lo// deng pa'i

bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to oM smras nas/ mchi ma sa te btsun mo la spro ba bskyed nas rang skad du bzhin bzang khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ da deng lhan cig phyi'i byung ste bu sdug btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/

rgyal po btsun mo dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ so sor rgyas te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las// ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nyo bar 'ongs te/ rgyal po la 'di
skad ces gsol to// ltargyal bu bzhugs zhes thos pas/ thugs nganam mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bu ba chung na de dung mo nga'i lags so// rgyal pos tshigade thos pa dang smra sngags bton nas/ 'jaskad

du kyi hud nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras par gyur to// dang po bu yod tshe na dga' ba chung// phyis nibu stol tshen sdug bsngal skye// gang de nga bu srog na slar thoban/ nga ya lus//
sdug bsngal ci yang med// btsun mos de skad thos pa dang/ dper na mas phog pa bzhin du mya ngan gyis kun tu dkris par gyu'i pas/ smra tshig 'ang skad ces smras so// bdag gi bu gsum 'khor
dang bcas pa'i na// nags tshal dong sa lhan cig rtse ba las ya/ bu sdug tha chung gtsug pu ma 'ongs pas// nges par bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos po yod 'gyur ba// de'i 'og tu yang blon po 'brang
po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'os pa las/ rgyal pos blon po de la bu sngago gang na 'dug ces smras pa las/ blon po'abrang pos de yade la gtsugs te jus pasaM/ lkog ma dang rtswa'ang bskams nas
tshig 'bu'i nga lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang/ btsun mos rang skad kyis phris so// bu chung da ltar gangan skyar du smos// bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par grub// myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi
sams nyid stor// bdag gi brang nad rang gas snyam byed// de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongs su btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas pa dang/ rgyal po dang
btsun mos gtam de thos nas/ smra zhang mchi mas brnangs bzhin du lus yongs su btang ba'i sa phyogs su myur 'ang 'dris par dong ste/ 'od ma'i tshol byang chub sems dpas lus yongs su btang ba'i gnas su

phyon nas/ sa pa rnams kun tu 'byor ba mthong ba dang/ cig car sa la 'gyel te shi ba dang 'dra bar brgyal bar gyur pas// de dang dan rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po 'gyel ba bzhin dusems rmongs shing dran/

ba stor bas shes pa ru'ang med par gyur to// de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang/ rgyal po dang btsun mo ring zhig lon nas gdod dran pa thob par gyur to// de nas lag pa bteg ste 'dug
nas smatshig smras pa/ kyi hud bu sdug mdzes par mtshan ldan pa// ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'os gtses// gal ste khyod kyi mdun du bdagashake/ 'di 'dra'i sdug
bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur// de nas btsun mo phyes shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang/ skra long long por gyur te/ lag pa gnyis kyase brang brdungs nas/ nya skam sa la 'gyel ba
bzhin dus la 'gro ste/ babu stor ba bzhin du ngus sa sme tshage smras pa/ bdag ga bu na sus gtubs na// rus pa lhag mas lagator// bdag gyi bu sdug stor bas na/ mya ngan sme ba nang mi
thog kyi shud bu ni sus bas da na// mya ngan dngos po 'do 'dra ma byung// bdag snying rdo rjes yanem// rtsi yo phyore na gas ma gyur// bdag gi rmi lam zhu mo gnya'o// gzhan dag gis ni bcad
pa dang// so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na// nga na sdug bsngal chen po myong/ phug ron phrug gu gsum las ni// gcig ni khras khyer mthong bsan// deng na bu stag stor gyur pas// ltas
ban ston lam bden med// de nas rgyal po chen po de btsun me dang/ bu gnyis dang bcas par brtsi bar gtugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te skya bo'i tshog saM mang po dang lhan cig tu byab
chub sems dpas bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyi'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go/ kun dag bo khyod kyis 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de'i ring bsrel yin par
rig par bya'o// yang tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// nga sngon 'dong chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogasapa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tsho na'agasems can dmyal ba
dang pa la degs dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu'ang rgyun ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyabs nas phan btags te/ nges par 'byung ba thob par byas nas/ da ltar nyon mos
pa thams cad zad nas bgachags kyi lhag ma med de/ lha dang mi'i ston par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas sems can ra ri'i phyi'i yang bskal po mang po'i bar du/ sems can dmyal ba dang

gnas gzhan dag tu gnas te/ sdug bsngal snatshegags dang du blangs nas skyesha dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges pa ra 'byung ba thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ca degos te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dono

de nyidi yang bstan pa'i phyoge tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// bskal pa grang med tshad med snyed ces 'oga' yul gyi rgyal po byas// nges 'ga' rgyal bu byas pa na// rtag par sbyin pa chab
btang shin tu 'das pa'i lus btang bas/ 'khor ba las dngos byung sta/ byang chub dam pa phyan par smon/ sngon byung yul chen zhig tun// yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya// rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bya ba//

rtag bar sbyin gtong sar sna med// de la phu bo gnyis yodade// sgra chen lha chen zhes bya ba// gsum po lhan cig phyir byung ste/mtha' rgyas radeng nags tshal phyin/ stag mo bkres pas nyen mthong nas// 'di
khya@#// 'dra'i sems ni bskyed par gyur// stag mo bkres mes rab bsregs kyang// gzhan bzar rung ba ci yang med// skyes chen 'di 'dra mthong nas ni ]/de yas bun zos dogs phu'i// chags

med lus na phab btang nas// bu bskyabs rmas pa med par byas// sa chen dang na re nems kyang// dus gcige thoms cad rab tu g.yos// chu klung rgya mtshoTan tu 'khrug/ rlabs chu dag nagyin du 'bab// gnam sa
'ong na ster bas na// mun nag tu yeng ma thong bamed// nags tshal dgon pa'i gcan gzan rnams// rabur rgyug rnams ni yongs su spangs/ bu gnyis ci'o phye ma log ces/ mya ngan brtse ba'i sdug bsngal
skyas// g.yog 'khor mang po rnams dang ni// nags tshal kun tu yongs su btsal// sbyin gnyis lhan cage rab 'grogs te// ri ba nags su phyin nas niaM// phyogs bzhir bltas kyang mi ma mthong//
stag mo mthong ba'i gnas stong du// ma dang bu bdun bcas par// thams cad khrag gis kha bsus dang// rus pa stag mo skra ya rnams// sa la kun du 'thor ba mthong// gzhan yang khrag ni
zags pa rnams// 'od ma'i tshul kun 'bagasapa dag/ phu bo gnyis kyis mthong nas ni// sems la 'jigs skrag chen po skyes/ de ga'i ka brgyal nas sa la 'gyel// 'khrugs myos
tsa yang ma dren pas// sa rdul dag gse lus kun gos// rnam shes drug ni dran pa nyams/ rgyal bu g.yog ni mang po rnams// de tshe sems la mya ngan skyes// mugator dran pa thob nas
kyang/ 'gabatagaskadachos phyung ste dus// byang chub sems dpa'i lus btang ste// byams pa'i mi na pho brang nang// bud med lnga brgya rnams dang ni// lhan cige 'os sbyod myong ba las// btsun mo/
dam pa'i num gnyis// rang gzhuzho sngags gyur pas// lus kun khab kyis phug pa bzhin// shin tu sdug bsngal rab tu byed// bu stor 'du shes skyes pas na// mya ngan zug rdu bams la zug/
rgyal po chen po zhes byas nas// sdug bsngal dngos po de dag bshad// rmongs smra ba ma bzod pas// brtso ba'i skad kyis rgyal po la// rgyal po chen po mkhyen pa mdzod// deng bdag sdug bsngal
chen po skyes// nu bo gnyis na reng byung bas// bkab kyang bsam pa bzhin ma grub/ khabakyis lus kun phug pa bzhin// mya ngan blang na gas la thug/ bdag nagayar lam lnga ltas na//
nges par bu sdug stor bar gyur// lhosan bedag ga srog skyobs la// bu ni gum gson mkhyen par mdzod// g.ya' lam phug ron gsum mthong ba// chung ngu de na bu sdug lag// khrasan phrogs
te 'tshal bsen// mya ni rdzogs par gsol ba dka'// deng bdag mya ngan mtshon byangebs// 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang ma thogs// bu srog ma gson glo ba chung// myur ba nyid du btsal bar gsol//
gzhan yang slad rol ma rnams las// bu chungam rnyed thos pas na// deng bdag sems ni reb ma bde// lhas na bdag la brtse bar mdzod// btsun mos de skad smras na/khus btegs la rab tu brdabs .]
rab tu brtse bas sems brgyal myos// rab rmongs shes pa ci yang med// nang 'khob bud med btsun mo de// brgyal te sa la 'gyel mthong nas// skung cher byung ste rab tu dus//

myaban dngangs skrag gnas kyang stor// rgyal pos tshig de bros pas zhu// mya ngan rang nyid gzung ma nus// blon po thams cad bkug nas ni// bu sdug tshol bar yongs su bkye// thams cad grong khye'abya'i
byung ste/ de dag de dag kun tu btsal// ngus nas mi no mang po la// rgyal bu gang na yod ces smras// da ltar gson nam 'on te sha// gang song ba su yase shes// ji ltar byas na ma thong gyur nas//
bdag cag mya ngan bsal bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po thams cad kun// rgyal bu de ni shi war bas// thos pa thams cad rab tu gdung// smra sngags sdug bsngal brjod par dka'// de tshe rgyal po gang
cha monges smras nas stan las las// btsun mo'i drung du nyar song ste// de yi lus la nus kyang gtor// btsun mo chus na gtor ba na// ring zhig gnas dran pa thob// rab thos rgyal po la
zhus pa/ bdag bu da ltar gnams// rgyal pos btsun mo la bsgo ba// ngas ni pho nya mang bkye ste// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal bu tshol bcug na// da dung gtam skye la longs ma 'ongs// rgyal bos
tsun mo yang bsgo ba// khyod ni mya ngan ma byed par// re zhig rang nyid bde bar byos// lhan cig phyi'i byung btsal bar bya// de nas rgyal po btsun mo bcas// bzhon pa zhen nas mdun du sa//
tha smra ba'i skad kyis chos btab// gdung sems men 'bar ba 'dra// ya rabs ma rabs brgya stong rnams// rgyal po'i rjes su grong khyer byung// brtse ba'i sgra mched par// so sor rgyal du yongs su
la// rgyal bos bu phrug btsal ba'i phyir/ mag gse phyogs bzhi'i bltas pa las// sgra bshig khrag gis lus bskus te// lus kun rdul rgyas gos pa dang// dus nas mdun bcad 'ong ba
ma ma zhoge kyang namethong ba'agyur// rgyal bos ltas ngan de mthong nas// lhag par mya ngan skyes par gyur// rgyal bos lag pa gnyis bteg nas// brtsa bas jus te bkag ma nus// thog mar blon po chen

pa zhige/ mnges stabs rgyal po'i drung khongs nas// rgyal po de la 'di skad smras// lha na thugs ngan ma mdzad gsol// lha yi thugs brtse sras bu de// da dung rnyed par ma gyur kyang// ring por ma thogs phyi'i
mchi// lha na thugs ngan ma mdzad gsol// rgyal po yang na song ba las// bon po 'bring po 'ongs pa mthong// blon po rgyal po'i drung khongs nas// ngus te rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal bu gnyis na
bzhugs pa yang// mya ngan zhugs kyis longs su gdungs// rgyal bu tha chungs gang lags pa// den ma rtog pa yis med// bu btsas stag mo ltogs pa zhig/ bu 'tshol snyam pa gatrags nas ni//
rgyal bu sems can chen polaso// gas rje chen po'i sems bskyed de// bla med laman gnyer ba dang// mang bo thams cad bzla ba'i slad// byang nub mchog la 'dushes bangs// shani tu zab
'gya ya sa rgya mtsho bzhin// mtho rtse la 'dzegasazhas// stag mo ltogs mdun sku yang bor// nyam chung 'atsal rjem thogs nas// 'od mas mgur du khrag phyung bas// rgyalabu'o
skun ratshal bsan/ skugadung lhag ma tsam zhig lus// de tshe rgyal po btsun mor bcas// de skad thos nas brgyal bar gyur// sems na rtsen mtsho byang ste// nyon mongs me yis rab tu bsregs//
blon pos tsan danamugags// rgyal po btsun mor gtor bas na// cig car las nas rab tu dus// lag bteg brang dag la yang 'jus// blon bo chung ngu'ong nas ni// rgyal po de la 'daskad smras//
bdag gi rgyal bu gnyis po zhi/tshalan brgyal bar gyurapa mthong// bdagags chab grang gtor bas na// dran pa cung zad thob par gyur// phyogs bzhi deg na ge khrigs pas na// rab tu 'bar me kun khyab/
badra// skad cig bzhes kyang slar yang 'gyel/ tshongs bdag nyid 'dzin ma spyod// phyag bteg brtse ba'i tshig dag gis// gcung ga yamtshan bsngags par mdzad// rgyal pos de skad thos nas kyang//
skya zha me yis lhag par btsos// btsun mos rab tu dus nas ni// skad cha'i phyung ste 'daskad smras// bdag gi bu sdug lhag par byams pa de// ma rtog srin po dag gis med par gyur//
de ltar bu gnyis lus par gyur pa yang// mya nganame yase ba srogs son yang mos// bdag deng ra rlung dag tu myur song la// spro bskyed srog ga lhag ma bsrung bar bya// de nas bzhon zhen lam
tha 0 du myur zhugs nas// rtse gcige sems kyis lus spangs brag rdung song// bu gnyis ya gcags brang brdungs spyod tshul nyams// 'gro bzhizhi ngu ba dag dang lam du 'phrad// pha mas par blos mya
na sngags bton// cig car lus btapa deng nags su dang// byang nub soms dpas lus spangs nas phyin nas// lhan cig 'dus nas rab dus sdug bsngal che// rgyan 'phreng ba krol te song
tsham ngus nas// byang chub sems dpa'i rus bu lhag ma bsdus// skye bo mang pos lhan tshuge mchod pa byas// rin chen sna bdun mchod rten brtsigs nas// ring bsrel de na sbrum gyi nang du bzhag
mya sha bas bzhi'i sar no grong khyer dang// kun dga' lan boka' stsal pa// sngon byung masacan chen po ni// shAkya grub pa nga yin pas// gzhan yone snyam du bsam ma bya// rgyal bo zas
gtsang yab yon te// btsun mo nga yum sgyu 'phrul ma'i// rgyal bu chen po byams pa yin// rgyal bu 'dzade po 'jam dpal yan// stagamo skye dgu'i bdagamo yin// bu lnga dag slong ljang yin//
gcagan mo gal chen po'i bu/ gtsagon shA ri'i bu yanan// ngasan khyod rug thams cad la// sngon gzhan phan btags pa yi gtam// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bshad// sangs rgyas 'grub
rgyu 'daslob byos// byang chub sems dang sa lus btang tshe// smon lam rgya chen 'di skad btab// bdag lus rus pa lhag ma yos// ma 'ongs sems can phan 'dogs shog/ 'di no lus
btang gnas yin te// rin chen sna bdun mchod rten de// la ni tshod med bar du gnas// de nas sa 'og byang bar 'gyur// sngon gyi smon lam mthu stobs kyis// rkyen ni jo bzhin
sems can zlos// lham kun la phan gdags bya'i// sa las 'phags te byung ba yin/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon rgyud 'di bestan pan// lha dang ma skyo bo'i tshigs tshad med gras med pa lhod yong

su gdung ba dang dga' ba chen po skyes te/ sngon mdu nam yang 'ad lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ thams cad blan med pa yang dag pab rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub
kyagong gi lha mo la yang bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni drin lan dran pa'i phyir gus pas phyag byas pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par bsdus pa dang/ mchod rten de yang slabs
'og tu byang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal pa las/ lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u sta nyashadug pa'o////de'i tshe de bzhazhigshegs
shAkya thub pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa da so so nas rang
gi zhing khams nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas sems rtse gcige
tu thal mo sbyar te/ mgrazhe gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa dag gse mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog ldan// 'od zer kun gsal gser gyi ri bo 'dra// rnam dgab
mnyan pad+ma dag dang mtshungs// mtshan mchog dam pa tshad med kun tu bkod// mtshan zhi sum curtsa gnyis rab brgyan te// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs// 'od zer rab gsal dpo zla yod/
ma mchis dra brel dper na nam dag zla nya 'dra// gsung dbyas rab dang shin tu gya nom pas// sang ga bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dam pa rnam brgyad dbang po mthun mdzad pas/
ka la bonge ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags// bsod nams brgya ya mtshan mchog sku brgyan pas// 'od zer phun tshogs dramo yongs ma mnga'// mkhyen blo rab gas la dper na rgya mtsho 'dra// yon tan/
rgya chen nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs// yongs rdzogs 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang// rgyanan jo bzhin sems can sgrol bar mdzad// nyon mongs srid pa'i bag chags kun bsal na[Y]//
chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun ma 'chad// thugs brtses sems can dag la phan 'dogs pas// da ltar slad ma'i dusatshe bde ba stsal/ rtag par don mchog dam pa rab bshad nas// yang dag rag
dben mya ngan 'das la 'god// bcom ldan bdud rtsi chos mchog ba bstan nas// bdud rtsi 'o gya nom donan stsol mdzad pas// bang rtsa'i grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas// bdud rtsi'i
'dus ma byas kyi bde la 'god// rtag par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po nas// sdug bsngal som can tham cad phur pa'i madzod//de dag bde ba shul du rab btsud de// de bzhin bde ba/
bsam gyis ma khyab stsol// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yas// dpe ni mang po dag gserdzoge mi 'gyur// rtag par kun la thugs rje cher gzigs pas// thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus
dag rgyun ma 'chad// bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du// lha ma thams cad lhan coge dpag bsams kyang// cha shas tsam yang rag par yong
ma 'gyur// bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las// thigs pa 'ga' zhage bsngags pa brjod pa yi// bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsngos na/// thams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur
hUM/ thob smon// de nas bcom ldan ras kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi
bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis sems can la phan 'dogs shinge/ sangs rgyas kyi medzad pa rgya cher byed par 'gyur bas/ sngage pa rnams yongs su byang nas/ bsod nams tshad med pa stod skye
bar 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun
pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las las te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor gas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di deg gse man par bstod pa// thub pa bsod nams brgya ya mtshan rdzogs pa'i ng// yon tan tshad ma mchis pas sku
rab brgyan// rnam dag rgya ste sems can blta mes pas// 'am stong bzhin 'od kyis snang bar mdzad// kha deg mtha' yas 'od ni reb tu rgyus// rin chen pad+ma'i lung bzhi'i mtshan rnams mdzes//
dper na gdugs shar nam mkha' snang bzhin brgyade// kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gzhon// gas gyi re bzhin 'od kyiso gsal mdzad pas// zhing na brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab//
sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhu mdzad nas// bde ba dam pa mtha' yas stsal bar mdzad// mtshan rnams phun tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas// sems can blta mas skyo ba yongs ma mchis//
dbu sku rab mnyin kha ga mthon mthing gnas// bung ba nag pos me tog sdug pa 'dra// ngas dang btang snyoms chen po ngag pas brgyan// byams dang thugs rje dag ni phun sum tshogs// mtsha mdzad
dpo byad dam par ba mdzes pa/ byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags// bcom ldan ngasod nams phan yon mang btang bas// de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab
rgyas pas// 'od kyis zhing na brgya stong snang bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'od zer shan tu rdzogs pas na// dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra// bcom ldan rib bzhin
du yon tan ldan// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston par mdzad// bcom ldan gser zhal dam par ba tu mdzes// tshems dkar gtams pa'i dung ga kha dog 'dra// bcom ldan zhalamadzes dpe zla
yong ma mas/ smone mtshams ba spu rtag par g.yas su 'khyil// 'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dpon zla ba nam mkha'i khams gnas 'dra// bcom ldan 'das kyis//
byang chub sem pa mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyanye ma khyab pa yin pas/ thams cad la ban 'dogs/

par gyur zhing/ gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag kyang rjes su mthun pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems
pa[– ]dpa 'amadzes pa'i tog gas bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyadapa'o///des byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos kyang tshigs su bcad pa dgags/ bcom ldan 'dis la
mngon par bstod pa// bcom ldan rnam dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal// yang dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal// chos sbyin sbyong ba'i blo la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam rtog ma mnga' blo la gus
phyag tsal// kye ma ngomatshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod// kye ma mthong dka' u dum ba ra 'dra// kye ma ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i rgyal du// kye ma ngomatshar bde gshegs yod tshad med// kye ma mtshan
kha sgyur smon lam che// kye ma ngo mtshar shAkari'i nyi ma 'od s// 'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas bshad nas// brtsobs skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad// thub pa rab dben dbang po mnyam
go pas// rab zha mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs// rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la rab zhugs pas// rab dben spyod yul brab mo dag kyang mkhyen// rkang gnyis gtso bo rab dben
bzhugs pas na// nyan thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhazhi stong// chos rnams thams cad ngo bo mamachis pas// sems can thams cad kyang ni stong zhing dben// bdag ni rteg tu bcom ldan dran pa bgyid/
bdagan rtog tu bcom ldan mthong bar mos// bdagan rteg tu gus sems bskyed pas na// rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dang mjal// bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis nas//
rtag pa zhal blta sems kyis ma rdzong smon/ rab gdung ngu soms bar chad ma mchis pas// rtag par me phyogs brgyud kyang skyo mi 'gyango// bcom ldan thugs rje'i shugs ni reb bskyor nas// mdangs
ldan zhal na bag gse rtag mthong mdzod// bcom ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas// rtag pa'i lham deg nabasgral bar bgyi// kun leng ban nam dganam mkha' 'ad// sgyu ma smig rgyu chab kyi
klu ba mtshungs// bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das par chos bshad nas// yon tan phung po thams cad bskyod par smon// bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang// bcom ldan rnam dag
spyod yul bsam mi khyab/ nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar ma bgyur zhing// rang slong byang chub sems dpa'i dpog ma 'gyur// de bzhinagshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas// thugs rje chen po'i sku
ni rtag mthong smon// las gsum nga la med byams gtso mchod nas ni// myur du nges 'byung yang dag mtha' phyogs smon//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa brjod nas/ tshangs pa'i
dbyas kyis shange galham la bka' stsal pa/ gis kyi lha mo khyod kyis ba'i yang dag pa'i mo derdzun pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas// bdag gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyi'i
mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa legs so legs so// bsod nams 'dase khyed myur du bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhinge/ soms na/
thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor sgom par gyural gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal
ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ byang chub gshang gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o///de nas lha me 'obs pa chen mo stan las langs te/ gus pas
thalamo sbyar nas yang dag pa'i tshig gas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas shAkya thug pa sku yang dag pa gsar gyi

kha ga dang ldan pa/ mgur dung gi debyibs dang zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu/ spyan pad+ma sngon po dang mtshungs pa/ sgros dma' zhing bzang ba/ chu shelagyi kha dog dang 'dra/ shas kyi debyabes mtho zhing drang
bsags rgya gar du bcad pa lta bur gyur pa/ dkar na thags bzang bas me tog ku mu da dang mtshungs pa/ 'od kyis kun tu snang bar mdzad pas rta ma brgya stong lta bur gyur pa/ 'od kyis kha dog kun

tu khyab pa/ 'dzam bu gsar dang 'dra ba'i tshig gsung la nor cing 'khrul pa med pa/ rnam par blang pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas byang chub nam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa/ thugs rtag
du rnam par dag cing thugs kyi chos pa'i ng de bzhin du gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang spyod yul rnams dag par gyur pa/ spyod lam ma lags pa sbyangs pas gshegs pashang bzhugs
pa dgu la 'khrul pa mi mang ra kha/ lo drug dka' ba mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum bskor ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su bzlas nas pha rol gyi 'gram duphyi'i par mdzad pa//

sku'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa/ n+ya gro d+ha'i ljon shing lta bu 'u gyur pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su bsgoms pas 'phrin las rnam pa gsum la skyon mi mang ra ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan/
pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa gang cagasung yang rung ste/ rtag par sems can gyi desho du 'gyur bar mdzad pa/ don ma mchis par ma gsung ba/
sa shAkya'i rig kyi nang nas seng gnyen por gyur pas rab tu brtan cing dpa' ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// deng bdag ga zhes kyis tsem lcogs pa'i dzes
zla u de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na srung pus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang/ bsod nams de'i
dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan du sngangs nas/ bla na med pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha ma blobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa//
khyed kyis yuna'ade po nas bsgoms pa las spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur nas/ deng nga' yon tan rgya cher bsngags pa brjod ba legs so legs so// 'di'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med
pa'i chos kyi sgo me mngon par rtogs nas/ mtshan dang dpe khyadabatsad po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ thams cad la rgyazer phan 'dogs par gyur te// gsar 'od dam pa mchog du rnam par rgyal po
mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lhame slebs pa chen mos bsngags pa brjod nga 'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/byang chub sems dpa' tshud med snyad rnams
0 dang 3lha dang ma rnams dang/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis bad ltar gi par bya ste/ ngas bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas/nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad/

de thob pa ri chos shan tu brab pa/ byang nub kyi rgyu yang dag pa gang yin pa de na khyed la yang dag par bstan Tazhin/ khyed cag las su zhage rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyod nas/ nga yongs su mya ngan las
'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam gras 'di gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas rgya cher yang dag pa me la de/ yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par byed do// de nas 'khor mang po'i nad
nas 8byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu dang/ lha'i 'khor phal mang po bye ba phrag drug cus mgron gcige tu 'ang skang chos/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad la'ang mos par sems/
mas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa tshad ma mas pa nas/ na tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba mdzad de brnyas pa'i chos shani tu zab pa'i byang nub kyi rgyu yang dag par gang lags pa de la gusapas
yongs su bsrungs na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na'ang lus dang srog la 'phangs pa ma mas pas chos kyi rnam grangasaM 'di rgya cher sbrel te yang dag pa'i chos 'jig/
rten na yun ring du gnas par bgyade ngo zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dgags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan yang dag bden
tshig gsung// yang dag chos la rab tu zhugs// yang ngag bden pa de dbang gis// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzan brgyad// thugs rje chen po ge mnabs na// thugs rje che la rab tu
bzhugs// da dung thugs rnga de stobs kyis// mdo sde 'ano srung 'dzin bgyid// bsong mas tshog ni yongs rdzogs nas// shes rtogosan reb tu bskyod// tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs
paNosad// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin brgyade// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// log smra thams cad rnam par shog/ ngan lta thams cad bsal ba'i slad// mdo sde 'di na srung 'dzin
sa bgyad// 'gerten skyong dang brgya byin dang// tshas pa dang na lha ma yin// klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas// mdo sde 'dzano srung 'dzan brgyade// sa ya stong dang mkha' gnas ba// yun
rang 'di'i na gnas pa rnams// bcom ldan bstan pa 'dzin bgyid pas// mdo sde 'di na srung 'dzin brgyade// tshangs pa'i bzhugs pa mtshungs ldan zhing// 'phags bden bzhi yos rab brgyanas
bdung rnams dag na pha ma mdzad slad// mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid// nam mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang sridi// thogs bcas nam mkhar 'gyur srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung bzung ba//
sus kyang bskul zhing bskyod ma 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 'di srung ba bkas bshad pa sbes pa dang/ so so nas rjes su yi rang nga' sems bskyed nas/
yang dag pa'i chos yos su srung ba'i sems kyis cig car mgrazhigatsag tu tshugs su bcad de gsol pa// bdag cag mdo sde 'ad lan/ bu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas// thams cad rtse gcig rab spungs
nas// rgya cher yang dag spel bar bgyid// gang zhige mdo 'di re ba bzung nas// byang nub rgyun sgrub bgyaden// bdag cag rtag par phyogs bzhazhes/srung skyob me gro dag kyang brgyade// de nas lha
dbang pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos n thugs su chud// drin bsab par bzheng ban// byang chub sems dpa' phan gdags slad/ 'jig rten langs
kyang mnge sde gsungs// bdag kyang sangs rgyas de dag la// dranibasab slad durtag mchong nas// 'di 'dra'i mdo sde 'di dang ni// mdo sde 'di la srung bar khyade// de nas dga' ldan pa'i
lha'i bu rnams dus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan gsungs pa'i mdze sde 'di// gang zhig 'dzani bar bgyis pa ni// byang chub gnas skabasags pas/
dga' ldan lharan skyo bar 'gyur// bcom ldan bdag cag rab tu gnas// lha yo rnamas+sane mchog spangs nas// 'dzam glange dag tu gnas pas na// mde snga 'don sgrog par bgyid// de nas mi
mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khamA [”]bdagayotshadapa/tshadu pa la'i rgyal pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnams dang theg rnams dang// rnam tha tshang med thams
cad kyang/ mdo sde 'di las byung bas na// de slad mdo sde 'dareg gsus// mdo sde 'di ni ston pa'i gnas// tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas// mdo sde 'di namenyan
sa ba'i slad// rtag par yongs su srung skyob bgyad/ ngo nag bdud kyi rgyal po'i bu tshong dpon zhes bya bas yang gus pas thal mar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ yang dag don dang ldan pa'i
gci mdo// bdud gcong rjes su ma 'brang zhing// bdud kya las ngan sbyong brgyud pa// 'di ni gang zhig 'dzani brgyade no// bdag cag mdo sde 'di lan/ brtson pa dgu gseb bzungs nas// brtson
'grus chen po'i sems bskyed de// kun tu rgya cher spel bar brgyado// de nas bdud kyi rgyal pos thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gzhag mdo sde 'di bzung nas// nyon mongs rnams
pa na pham bgyid pa// de 'dra'i sems can de dag la// srung skyob bde la 'god par bgyid// mdo sde 'di ni gong 'ad pa// bdud rnams kyisen glegs ma rten// btsem ldan byan gyi rlabs kyi mthus//
bdag gis de la srung bar bgyid// de nas lha'i bu bkra shas dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga tshugs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rnalta kyi byang chub mchog/ mdo sde 'di las ston
