med pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis ma brdzi ba dang/ nad 'go ba med pa dang/ 'khrug pa med par 'gyu'o// snyam du sams bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ma/

ge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenazham/ dgebastan ma gsher 'od dam pa mdo snga'adebang po'i rgyal bo 'di 'dzin pa de dag la/ mo'i skyel po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bu s bsta stang du byed/ bla mar byed/
ma gror byed/mchod par byed cing/ rgyul pen po byed bzhi dbung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ lha' tshigs de dag dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byazhin/ mo'o
rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ dge ba man par 'du byed pa de dang tshe 'di'i lus kyi skye la srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsan rgyase mi khyab ba des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuralo/
tsha'adi largyal bo'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur// dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyi'i rgol ba thams cad dang/ dag
yi thams cad chos dang mthun par shAn tu tshar chod par 'gyur// de skad so bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das gang la la zhige ma'o rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bu s gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/dag slong ma 'am/dge bsnyenanam/dgabastanam mdo

sde'i dbang po 'dzin ba de dag la'ang bsta stang dugade/ bla mar 'gyodi/ rim gror brgyad/ mchod par bgyid cing/ rgyal po chen po bdag ga gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang dgon du dag par phyag bab spyod/ spos chab sna tshogs

kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cog thun mong du chos ma nyan pa de ga nyan cing/ bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du/ dag pa'i rtsa ba'angeshas cung zad cige sbyin pa

bgyidi na btsun pa bcom ldan 'os dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi snyan la mchas mthug tu/ ma'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mde sdu'adebang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bag pas bdugs ma thag tu spros sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug ba sna tshogs kyi 'khrashong dag 'byung bar

gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'o rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug ba sna tshogs kyi 'khri shong dag ga gedugasa rnams su gos par gyur

ro//spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam ba' 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhange/ snang ba des bdag cag gi khang ba rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan

'das myos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi debang po brgya byin dang/ lha me chen mo dbyangs can m dang/

lhatshe min tshe brtan ma dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'ashu rtsa brgyud dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po ba/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpe chen po

lags na rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang/ klu'i rgyal pen po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang/ de dag rang
rang ga de khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung sta/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khrishang gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur khang pa rnams
kyi nang du gsar du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des gas thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'grub ro// deskad ces gsel ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la'adi

skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal bo chen po dag rgyal bo chen po khyod bzhi'o rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la skyes dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'apishange de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa la/
zad de// de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ rgyal po na bo dag ma'i rgyal po des gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la med pa'i phyir/ sras stags dag gas bdugs ma thag tu/ laga' phog stod ga
thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shang rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te// de dag skad cig thang cage bud tsam de la stong gsum gyi steng na po'i 'jig rten gyi khamA

'di deg thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang/ nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang ra'i rgyal po khor yug dang khor yugachen po bye

ba phrag brgya dang/ gling chen po bzhi'i 'jige rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med

man du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lho bye ba phrag brgya dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i sa bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad nas/ lha dang/

klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldange dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i rigs rnamAkyi rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ skyes dang bdug pa snyatshog

kyi 'khrulegong de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dro rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i steng ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des kyang/

pa lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i
0 'khri shing dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gsar 'od dam pa'i mdo reb rib po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ ma'i rgyal po des skyes sna tshogs de dag gse bzhugs ma thag tu/ gse
da dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gatra brjod kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'aTashade dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs cu'i

'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhinge bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung ga phye ma snyad de dag gi bar

snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sbe tshogos kyi'akhri shinge rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ redag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum la/ spos dang bdug ra sna tshogs rgya che zhing bya tshob man par

'gyur ba gser gyi kha dego lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang bu des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po

chen po dgacho'aphrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhi'i gshags ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyed dgon/ chos smra ba de la dgos par 'gyur te skyes budam
ba legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i bang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'dalta bu/ ba mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyisam khyab
grubya/ pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag pa ba du 'ad par 'dod pa// khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sngone bar 'gyur ro// su than gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang/
pas po'i rgyal bo 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par ma 'grul na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ 'chad pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa
dang 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par ba tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ ri ci'i phyi'i zhen/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems
la dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i mi ldog bar 'gyur ba'i phyir// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag dum gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrigo 'bum phrag du ma rang 'ang go sas rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gisaM/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshig mthun pa dang/

jug mthun pa dang/ sgro skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyen ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/
skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste gang gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du'aphags pa/ sems can thams can

0 las 'ag tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi bas dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrage 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyed khyang chub kyi

snying bo la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shange gi rgyal po'i drung
du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ ma sdug pa ston pa/ gakhrugs ma sdug po sAtshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu
tsha ba khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpa med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs pa
'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mtshon par bstod pa/ mchog tu brab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu
gnyis ba du skor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi sngon po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung ban med 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyed chos kyi rgyal
zha po sgreng bar 'gyur skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bor bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi bla na med pa 'babs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nye
mongs pa'i dag 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems na bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shani tu 'dzages su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya
mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rdum dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar pa'i byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba
ts+tso/ khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dgamanyes par byed par 'gyur zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad
pa sa gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan 'di deng ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/sangs rgyas 'bul
phrag du ma la dge ba'i ba bskyod pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas sAng brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po
bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu khas pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ ses dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khrishing dag gagadugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/
lus tsha gdal bar bgyis te/ ma'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dang ma mchis pa legs par phyag bdar bgyis pa/ sbos chab sAtshogs kyis ga chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sU tshogs ]

gyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i phro brang ga la ba des chog martan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// ma mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha mo chen mo dbyas can

ma dang/ lha mo chon ma da ba kha dang/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dgashes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pishu rtsa brgyad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/

gnod sban gyi sde dpon chen po 'gan rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon na be nor bu bzang dang/ phyogasa'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros ba dang/ klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho deng/ lha byel

khrag khrigo 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi gdab bar brgyus te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyud sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la pa dang/ sa skya ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legrwa
par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshags par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par 'gyur// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi da pung dang g.yog
tu bcasapa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag tham can mthun par bgyis te/ mo'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs brgyad pa/ dgepa thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyineb
de la/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ma'i rgyal po de la kun tu srung bar brgya'i// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang
ba gu@#// bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang/ grong khyen de dang/ yul de'ang kun tu bsung bar brgya'i// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba
sa dang/ yos su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi/ chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der yang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams
zla cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'daso gang la la zhig ma'i rgyal bor gyur te/ ma'i rgyal po der yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i debang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal po de dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang du mi bgyid/
bla mar ma bgyid mi grong ma brgyad/mchod par ma bgyid na/ bag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di deng/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis
tshim par ma bgyin/ mi gror ma brgyade/ lha'i lus 'di dag gabri byon yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gzertson 'grus dang/ mkhru dang/ stobs kyang mo skyid/ bdag cagag
lus la gzi brjod dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa'i ng rnam par 'phel bar ma bergyade pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'as bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas ba dang/
0 gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrige 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar de'o bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de pa la bar bo'an/ yul na gnas pa'i lha tshogs thamA
cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bon/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal
po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar gyuraM/ yul gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'grub pa skye ba dang/ mtshang 'drub skye ba dang/ rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed ba
bdang/ gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur phyogs thadad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gakhrab dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mam thun pa'i gdar bar 'gyur/ dgung zla

'ab ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i garbab dang nyame'i gzab 'byung ba 'gal/ nyim dang zla ma mkha' la gnas pa'i ng stog par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus suzhas
mkha' la 'ja' kha dog lta bu 'khyol bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'i ng sgra 'byon pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du da drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa ga po 'bab par 'gyur/
yul du mu ge' ya nga ba 'byung ba'i 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyisaM yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung par gyur/ sems can dedag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams ma sdega'abar/
[ge]// 'ga'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi de pung dang g.yog tu bcas ba dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag dum dang/ yul na gnas pa'i lha dang klu
rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor nas/ yul der 'ad lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyu// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal po'agyur la/
de bdag nyidi la kun tu bsrung bachen po brgyade 'tshol bar gyur/rgyal po'i bde ba snyatshogs yun ring bor myong ba 'tshol ba'i gyur bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po de bgyod tshul
bar gyur yul na gnas pa'ims can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal ba'agyur phardol gyi demag tshogs thams cad pham par brgyade 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ri du longs su sbyong
'tshalo ba'agyur/ chos kyi skyol po nyid brgyade 'tshal ba'agyur/ rang gi yul yang 'gro ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go bar ng/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs suny+dzar bar bskyod 'tshol b.ru gyun/
'khrubatsun pa bcom ldan 'as ma'i rgyal po des gdon ma la ra/ gser 'od dam pa masder dbang po'i rgyal bo 'di ma nyan bgyi//dge slong ngam/ge slong ma 'am dgobagonanam/dgobasnyen mdo sde'i
dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsdu steng du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mo'i brgya/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan par dge ba'i rtsa
ba bsags pa 'di deng/ chos bdu rta'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyidi/ bdag cag ga lha'i lus 'di dag gi ga'u khyon chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de tshe phyi'i zhen/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
ma'i rgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad mnyan par bgya ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang 'dzage rten las 'das

par bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji skad pa bstan pa dag dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan bdag dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs
ga gses sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas chos mchog/ zhes khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od

dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bani/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang/ brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang/ drang srong man par shes pa lnga can bye ba
khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas rjes mchog/ chos khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi den gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so//
rmanas 'dzam bu'i gling khroms rtsad na gnas pa'i ma rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal bo nyidi bgyi ba dang zhis soms can thams cad bdebar 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas rang gi yul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang/
yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtsa nas yul zams cad na gnod pa dang gro ma mchis pa ra 'gyur ba dang/ tsazhes pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyi'i phyogs
yapar 'gyur ba dang d+d+haci nas yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mas shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ shis yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa rnams shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang/ ri nas
pa'i rgyal po dag gis nga rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi skyon chen po 'bar bar bgyis na snang ba bgyis bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtsis ltar 'ang khyae thamasacar ltadag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar
'gyur ba dang tsa nas bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhi dbung dang g.yog tu bcug pa dang/ gdo zhi 'bum phrag du ma dang/ 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i lha'atshogs thams cad tshim pa dang rim gror brgyad
tho ga 'gyur ba dang ci nas bdag cag lha'i lus 'di dag gab brje chen pos rnam pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtsi zhes bcag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang/ mthu chen po skyed par
'gyur ba dang mi sa bdag cag gi lus la gaT+Takharjidi nga dpal dag phun sum gas bsab tu 'jug ba'agyur ba dang d+hA nas 'dzam buTi gling thams cad du le lags shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang
mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang minas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang dga' ba sna tshos myong bar 'gyur ba dang d+hA tsanas sems can thams cad

[41 ]bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong ba 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan
glanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad da ltan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag pasaches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byon gyi ldebs dang/ brgya byan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gi lha'i shes pa bas

chos 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bran med pa dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin
gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sas rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'agling

'dirgya cha yang dag par rab tu bshad do// ma'i rgyal po'adegos pa dang [）]rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang/ rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams nga na mchis pa dang/ gang dag gis sems can 'di
dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams can dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mde sde'ajab pa'i rgyal po 'dzazhibab/
bstan yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad de// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang skyon nges ma'irgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
ba'i rgyal ngo bdagyes pa snga mnyan par bgyi/ gus par me shor gyi gus par man bar gyi// de na rus gsol ra dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/

de phyi'i rgyal po tshon po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdenom za bar ma'i rgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang/ i gro byed pa dang/ mchod pa byed ba de dag na
cu srung ba'i phyi'i spro ba rgya cher rgyas shig/ rgyal bon po dag dge slong a/ dag skyongs ma/ dge bsnyen ma/ dge bstanam ma snga debang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzazhi ba de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi
mdzad pa 'dzazhi nga chugatshug dang/di ga lha dang/ mo reng/ lham yan du bsdus pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyus kyi na dzad pa byed 'a 'gyur/ gsan 'od dam pa mde sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ma
yang dag pa rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyad bzhesecu nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'chi ba'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dag bstan ma srung ba dang/ gnod
la med pa dang/ nga med pa dang/ 'khrug pa med pa dang/ soms bde bar 'gro zhing/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston ba 'gyur ba'/ dge slong ngam/
dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i debang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/
bde legs su 'gyur ba bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yade bzhin gyi zhing bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungasams pa
'ad/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin rung 'chang ba'i mes ba de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchise par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu de la bdag gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad
bsal te bde bar gnas par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus srung ba'i phyi'i sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o

namo bo tha ba Na ya/ ma hA rAdzAya/ tad+ya thA/rab rar/ kuno kuno/ khu no khu no/ ru'o runo/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ bkA raM/ mahA ga kA raM/ mahA kA la/ mahArA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu tshwa sarbasatwA

nAny+tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlasashong mdud pa lan re bod pa la mkhas pas bsam ma bsam yas la/ de ltar lan bdunabyas nas dpung pa la btags na don nges par

'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang mkhrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ sbos gu gul dang/ tsan dan dang/ ga pur dang/ du ru ka dang/ a ka ru dang/ phog dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha
'a@#// mnyam par sbyar ba'i sbres kyis mchod cing sngags 'dibazlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu sbyan drang ba'i byago na mo ba kha Na ya/ ma hA dan dA ya/ tsaN+Di shwa rwa ya ]u a/

sa a ba 'a tshad tsatsasha3/ ba bam/ kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwA hi ta ste ma mo d+han ban+do/ pany+tsa shaswa yaM/ A k+kAr ya satwA/ sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bklas bar bya'o// sngags

'di don pa'i dus sudakon mchog gsum dang/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'atsal bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bun si mas lha thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhingamo sbyin pas/
sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyi'i yid bzhin rgyal bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/ sems can ng phag yang bzhin du bde ba red par 'gyur ro/ de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi

bus 'am ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi sAng go'ang smras so// na moratA tra yA ya/ na mo lo sha ba Naya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA sa ma sa mo/ su lu su mu/

tsaNA tsaNA/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka'o ko laM/ ku ru ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu'u/ saM pA ya/ atAnaM/ ni tun/ ab+han+d+ha tu sU hA mo bo ga Na ya swAhA/ d+hAn dA ya swA hA/ ma nor

sbapa ra pU ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ khang ba dben pa'i nang du lci ba'adekyil 'kho chung ngu zhig byas te 2 gshos ci dang ci 'byor pa'i mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa
pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun ma 'chad par bya zhange nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas/ sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
bu'i sras dzana' sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te nga'i yab la cu zhoge gsol zhes dra bar bya'o// de nas bdag na dekon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyi ba zhig gsol
rgyas stsol cig ces smo'ashage/ de nas sras dzazhir sha b+has yab la gsol ba/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyi nyin zhig gsol le zhes gsol pa dang/ yab kyis
khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas na de grub par shes te/ gnas dben pa'i bdag gcige
bu sbos bsngags la/ nyal khar sngags su dri'i za ma tog gcigegazhag ste nyal bar bya'o// de phyin chad zhang gicog bzhazhi du tra ma tog de'i nang nas nor 'byung ba las/ nob da po'i ni par dkon/
mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yokhyad me tog dang/ spos dang/ zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang/ brel cing 'phongs pa rnams la'ang sbyab+he zhinge zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams
par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tsho ba'i bsam pa bskyod na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skyo bar rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des rtan gagi bzhin lha'i
rgyal po rnam shos kyi bu dang/ gzhan yang sras dang srasamo'i 'khor dubs pa la rtag par bsam zhing bstod pa dang bsngags pa bya'o/ rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi ma

phyi rgyas gtong zhing/ lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang bsod nams mkho ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba rgyas ba dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob bar gyur ro/ na de ga gis de ltar byed
ba de mthong nas/kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la srung ba dang skyob par byed do// sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dang ga tu med par gnas shing/ ngan song gsum yongs su stong dang/
[« ]gegs dang brkang thams cad kyang med par 'gal// yare bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang gtar gzhan rag kyang thob par 'gyur 'o 'u/ rdzu 'phrul la ngabang skyab zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par
gyura'o/ 'gal te longs sbyong can du 'dod na'ang yodi bzhin du grub pa dang/ bya dang gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyugano/ bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong ba
nyel na tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga nyon pas las dka be la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka po to dang sbar ba'i tshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ra me mkhan gso sbyong yan lag
brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni depal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su na rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag bu smad dang 'khor du bcas pa'i bras
to gnas pa bkram nas me tog sna tshogs dang/ dro sna tshogs mang po dang/ mar me dam pa dang zhal zas bdar ba sna tshogs kyis zhe man rgyun ma 'chad par mchod par bya'o// sngags
'di zlos pas sems chu g.yeng bar bya zhing/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// namo bkaNA ya/ bud d+ha ya/ na me bo sha ba Na ya/ yak+Sha rA dzAya/
ma hA'adzA ya/ a ta ra dzu a/ nam shu ma hA de bya/ tang g+ha ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shado su shud+do/ han han/ ma na ken/ badzebi glu/ mut+taM ke/ a la kr-i ta/ shA ri'i
ya/ sarba satwA/ d+ha te kA ma/ bo shra ba Na/ hUM ya de ba pa g+ha ya/ eha a hi/ ma bo waM/ts+tsha gaN/ pa ra s+ya pa ra s+ya/ da dA ha nam/ daru na/ kAm s+ya rAranaM/ ma ma/
ma na pra la dA yaM swahA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags blos pa de dang mchod pargya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa dang dga' ba'i ngesam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byas pa gzhen nu'i
gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yade bzhan gyi nor bu gser gyi snyed dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/
lus kyis gus pa ston cing/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gtsag tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'dasked ces smra'o// khyod kyi deng rtsa speng ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben
par 'gro 'dod pa 'am/ nor bu ni po che 'dod pa 'am/ mamang po'i yid du 'ong ra 'don ma kham/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa ma/ sngags gzhan sgrub
ba'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ mngon pa shes pa dang/ tshanang bar 'dod pa dang/ sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsams ba bzhin du grub par bya'o/ bag
gas pas pod ga la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad a/ de ma yin pa gzhan ga 'dana'ang thams cad bsams pa bzhin du longs su grub pa' byaste/ ri bo cher gta' ma khrad pa dang/

bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dang na nyi zla 'di sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang/ sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus na yod kyang song kyi/ bden pa'i tshig 'di'i sa nas kyang su bar

pa/ ma 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang/ yid bzhin du skyong pa los sbyod pa thob pa'i 'grulango// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i ngobang po rgyal po 'di gang zhige 'dzag cing 'chang ba dang klog cung
'don pa'i ng rung/ sngags 'di sgrub pa'i ng rung ste/ tshugs chung ngus myur du grub par 'gyu'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi chen
dusngags 'goshad ra sa/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyur// bdag gis kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyi'i rjes su 'brang zhing gnod

pa dang 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin tsang rgyas par byed pa dang/ sngags 'ad 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad/
'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bdag ga 'khobaganod sbyin skyong rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu sgom zhinge mngag gzhug yade bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'a slu ba med par
mang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags 'oskad ces smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// rgyal po'i/

po khyod kyis sems can thams cad srid pas gdung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde ba'i bya ba'i phyi'i sngags 'di skyes pa dang/ gzhan yang mdo sde 'da'ajig rten du yongs su
rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad pa na legs so legs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tsha mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i ges su bcad pa 'di dag gas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba

dra me med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong ga 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/ rgyal ba me tog pad ts+tsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// zhi po na du ma'i byung
gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang// ting dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang/ rgyal ba'i zhabs 'khor las grose 'dra ste// khor yug mu khyud debazhi/

rtsig ma stong// phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas sbras pa ste// zhabs kyi dri ba dang nga 'i dbang po bzhi// gsor rgyal bo lta bur rab tu gdab// rgyal ba dri med gshen gyi rtse debang rgyal// yo tan thams cad
ba dbang 'dra ba lta// sangs rgyas dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// skya ma smage rgyu lta bu ba chags med ba
rgyalab dris med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chon po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal ba/ stobs bcu dag gis gso'i 'od dam pa ya// mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po rab mchog 'dza/ 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyisanaM dbatson 'grus rab tu ban bas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde dkon chog brab tshe 'ad// sems can kun la bde ba ni

byed pa// sems na rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyi'i// 'dzam bu gange 'api yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ 'di ltar stong gsum rgya che stong chan gyi u0f7a/ 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang// mas can dmyal
bsam can rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yani/ 'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal bo gang dag ya'i pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po brgyad nas na
[4/ ]chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar rgyus/ dgang gse 'dzam bu'i ging 'dra'i bde ba dang// shin tu le legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing// 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang// sems can/
khams cad bde bar 'gyur ngar gyis// 'di nomo yi dpang po gang rnams na// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang// rgyal sride rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des// mdo sde'adebang po 'di mnyan par bya//
mdo sde 'debang 'ja mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgran yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba byed// mchog tu 'jigs pas 'khongs pa sal bar byed// dpon ni chen
sha ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/ 2dper na chu grang skom pa sel byed pa/
tshabs nyam thag na red pa ltar// yon tan dag gse sgom pa'i rgyal po la/ mang sde'i debang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// dper na mi chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// zhe chen snod na lag mah+phal yod
pa ltar// ma yi debang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'ang ni lha la tshogs kyis mtshod mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa// 'jig
dirten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrung ba yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ mdo sde'i rebang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'i
bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbage bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/ dbab tu dga' zhing
lazab tamagu soms kyis// mdo snga'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i grong na gnas pab gyur pa yi// lha yatshogs rnams bsam rgyas ma khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas//

(mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rten par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yos na// gzi brjidi dang no stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gat+pa bya chen po yase na lha yi lus/ shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel
bar 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhos/ bcom ldan 'das las tshags su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di reg thos pa dang/ ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos
'tshe kyangeshugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchim phyis te de dag lus 'phar yan lag kun 'jar zhing dga' ba dang/ yang bde ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan
pa 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis gtor mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang stan rnams las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/

rgyal po chen po re re la'ang gnod sAn lnga brgya lnga brgya dang/ chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i sman du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhi ste 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las
tshig gden 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na 'ab/ bdag cag gas de la dran pa dang/ ma brjod pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//mdo sde'i debang bo 'di dag gang na bzhug
pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yos su rgyas par byed pas nam yang nub par ma 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi ma grangs 'di'ishadapa'i tshi/
chos can de dag gse ye shes dang/ sbrebs pa dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shange 'khor ba yongs
su spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i ma ldeg pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'kho
longs su skyong bar le bu zhes bya ba ste nu gnyis pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAn dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la 'di lta ste/

gas pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di no/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi yongs su 'dzin pa yin no// de skad ces bkar snyam pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
sa gzungs na lul na ma gnas/ phyogs na ma gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gzhi gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan

'das kyis tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shar dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang/ theg pa chen po la mos pa dang/ theg pa chen po la lhag la
'a bya ba byas pa yazhen/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na ma gnas 2 phyogs na ma gnas gange/ chos kyang ma lane/ chos ma yin pa'i ng ma yani/ 'das pa'i ng ma ya'i/ ma 'ongs
pa'i ng ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang ma yani/ rkyen las byung ba'ang ma yazhe/ rkyen med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung
ba'ang ma yazhe/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba'ang ma yane/ chos gang gi skye ba'ang ma yin/ 'gog pa'i ng ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyi'i/ 'di
lta ste sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs
ta zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang/ stebs kyi gnas 'dri ba legs so legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'o
jus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzus thob pas gang na gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i ma ldog par 'gyur
ba dang 1 yang gu par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang/ rton med pa'i chos kyi steng bzhan gyi thebs pa can gyi slob dpon dang/ lam la shani tu gnas par gyur ba'i gzung bya chos kyi rnam grangs bshad
du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ta'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// shA ra dwa ta'i bu legs so
logasaso// shA ra dwa ta'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzus thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ta'i bu gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
la bkur stare byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ rim gror byed pa dang/ mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur sta'i byas par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs 'di nyan pa/
byed pa dang/ gang dag gzus 'ad 'chang bar byed pa dang/ gang dag mes par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyura'o// ]
[S5 ]// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs don 'di yin te/ dang thu/ san+d+ha ra Ni/ ud+d+hAr Na/ su sa pra tiT+Thiti/ su nAm/ su pra tits+tshe to/ ba dza ya ba la satwa phra ti su la re hA/dzan pa/
la/ ut+pa da naM/ a ba nA ba na/ a b+hoTe'un/ a b+ha bye ha ra/ shu b+ha ba ste/ su btA/ ba hu gul+lA/ a bu pa dA sAhA/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub
sams dpa' gang gis sha'i tu gnas pa dang/ legs bar bzung ba byas nas 'ching bar byed pa de la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa 'am/bskal ba stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag steng du/
'ang smon lam zad par ma 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par ma 'gyur te/ dug gse ma ya'i zhing/ sbrul gyis tshugs bar ma 'gyur ste// de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa
med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das par sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste chags pa med pa'i gzus

zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yazhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu ldan po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste sangs rgyus btse
ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bskal pa grangs med pa la na bza' dang zhal bras gya nom par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med
xxx

la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rdel grangs 'di zhe sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yan no// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyise glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba'i sngon gyi yang dge
ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs ba ngarang da ltar 'chad kyis zung zhige/ ku ga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya
ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogasan 'od nyams pa zhes bya bar gog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do// kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnyems kyi
mang shes pa dang/ phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma 'byung ba shes par bya'o// glog ga mong 'di dag ya gir bros te/ gnas gang dag tu gzhag pa'i gegs
de dag tu glog thams cad ma 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho/rab Do'i gsang sngags kyi tsheg 'dareg bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ na mo ni mon ma'i d+d+hanaM 1 'jig rten gsum
snang par byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glo ba thams cad bdag la srungs shig srungs shamed sAhA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras garligs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'dras la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di'i/ dru ba Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka Ta ba ka Ta/ ni ka Te/ pra tu ma tre/phra rgya ma tre/ shud+d+ho/muk+ta/ ba ma le/ pra b+ha sa re/at+tAre/ paN+Dar/
pa lA paN+Dar/pAs ni/ har kaNar/ ka pa laM/ pi gal/ ak+Sha da d+himuT/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dngang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/bcom ldan 'das ga la

ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya sha/ mu ni muni/

su nin d+ha re/ma ti ma ti/sum ti/mahA ma ti/hahahaha/ khyod la sdig pa yod kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes snyas kyi/ pUb Da sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i
snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de dag gi rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po/
tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ sems can rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba bskyod pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs

kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ halo malaM/ tsa losAhA/ dra 'u ra sA/ brah+ma swa ra sA/ brah+mab+ha su gat+taM/ pu saMsta resAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ngedag gi srung nga tshangs
pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba sto/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zhi der bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ba no per na/ ban+d+ha/ ma daN+Da/ mnan te/ tIn go ra/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka so/ sa la phru cu/ ho na ma t+yaM taM/ ut+tA ran/
ma ho ran/ rgyu ra Na gi/ tsakra pA ge/ sha ba rasha ba ra sAhA/ botsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di/ bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'babs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa
thams cad las thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams car las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ 'phags skyes
pa dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gis kyang/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snyang bcu pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par

khagyi'o// tad+ya thA puSh+Tha su push+tsa/ du ma pa ra sUr/ Ar+ya mu sha ste/ shAn+ten muk+ta/ maM ga mya/ hir ts+tshagats+tshastaste/ sta ba tosAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi pa bdag cag gi
u0f09 srung pa 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tsha skyong ba dus me lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// dmas
klu'i rgyal pa rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ ku'argyal po glog lci dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo/
sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung pa chen po yade bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa dus ma lags par
smar 'gum pa thams cad sal ba/ dug rnams ma gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang/ byad stoms dang/ ro langs dang/ bkra mingegos pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan
'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang/ sor sna sbyang ba'i slad du/ thugs brtse bar du gongos tu bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams na ser

sna can te/ sams sor snas skor ba lags so// tad+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ a mr-i te/ a kyA ye/ a b+hi ye pu ts+tsha/ bumya ba ta/ sarba pA paM/ sru sha mnAya sAhA/ Ar+ya ngan+d+ra su ngar nAyaM swAhA/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o/
rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus brgyad par ma 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams
cad dang gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtan skyong ba dang/ klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang sta

bzhin bzang dag khyed skya ngo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ dru nga Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad
pa legs so legaso// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang/ myos pa dang/ rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' su la/
nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dug dang/ klu'i bdag po de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri ngang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i debang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya sta bcu pa' de 'o
de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ngadag gis kyang/ dag slong chos smra ba de 'tshog rgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nyo bar sgrub par
bgyi gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhug par bgyi'o// dge slong chos sla ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'o
ba dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ mi ga gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam bskyadan/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba re'i nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang/
yi ge de dag thams cad bslab par bgyi'o/ ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gsar 'od dam pa mad
snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling nayun ring du gnasashing myur du nub par ma 'gyur ba dang/ sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes
rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab kyi phung pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ tsha'adi lo tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ srog la phan
gdags pa dang/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang/ bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par
'gyur pa dang/ bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phunasum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bskyud pa ma mchis par gyi ba'i slad du/pal gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dag slong chos smra ba derang/ soms

na chos mnyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skyo ba dang/ 'chi 'pho ba'i ba nod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtog
pa dang/ 'khrug glob dang/ khrag khrug dang/ rmilam ngan pa dang/ log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang/ byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag lus ngagyod
du stsal ba'i sman dang sngagasan 'di deg ste/ shu dag gi'u wang smra ka dang// sha mya sha myangeshari sha// ne has skal ba che// dzam shing tsaa ka ru// sha re'i sta su rtsi'i

pog/ gu gul ra sa sha la gi/ ro dreg le ma rgya spos dang// tsan dan dang ni ldong ros dang// ga'u wang dang bcas ru rta dang// gur kum gla sgang yungs kar dang// spyi mo sug stsolan la da// nag gi sar u
shari 'di dag mnA mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btag par bgyi// phya ma la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bagyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri to/ ka ma ta la/ nal dzin ka ra te/

haMka ra taM/ in+d+ra dza la ni/ naM kA ra tre/ bshad dre/ a ba rta ka/ sa ka na ku tra ku/ ka ba la kade la ma ti/ shu la ma ti/ sin+d+he/ rgyu rgyu ma pa ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sad rkya swa to sAhA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor/
[«]1 bgyis nas mi/ me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig dor yang gzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgyan
pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// lha mo de na legs par brgyan// bar bar dag
khyu 'um leng gzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtsa sna sbrang gzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/
[Ea ]myud ya the dan/ a ra ka/ na yan/hil mol/ ki li ki kho le sAhA/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro// tad+ya thA/
sa ga lnga/ pa gi Da/ ba ga ta ba ti sAhA/ phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig/ tsas pa'i skarama'i gnod pa dang/ phung por las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang// 'byung po'i
khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyuracig/ tad+ya thA/ sha ma gi sha mi sAhA/ sa ga/ bag Di sAhA/ ba ga Di pa ti sAhA/ sA gA ra/ saM duts+tsha ya sAhA/ sats+tshamA tA ya sAhA/nA la

kaNAya sAhA/ a pa ra dzita/ par ya sAhA/ sIm ban/ saM bud+d+hA ya sAhU/ a ni mo la bak+ta ya sAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba to/ bra Ni/ na ma sAr sA t+yaM/ mahAd bya sid rgyan mI/ man+d+ha pa rA/ tar tung tse to/ duny+tsanu
bya sAhA/ dge slong chos skya ba de la srung ba dang/ chos mnyan pa de dag dang/ yi ger bris pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyidi/ dor mtsho bar brgya'i// lta'i tshog
thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// tsanas dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang/ 'borab las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub las phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang/ gza' dang/ 'thab pa dang///byang chub lam bya'am
@# rtog pa dang/ btsas pa'i skarama'i gnod pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dung/ byad dang/ rolangs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/

lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod/ skya bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba'i khyor zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs

'tsha so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u de skyes lha mo dbyangs/
can da bkug go/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun du rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan cha// brtser gnas mdzes ma dur ba rtsa yis gos bskus pa// dur ba'i rtswa
sa gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhagasanas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dag ba'i tshig shod lce khrol mdzod// spyod ya tha ngan/ mur/ re/ ab tshe

u a ba dzab te nyi gu le/ ma bu le/ pad+ma la ba ti/ mang+geT/ mA rits+tso/ sa ma ti/ da sha ma taM/ a gro ta ma hU~M/ ta ratsa/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi ri tsi re de shi ri mi rim rits+tsaM/ snga na shrI ye/

ca10 lo ka ts+tsa lo ka kr-iSh+Tha/ lo ka pra ya/ sid+d+hi pAste/ snyomamu kha/ utsir/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+haM/ na mu tsa/ mahA/ namu6/ mahAdi phyi/ pra ti hUM hA/ nam ska rAn/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par/
gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang/ gsasu bcad pa'i rgyudang/ sde snod dang/ snyan dang bags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rog sngags dngos grub du gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ mahA pra b+ha ba/ hi la ho lo/
ma la ma la/ bcom ldan 'das mi lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyun ge/ kA ra ta kayur/ ko yu ra ma ti/ hil mo lo/ hri la ma lo/ sangs rgyas kyi bdun pa dang/
chos kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ dbang po'ibaden pa dang/ chu lha'i bden pas/ lha mtshan mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rtan n bdun pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa
dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hilo mo lo/ hi li ma la/ hi la ma lo/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma
lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/
yang bram ze ko'u di la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ shes rab che ba dang/ nor
dang dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phana'adogs shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so legs so// mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyi'i
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gzungs 'di deng por su bden pas// dkona mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/

sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos dang// byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang// rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal le// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang// rim gro gus pa
bsam byas te// na la dben pa'i gnas su// sgra bskyod gzungs dang bstod pa brjod// ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la// mchod pa rgya chen bsham par bya// skye bo'i rogis namang po la// snying rje'i
sgyu sams kyang bskyod par bya// bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can// rtse gcig soms kyis bsam bya zhing// bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyi// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i// de ya
za tshig don legs bsamA te//stong nyid sgrub pa'i ng gnas par byos// bcom ldan thams cad mngon sum du// rtse gcig sems kyi bsam byas na// ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang// gzungs mchog
dam pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldanodapal mguragasung chos kyis// dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul// lcags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing// so sor rogis a mtshon
ston bdelta'igasung mchog dam pa la// rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa slongs// bsam mi khyab pa'i lcags mtshan 'di// smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes// chos rnams med par stan mdzad/
pa[} ]ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin// sangs rgyas lcags mtshan gsung sgra la// da bsams smon lamatshad med 'grub// gapazhig dbyangs can mngon mchod dam// yang na slob mas man ngag
bzhin// lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur// gang zhig yags mchog sgrub pa'i ng// rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung// bsod nams yoshes
tshogs 'phel zhing// nges par 'grub la yaMde gnyis spongs// gang zhig nor sgrub nor ldan dang// kha dang grags po'ang de bzhin 'grub// 'byung bar 'dod pa'i ng rnam grol bar// nges par/
'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// yon tan mang po tshad med dang// bsam pa bzhin du kun 'grub pas// 'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// dben
par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ren byas pa der// bum pa brgyan pa bzhi bzhag ste// dus bzhin ma tog bdug pas mchod// ba dan gdugs dang lta lta phye// phyi ma byug
pas brgyan par bya// sangs rgyas dang ni rebyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du// zhag bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de// gal te lha de
ma mthong na// bsam pa brtan pasazhag dgur bzlas// de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na// gzhan du shes pa'i gos btsal te// tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la// mchod/
ring bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcod// bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la// nyin mtshan rgyun du brtson bskyed de// de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs// des n bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de sto'ang bsam
pa ma grub na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na// mngon shes drug la sogs pa'i ng thob// de nas bram ze ko'u da skyes de skad ces bshad pa thos nas/
kha dga' ba dang rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dam la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis sems m g.yeng bar bdag lanyenAcig dang/ bdag

tshu gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brtan to/ dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyire tshigs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o// phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la// 'jig rten khams 'dire dbang brnyes par//
sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyed la bstod// dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang// thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin// rtag
tudapal la brtson chen spyod// g.yul gyi gnas las rtag tu rgyal// snyapardzabazod la dul pas bskyod// gshin rje'i sring mos lungaston cing// rtag tudar gos sngon mo mnabs// mdzes dang mi
[74 ]/mdzes kun ston cing// spyanamag sus mthong dang ba skyed// spyod pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// skyabs su su 'os rjes su 'dzin// bar 'aga' ri dang brag la gnas// bar 'ga' phug
dang chu bo'i 'gram// yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su// gnas de dag lha mo'i don// ji ltar ra brog ma rnams kyis// rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas shing// rtag tu lha mo de mchodon//
thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyob// stag dang sang gsar khor byas shing// bya dang phyugs dang de la rten// dril chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas// bane 'i rel grags par gyur/ phyag na tra/
Al thor tshugs dbu// yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams// zla ba mar ngo'i bcu gcig gam// dgu yi dus su mchod par bya// g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas// 'jig rten kun la
gzigs pa'i phyir// lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas/ lhamo'i mchog de dpa mad pa'o// phyugs rdzog mo'i gzugs ston cing// lha dag 'thab pa'i ng rtag tu rgyal/ yun ring 'jig rten bde bar
byas/ (bar bga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi// bram zerasgrazhing chos bzhi dang// rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas// drang srong lha yi dbang bas pas// sa chen 'ad dang sa bon khyod// lha mo 'du
ba'i dusasu yang// rgya mtsho lud banane nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyi// kun gyi gtso byed 'dul bar nus// mo rnams kun gyi tshongs spyod mchog/ 'jig rten gtse sbyin bdag
la dgongs/ rgyal po'i gnas na'ang pad+mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dang gzanges/ zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas/ mang du thos ldan rten yang byed// ri bo'i rtse ba chen spobs pa
'phags// bsam pas gling dang rab kyang ston/ lha min la sogs lha rnams kyis/ kun gyis yon tan bstod cing bsngags// sman stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang// gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du blta//
sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa// de kun bsams pa myur du skang// bro myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang// sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jibs rten khams dag tu// rtag tu sgronachen snang byad
a[ ]bzhin// bya dang gcan gzan ri degs kyi'ang/ kun gyi bsam pa yongs su skong// bud med kyi mchog ri bo bzhin// drang srong 'jig rten ring gnas bzhin/ lta mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral// ma
mdzod bdag bzhin bden par// 'jig rten mthun par gzugs ston cing// 'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang// khyod ni rtse mo'i gtso yin pas// de las mchog pa'i sems can med// gal
g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas// ma yi deng du khyud gyur tam// chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad// rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang// yang n dgra yis bsad
par yang// rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos pa// sdug bsngal dag las thar par 'gyur// dge dang ma dag kun las skyob// dums dang snying brtse mdun du gnas// de phyir bdag ni sems btud de//

phyag 'tshal lha me chen mo la'o// de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ka'adis/ chu bo chen mo dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad
nga lanyan par gyis// lho dang dra ze lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gis rab gang yin/ lhu mo dam pa mchog tumadzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags

pas yan lag brgyas// dbyangs can zhes bya spyanan yangs shing bsod nams 'bar// dri med yoshes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan// rane chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab dag gi

yon tan khyad par de stod ro// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang/ yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang// dri med mchog dang par 'bar ba dang// mig mchog dang ni mog gi dam pa dang// dag pa'i
gnas dang dag bsar pa dang// yon tan bsam mi khyab pas brgyan pa dang// zla ba dang 'dra dri med 'od dang// ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang// seng ge mchog dang la la zhen pa dang// lag pa

brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang/ mnga' gzhu mdung dang ral gyi dgra sta dang// pe con lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams/ zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal// yad du 'ong ba'i ngeg dang dpungs snyan
dang// shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa dang// dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang// lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang// lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang// 'byung po'i tshogs
kyi gnas rtagamachod pa'i phyir// sa bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya go/ bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cape// dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub gsol// dag rnams

khridanabadag la rtag tusrungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'dedug na// nang par langasanas gtsang charab rjod par bya// bsam pa dang nor 'bruthams cad rnyed// dngos grubadag brgya chen thob par 'gyur/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze ka'ud u0fb1 la legs so zhes bka' stsal ta/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang/ dngos grub dam pa slong ba/
bsod nams tshadabad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dar na lung ston pa ma ze ko'u dbyis bskyod pa dang gsang sngags kyi tshog gas/ lha mo mtsho dbyangs can la gsol nas/ a 'kherar

T+Tha dag la smras pa/ skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang/ de'i thugs rjes skyobs shangetshe'adi nyidi la spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang/ thos pa 'dzin tsanga shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
dang rta gotsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing/ tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas// bsam pa de nges shing gus pa'i sams kyis lhamo dbyangs can sman
drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sal phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang
du sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

yang dag par bden pa'i gsud la gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po dang mthun par bdenapa ston pa 'am slu bar gasungab bskal pa bye ba tshad med par yang dag par badenapa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing// gsung ba de dag la rjes
suyi rang// bden pa gsung bsaljags yangs la ring babakram ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling dang/ rgyal chen bzhi dang/ stong gcig dang/ stong gnyis dang/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'bangs shing/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal lo//
lcags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang/ bdag spobs pa tshad med pa dang ldan par gyurar// phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog/ byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog/ 'phags pa rang rgyal
dbyangs can mchog/ zung pa'i me brgyad dbyangs can mchog/ bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog/ yang dag gzigs dang dbyangs can mchog/ drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog/ lcam
dbu mdabyangs can mchog/ skam byed smyu yang dbyangs can mchog/ gab+bacan klu yong dbyangs can mchog mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ rgyalachen banapo rabyangs can mchog/ bden
[7 ]@#// gnas lcasras dbyangs can mchog/ rdordzogasang bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang da dungs na mchog/ lha mo la mo dbyangs can mchog/ tshogs bdag lha yang
dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi lha modapyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog sur tshog 'chad dbyangs can mchog ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog/ 'brog ma mo yang
dbyangs can mchog/ gnod sbyin kun kyang rabyangs camago/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog bdag la las mchog kun gyi stongs// mtha' mdadabyangs can mchog thob mdzod// sumed
pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo// bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od snang mdzad
k+Sha la phyag 'tshal lo// bdenatshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// dod gnas la phyag 'tshol la khabor changagatso la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs can lha la phyag
tshal lo// bdag nitshog la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ra me chas pa// thams cad myur du grub par mdzod// nad med rtag tubadeb dang// tsherang ba yang thob par shog/
rabod pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang// byang chub lam la brtson pa dang// skye bo kun la panam mdzod// rib thams cad gyuradu skongs// bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang// bdag gas
[n ]mi slu tshig smras pa// dbyangs can lcami mchog gsan// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lca mo 'dire na gshegs par gsol// bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod// lus dang dag
la myur zhugs shing// yid myur skyobs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs spobs pa ldan par mdzod// tshig ga gzi brjid mthu des na// sems can
thams cad 'dul bar mdzod// bdag gis tshig na tsis pa// donadi thams cad grub par shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyod cing// byed pa bums cad chud ma gson// nam
zhig bdag gi sdibs 'dod pa// don de grub par ma gyuran// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshagen// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshams med lnga yi sdog bgyis pa// sangs rgyas
bkasan 'dul bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang// byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang// shA ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal dang// bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste// de la sogs
pa'i bdenatshig kyang// thams cad bdag la grub par shog/ sangasargyus nyan thos 'khor rnams dang// bdag gis deng 'diriny+tsanadrangags// bdag bar ba bskang ba'i phyir// thams
cad myur du gshegs par madzod// yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa// thams cad slu ba med par shog/ srid pa 'ju mo man chad dang// gtsang ma'i gnas thams cad dang// tshangs pa
tshangs namadun 'a donanang/ tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang// stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang/ ma mdzad 'jig rten gtso bo dang// denang de la 'khor
nams dang// dkun dang 'di spyan drangs te// zugasarjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing/ nga tsho pa kun gyis gzung bar mdzod// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang// gzhan yang 'phrul
dga'i lha dag ga dang// byams pa mngon par 'tshad rgya'i gnas// dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang// 'thababrel gyino b+he rnams dang// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang// rgyal chen bzhi yi lha/
rnams dang// gzhan yang lha babor thams cad dang// sa chu me rlung lha dag dang// ri rab stun la gnas pa dang/ ma bdun ri balha rnams dang// dekun 'khor dang bcas pa dang// thur phud
lnga can nor rgyas dang// nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang// dal sogs pa'i khyu rnams dang// 'jig rten bdebada mdzad pa'i gnas// dol sogs pa'i lha thams cad// sdig pa'i las lam
mos dang// sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i me// burab gzhon la byams pa dang// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang na lce ma yin// gzhan yang m 'am tsa deg dang// lto 'phye
a tshel sogs pa rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthuyis ni// bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bcu ba'i dgongs pa yis// bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyod//
lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyi// gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi mthu yis byin brlabs shing// bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ ji snyed nam mkha'
mtha' gtugs shing// chos kyi re byings kyamatha' klas pa'i// sems can de dag thams cad kyi// bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ de nas dbyangs can lha mo la/ bram ze
ko'u da skyes de skad ces gsol pa dang/ lha mos skyes bu chen ra de la dga'ozhas sbas te/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/
dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ sems 'dun pas rjes su dmigs shing/ ci 'dod pa'i don chog bzhin du
bsgrubs nas chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang du 'chang ba dang/ klog pa drang/ 'don pa
du bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa na ma gtogs so// doskad ces smras pa dang/ bram za ko'u de rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
ti thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to// rinas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lhamo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su
bsrung zhing yongs su rgyus bar bya ba dang/ mdo bad 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang/ bsod nams dang/ spobs pa tshad
mer pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems bskyod pa rnayaMs kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa legs so legs so// gsar 'od dam pa mdosde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo
las= lhamo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya sta bcolnga pa'o//// ranas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mo tshanamo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
ma lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ma des kyang/ chos smra ba'i dag slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ brel 'phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ sems rtas pa
thob par 'gyur ba dang/ soms bde bar gdugs metshan bas par 'gyur ba dang/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig rang la ga rnam pa tha dad pa dug chub par 'gyur ba
dang/ rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par rjod par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gsor
'a 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'di 'dzam bu gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyurazhingagyuradunub par mi 'gyur ba dang/ soms can rnams kyang gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyurab dang/ bskal pa byab khrag khrig 'bum phralo du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ mug ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ lo legs par 'gyur ba
dang/ sems can mas bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang/ somasacan dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shAn
tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang/ zas dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ na ba'i gso snyan dang/ snyan cong dang/ yo byad dang/ 'tshig chas kyi bya brag gzhan dag gis
kyang dag slong chos smra ba da spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rinichen me tog yon tan mtsho bi chu dang gsar gyi ro kha dog bzang po
gsar du snang ba'i dpol zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dbal gyis dge ba'i rtse ba bskyod de/ dus da ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang/ phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang/
phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang derasems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar bo thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang/ skom dang/ nor dang/
'bru dang/ 'gron bu dang/ gsar dang/ nor bu dad/ mu tig dang/ bshum dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byurudang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram
a dang yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang ma 'ongs par 'gyur/ soms na de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// lha mo chan mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de lamachod
par bya/ spos dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa'i ng dbul bar bya/ lha mo mnamo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing/ de la spos dad/ bdug pa dang/ me tog kyang byane la/
ngo sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa ya bcud dag rnam par 'phel/ lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga'/
bar 'gyur// 'bras bu la tog lham sdong ljon shing rnams// lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang skyed/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems
can de dag la/ lha mo chen mo daMpal na sams par 'gyur/ de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpalalha mo tshan mo la legs so zhes
bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so// lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ sams na tshadamed pa rnams la phan pa
dang bde bas phan 'degs shing/ mdo sde 'di'ang yongs su rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal pa
las lha mo dar la gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o///de nas lha mo dpal nams/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di//
nas byang phyogs sum ring ba zhig na/ lha 'a rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang la na gyi 'khor na spyad gos tshul dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las
byas pa'i khang bzang pad+ma dam pa gsar gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ban bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po skyel bar 'dod pa des/ rang gi khyim phyag bdar legs par bya/
khrus legs par sbya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos rab tu dri zhim par bgo bar bya'o// de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden
ma rtag yon tan rgya ma zlum dang gser gyi kha dog bzang po gsar du snang ba'i dang la de la phyag 'tshal zhing/ mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lcam chen po dpal gyi la gnas /
nga bzhin gshags pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sngos kyang dbul/ ro breb sna tshogs kyang dabul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sdeb debang po'i rgyal po'i
ming lang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang bad/ lha mtshan mo dpal la'ang mchod cing/ ma tog dang dadug pa'i ng dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang
dbulan/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ du'atshalha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po'ang 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
lha mo tshan mo dpal dgug par 'dod pa dus/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'isangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byungachung sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
khadas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'i rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gsar du snang ba la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsar du snang ba'i snying bol phyag 'tshal la/ de bzhin gshags pa nyis brgya'i 'od zarasnang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
yab/ pa gsor dang rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mi rtog 'bar ba'i'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
sngon ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// lce phyogs kyi
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dar 'a byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa la phyag
'tshalasu 'bod/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag
'tshapa la// byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di bdag la sbyor bar bya ste/ ri'i sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/
spyad ya the dan/ pra ti pA Na tsare/ sa man+tA daru na/ mahA bi hAr gti/ sa man+ta nga man ga to/ ma hA ka// pra ti pra ma na satra amra sa man nu pra pu na/ a yAn d+harmatA/ ma hA b+ho ga na/
mahAmaM tra/ cu pa saM gI ti/ ma ha klo she/ su saM gra hitaM sa mar thun pa lo na so/ 'di dag na spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de len yang
dag par grub par sbyin pa ma sru ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma la skyed pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gses le bdun du 'den cid/ 'dzin pa
dag la yan lag brgyudapa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la bsnyen tu/ bdag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas
thams cad la me tog dang smos rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gis bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas kyang
rung ste/ khyim de shin tugatsang bar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas to/ spos dang bdug pa'i ng dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma'ang bting bar bya'o// sa la ma tog gi sil ma
ba/ bkram ste bsdad par bya'o// donas skad cig de nyid la dpal lha mo 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad khyim mam/ grongs/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/
gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel nge 'phongs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'gron bud/ gsar dang/ rin po che dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ yo byad
thams cad 'byor pa dang/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'o rtse pa gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las lha mtshan mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bu
0 ste rta donas de ji srong 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 'a nga par ma 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang
po'i rgyal de las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yongs su spel ba'i le'u zhes M bya ste bcu bdun pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'adebang po 'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ma/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal
lam ljongs sam dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ra'i sman ljongs sam/ 'pha brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'abrong ngas/ grong khyer ram grong rdal lam//
ljongs same/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sume/ pho brang 'khor der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dres sa'ilce ma brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun
pe bcom ldan 'das gang na gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang de 'i rdul de 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang/ sa phyogs gang dang gang na dge slong chos
