kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ 'di na gtan gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis/ da rebazhin/
gshags pa'i gdan thongs shig/ de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gdan bting ngo// gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdan bting
lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog/ ma la mchog stsol dam pa sride bcing bkrol// bzhugs te mi la sman slang mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mchid dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol//
de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed bya dka' pa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rjes pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/
da skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying po pa// bzod dang brtson 'grus che
la zhidang dul dga' zhing// blo gros dran dga' yon tan dpag med gnas gyur gyis// rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags da legs shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi
mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang/ ma rtog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i ris la brdabs te/ bsnan ma thag dus rnam pa drug g.yos te/ nor du dung/
gsuradang/ dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig denas byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
bo mchod rten 'di phyi zhag/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas mchod rtan da phya ba dang/ des der gser gyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi nor bu dang mu tig gis khebs
par g.yogs pa'i gsar gyi dra ma tog cig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsar gyi za ma tog dag cig mchis so// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye zhig/ da bzhin du thams cad kha phye pa dang/ des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang/ ma tog ku mud 'dra ba dag
cig mthong// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag cig gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' de
@# skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer to shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs taM/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rus
pa rnams dge 'dun gyi mdun du bsnams te/ phyag tu bzhes nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dag yon tan mchog rab rtogs ldan blo gros mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan bzod pa
slob grags mamag dam pa ste/ blo gros ldan rnams phyir 'ang rtag tu byang chub 'di la ni/ spyi brtan mos dang blo gros mchog tu sbyin la dga' bar byas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa// mchog tu mthong bar dka' ba/ bsang nams kyi
zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyagatshol cig/ de nas dag slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo
sbyarato/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad kyi phyag
bgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bo sngon byung 'das pa'i dus na/
rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang stobs du ma dang ldan pa/ thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/ de ladu lha gzhon nu dang 'dri ba gsum zhig yod de/
sgra chen po dang/ lha chen po dang/ snying stobs chen po'o// de nas rgyal poman po rtsa ba'i phyir/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung ba dang/ gzhon nu de dag skyed mos
tshal de yi yon tan la cha gsasheng/ ma rtog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu ste/ nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ 'di nasargyal 'budag deng ba dang/ gzhon nu'i rame gro pa/
rnams kyang rgyal bus bskyang nas phan tshun du dung ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags khrod bcu gnyas su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras
pa kho bo'i snying la 'jags pas naon na badrare bdag cag gcan gathun gyis gsad du 'ong gis tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/
skya bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam du baspyod pa'i snying du gyur to// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'di'i// bdaganama'ajigasamya ngan
ma mchis kyi// shin tu rgyas mchog den tshem red snyam ste// bdagag snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis pa de dag gi khrod du/
rgyu ba na/ stag mo du byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig len par gyur la/ bu lngas bskor te bkres shing skom pas nyams smad nas/ lus mchog du nyam chung bar gyur pa
nga 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'i nyon mongs ma 'ad bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig len par gyur/ da lta ngas ma red pas/ yang min
rang gi bu la zabar 'gyur/ yang na bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ nyin mongs ma 'di'i rjes kyi/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'dir gang sha
gsar pa dang brag dren ma yongan/ don stag dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ sangag rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro// wu chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa
dang skom pa dang ldan palus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/ rab tu nyamachung bas 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi rusan/ 'di'i srog yongs su srung ba'i phyir/
su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed bar 'gyur zhig gu/ sgrachen pos spyas pa/ kyi rang gi lus yongs su gtang ba ni bya dka' ba'o// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag
lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa bla chung ba rnams la tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam/
pa rnams l na byadaka' ba ma lags so// yang/ snying rjesnying brtse las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag/ lca yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun pa'i
- ]@#// dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam par brgya yas brtse// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste// stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig
tu bstas nas song ngo/ de nas snying stobs chen pa 'di snyam du sems te/ da na de dag gi lus 'di yongs su gtang ba'idus la bab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig de 'gyas pa'i
chos can mthar 'du mthar ngan pa/ rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal chudang// gzhon bu 'os pa chen po dag gas ring bsrungs kyang// sngar mdarang gi rang bzhinami 'dor byas
don med// yang na tham sa cad du ma gtsang bar gyur pas na/ de'i 'tshong mad kyis/ da bdag gis de las bzang po'alas sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang 'chiba'i rgya mtsho las
rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro// yang stong pa med lus dbu ba 'di la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gson pa// 'bras dang 'dra ba'i srid pa brgya ldan gni dang phyi sas gang ba'ang gtang/
mya nganamad cing 'gyur med pung med du med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan bcas gangajul dang bral ba thob par bya// de snying rje chen po mchog dang ldan
patsi pa'i snying du gyur pas/ de ltar badzul nas khyed gnyas gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskung de// ]
de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen pa nags 'dabade nas sar leg sta/ stag gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs med
zhib thob 'dod d// gzhan gyis gtang bar dka' ba'i lus dablo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub rang mad rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyor ba thob par shog/
bdag gi srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum pa bsgral bar bya// zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas snying stobs chen pos stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang/ de nas byams
pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la stag mos ci'ang ma byas so// de nas byunguchub sems dpa' kyi ma'o// 'di ni ma chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse ba'i blo
gros kyis mtshon tshabatsalan gang nas kyang mtshon cham rnyed nas dunas 'ongama'i yal ga lo brgya len pa sra ba zhage blangs te/ bdag gis mgul la bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel
to byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thagatu/ chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnyem pa drug tugayos so// nyama'ang sgra gcan gyis blone pa bzhin du
'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa mad do/ lha' smos dang phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog char yang bab po// de nas lha zhage gas ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' l
bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po byed 'dang nga ltar thugs rjes sams chan rnams khyab ste// mayi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di btang bas na// skye ba dang ni 'chi
ba'i rin dang bral ba zhi ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ zhib gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dare na tshogs mad ring por mi thogs bas// nga nas stagamo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la
b+h+yA ltasanas/ lud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so// de nas sgrachen pos sa g.yos pa la bsams nas/ lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// ji
pa ltar phyogs bcur rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa la// sa 'di reb tu g.yos shing rta ma'ang 'dan med gyur la// ma tog char pa 'bab cing kho ba'i yid kyang 'khrugs pasen// dgazod

rgyu bdag gi nu bos rang ga lus nibatang yang dag ltachen pos smras pa/ don ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras pa// bkras dang ldan nang sdug bsngal brgyas gces pa// shAn du nyam chung rang gi bu la yang
zaza bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang degs// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu ma ngan gyis nanas mchi mas mig gang ste/ lom de nyid la slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang/ gos
thams cad ni 'od ma yal ga dag la gzar/ rus pa rnams mi bya zhinge bral/ khrag 'dzeng du gyur/ skran phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus
pa'i stong du 'gyel nas ring zhig len pa dang/ 'du shes rnyed de lasanas lag pa sgrung ste/ nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo// kye mabenube sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang// de bzhin du dbye la rang du
gdung pa'i ma// pad+ma 'dra pa'i mig ring khyed kyis gar gzhag ces// ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chus 'dra bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag thog gnyis n se phyogs 'di nyid du// shin legs kyis

gson pa de lta ma yin na// snying stobs chen pa mad nga ra gyur pas bdag cag la// pha ma dag gisaji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis snying rnardza'i skad du rnam ba mang bor
dus nas deng du danas rgyal bu gzhonanu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gasnonanu 'tshol zhing phyogs drang phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang/ gcig gis gcig mthong nas gzhon nu ga re/ gzhan nu
ga ra zhes 'dra'// de'i tshe btsunam mal na nyal ba'i rmilam na sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa la 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang/ sa phyung ba dang/ ji ba'i phug gu sprug pa gsum zhig
da pa las gcig khras khyer bar rjes so// de nas btsun mo saM g.yos pas snying sngangs te/ chod la sad nas sams pa la shugs/ 'byung po'i nam rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab
g.yo tsa zhig gu// nyi ma'i 'od zer med par gyur pas ngayi snying la mya ngan 'gyur ba ston// nga yi lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yol rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa// nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni
rtsor deng ba la dge ba 'gyur ram bya// de nas de snyam du bsam pa dang/ bran mo'ang snying smyos te 'ongs nas/ btsun mo la sbas pa/ ngo bo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa
dag gzhon nu 'tshol zhing mchis na/ job stor ces gda' 'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa// lha
bdag gi du sdug pa stor cesathos so/ rgyal po'ang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lha zhes smras so/ dunas rgyal pos btsunamo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/
nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis/ bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig/ der gzhon nu 'tshol ba la zhugs pa dang/ skyo ba'i tshogs dag red red par gyur to// nga nas ring po ma lon par

rgyal posargyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hud bu dang brel pa zhes bya ngan sdug bsngal
ba'o/ rtaji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yang na mi bde ba/ mi rnams bu rnyed panadi ltar dgal ba ma yin no/ 'jig rtenan ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am// mi rnams gang dag bu
gson de dag bad ba yin nam ci// de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ rngamo gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du shin tu mi zad pa'i sgra byung ngo// de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog ga tshigs
bcas te// me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dag tha chung 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tho chung de ga ro// de nas de gnyis
lhag pa dang/ rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khyu'ub chung ga re zhes gzhon nu gnyis la dril ba dang/ de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang sgyu/ rkan dang/ mchu dung/ kha dang/
so bskams nas cang mi zer ro// btsun mos byas pa/ kho mo'u sdug thachung ga re// kho mo'i snying 'di gas la thug gyur cing// lus n mi bzad rab du gzir gyur te// ba mo'i
dran pa nyams gyur myur du smos// de nas g.yon du de gnyis kyis ji ltagyur pa de zhib tu bas so// de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo myos par gyur te/ myos pa sangs nas snying
rdza'i skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dang ngo// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rus pa de dgag dang/ khrag dang/ rgyus pa mad cing/ sku phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas/
shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de nas mdunan 'don pa dang/ blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chudang ri ma la ya'i tsan dan gyi lde gus rgyal po dang/ pan
mo'i lus sim par byas so// de nas ring mgo lon pa dang 'du shes nadanas/ rgyal pa langs te snying rje rje'i skad du 'bod ba/ kyi hud bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba/ 'chibadag/
dbang du ci phyir myung du song// 'chibadag ci phyirang la sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan ma 'byung// btsun mo'ang myos pa las sangs nas//

sha gzhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang la brdungs te/ nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i stang du 'dre ldog cing mo ha be'u stor ba dang mo rje'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje ji'i skad du ngu'o/ dkyi rgyud sdug myong
gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'ad// su yis sa yi stong du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu// bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de rings 'dir btsim//
kyihud sa 'dir du mchog bsadu mthong ba// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pa// bdag gi snying 'di lcagasan yin yang dag/ da ring rmi
lam du ni bdag gan ma 'ga' zhig gis na ral gris bcad// so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu phrug de ni myur du ma rungs gyur// bdag gis the ba'i phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir
ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag ni bu gsum dgagis bskorab las kyang gtsalen de ring 'chi bdag khyer// kyi hud sdig pa can gyi rmalam de'i 'bras bu grub pa ni 'di yin no// de nas rgyal po dang

ba btsun mo snying rjerdzo'i skad du rnam pa mang po smra zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir

bzhag go/ kun dga' bo dra'i rmada'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes bya ba'agyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sams na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de rtse'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe
pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug las yongs su ma grol bde'i tsho'ang sems can dmyal ba la
sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de
ltar sems can Mrara' phyire yang sems can ramyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas par skye zhing/ skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par grol lo// sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka'aba rnam
pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub mchog bde yongs su 'tshol ba na//
bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste// jiltar rgyal pa dang ni rgyal du gyur// da ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs su btang// sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams ni rjes dran te// shing rta chen po zhes
bya'i rgyal po byung/ de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa// snying stobs che zhes byar dam pa yod// de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod de// ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po// spun tshogs de dag
nags tshal khrod du dang// du dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong// de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes/ stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gang bas na//
bdag bud dag tha bar 'gyur 'ong gis// de ltar bdag lus da na gtang bar bya// shing rtatshayi bu ni snying stobs che// stag mo bkras mthong stag phrug rnams// thar par bya phyir
k+kA snying rje yis// ringos gzar bar mchos pa dang// sanir deng bcas su g.yos// bya chogasa rnam mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di// mun pas
thibs por gnas par gyur// de yi phu bo sgra chen dang/ de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis/ nags tshogs chon pa der bltas nas// snying stobasachen po ma rnyed nas// shin tu rgya
na zug rdu'i snying// dran mang nags kyi nang na rgyu// nu bo da ni yongs 'tshol zhing// gdong la mchizag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag
gnyis// stag ma nyam chung gar nyal ba// der ni nye bar song ba dang// stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi/ stag gi mtshul khrag chags mthong// sku dang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa
la rnam par 'thor ba mthong// de yi khrag gi thigs pami/ nyung zhig sa la yodapar gyur// rgyal po'i bu nid gnyis kyis// khrag chags pa yis de mthong// rab tu brgyal ta sa
'di la/ 'gyel nas yid mi nyams par gyur// lus rnams lan rdul gyis gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// dadag gno 'khor rnams kyang// snying ra
ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chusan rab 'thor zhing// lag pa bsgrengs du ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang// btsun mo gces mchog bskyod pa'i ma// bud med
dag na lnga ba dang// pho brang nang na dur 'dug pa// nu sor gnyis ka'i rtsa mo nas// 'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag/ deya lus dang yan lag kun// khab kyis gtsags
pa bzhin du tsho// snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang// bu bral mya ngan drag mdas phog/ rgyal po'i gan du tu song sto// mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'// snying rje'i sgra yis rab du
zhing / rgyal po shing rta che la smras// mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus mya ngan me yis tshig/ bdag gnu sor phyi gnyis nas// 'o ma khrag du rab tu 'byung//
bdag lus khab kyis gtsags bawani// bdag gi snying yang gas la thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i lhas// bdag gi bu rnams da
ltar 'tshal// thugs rjemadzod de bdag srog gsol// ring bdag gi rmi lam na// tho ba phrug gu gsum rnyed na// bdag gi the ba'i phrug gu ni// sdug cing yid 'ong gang
lags pa// dang ni khra mchis bdag ga gi/ tha ba phrug gu de khras 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra gi/ mya n gnas nig 'dir rab tu zhugs// sems
ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas// bdag ni ring por ma thogs 'gum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshol// thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog stsol// de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ brgyal nas
sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dungang pa rnam par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa mad// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang/ snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu du// btsunamo
ma dam pa brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni// de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de// ru dang bral ba'i mya ngan non// blon po dang nu 'khor rnams kyang// gzhon nu rnams nibatsal phyir
sgyur dang/ /grong khyer kun gyi skya ba dag/ tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod// ngu zhing gdeng nas mchim zag/ lam kar snying stobs chad 'dra// gsonanam 'on tam sha 'am// snying
stobs chen po de gar song// bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'// de ring masnyan thos gyur cing// yun ring mya ngan mi bzad rlung/ sgra mi phyin
sku tsang rgyu mtha' yas/ drag po'i sgra bcas ldang zhig gam// rgyal po shing rtatshe langs te// mya ngan non cing du bzhin du// btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyide chu yi rgyun yang
'thor// ji srid dran rnyed ldan gyur pa// de srid du na chu yis gtor// bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dra bar byed// rgyal po shing rdzu chen po yis//
btsun mo'i mchog la 'di skad snas// blon po rnams dang 'khor rnams kyang// gzhon nu rnams n 'tshol phyir dong// khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing// rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de
ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te// rgyal po pho brang nas byung nas// mya nganananacing ngu zhing ngu// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor to// yid ni rab
zhum lus kyang snyan// srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang// ngunang mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi na mchog nas byung/ rgyal po
byung ba mthong nas// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'byung// rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'idun lta ba'i phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs
su bltas// mgo brags yan lag khrag sbags shing// lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdung la mchi thag ngu bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta
chen po'i snying la yang// rab tu ma bsdad mya ngan gnas// ngu zhing gdeng la mchim zag/ lag pa bsgrengs te ngu zhing 'dug/ de nas blon po gzhan zhig na// rgyang ring myur du ringes
par 'ongs// 'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po na// shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sus yid du 'ong bar mchis//
ring po ma thogs khyod kyi gna' der ni// sras mchog yid 'ong mchib khyed kyis gatrigs// rgyal ra yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang// de nas blon po na po gnyis pa'ongs//
rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing// mchi ma'i gdang gas rgyal la 'di skud pas// rgyal po rman po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni// mya ngan mi yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas//
rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'// snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zani// stag mo ngu byung ring por ma len pa// rang gi bu rnams bra bar 'dod pa mthong// de dag
la ni gzhon nu sems can ches// snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/ byang chub tun smon lam ma btab pa// sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya// byang
pachub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/ ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis reg par bya// sems can chan pa ra ngos gzar nas mchongs/ stag mo bkres pas rten pa de langs te// yud
tsam gyis ni lus la sha mad byas// rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus// ma rungs pa yaM sa tshig na de thos nas// rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te/ sa la 'gyel nas sems
kyang stor bar gyur// mya ngan ma ni shin dumi bzad 'bar// 'khor dang blon bo snying rje'i skad kyis ni// ngu zhang mya ngan chen bzhin de dag kyang// chus 'thor lag pa bsgrungs te rab/
du ngu (blon po gsum pas rgyal la snas pa ni// bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag/ nags chen den rab tu brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel te sams kyang stor mthong
nas[}]dran pa rnyed da langs kyi bar du no// bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tugator// phyogs bzhi dag nas kum nasaM 'bar ba mthong// yud tsama'agrengs nas slar
yangs la 'gyel// snying rje'i skad kyis smasngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa bsgrungs du gnas nas ni/ nu bo de la bsngags pa rab tubarjod// rgyal po da na rab tu
sems zhum zhing/ bu dang bral bas nanas sums kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab du 'don zhing sngags 'den/ rgyal po da na 'di snyam yongs susams// bdag
bu sdug cing yid 'ongo gcig pu ni// sems can chen po mi rtog nyid kyis drin// bdag gi bu riganyis pa de dag kyang// mya ngan ma yis srog ni zad 'ong gi/ 'di ltar bdag de
myur du der song la// mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya/// bzhon pa mgyogs pasargyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkra bar bya// de dag rnams na skyid pa'i ma
oM snying/ myang n ma yis gas par 'gyuradu'og/ bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob gyur te// srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs
ka kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhin du bu rnams lta phyir song// bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rang ngu zhing// nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong// rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid
nas su// rab du ngu zhing khyim du song nas// de yis skyon par la gor myur du yang// btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga// sngon gyi rgyal po'i
rtachen po ya// bu de snying stobs chen pa mchog gyur cing// gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin/ rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang na// shing dmazhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun

na mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu 'phrul gyur// sgra chen po na byams par gyur pa lane/ rgyal po lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba yin// stag mor gyur pa skyo dgu'i bdag mo

stag phrug dag nadagoslong lnga por gyur// de nas rgyal po shing rAtshon po rang/ btsunamos snyang rdzabar smra sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas/ rgyan thams cad ngagrol/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan
tsha cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/snying stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di dag phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag sta/na pa tshosna bdun gyis mchod rten 'di byas so// snying stobs chen po 'dis stag mo
la lus yongasasu btang nas/ lus yos su btang ba 'dis phyi mam 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrangs pa las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byar nas skyon

lam de skud btab bo// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'isems can grangs med dpag dumad pa dgabAnamed pa yang dag brjoyapa'i phyang chub tusams bskyed do// mchod rten 'di 'dire ston pa'i

rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod rten de'ang sangs u0fb1sa kyi byin gyi rlangs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// gser 'od dam pa mde sda'i dpang po'i rgyal po las/ stag mo la lus yongs su btang/
ba'i le'u nas bya sta shu rtsa drug pa'o///dunas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsar dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs
ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa gsar dang rinapo che'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gtsog tu 'khod do// phyogs
gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ dra bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin pa cha'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag gis mngon par bstod de// rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso ma'i gsor 'dra ste// sku luso gsar gyi mdog du rnam par gda'// gsangagyi ri dbang lta bur gsar gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po'i
gser mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus brgyan// dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs sku lus spras// gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar//

shin tu dri mad nA ba ri dbang 'dra/ tshangs pa'i sku dngasgra snyan tshangs pa'i rebyangs// sang ga'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yanalag drug cu'i bsgrags pa'i dri med sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma

tsak+kA tsu ka la bing ka'i sgra// shin tu dri mad dri bral gab 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgyu ya mtshan gyis brgyan// mkhyen pa'i mtsho ru yid dri bral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra//
sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags/ 'chib

(med pa'i bde ba gsol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'chib med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bdung kun gyi 'byung gnas bdaba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar par mdo

sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skyo dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rang tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnams la bdeb kun stsol pa// khyod la dpanubagyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes yon tanamatsho// srog
rigs kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang// byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang// khyod kyi yon tan la shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang par yang
thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par// lhur bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan thug byas te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag
gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis// sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
bstobar ba le'u zhes bya ste ngeshu rtsa bdun pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
pa'i lce nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dug gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de// thub dbang khyod ni
bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhib ston// nyi ma stong ltar 'od nasnyem par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar bas
'od kyis khyab// kha dog sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra// sngon po dkar pa gsar 'ad ba zhu// zangs dang skya rengs shal gyi 'od lta bu s// rdordzar dbang rirang thal mdzad cing/ zhing rnams
bya ba du mar snang mdzad do// sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad// bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad// mdog dang dbang po gsal ba blta na mdzes// gzugasabaltas mi ngoms
skya bas bltan dag// rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu sa rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// ting 'dzin byams pa/
bsod nams dam pa bsags// dpo byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan// khyod nirab du tshims mdzad pan pa mdzad// bad mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung
nAsa'abyung// yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// zhing rnams ngebadag tu lhangang ste// ma yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// jiltanganam mkha'i nyidakyil rdzogs pa bzhin//
ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan pas// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gdab// bzhi ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing/ kha ba'i mdog dung dkar pa bzang 'dra ba'i/ tshems kyi 'phreng bas khyed
kyi zhal mdzes pa// ngang pa'i rgyal pas bar snang ji bzhin no// khyod kyi zho zhal mtshuga gnas zla ba 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil chung khong chud 'dra ba lags// ba zlum 'dra'i spu 'od dkar rnams
kyis nam mkha' dkyilan 'a ma lta bur mdzes// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu tshu/
brgyad pa'o//denas rigs kyi rtse mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par
dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing// srid dang sring man mkhyen pa'i rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag

'tshal lo// kye ma'o kyi ma'o sangs rgyas gab badz+dzadematho' yas te// kye ma'o kyi ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni re reb 'dra// kyi ma'o kyi ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum ba ra'i ma tog bzhin du
shin tu dkon// sams cad dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad du// gang gis mdo snga'i dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa// mdabang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog kyama'e kye ma'o de bzhin

gshegs pa thugs rje ldan// de bzhin gshags pa shAkya thub pa dbang po ni// zhi ba dam pa zhi ba'i phreng khyur rang du zhugs// ting 'dzin thabatsang zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod
yul der yang rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus n sbyong pa ste// rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'i ng stong pa lags// chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na//
sems can rnams n stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal te// rtag par bor thug du rgyal ba dran par bgyid// rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag du mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma mthong bar
bgyi slad du// rtag par yang ni smon lam rab du 'debs par bgyid// bdagan rtag tu dogasar pus mo btsugs nas su// rgyal ba'i gabrugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan sems// 'dren
pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis du bar bgyid// bdag ni bdabar gshigs pa mthong bar rab tusnyom// mya ngan ma yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong bab bsal/
bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol// bdag de khyed kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu skom// thugs rje'i chab kyis bdag la rab tu tshim par mdzod// 'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugasarjer mdzad
du gsol// zhi ba'i gzugs mthong pa ni bdag la stsal du gsol// khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i skyor pa ste// 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus n stong pa lags// sems can thams

pa cad dag na rmi lam rang bzhin te// rnam mkha' 'dra yang nam mkha'i dri ba nyid kyang lags// sgyum smag rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra// 'dren pa khyed kyi ston pa che dang ldan pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das
gdan las bzhengs ta tshas pa'i sgra skad kyis bka' stsatsapa// rigs kyi lha mo khyod legs so legs so// khyod yang legs so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rigs/
kyi lu ma byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad dang/ lha mo chen mo dpal la sogs pa lcamo'igs de dag thams cad

dang rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa'i lce'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dadag dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ dri thar bcas pa'i 'jigarten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mde snga' dbang de'irgyal po las/ 'jug bsdus kyi le'u zhes bya stanyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
bshags pa gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang re 'argyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i med rdzogs so// [0f7a]/ gar gyi 'khan po dzan mi dradang/ shAl in+d+ra bo d+hi deng/ chu chen gyi
la che ba bats+tsaye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yasu bats+tshapra b+hA sat+ta ma sud+do
nam tA rA dzan ma ma dpAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sta'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba thag pachan po' med////bam po dang po/ 'a 'das
pa dang/ ma byin pa dang/ du ltor byung ba'i sangs rgyas dung 1 byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshalal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus/
gcig na/ byargodapung po tshes kyi dbyings// thangamo sangs rgyas spyod yulan// dbatsan gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams mad pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams l
mdasa'i dbang po rgyal po ste// mnyan na shin durbab pa dang// yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid// gsera'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyison// byin gyi rubs kyis byin
brlabs pa// mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gisartse phyogs su// 'od dpagamad kyis nub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis ni byung phyogs su// sdig pa
thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sdig pa lasa rnams rbad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyisan legs par brgyan// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang ponyams// tsho thud pa dang tshe nyams dang/ phun su mchogs min gang
chags dang// lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang// mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang// bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang/ phan tshun mthun pa mang na dang// nor 'grib pas na gnod pa dang// mya ngan
mngal dang gnod pa dang// 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang/ gza'adang rgyu skur byed soms dang// mi bzad gdon gyis nyan pa dang// mya ngan mngal las byung pa yi// rmi lamasdig pa mthong n yang//
dus ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis// mdo snga'idam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dab mas dang zhing// gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan to// zabamosangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ mdo 'di nyan par
khyod nan// mdo sde 'di yi gabri brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa ste// shin dum bzad bdabadra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jigartan skyongab bdag med dang// blon po tsho ngogs kyi

[4/ ]dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba dum yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lhamo nam dbyangs can dang/ 'dirany+dza rang gnas pa dang// 'byung po ma mo 'phrog ma dang// sa yi lha mo brtan mdung//

tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang// klu dbang mkhruchen rnams dang ni// mi dbang cad bang lha min dbang// de bzhinam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang// bcasate de dang deng
lcagasanas// nyin dang mtshan mo me g.yel bar// dodag la ni srung bar byed// thab mosangasargyus spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mde 'di reb
du bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyen pa dang// gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang// gang su rjes su yi rang dang// gang dgamachod pa byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang// mi dang mi 'am
cad g dang// lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bya bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po na// mtha' yas grangs kyang mad pa dang//
bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang// rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba yi// gtsang ma'i gos
rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing// byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// g.yel ba med pa samachod par bya// rang gi sems na dri med cing// rgya che bar yang rab byed la/
sems kyang shin tudang byed kyis// mde snga dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// padag mi nang legs par 'ongs// sa yi srid pa legs par 'thob// 'tsho
de bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang// bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dug rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tubasngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang
pe la pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya bsta dang pa'o///yang de'i tshed 'i dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pa na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa

mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems

tu/ rgyugang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lobargyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis rang

rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang/ kha thas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bskal pa bye ba khragakhrig

brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur panas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar yang dag por bas par gyur/zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su bdang
00 ste thanarang gilus kyisha dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa dang/ rkang gis kyang sems na ltogs ba rnams tshim par mdzadun/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la/

song ba'i yid 'byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'itshulagyis bsam pa 'di ngegasams pa na/ de'i khang pa yangs shing rgya chal/ phamasngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas smras pa/ dopazhan gshags pas
khadog bsgyurab/ lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas/ lharin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te khri do dag las kyang lha'i ris bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs

rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i ma tog pad+ma rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshags pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo// pad+made dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
bzhi byung bar gyur tu/ shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung/ lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung/ nub phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs patshodapag

med byung/ byang phyogs nas nad bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung sta/ sang ga'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thagatuM/ de nas du'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba

chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i badzagi rten gyi khams kyi bar dang/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'ajig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
ga bye ma snyad kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i ma tog dag gi char yang 'bang/ lca'i sil snyan gyi sgra'ang byung ngo// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams bdagesems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag na mig
gis gzugs rnams mthong/ sems can bod pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams shes/ sems can smon pa dag ni dran pa so sor red/ sems can sams g.yeng ba dag ni sams migaparung bar gyur//
'a sems can sbyin mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sams rin pakres pa dgar lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom pa dang bral bar gyur/ sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang

bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog

gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dga mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' sto/ dga' ba dang yadeb dpa myas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga
la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams rjes su dran la/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i len tan rjes su dran zhing/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku

tshe'i tshad la the tshom zaparagyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'dici zhig snyam du bsam pa de soms shing 'dug pa gyur te// da nas sangs rgyas bcom/

ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dapa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'disnyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung
ngosnyam du masamasashig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ 'dud
dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dag sbyong dang bram thar bcas pa'i skye dgu dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lhamaya na du bcas pa'inang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
pa'i sku tshe'i tshod kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'u bar du'ang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su'ang ma mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gisade zhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa/
brjed ma thagatu/ de nas de'i tshesangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang/ gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/nam mkha'

ldi dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang/ byang chub semada'i bya bakhrag khrig brgya stong phragaru ma 'dus nas/ byang chub saMms dar 'amadzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dal/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshar pa tshigs su bcad du mdor bka' stsal pa// rgyu/

mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/ thogs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar minus so// ri ba rnams nithams cad kyang// phra rab rdul dang bgrang bar nus//

shAkya thub pa'i skutshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrangabar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod payi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'atshad minus// gal tu/
la las rnam mkha'i la// sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar minus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs M// bskal pa dag ni 'di

snyad cig/ bskal pa bya ba brgya dag ces// grangasan rnyed par mi rung ngo// gang phyir doyi rgyu dang ni/ rgyanayang rnam pa gnyis yin te// sdig pa'i 'tshob spangs pa dang// kha zas mang pa byon pa ste// da

phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i// sku tshe'i gras na mi rnyed do// bskal pa 'disnyad cig ce'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'gyur// thatshom cung zad mtha zhig/ rgyal ba'i sku

tsho'i mtha' man// grangs ni gang du'ang ma dmigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor de slob dpon lung ston pa bram the ko'u dbye nas bya ba dang/ bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/
de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la jusato/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasaganyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ra// gal te bcom ldan/
'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse nga/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// phan par bzhed pa sogs can thams cad lapham ltadu/ mi nyam pa dang mnyam par gyur ro// bla ra lta bur snang
ba mdzad pa// shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu legs shing/ gal te khyodasems can thams cad la sgra gcun bu bzhin du gzugasan/ bdag la dum pa cig stsal du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon
lung ston pa ko'u de la 'di skad ces smasaso// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pacig gsola'am/ bdag gis khyed la dam ra cig ston na// brag ngos smras pa/ li tsa rgya/
gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang/ ring bsrel gyi phyi mdagos pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrolaungs 'bru tsam labarten par 'dod do// rang bsralayungs 'bru tsam de
mngon par mchod na/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig 'thob ces grags so// kyalatsa byi gzhon nugasar 'od dam pa'i mdonyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shis par
dka'/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa/ gsar 'od dam pa'imado khachad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kyi li tsa byi gzhon nu gsar 'od
dam pa'i mdo 'di ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/ kho bo cag 'tha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs pa na/sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag
pa thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrol yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gnang du bcug la bcas kyang rung ngo dkya li tsa byi gzhon nu+odacad bzhin gshegs pa las ring bal yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ rang
sral bya ma tog tu bcug stabacas pas/sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye 'batsa byi gzhon nu khe bas na rim pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas ri byi gzhon nu 'jig

pa chen thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u du n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis sur slas pa/ nam zhig gang+gA'i rgyun la// ma tog rnams ni skye ba dang// bya rog dmar
par 'gyur ba dang// khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang// 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bu chags dang// 'bra gor a ma'i rig pa chags// de yi tshon yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur//nam
zhig rus sbal spu rnams las// gos su legs par btags gyur te// dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa// de tshe ring bsrol yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sbyang bu'i rkang 'a ga la sa// yang thog legs par byas
0 gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de tshering bsral yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad pa kun// son dkarapor skyes gyur to// zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur//
mtho ris sun 'dzog pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skasan legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig skasanadir 'dzegs te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba

dang sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshering bsrol yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'khrungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrol yodapar

'chug// nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la/chudamar bam pa 'drar gyur cing// glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur ba// nga tsho ring bsral yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya reg rnams// dben par deng nas rtsa ba dang//
phan tshun mthun par gyur pan// datshe ring bsrol yod par 'gyur// bal sha yi lo ma rnams// rin na sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabs su nam gyur pa// de tshe ring bsral yod par 'gyur/
nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung sta 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrol yod par 'gyur// nam zhig byan 'ug pa yis// ri bo skyes kyi dad ldan pa//
la thogs tu 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u daces tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ lo tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis
mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smos pa// legs so legs gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshig pa tsha// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa//
lung bstan pan dem pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa pe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chab nyid// bsam gyis mib go ramis bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni
bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tun// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag byung// sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di sangs rgyas
chos nyid yin// bcom ldan 'dasan bcos mkhin// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// de lta bur sra ba'i sku// sbrul pa'i skun ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes
bya ba mad// sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrol yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel gzhug par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de
bzhin gshags pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis 'di thos shas nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid len lung bstan

phyir[.]gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshod bstan pa zab mo de lta bu d dag thos nas/ thoms cad kyis dran med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod de/ dadag yid kyi kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da'// chos kyang/
nub par ma'agyur te// sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsams khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams
la phan pa'i gi/ bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dapa' mdzes pa'i tig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom 'das

shAkyakhrub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thosanas/tshim zhing mgul yarangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang/ lade bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgu ba rgya chen pes khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku tshe'atshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'itshe/ sems can grangs med dang ga tu mad pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyasaso// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
kyang mi snang bar gyur te// gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/de bzhin gshags pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i 'uzhas bya sta gnyis pag/
danas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis leg pa'i mi'aman/gas gyi jo kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhiga mthong/ phyogs thams cad na'ang
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med du pag tu med pa dag rin tsho'i shing drung na/ rin po chab cha ma'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskorata/

mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo// de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig ja da dung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thesaso//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran// rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer

dza chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro ge la bdang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
tshe'atshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' madzes pa'i rtog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
bder logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dpang pa'i rgyal po las/ rmilam
A mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o//kanub gcig g.yel ba med par yang// ngadag gi rmi lam gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du na gsar
0 gyi'od ltarim bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhung nga ste// phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur// kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen ba rgyun dag gi/ khra la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te//
brgya stong phrag na du mas// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong// bram ze'i gzugs ni 'drab zhig/thachon rab tu rdung ba mthong// de yis di la brdungs pa dang//gas su bcad pa 'di dag
byung/ gser 'od dam ba'i rjechesgra yis ni//stogasum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di ni// na song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog/ rnga bo chayi
sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thamasacad zhi gyur cig/ jaltar thub dbang 'jigasayid 'gasazhi ltar// semaMsacan 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun

mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rdzabo che yi sgra skad 'di yisan// sems can
thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur// sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog cigashog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'grol
khan gyi chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sal bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhu gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i/
lus la ma lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sasargyas phyag 'tshal le zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang//

skye ba stong phrag bya ba sku dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu rngan gyur cig/ dedag gisanad+ma chan gsung thos shog/ rnga bo chas sgra skad 'di lo sa ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur//
sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ khyo ba dag ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon pa gang yin pa// rnga bo choye
sgraskad 'di yis ni// da dab rnams ni don kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sa mas dmyalam bzad skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas
shing yongs 'khyam pa// ma rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rtan n/ sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag re gang/ rnga bo che la sgra skad 'di
las ni/ de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun 'ashog/ rtenamed dpung gnyen med pa dang// skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag/ da rnams la na skyob pa dang// dbung gnyen rtan mchog
bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcud 'jig rtenan// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongasasu gsol//
ma bodag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las/ shin tum bzad gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu kun sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang//
sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang// dge kharag tu mi 'dzin pas/ sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa// phyug pa'i rgyags pas drags pa dang/ rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang/
gnon pa'i rgyugs pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// nyes bsam nyes par smras pa dang// nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang// nyes pa'i dmigs su
ma bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// byis ba'i blo yis 'jug pa dang/ mngegs mun pa'i sams dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang// nyon mongs
rnam bar 'khrug soms dang/ rtsad mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang// mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang// nor gyis mtshig nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// 'phags
min skye bo 'dri ba dang// phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni/ g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis nyes pa gang bgyis pa// 'phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi
'jig rgyu dang// phyug pa ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// g.yo ba'i soms kyi dbang nyid dang// 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang// bkras dang skom gyis
smA @#// rten pa yis// bdag gas sdig pa gang bgyis dang// brla'i ba dag dang btung ba dang// dudabad rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyen mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/ da//
bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug/ 'os par spyod pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di'adra'i tshul ni gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chagasaso//
sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang// de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang// gus pam lags/nga bgyis pa/da dgathamasacad bangag 'chagasaso// g.yar angasargyas Adang 'byakhasam baba'an
la yang// gus ba ma lags bgyis pa rnams// dadag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos stsa ba rnams la yang// gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang// chos la'ang gus pa ma
blo bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gisartag dugashis khas// dam pa'i chos ni sbangs pa dang// pha ma rnams la ma gus dang// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags/
so= drug pa dang ni byis pa dang// 'dedachags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal drags pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gi phyogs bcu'i 'jig
tshangaskartan du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod pa bgyi// bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun//
sa bcu la na dgod par bgyi// sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang// thams cad de bzhin gshags gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyi nus srid du// sems can/
ri de'i phyir yang na ]/bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// gsar 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag bstan
bar bgyi// gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi
sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gsar 'od dam pa dag pa yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas na// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcul
ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsholas bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas mtshochu bo dang// yon tan rgya mtsho brab mo dang// sangs rgyas yon
tan mtha' yas kyi// thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs par bgyi/ ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang// gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang// dbang stabs byang chub yan lag gi/
stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i lkugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis gi/ nongs pa rab tu
na@#/// gzung du gsol/ khadag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// 'phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs/
pas gabrir// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dag gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad
jugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sal bas/ nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin
gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang//
rgyud ltar bdag gis sdig pa gang// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis
pa gang// sdig de bcang pa ra mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang// yid kyi rnam pa gsum pa rnams// dodag thams cad bdag 'chags
sa lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang// las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mdag las bcu
sbangs nas su// dge ba bcu po bstan bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob
bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngaramachisanus na// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang// 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dag
ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang// bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag na dag ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la
reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu ma bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags
par bgyi// skyo ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang// 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo soms nyam nga bar/ dalus kyi spyod pa nyam nga snatshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsagasad 'chags
so byis pa blun byas nyen mongs nyam nga dang// sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang// srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang// zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang// dal
ba'i nyam ngadus kyi nyam nga dang// bsod nams sgrub pa nyam nga dag gis kyang// rgyal ba mi nyam mngon sum mchis nas nii// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bagyi// sangs rgyas gsar
d mchog ri snangar rab badra// yon tan rgya mtsho'apral phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi// rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gsomago/
pas gsar ni dri ma med pa'i gsar gyi mdog/ dri med rnam dag bai DUmu yi yan lag sman// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpa' gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun nag
[“/ ]bas/ yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyib yan lag drimad gsar 'dras khyab// nyon mo ngas mas gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i ma 'dral/ thub pa'i smra'i
@# 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshon mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad pawang pa dag gis ma na lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'ba' lugs
'od zer dra ba las/ 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgyan kha dog sna tshogs po chung// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shul bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra
b rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyed ni nyim bzhin du de yisani// mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu ba'i dba' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen 'phongs pa'i chu bar lhung ba la//
[“]khu sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog du chu ba cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skoms// yan lag gsar gyi mdog du rnam par snang/ yi shis 'byung gnas
'jig rten gsum kun mchog rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam smras pa// sangs rgyas gsar sku 'babal phyag 'tshal// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i tshe na dbag med dang// ji ltar sa la sajul
mtha' yas dang// ji ltar rarab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang// ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par
minus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsam kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par ma nus so// chun sku yi rtse mo'i tshod tsam dang/ rdor bcas ri bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni//
bskal da ra bsrungs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha' shesamanus/ yon tan la dogasnyan dong grags pa dang// dag pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang/
dpe byad bzang pa brgyad cus brgyan pa yi// sems can thams cad de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag gi dag pa'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten ma ring sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyid/
'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gawaMr thar par bgyi// stobs bcas sngar bcas bdud 'a sa rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dag babasko
bar bgyi// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab kha gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsachuyis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bsardzogs pa ltar/ ]sa rol phyin drug bla mar
rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhan phyir sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skyo ba bya ba stong// bdag ni rtag tu skye
badran par bgyi// thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de yi gsungani rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dag pa'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi//
sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung ba nas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun n srog chags thams cad kyang// 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi
gyung sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// dokun da'u ra dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad ngatab nyam chung lus nyams dang// phyogs racu dag na skyabs mad gyur pa/
rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad mad stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u bsdigs gsang thug dang// sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs
ba u0fa9yis kha phongs gyur pa/ sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog mi bzad rgyal po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag bajagasaM shing bcing bas bcings
gzir ba/ 'phongs pa sna tshogs dag ni gnas gyur cing// nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang// 'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/ dad dag thams cad bcings las ]
[o]/ grol gyur cig/ brtag pa dag ni brtags las thar par shog// gsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ 'a phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can gang dag
bkres srid skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ leng bas gzugasa rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig// 'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer
bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can dngul pos gtor rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog
grang yang sdug bsngal tsher bas gnod ma gyur// sems can thams cad bstan sdug ba dang// gzugasakhazang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/
yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tud dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rngacang tu'u pa wang sgra snyan dang// chumag mcho'u rdzing bu lteng ka dang// gser gyi pad+ma uts+tshal
pad+macan// zas skom gos nor mu tiganor bu dbyig/ rgyan gsar rinachen sna tshogs be DUr// dadag bsams ma thag tu grub gyuratsag/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma 'byung//
sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// dadag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang// phan tshun du ni'od byed gyur par shog/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// da dang bsam
par skye bar de dag gyur// bsams pa thams cad bsamam thag du yang// bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang khyug pa
la dngo gos dang phyi ma ma tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bar bar shog/ sems can de dag len cing dag gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad
dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang// rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang// phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad spyod gyur
cig mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang
'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ budamad thams cad rtag tu phor gyur to// dar 'a
zhing tshul yod mkhasashing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// parol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung// sangs rgyas
a bad bzhugs rin chen bo DUmagi/ khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thes par shog/ bdag bas sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa na// srid pa'i nyam
par sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'a dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad lus ni zad gyur cig sems can gang dag srid par bas gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags
ba'i thag pas dam btsidzes pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog/ sdug sngal rnams las thar gyur rgyur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu gling 'di dang// gang dag 'jig
rten khams na gzhan rnams na/ kha sod nams sna tshegs zab mo rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yis// bdag gis rjes su yi rang
bsod nams des// bdag ni smon gruba'abras bu thob par shog byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang// dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa
dang 3yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud mdabram ze rgyal rigs las/
thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang ston pa// tshorabs kun tu skyo badran par bgyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis lan 'a ga brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi
dbang rgyal pos rtag tu do mchod do// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grogs 'gyur ba// dedag sangs rgyas gcig gi gam nas dge ba byas ma yin//
gnyis la malinabazhil ma yin la min ngamyul min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/
sa bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o///bam po gnyis pa/ ga danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag pa'i
bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe da'i dus na rgyal po gsar gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba dus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i 'byung
gnas 'dis 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod de do/ rgyu'akha gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang// phyogs bcu'i
kashrI 'jig rten dag na gang gzhes pa// rgyal ba dedag rnams la phyag bgyi 'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang la zhing rab zhinam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog du
rab tu gdab// ngangungs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung// bung ba rmad+ya ulpal sngon po'i dbu// mthonamathing lcang la
ni tsag 'dra// kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gsar ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// sngan ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med// ut+pal sngon po rab turgyas pa 'dra//
0 lcagasan zhinge legs ga ba'i mdog (pad 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod sku pad+ma dung dong 'dra/ bai DUr+ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing/
zla ba zad pa 'dra// sku yi lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal mtho'apishangasan rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sa la gsar ltar kha dogabazang// rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi/
mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags// spyi la bu ga nas ni re ra skyas/ snga rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// mthon mthung 'od 'bar 'tshar zhing lcang lo can//
rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'drab r so lam ris/ bltams ma thag tu su yis snang bar khagyis// phyogs bcu 'jig rtan dag ni thams cad gang// 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas
zhi[） ]cha bdeb kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshig/ sems can dmyal 'gro dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang// yi dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag thams cad bar
bas tshem/ n gnas ong 'grob rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gsar dang 'dra ba'i 'od// btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bad gshags zla ba rab tu drimad
zhal[}]'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam// sang ga 'drar bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyag na rab tu ring
ba sta rtasA la'i lcagam rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtang// nyimastong ltar rab tu lhag gag/ thub pa'i dbang po sku mdog/
dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang// sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nga bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang// mtshan byad zla ba nyi mamang
bo dag/ de dag thams cad 'od n bad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas te ma 'jig rtan sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag
na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i sems can mthong// bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal

k+Sha ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa la stong gardul dang mtshungs 'dra snyad// phra ba'i rdul snyad sangs rgyas gang 'das dang// gang dag phrab 'i rdul snyad 'byung ba dang/
gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyad bzhugs pa yis// rgyal ba de dag lan rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis ma tog dbul ba dang// sosa rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang// dga'
ba'i sems kyis kyang n phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dga' gyur pa// snying bo mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas
yon tan brjod par mi nus so// rgyal ba gcig ga yon tan rnams kyang na// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dgan thams cad kyi// yon tan gug
rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srodapa'i chu mo mnachad chus gang ba// sa yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs
rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba pa rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bas/
gang/ rtades ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ da ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstodanas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas/
rnams su yang// gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmilam du na 'o de 'dra'i rdo blta zhing// dar bshags pa 'di dramanyan par bgyi// rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba//
skya ba de dang der na rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' las mtshungs med dang// gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// dadag rmilam du yang mnyan par bgyi//
ni gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsholas thar par bgyi/ pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyin s byang chub bla med thob par bgyi//
bdag gi zhing na lhod pa mod gyur cig/ rdzaphul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras budang/ rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar
bgyi tadang na bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig gsar gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gsar gyi 'od// bdag ga khye'u ni nga yin 'di gnyis kyang// der ni bu bo de dag gnyis ka dang//
byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas mad rten mad cing// skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnalasan//
skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rtan gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bad ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha'i 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/
klo ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub sdud par bgyi// gsor 'od dam pa yi nibeshags pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig
bdag gi nyon mongs mtshozad par shog/ bdag gis bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ya shas rgya mtsho rnam dag cing// yon
tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog/ byang chub yon tan rin chen gas gyur cing// gsar 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyisan// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang par shog/
bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag galus kyi 'od nasnang bar shog/ bsod nams dam pa lhag gir bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten
gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig// bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho lasan sgrol ba dang// bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho'adra ba yis// ma bos
bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten gsum n sngon mthar jisnyad gshags// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha'ayas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ga/ yonam
mtha' yas rnams kyi bdag gi zhing// ma 'ongs dus na da 'drar 'gyur bar shog// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar
byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa ma tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams ba zhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyus bshad de// de lta bas na mad mchog dam pa 'dir/
stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par byas// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas namado mchog dam pa 'di//
stong pa'i chos rnams mdotsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang// sems can 'byung bya'i phyir na snying rje'i dbang// thabs dang
tshul dang rgya gzhan rnams kyis ni// mde mchog dam pa dbang po 'du bshad de// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams n dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag
thams cad M grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rnaba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna yi dbang po
sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po rig pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang pochos M rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po bad dag phan tshun
du rtarang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ drasamasani sgyu ma lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drugan yul la rnam sbyod du// ji ltar ma zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang// dmag dang chom
kun dgra dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems nayul drug gnas bcas shAng// dbang po'i spyod yuladag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems niyul drug gnas bcas te//
dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang// re dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug pa thams cad la//
dbang por zhugs pa khyabazhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa padag nyid byed// lus g.yo bshad cing byed pa mad/
po mad cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung// grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams na/
grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sprul rnams bzhi/
bo de dag kyang// gnyis ni stong 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogasa mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraM/ sa yi
sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang// 'di gnyis 'og tuzad par 'gyur ba yin// mas sbrul dang rlung gi sprul dag dang// 'di gnyis stang gnam mkhar 'gro bayin// ji ltar sngon chad byas
pa'i lasa rnams kyis// sams dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas deng// ltadang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skyo// bad kan rlung
dang mkhris pa zad gyur nas// lus shi gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang// mngon par m dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor bzhang bzhin gyur/
gla/// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa ya rgyun las byung

ka ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dgache'abyung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba ma 'byung// de phyi'i 'byung ba che nas ngas brjod de// yod pa min zhing nam yang
yod min la/ ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// dbas ngasanam rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang// sku mched drug dang rig

kha dang tshor ba dang// srid dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang// skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// kha kher ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag// ma
phyung ba las byung ba mi 'byung dang// tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang// bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo dral// phung po'i gnas la stong ba

gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan chen rig par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phyed/ bdud tsa khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// sa bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas na bdud rtsi ru bas

bdag tshim byas/ngas chos kyi chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni ches kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// sa ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngasani chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams
las rgyal// san chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam ba bsgrangs// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ani ngan song gsum gyi las rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs ma yis gdungs gyur pa// rten

mad gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mas gdungasazhi byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab

mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku da yongs su tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang// yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang// nor dbyibs nor bu mu tig
can dang gsar// bortum dang rin chen sna tshogs btang// stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang/ tsA dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang// nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcad
gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlags nas/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas/ mamakha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phyi ma'i phung po sbyangs nas na// 'di la chagasum dbye bar nus
sa la rdul niyod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyis shes pa gang// de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes
pad las rdul rnams kyi// phyi ma bgrang bar byed na// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrangs par nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyenal mi
