nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang// skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang// bskal ba bye ba dumar na// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so//gsar 'od dam pa mdo/
sde'i dbang po'i rgyal las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'uzhes bya ste drug pa'o//denas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'kher srung dang/ rgyal po chen po
'phags skyes pa dang/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzangastan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa ga cig tu bgos nas/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la nga der tshogs
a su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mde sdo'i dbangapo'i rgyal po 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
gsungasal/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgos pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yos su gzung/ lha'i tshogs
thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/lta'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lce'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod ma// 'jig rtenaskyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags brjod nas rab
tu bkur ba/lha'i khang khyim thams cad snangabarab gyidar/sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rang du sbyin par bgyid pa// sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jigartan/
0 gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu skams pa/'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyunagacod pa/ pa gol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab lu'i bar bgyid pa/nad
kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid gza' thams cad sol ba mchogatu ni bar bgyid pa/myang n dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab du zhi bar bgyid pa/gnod

pa brgya stor rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das gsara'od dam pa mde snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'a khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/chos nyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba
'das bdag cag rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas la bzhi lta'i lus 'dis gsan pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang/ stobs dang/ mthu'ang skyid par 'gyur/gzi
parjod dang/ dpal dang kan sum tshogs pa'i ng bdag cag gi lus la 'jug bar 'gyur te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal bo bo bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyis khyu dang/ klu dang/gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyalapo
bgyi'i// 'byung bo'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rdzam mchis pa/ gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog ba rnams bzlog par ba go/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi/
[ziE ]/ sdu dben na bon shu rtsa brgyad dang/ gnod sbyin ba stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad/
la blta pa khagyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi sta/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa ba
tshu ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'dzems par 'gyur ram/ mu ga'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa
stong dang/ gnod pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtsos par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dag slong
chos smra bde dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasanam bdag cag rgyal po chan po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyis dag slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul
gang dang gang du mchi bar gsar 'od dam pa mde snga'i dbang po 'diyul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par gyur to/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa stong shul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu
sku 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pogang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa 'i dag slong chos skya ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gsar/
'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang bstan par 'gyur ga btsun pa bcom ldan 'das namami'i rgyal pos gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ma nyan tu thos nas/mde
snga'i dbang 'dzin pa'i dag slong da dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung bar bgyidi/ yongs su skyab pa dang/ yongs su 'a dzin pa dang/ yongs su myong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal de chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su
garung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ reb dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge
khasnyan nam/ dag bstanam mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thamaMs cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cagargyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i
yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sumatshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasanam mi'i rgyal pos dag
slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dag bstan ma mde snga'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
cago rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad bsachos bsti stang du bgyi/ chos bla ma bgyi/ chos rim gror bgyi ches mchod par bgyisdu/ yulu//
ka thams cad du'ang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bo chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal bo chen po dag legs so legs so/ rgyal po chen po

wA khyed yang le gsaso legs so// 'di lta gyu/ khyad na sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa pa rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyan pakur
byas ba/ ngos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta sta/ khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sams dang
ldan pa/bdeb dang ga byams pa soms dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gogs pa// sems can byams

cad kha bad ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyad panas me'i rgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dil mchod pa dang/ rim gror byed par brtson pa de
ma dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shige/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang / bad legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ des na rgyal
po tshan bodadung dang/ g.yog dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun/
tubasrungs bar 'gyur go/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yos su bzung bar yang 'gyur lo/ des na rgyal pochen po dpung dang/ g.yog dang/ gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyad pa'i
khyu dang khyu ma yin du g.yul 'gyod pan rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ lca ma yid rnams lam bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gsar 'od dam pa mdosta'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'du pa/
bar byed pa'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dag bstananam/ dag bstanam mdo sde'i dbang po'adzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su
gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyus ratshan pa/
'phags skyes lo dang/ rgyal po chen po yod mkhazang stan las langs ta bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'ilcangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ad grong
khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongasasem/ yul 'khor tam/ bobrang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ btsun

ba pa com ldan 'das mi rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la lazhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing/ rtag par rgyun du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/
wAtam rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsAn ma nam/ dge bsnyan ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la' nga bsti stang bgyid/ btsun
par ba gyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang de'i rgyal po nyanan/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po
bzhi da pung dang gcog du bcas pa dang/ gnod spyin bad+mo stong phrag du ma'i lta'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang 1 stobs chen
par ya nga bgyid par 'a gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang/ dpal dang/ phun sumatshogs pa'i ng rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cagargyal po chen po bzhi
a dpung dang g.yog tubacas ba/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lus bltar mi gda'i bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan grongangam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/

bca yul 'a khor ram/ pho brang 'a khor gang nagasar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal/
bo 'di nyan pa dang/ rim gro bgyid pa dang/ mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu basrung bar bgyi'o// mos su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba
dang/ zhib dang/ bde legs su 'gyur par bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang da yul 'khor de dag dang/ yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/
yos su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad
las yos su thar bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gal la gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang/ rim gror
bgyid pa dang/ mchod pa bgyid do'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dag zla 'dabanya ba da'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs
yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song sta/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sams bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mde sdo'i dbang
po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjod kyi mthus/ dgra zla 'dapa nya ba'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/
rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'i ng 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/btsunapa bcom ldan 'das ma

ny+nyA dgra zla 'dab rab 'i rgyal po de dag rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dang nyi pa'i rgyal po da yan
lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dbung gi tshogs yanalag bzhi pa dang lhan cigatu yul der mcha 'tshal ba dang/ gang na
gsar 'od dam ba mede sta'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tubacas
pa gnod sbyin bad+ma stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchibar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// byel
ba sna tshegs brgya dag kyang 'bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgogs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na yul gzhag par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs te/ khyad bskal pa

grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang/
rim gro byed pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun du bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang//
bad legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang/ grong khyer de dag dang/ yul 'khor dedag dang/ yul de dag kyang yongs su srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab
pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yos su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/
'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyis shi// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad n gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang/
bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug das mngon par dga' ba dang/ rang gi
za nar gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tsho ba dang/ phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyod pa dang/ rang gis ji ltar sngon gyis las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang
byag gi sa dga' ba dang/ phanatshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang/ yul gzhig pa'i phyi'i pha rol gyi gnod pa dang/ nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal
po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sams su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sams dang ldan pa sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun dum 'thab/ mtshang mi 'du/ ma rtsod/ mi 'gyad par
rang rang gi yul dag dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur//
skya bamang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang/ zlo bo dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza'
ba dang/ rgyu skar dang/ zla ba dang nyi ma'ang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun yongs la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems
0 can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang mar sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal//

char bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'o jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lhan khang khyim rnams kyang sgyu dang lca'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal bor gyur la/ gsor
'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ rim gro dus/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsAn nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po
'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing/ rgyal po chen po khyad bzhis dbung dang g.yog dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying
bcu ba'i phyir/ rtog par rgyun du gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung chu'i bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro//
khyad kyi lta'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen pa'i ng rnam bar 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang/ stobs kyabaskyod do// khyod kyi gzi brjid dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs
pa'i ng rnam par 'phel le// mi'i rgyal bo des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la'ang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs
pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshags pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong du ma la'ang yo byad bsam
kyis mi khyab pa rgya chapa yas pa thamasacad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal pod la kun tu bsrung ba dang/
yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang//
rgyal bu rnams dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par ra 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/
yongs su bskyang ba dang/ changapa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang chos gzi brjid dang ldan pa
dang ches stobs dang/ bad ba dang/ yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor dedag kyang kun tu
bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang/ gzhon pa med pa dang/ 'khrug
ba medapar 'gyurared/ da skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'kher srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'a phabos
skyes bo dang/ rgyal po chen bo mig mi bzang de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la lazhig gsar 'od dam pa mdo sda'i dbang po'i rang
'da'eng nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la'ang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa rnams dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang/ btsun
mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs la'ang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshol bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
mchog tukhyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshong la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar
'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang
kun du srung 'chol bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang/ dgram mchis pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba
dang nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i
sa sams dang/ gus pa dang bcas pa dang/ ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyid de mnyan par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa mdo sta'i
dbang po'i rgyal po'adi mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// dar mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang sos chang sna tshogs kyis chag chag
gdab cing/ ma tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// smos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa dar chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bshams par
bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs pa/ra brgyan par bgyi'o// ma'irgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos drim rab tu gda' ba/
gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi snyan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi sa/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs
par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa thams cad rnam par sbangs pa'i sems kyis/ gsar 'ongs pa
mdo sna'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dimanyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos la de la'ang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa dang/ rgyal/
bu rnams dang/ rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor tshog sa rnams la sdug pa dang ldan par blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ rgyal po'abu
o rnams la tshig snyan par stsa ba bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la'ang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal
bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyisamaM khyab cing mtshungs pa mamachis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi// dbang po bde
bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid donan po thob par bsam par bgyi// bdwaga dga' brtan pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyod nas chos sna ba bsu bar bgyi'o//
daskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po nabo ban la 'askad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar
po gsar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya// sbyad pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdugs dkar po'ang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po bzhi
dang rgyal pa'i bkod pa chen po bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la// chos smob bsu ba'i phyir dara'agro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bar bde snyad kyis bskal pa bye bakhrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsal bar 'gyur/ dasnyad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag
( khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ dar gos pa ji snyed bor ba de sAd du/ cho' de la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
! brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dge thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyis rgyal rigasawA'i rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma
tshwa thob par 'gyur/ skyo po thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/
grags pa dang ldan pa ra'agyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya chab r 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jigartan la phan par 'gyur/ lha dngagi
rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po chachen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gajugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang/ bstan stag pa
dang/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshags pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams
kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyurato/ rgyal pachan po dag yon tan 'dultaru 'dareg mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag
tshad brgya dang dpagachod stong du'ang bsu bar bya/ chos slabade la ston par 'du shes bskyedar rabya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshags padagrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi
rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// dang bdag gis de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jigarten thams cad
dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// dang bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sman mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// dang bdag gis de bzhin gshags pa
byab khrag khrig brgyastong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa rang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa
dachen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can ramyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'askye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig
rtan gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par byas par 'gyugo/ deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dag ba'i/
rtsa ba'i saM bon bskyod par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus pur khrag khrig brgyastong phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// dang bdag
gis 'khor lesasgyur ba rgyal po nyidakyilus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thebadagag dgaba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag du mar 'kherob las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// de bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpal/tu med pa bla na med pa yang sashing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
tsha su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsunamo'i 'kher gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// dang bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su
'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// dang bdag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su
bskyangs pa dang/ gnod pa mar pa dang/ dag med pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyisami brdzi ba dang/ nad 'go ba med pa dang/ 'khrug pa mad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems
bskyod par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dang/ dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dag bsAnamagasar 'od dam pa mde snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po da
dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bu s bsti stang byed/ blamar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod pa byed cing/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhas dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ lha'i tshogs de dag
dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi dem pa byin/ mi'i rgyal bo de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ dag ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ tsha'adi'i lus kyi rgyal srid
kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par la phel bar 'gyur re// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang/
phun sumatshigs pa dang/ gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang// dgra thamasacad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// da
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bodi dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por
u@#// 'gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bu s gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan pa la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bstan nam/ dge bstan/
ma mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bstastang bgyi/ blamar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid cing/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho
brang de shin tu dag par phyag bdar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chagachag legs par 'debs la/ bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thunamong du chos mnyan pa de mnyan
cang/ bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shasanyung zad cig sbyin par bgyidan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dag slong chos snyapad chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu
mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogos kyis bdugs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
da la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu sos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi'aphrishing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig
yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya
0 chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des bdag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
sbyos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dug skad cing yud tsam dol/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ lhamo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang lha
mo chen mobartan m dang/ gnodasbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi snga

dpon chen po lag na rdo rjedang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzangadzag 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang/
de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i stong gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri stsa tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur
khang ba rnams kyi nang du gsar du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po
chen po bzhil 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyad bzhi rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi stang gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khrishing de dag
gdugs rnams su gnas par mazad do// de ci'i phyir zhan/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir
sbos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ lagan spos snod gcig thogs pa de la sbos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khrishade rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong/

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thums cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang/ zhwa ma bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgya mtshochen po bya ba phrag brgya dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya

dang/ ri'i phyal nga khor yug dang khor yug chen po bya pa phrag brgyadang/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang/ sum cu/

rtsa gsum gyi wu bya ba phrag brgyanas/ 'du shes med 'du shes yod min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lho bye ba phrag brgya dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i'i jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum

ka/ cu rtsa gsum gyi lcagar bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am cidang/ lce'aphyiche de'i tshogs rnams rang
rang gi khang pa dag gi stong gi bar snangal sos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dodag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam bar 'gyur/ lha bang pa rnams su gsal

gyi kha deg lta bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams stangabar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pon po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan lha'i khang

thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa'i 'khrushing dedag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des sbos

sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenadugasar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/spos dang bdugab sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ de

dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du mgang+ga'i klung gi byamasnyad dag gis ngas rgyas kyi ni de bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrogakhri'i

brgya stong phrag du ma la/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshog sakyi 'khrishing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phragadu mal

spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya chozhing rgya chab manam par 'gyur/ gser kha dog lta bu snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+ga'i klung gabya ma

snyadadag snangabar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag tshe'aphrul da lta bu dedag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshags pa byab khrag khrigeb+hAm stong phrag du mga'i klungag khyim stod dgatshes smabade dag la dgongs
par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di la khur zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon
tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyed yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin par 'gyur ro// su tha nagasar 'od dam pa mdo

'tsho sdu'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen pa'i sems can de dag kyang dag ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par ma 'gyuran/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ 'chad pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par
ltar khyadapa dang/ 'khoral rgya cher yang dag par rab tuston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ skyes bu dam pa gsar 'od dam pa mdo so'i dbang po rgyal bo 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i byar ro// glabam po
gsum pa// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyad dag na/ de bzhin gshags pa bya bakhrag khrigeb
stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshode'i dus na tshig gcig dang/ ngag gcig dang/ sgraskad gcig gis dag slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan
[4 ]la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' sul te// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dusan byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bya chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song
sto shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cud las khyad par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang//
dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyed byang chub kyi sgong ba legs
par rgyan par byed par 'gyur skyes bu dam pa khyed stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung nya 'dug
sta/ bdud kyi sna bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigalta'adug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugasami sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang
chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa ra song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe mod pa/ rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa// mchog turbab pa/ blan mad pa yang dag pa bcu
gnyis rab duskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi nga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung blan mad pa 'bud par 'gyur/
skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgrung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyed sakyi sgronamabla na med pa 'barab byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'babs

par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i sgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod soms can bye ba khragakhrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin du'ajigs su rung ba 'jigs ba
chen po'irgya mtsholas sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dumadag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dmal
khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dgamanyes par byed par 'gyur ro// daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chon re bzhi po dag gis 'di skad/
ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gsara'od dam pa mang snya'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tsho'adirangam 'ongs pan 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas
stong phrag brgya la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal bo

chen po bzhidapung dang g.yog tu bcas ba dang/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa namachis pa dag spos dang bdug pha sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing nag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu
lus mi gda' bar bgyis ta/ mi'i rgyal po de khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag mdar bgyis pa// sbos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/
rgyanasna tshogs kyis legs pa brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos nyan pa'i slad dumabar bgyi// mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lca rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/
lhatshodabyang sacan dang/ lha mo chen mo dpal dang/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/
lha'abudabang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang/ klu'i
rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal pargya mtshodang/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar brgyus te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa
dag la ba dang/ chos stsab de'i chos kyi khri mthon pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ ma tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i srung/
du mchis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog ngubacas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun
par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dag ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ blanamed pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'disatshim par gyur ma
thag tumi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi
na rgyal po'i pho brang de dang/ grong khyer de dang/ yul de'ang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba/
tshe dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar bgyi// yul de'ang 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasasu
ba thar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la lazhigami'i rgyal bor gyur tu da mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyam nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'a dzin pa dag
la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du
ma la chos nyan pa 'di dang/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gzi'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag/
gi brtson 'grus dang/ mthu dang/ stobs kyang mi skyad/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa'i ng rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do//
datsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig ba stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul deyal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lca'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa'i m
ldan 'das lca rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam pa 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byungabar 'gyur/ yul na gnas
pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skya bdang/ mtshang 'dru bskya ba dang/ rtsod ba skyo bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang/ gza' dang nad rnam pa snatshogs
g.yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ldang bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyusar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla'achal
ba de'ang nyim ltabur gang 'bar 'gyur/ rlaba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza'i 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyim dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa'i ng rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur
dus dus sunam mkha' la 'ja' kha dog lta bur 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i rngon pa'i ng sgra 'byin par grags par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar
'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur yul du mu ge'i dgon ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ ba rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de
dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ gnod
sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang da yulan gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der ba de lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang/ gnod pa sna tshogs stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong 'tshal bar 'gyur/
bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sams kyis rgyal po nyidi bgyid 'tshol bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bad bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/pha rol gyi dmagatshogs thams
cad ' pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad bun ring du 'os su myong 'tshol bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyidi bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang/
gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon ma 'tshal bar gser 'od
dam pa mdo snga'i dngang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyam par bgyid/ dag slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dgabasnyan nam/ dge bsnyan ma mde snga'i dbang po 'dzin ba dadag la rang bsti stang bgyid/
blamar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bdag cag rgyal bo chen po bzhi dbung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang/ chos mnyan pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di
dang D+ha chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba'as tshim par bgyid/ bdag cag gi lha'ilus 'di dag gis gatra b+hA dachen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi// datsa'i sladadu zhun/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'angasami'i rgyal bo des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mde snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi sta/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang/ mi
rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji sud bstan pa dag dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyad bstan pa dag dang/
drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshegs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshog saji snyed pa bstan pa
dag lasachos mchog/ chos khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po brgyastong de dag dang/

brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa ldacan bye ba khrag khragi brgya phrag stong thams cad pas chos mchog/ chas khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pas sems can rnams kyi pen gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so// ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cadun gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyidi bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar sams/
ga can bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/
[” ]jiltar pha rol gyi dmag tshog sapham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar yul de dgan nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis nga rang 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar yul thams cad chos
[/]kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur nga dang/ ji ltar mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgronam chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur
ba dang/ ji ltar lhatsA khang khyim thams cad khyu dag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang/ jiltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tubacas pa dang/ gnod sbyin
brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim po dang/ rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gar chen pos
rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtsoma'agrus dang/ stobs dang/ mthu chen po spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ jiltar bdag cag gi lus la gathibarjid
dang dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la legs shing nyams dga' la skyo ba dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang/
dziltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad nu gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar sems can bskal pa bye ba khragakhrig

brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur nga dang/ sangs rgyas ngacom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de ltan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa lnga sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rjen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin rlabs dang/ brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig stong ga

ts+tshA lha shes pa bas ches 'phags pas/ dwa bzhin gshags pa'i mkhyen pa bla med pa dang/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams
cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam/
pa mde snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dare rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang/ rgyal bo'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam
bu'i gling thams cadun mchis pa dang/ gang dag gis sems canu'adi dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad de// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkumangos
mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 3tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'adabang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// daskad ces
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal pachanapo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po byed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu'acas pas gdonami za bar mi'o/
rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'idabang po'i rgyal po 'ang nyan pa dang/ rami go byed pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa de dag kun du bsrung ba'i phyir sbyo ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal ri tshanapo dag rage
song ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsam ma/ dge bsnyen ma mngon+tayidabang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang/ de dag lha dang/
mingang lcamayon du ngacas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad
par 'gyur te/ rgyal po rman pe byad bzhis ci nas mdo snga'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i ngag slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dag bsamanam/ dag bstan ma bsrung ba dang/ gnod pa mang pa
dang nad mad pa dang/ 'khrug pa mang pa dang/ sems bde bar 'gyur zhing/ gsar 'od dam ba mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/
dag bstan nam/ dag bstan la mdo snga'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba
dang zhib dang/ bad lags su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal
( pe chos po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lca nga sa la btsugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud nas/ po'i tsho mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba
nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba ma tog pad ma rdul mang chems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung nas gyur//
rgyal ba rgyu mtsho yi shes chu yis gang// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang// rgyal ba'i zhabs 'khor lor bris pa ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsi ba ma stong// phyag dang
zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabasakyi dra bangang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gsar gyi ri bolta bur rab jugada'// rgyal ba dri med gsar gyi yid bang pa// yon tan thams cad ri reb 'dra
bsta rtosasargyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ dadabazhin gshegs pa zla ba nya ba 'dra/ nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sbrum smig rgyalta bu chags med pa// rgyal badri
ma mdal phyag mtshal lo// n gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bon po ba'i tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dam pa yi// mde snga'i dbang po'i
rgyal po ba mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong khyed cag rnams kyisanadi/ brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang barakhya// 'di ltar mdo snga'i dkon mchog rbang mo 'di// sems can
kun la bad pa sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la panadang bde ba'aphyir// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyin stong =na gyi/ 'jig rten dag
nanasong sdug ngasngal dang//sems can dmyal ba'asems can rnams kyin// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'dzin yang/ 'dzam bu'i gling
gnas rgyal po thams cad kyis// rang du dga' khachen po bskyong nas ni// chos rnamos kyisaniyul rag bskyang bar bgyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang// shin tul
legs nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing// 'dzam bu'i gling na thems cad dbanayang// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar ngagyis// 'di nam yi dbang po gang rnams ni/ yul la dga'/
dang bdag bdu dgabab dang/ rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la dga' bdes// mdo sde'i dbang po 'dani menyan par bya// pha rol dgranAyang dag zad byed pa// pha rol
dgra tshogs zlog pa dag byed pa/ mchog tu 'jigs pas 'a phengs pasal byed pa// mchog tudag byed mdesda'i dbang po 'ad// ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung
khyim nayod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang/ mdo sta'i dbang po mchog 'di de ltar blta// jaltar chugrang skom pa sel byed pa// tsha bas nyam thag tshe na da pa ltar/
yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'dad bzhinano// mdesdu'i rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen stod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang
po tshogs la gser 'od mchog mdo sde'i dbang po'i mtshog 'di di bzhin no// 'din lhayatshogs kyis mngon machod pa// mde sdu'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa// 'jigartan skyong ba rdzu 'phrul
chen po pa/ bzhi po dag gisa kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogasabcudas nas nigs rgyas rnams kyis kyang// mdo sde'i dbangapo 'dane rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dpang po 'dinaTishad pan/
sangs rgyas rnams kyis legasazhes barjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bya ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhingarab tu mgu sems kyis/
mngosdo'idabang nga 'dasim nyan par byed/ 'dzamabu'i gang gnas par gyur pa yi// lha tshigs rnams bsamagyis ma khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/ mdelha'i dbang po/
laninyin par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'dalis// gzibarjid dang+gani stobs dang brtson 'grus 'thob// gzi brjid chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing m par 'phel
bar 'gyur/ de nas rgya chen pobazhis// bcom ldan 'das las tshigs sudacad pa 'di ltadu 'di dag thos pa dpatshar du gyur// rmadadu byubar gyur/ dga' ba gyurataM/ dodag
chos kyishugs kyis yum tsama'i dusanaamatshim phyis te/ de dag lus 'aparayan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/
yang bcom ldan 'das lha2ma tog man da ra bdag gis gtor/ mngon par gdon to// gtor mnabar gtor nas kyang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus
mo ga[j]sa pa lha da sa la btsugs// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag rgyalangon po'i rgyal pan log gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang chos sna bdo bsrung nga dang yos su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dag srong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gsar
bodadam pa mdesna'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal ba tshag po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// kadenas lcayo chan mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag
pa gcig tu babs te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyarab bdudad/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das lha mongan mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang/ dag slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig
gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dgeslong chos skya ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o// gsur 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di las tshig gam yi ga gang yang rung ba dag ga cig yongs
su nyams par gyur tam/ bsgyud nabadag gis dag slongs ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang/ tshigadung/ yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag

la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'isamasaM can dadag gi don gyi slad du/ gsar 'od dam pa mdesdu'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i glingan rang du gnas shing gyuradunub par mi 'gyur nga dang/ sems can du
ma dag gis gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'irgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rnob bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang//
'di tshephun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ srog la phan gdags pa dang/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tumamachis pa thabatu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ thabs sna tshogs rab
du'atshal bar 'gyur ba dang/ bstanabacos thams cud la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang/ bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ baspyad pa ma mchis par bgyiba'i
slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dag slong chos smra bde dang/ sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi sladadu sngags dang smanadang ldan pa'ikhrus kyi lasaM brjod par bgyi ste/ gza'
dang rgyu skar dang/ skye ba dang/ 'ba'i gnod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rnyog pa dang/ 'khrug slong dang/ khrag khrug dang/ rma lam ngan pa dang/ log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang/
byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i s+sadang sngagasani 'di dag ste/ shu dag 'ga'u wang 'bu sug dang// sha myang sha mishi gi
dbang po lag dang skal ba che// dzAmasha tsha a karu// shi'i ba sta sra rtsi dang// gu gul ras shalalakaM/ rdodrag lo ma rgya spos dang// tsan dan dang ni sdong res dang// 'gi'u wang bcas
dang ru rta dang// gur kum gyasgang yungasakar dang// sbyi mo sug smalan lad// nag gosar uka ra// 'di dag ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyalal btags par bgyi// phum la
ni sngags tshiga'ad// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+yathA/ su kri taM/ ka ma lanIl/ dzanakar ta/ oM ka ra ze/ inadzaladzaMka ra dri/ pA shad/ a
brtakasikenaku/ gur ku/ ka bil ma ti/ shul mati/ samatshid+mad+ma mapa ti/ sha ri na ri/ satusbi tisAdA/ lcibs dkyil 'khor bgyisanas nii// ma tog sil ma bkram par bgyi/
rgyu/ gsar gyi snod dngadangul snod du// dngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig de yang gzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa
gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul dugs par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba danabagyi// lha mo de ni legs par brgyan/ bar bar dag tumo
leng gzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse sna spyad gzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcad par 'gyed// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams
gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi// spyod thadan/// nayan/ hile/ ma le/ gi le/ li khe le sA/ btsem ldan 'das kyi snam lags su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags
'dabarlas brjod bgyis// khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga Da pa gaDa/ bag tab pasAhA/ phyogs bzhidagan gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dogani cha srungs shig/
btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang// phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang// 'byung ba'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi bzad zhigyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sham/
bi sha ma swAhA/ sa ga za ba ga Na sAhU sA ga ra saM bud+d+hA ya swahA/ sArAmAtAya sAdA/ nAl ka u0f97ya sAhA/ a pa ra dzi ta be cu ya sAhA/ himabi d+ha saM bud+d+hA ya sA/ in mi la pAk+Shayo

sA namo b+ha ga ba ta/ brah+ma ga Nan mas ra sa t+ya dbyi sid+d+hinaman+d+ha pA dI/ ta ra tu pa tsitobrats+tshanu ma ma dusAhA/ dag slong chos sbyab dbasrung ba dang/ chos mnyan pa de dag dang/ yi gal
'job de dag gden gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdaganyid diraM mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug
khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ltar dag slongangs/ dag slong ma bas/ dag bston nAm/ dag bstanam mdosnya'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags
pa 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor ba las byung ba thob par 'gyur bdang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyire mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ myur dub+banamed pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar/ gza'i dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod bdang/ rmilam ngan pa dang/
log 'dren gyi gnod pathams cad dang/ byad dang rolangs thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ltamo dbyangs can la/ lha mtshan mo dbyangs

can khyed sku mang po la phan pa dang/ sku de tshong pa la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te da khyod kyis sngagasadang smanadang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra re rashad panAlegs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// lha
mo dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ dunas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'ud nas lha mo dbyangs can dbakug go/ lha mo
chen mo dbyangs can mchog 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun rnam grangs mchogakhyen yenatan cho// rtser gnas mdzesam dar brtswa ya gos bskusar/ dar lha rtswa yi gas gyenakang
pakha cig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'drisad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dag kha'i tshig shod lce khrol cig/ sud ya the dan/ mu ra tsir/ a pa dze/
a badza ba tu/ dgu le/ mi gule/ pi gal mgu/ mAri tsis ma rta/ du sham ti/ a gri mgri ta ra/ tsa ta ra tsab ti/ tsor shi rAm ri/ mA ra tsi/ pra Naphri
la lo ka dzil ka b+hiSh+Thaleka praya/ sid d+ha pra te/ b+himamu khe shu/ tsatsir/ a pra ti hate/ a pra ti/ hatabud+d+he/ namutsi/ mahAsamu tsi/ mahA de bi/ pra ti kri
hU namaskaban/ bdagagi bya thogasapa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'irgyudang/ sde snod dang/ snyan dngags la sogs pal/ bdag gi rig sngags
dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+yathA/ mahA pra dz+ha pA li sil/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldama'adas ma lha modabyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyalabar gyur cig/ ka ra kayu ro/ ka
yu ram ti/ hi li mi li'i/ hi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/ chos kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ dbang po'i bden pa dang/ chu lha'i
bdunangs lha me chen mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bdenapa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo tshanamo dgug par bya'o// tad+yathA/ hi li mi li/ hi
lami li/ hi li ma laM/ bdag rnam par rgyu bar gyur cig/ btsem ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can laphyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshiga rnams grub par gyur cig
sAyA denas slobadapon lung ston pa bram blo ka'adirgyas/ lhamo chen mo dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad
ngal nyan par gyis// lha dang dra walha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi reb gangayin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon
tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyananiyungs shing bsod nams 'bar ba dang// dri med ye shes yon tanasna tshogs
rnam par brgyan// rin chen sna tshegs thadad lta bu blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab dag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang/ dayang dag
sngags dang yon tan byed pa dang// dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang// mig mchog dang nimigagidam pa dang// dag ba'i gnas dang dag ba mthong ba dang// yon tan
bsam du med par brgyan pa dang// zla ba 'dra dang drame med 'od dang// ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang// sang ga mchog dang ma la zhon pa dang// lag pa brgyad rnams
tsho kyis ni brgyan pa dang// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang bdang// yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang// shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa dang// dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can
dam pa dang// lha dang lha min dbang pos mchodapa dang// lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang// 'byung pa'i tshogs kyis gnas rtagamachod pa'i phyir// sAhA/
bdag cag lha mo 'dal phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgongs pa kun tu bdag lo das grub stsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu
srungs// ya gardzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dgan/ nang par langs nas gtsangamar rab brjod par// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad red// dngos grub dag brgya chan
thob par 'gyur// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal ra las/ dbyangs can gyi le'akhas bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// danas bcom ldan 'das la//
lha mo mnamo dpal gyis 'di skadanyes gsol to// dutsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mtshan dpal bdag gis kyang/ can s chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad pun
sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ bral 'bangs mams par thob par 'gyur ba dang/ sams rtas par 'gyur ba dang/ sams bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang/
gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ga rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang/ rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par brjod par
'gyur bdang/ sasargyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gden gyi sladadu/ gsar 'od dam pamangostab dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du
yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur po dang/ sems can rnams kyang gsar 'od dam pa mdo sdo'idabang po'i rgyal po 'ditan ra 'gyur ba dang/ bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar ltadang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur pa dang/ su ga ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ le legs par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can
rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu
chadapar 'gyur ba gang 'di gos dang/ zas dang/ mal cha dang/ na ba'agasos sman dang/ yo byad dang/ 'tshog chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi//
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen m ga yon tanargya mtsho bzhun dang gsar gyi kha dog bzang po gsar du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya bad la/
lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyadad/ des de ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sams pa dang/ phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang/ phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs
da dang dar/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bdo bar 'gyur/ bas dang/ skom dad/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ 'gron bu dong/
gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mutig dang/ bozlum dang/ dung dang/ mnashaladang/ bya ru dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram dang/ yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'phos pa
'gyur/ sems can dedag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro/ lha mo chen mo dbal gyi mthusade bzhin gshegs pa dril mchod par bya/ sa dang/ ma tog dang/
bdug pa'i ng dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing/ de la sposadang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog kyang byanil/ ro brob sna tshegs kyang
dunon/ de'i 'bru'i phung po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dal 'di skadacos bya ste/ sal sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel// lhan ms rtag par rab tu dga' bar
'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog lcam stong sngon lha rnams// lag shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyod// gser 'od dam ba mdorta'i dbang po'i ming brjod pa'i sems cand dag
bskyo mo chen mo dpalasoms bar 'gyur/ dadag la dpal chen por byed pa'i 'gyur go/ lham chen mo dpalanalceng can gyi thobrang 'khoran skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams
kyimo tog 'od ces bya ban/ nganiu0f38ma sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gsor gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ban gnas// mi gang la la 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi
khyim phyag bdar legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// gosadri reb tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rim/ nam togayon tan rgya mtshobazhurmadang gsaragyi kha dog gsar du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing/ mtshan nas kyang
lan gsum brjod/ lha mo tshanadabal gyi la gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me togadang/ bdug pa dang/ skyes kyang 'bul/ re bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/
gsar 'od dam pa mdo sto'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang barjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang mchod cing/ ma tog dang bdug
pa'i ng 'bul/ re bri ba sna tshogs kyang 'dul na/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sta'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ dbatsholha mtshan mo dpal khyim de la sams pa ra'
de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po'ang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal 'gugs par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang/
ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshanas da rig pa 'di dag sbyor bar byasku/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/ sgyur+yathe
na bti ra ba re/ samanadarAn/ mahamitAr gti/ saan bden gtamahA/ kat+yaMpra ti/ phraaNaM/ satAam+basamaMt+tanu pra pur/ An/ d+hamatAmahIg+hogi ni
mdam pas hitaM srid bsang sIto/ sajamananubalAni/ 'di dag natsobonas dbang bsur btsos nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de khonayang dag par grub par
phyin ng mislu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar la sbyor ba rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba khagamakhomidapa dag gis lo bdun du 'decing 'dzin bdag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyon par
gnas le bstanatu bdagadangasems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pas shosayosasurdzogs par khyaba'i phyir/ sdadang phyi drosangs rgyas thamasacad l tog dang sposa rnams
kyis mchodan/ des bdagagis bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyuracig/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon ' gnas akyang rung// khyim de shin tu
gtsamar byal/ lci bas dkyila 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa'i ng 'bulapar bya'o// stan gtsang ma'angagang bar bya'o// salam tog sil ma bkram nas bsdad
dpar bya'o// des skad cig de nyid ladapal 'ongs nas der gnas bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyin chad khyim mtsha/ grong ma/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/
sa gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brelacing 'phongs pa med par byed do// 'gronabudang/ gsaradang/ rinapo tshe dang/ 'o dong/ 'bru dang/ yo byad thams
cad 'byor pa dang b.lar sbyar bathams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur yo// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dugakhyedapa de dag thams cad las/ lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ das
nad srid 'tsho ba'i bar dud na gnas pa 'gyur da 'phongs par mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yosasu rdzogs par 'gyurayo/ gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
ba lasu/ dar lagyi le'u zhes bya ba sta dgu pa'o///bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa mchanagatsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa 'bar ba rin chen gsar gyi 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam du gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gsar du snang ba
laphyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa gsar du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa gsar dang rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs bags la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa gsar gyi ma tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal le//
de bzhinagshegs pa sgron ma chanamo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshags pa rin chen tog laphyag 'tshal lo// byang chung sems dpa'i mdzes pa'i togaces bya ba dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' gsar 'od dam pa zhes bya ba dang/ byung chub sems dpa' gsar gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba dang/ shar phyogs nad bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang/ lho phyogs nade bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba dang/ nub
phyogasan de bzhin gshegs pa tshedapag med ces bya bdang byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba ste/ su gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'dilas/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ khong du chud pa byed na/ dertag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// danas
bcom ldan 'dasal/ sa'i lha mobartan ms 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs
pa'i dusan/ bong ngam/ grong khyer ma/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i sa phyogs sam/ si'i sman ljongs samu/ bobrang 'khor
gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ma/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam daljos sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khorader/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das so'i lha mo brtan m bdag mchibar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nagasar 'od dam phamango snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dartsecher yang dag par rang tu'achad par 'gyur
ba dang/ sa phyogs gang dang gang na dge slong chos sab de'i tshos kyi khri gshem par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dang gang du chos sna ba stan la mchis nas gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adasasa'i lha mo brtan ma bdugs phyogs dadang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos
khri'i 'og logs sums te/ yan lag gi dam po mgos ngag slong chos sgrub de'i nang mthil nas brtan par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang/ tshes bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis
par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yang dag par mchod pa bgyi'o// bdagam pa ru gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po
[4 ]dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rje rdzal thug pa'ibar dusa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par
bgyi'o// stod du'ang rgya mtsho'i sa la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khora'adi/ sa'i bcud kyi snamagyis brlan par bgyi'o// sachen po 'di rab tu mdangs dang ldan par bgyi'o// donas
'dzam bu gling 'dare rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ snyanudang/ nagasatshal sna tshogs rnams mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'khrungs par 'gyur/ kun dga' r ba dang/ nags tshal
dang shing ljon pa thams cad dang/ lo ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog rnam pa sna tshog sathams cad kyang rab tumadangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ dri dang rab tu ldan
pa dang/ snum dang ra btuldan pa dang/ ro zhim por 'gyur/ bltan rab tu sdug pa dang/ rab tu che bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dpag kyang btung ba dang bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag
'al nas/ tshodang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ dbang po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gabi brjod dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzugs dang ldan par gyur
nas kyang/ sal mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs thadad pa brgya stong du ma dge bgyid par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyid pa'i las rnams
khagyid bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzamabu'i gling thams cad na ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur//
mi'i skya bomang bos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gawi brjid dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog
dang rta gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'di'i slad du dug slong ngam/ dag slong ma'am/ dag khasAnanam/ dag pasnyan mamado sto'i dbang
'di 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi snyan lamachis pa'i gan du mchibar 'gyur/ mchis naas kyang sams rab tu dang bus sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ pan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ gsar/
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tshu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhen/ btsun pa bcom/
ma ldan 'das gsar red dam pa mdo snga'adabang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang/ rab tu stobs dang ldan par
'gyur// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ mthuchen po skyod par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang/ dpal dang/ phun sum tshogs pa'i ng
ka 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis chem par 'gyur/ gzi brjod dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ mthudang/
shugs chen po thob par 'gyur na/ sachen po dpagatshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dis 'i bcud chen poa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ sa chen pomadangs dang rab tu ldan par
'gyurare/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasas la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yas par 'gyur ro// chen por yang 'gyur ro// sa la gnas pa'i sems cand/
dgachanapor gyur nas kyang/ lengs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba'ang myong bar 'gyur ro// de dgathams cad bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ bca' pa rnam pa/
snatshog sadang/ gos dang/ mal cha dang/ gnasadang/ khang pa dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ skyidamos tshaladang/ chu bo dang/ rdzing dang/ chu mig dang/ mtshe'u dang/ mtsho
dang/ stengakadang/ 'dalta ngu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sa las byung ba/ sa la brtan pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sams
can nge dag thams cad kyisabangagu ba byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o// gdon mi 'tshol bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir brgyad
bla mar bgyi/ rimagro bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gatshesems can de dgachos snyapa 'gan dumachis pa'i slad du rigs tha dad
pa dang/ khyim thadad pa dag nas byung stamachis nas/ gser 'od dam pamado sde'idabang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nasakyang rang ge ris dang/ khyim dang/ grong dang/ grong
jalatha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi san gnas pa dag phanatshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos manyan pa zab mo thos so// derang bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs subazung go/ bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin pa/ shogs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so// dang bdag cag gis
chos mnyen pa 'dis sems can dmyal las yongs su thar to// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul lasayongs su thar to// dang bdag cag
chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ tshorabs brgya stong phrag du mar ltadang ma'i skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur nasagatamazer bar 'gyur/ khyim thadad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag
sems can gzhan dag lags pa'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las than dpagacigabarjod dam/ gsar 'od dam pimado sde'i dbang po'i rgyalapo 'dilasathan le'u gcig gam/ sngon/
byung ba gcig gam/ than byang chub sems dba'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa' na gcig gam/ than tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig
gcig gs sums can gazhanadag lazos par bgyidadam/ tha na gsar 'od dam bamango sta'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gazhan dag la btu ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
gang dang gang nasomasacan rnam pa tha dad ba de dag saphyogasa rnam pa tha dad pa de dag tu mdo sde'i gtatshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig rjod dam/ thos par bgyidadaa/
gtam rgyud rdzongan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin dumadangs dang ldan pa dang snum par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad/
@#phyir/ sa'i bcuda rnam pa snatshogs dang/ yakhyad thams cad rgyas par s+ya bar 'gyur/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad
kyang bde bar 'gyur ro// nor rlung dang/ lengs sbyong tshab dung/ sbyin pa lamos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// daskad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa'alha mo brtan m la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la ladag gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na
tshig gcig nyanan/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shibadzesanas sum cur gsum pa'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i jogis gang yang rung ba zhib tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sa'i
lha mo sems can gang la la dag gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ gnas de dag legs bar rgyan par khyadam/ phan gdugs ba dwacig gam/bdan
gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gisagayogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tubargyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po dag tu/ lha'i rin pa chasnabadun gyi gzhal
mad khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyun pad gtu gnas apar 'gyur/ dgang ba tshosaMms cand dgami'i 'jig rtan 'dinas shi 'phosato/ rin por sna bdun gyi gzhal med
khang de dag tu skyo ba de'i ngo/ sa'i lha mo'ani pe mas bdun gyi gzhalamad khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur// lhu'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ng myong bar 'gyur ro//
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas la/ sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo pan mabadag dge slong
chos stsal chos kyi snyan lamachis pa pa'i chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs su sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o// cinas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum dag la dgo
ka ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur pa dang/
sems can nems kyang gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lce dang mi'ibade pa
bsamagyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshags pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma'ongs pa'i dusan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon/
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnaMsadang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdugabasngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar
lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dag slong chos slab deb rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgos brtan par bgyi'o// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal polasasa'i lha mo
brtan ma'i le'u zhes pya stobcu pa'o////de nas gnod sbyin gyi snga darenayang dag shas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen potishu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cigachu stan las
langasate/ gos phrag pa ba gcig tu bgosan dusamagayas pa'i lha ngos la btsugs to/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pacom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus nagasar 'od damapa mngosdo'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'jigrong ma/
grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongasasum/ dgon pa'i phyogasasam/ ra'i sman ljongs sam/ phebrang 'khor ba/nga du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'dis gnod sbyin gyi sdadapon chen pe yang d ga shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sdadaben chen de nyicu brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu gleng ngam/ grongakhyor ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongos
sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i smamaljongasasam/ bobrang 'khon der mi bar bgyi'o// lus ma gdab par bgyis te/ dge slong sa skyab dbasrung bar bgyi'o//
yongasasungaskyob pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhib dang/ bdalegs su 'gyur bar bgyi// skyes pa 'am/ bud
mad dam/ khye'u 'amA/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad ng/ gang sudag gsar 'dadam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dilas zan tshig bzhi pa'i tshog sasu bcad pagacig
napa dang/ phan tshig gcig dang/ than gsar 'od dam pa mas dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gamaM/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mtshan
gcig shes par gyur te bzung ba dang/ tha na gsar 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos par gyur to/ bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o//
yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi bdar/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs de dag dang/ khyim de dag dang/
grongade dag dang/ grong khyer de dag dang/ grong rdal da dag dang/ dgon bdadag dang/ pho brang 'khor dadag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang pa dang/
yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pabcom ldan 'dasargyu rang gis bdag
gnod sbyin gyi sde dang nan po yang dag shosazhes mang du tshags par gyur cin/ 'dazhi btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyisa mngon sum mo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
bdag gas chos thams cad 'tshal to// chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal te// chos thamasacad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyad pa dang/ chos thams cad ji
lta ba dang/ gnas pa gang lags pa dang/ chos thams cad gangadag lags pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi ragis gangalags pa dang/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasachos
thamasacad bang gala mngon sum mo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thamasacad la bdag gisaye shes snang bsam gyisami khyab bo// ye shes kyi
ngag lus l ba bsamagyis mi khyab bo// ma shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyabab// ye shesakyi bung pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag
