gis yo shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsamagyis khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasaji ltar ba dagachos khamasacad yang dag papa'i tshalabadang/ yang dag par yongs su brtag pa dang/
yapadag pasngayongs su btsal ba dang/ yang dag par rnam par bltas pa dang/ yang dag par khong du chudapa'i des n/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
po yang dag shes nas ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdagagisajag song chos sa bde'i tshig brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du spobasapa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// mines
las+sa chos sna bdud lus ngal bar 'gyur ba dang/ lus kyidabang babadabar 'gyur ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba skyabar 'gyur ba dang/ gang gi slad dusangs rgyas brgya stong dag lad ba'i rtsa ba
bskrun pa'isems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pamangosdo'i dbang po'isgril bo 'di'idzamabu'i gling duyun ring du gnas shing myur du nub pa mi 'gyur ba dang/ soms can
rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sda'adabang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang/ ya shas kyi phung pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa thob par 'gyur bdang/ shes rab dang ldan pa ra 'gyur ba dang/
bsod namasakyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ ma'ongs pa 'dusan bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bdababasam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems
can dmyalab dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ ga 'ani ji'i ba jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thums cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur bde'i spu'i bu ga rnams su mdangs stsal bar ngagyi'o/ da
lus mthu dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bgyi// de'iya shosagyisnang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o// pa'idran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o// de
cher sbe bar bgyi'o// gsar 'od dam pa mngosde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ba stobcu gcig pa'o//skabam po bzhi pa go
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas ni chan ma rtog yon tan rgya mtshob zhucha dang gsar gyim rtog bzang po gsar du
snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pat+tasangs rgyas yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brag
dums sku lag par brgyan ba gang chos kyi sgronam 'de'abar bar mdzad pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// lhachoma med pa yon tan gyi 'bru dang bkra shis pa dpag du med pa phun sum
tshogs pa de la phyag 'tshal la// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can shes rab kyayon tan dpag tu med pa de laphyag 'tshal lo// yang dabatshade'idus nargyal bo stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gabu rgyal kho
mdzes pa'i tog dbang bskur nasAring bo ma len pa/ rgyal srid la gsar du gnas pa la 'daskad ces smras so// bu gangangs ston dbang bskur nas ring po ma 'thon pa zhig na yaba mchog gi
dbang po'i tog las blangs pa/ rgyal bo'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'idamatshig cesabya ba zhig yod de/ ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dmatshig des lete khri'i bar du rgyal
ponyidi byas par gyur te/ thanasoms kyi skad cig tsam gyi tshod kyang/ sngon chos ma yin pas phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma shes so// du rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dal
tshig ces bya bdegapan no/ de nas rigs kyi lha mode'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gis/ bu rgyal pomadzes pa'i tog la rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang/
po'i ram #sabya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// sems can kun la phan byed pa// thatshom thams cad gcod pa de// nyes byas thams cad 'jig
byed pa// rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya/ rgyal po thams cad so so nas// dga' ba'i sams su bgyur byos la// lha yi dbang po'i dmatshugakun// thal mo sbyaratamanyan/
par byos// jorje 'byung gnasar dbang 'di// lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs dbang lan dri ba'i phyir// 'jig rtan skyong ba rnams kyang langs// khyod ni lhagatso tshongs pa ste//
khyod lta rnams dbang phyug lags// khyod nabadag cagathe tshom gcod// bdag cag dogs pa gcad du gsol// mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la// ji ltaburan lha zhes bya// gangag rgyus
na rgyal po la// lha sras zhes n bgyi bar 'gyur// gal te lhani ji lta bur// mi yi 'jig rtan 'dir skya zhing// mi bdag gyur te mi rnams la// rgyal po nyidi na bgyid par 'gyur// 'dzagi/
rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la// de yang yongs su dris pa dang// lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des// 'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/ dadaltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// da ltar bdag la
dris pas na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan// miyi gnas su skyes pa yi// rgyal po rnams kyi skya ba dang// rgyugang gis na yul rnams su/
na sum brgyu/rgyal bor 'gyur ba bshad par bya// ltudabang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/ ma yi rumadu 'jug 'gyur te// lcayis sdur ni byin brlabs nas// yin samangal du
'jug par 'gyur// mayo 'jig rtan skyes kyang ni// mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par gyur pa na// danalha yi sras zhes bya// khyod ni sgyu kun du yan nas// sum
cu rtsa gsum cu dbang gis// rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni// ma rnams kyi ni dbang por sprul// zhes bar byas pa rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yan la gzhig pa dang// sems can
legs byed dgod pa dang// lcaya gnas su dag pa'i phyir// mi yi dbang po ma shas dang// sku la shas dang drawa'ishas// gdol pa'i shas dang srin shas kyi// nyes par byed pa
pa zlog par byed// legs par bya ba byed rnams la// mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shas// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yi rgyal ba byan gyis brlabs// tsho'adiba'i gas
par byas pa dang// nyes par byas pa'i lasa rnams kyi// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// yulan nyis byed gnas ba dag/ gang tshe
rgyal pos yal bor zhing// sdig pa can gyi skya bo la// mthun ba'i chad par mi gcod cing// nyes par byas pa ya la bor ba// detshochos min shin tu 'phel// 'thab mo dang nigayo
rnams kyang// yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir byung// sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na// lha ya dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas padag/ gang tshe rgyal pas yal bor ba/
detshagayonami bzad pa// drag pa rnams kyis yul 'dzams 'gyur// ba roladamag tshog salhags nas su// yul 'khor de na rnam par 'jig/ longs spyod rnams dang rigs kyang
'jib// gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang// g.yo byad rnam pa mang po yis// phan tshun du na 'phrog par 'gyur// bya ba gang gis rgyal de nyid/ 'byab dan mi byed pa// grung chan
dbang posardzing bu bzhin// rang gi yul la lor rnam par 'jig/ marus payi rlung ldang zhing// ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab// rim dang ni zla ba dang// gzigs ' dang rgyu skar ma rungs
'gyur// rgyal pos yal bar boranadir// sa bon le tog 'bras bu rnams/ logs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing// mu ga dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul ltas phying gnas pa
dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba// da tshalha rnams khang pan// yid n dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// wa rgyal dbang po de dag kun// rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te// chos min phyogs
la gnas pa'o nas/ phan tshun du ni sma par 'gyur// rgyal 'das ring por ma thogs par/[“]/lce rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur// lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas na// da yid yul
ni rnams par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing// mtshonams kyang ni'ajig par 'gyur// g.ye rnams dang ni 'thab me dang// nad kyang kun tu 'byung
ngar 'gyur// lha yi dbang de rab khros shing// lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar der// yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po de ni bu ngan da// spyananam yang na bu yang rung// sdug
pa rnams dang dral bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur// skar mda' dag kyang ltung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung// pha rolaM
gyi nadimag tshogs dang// mu ga bani tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi glang por phangs pa dang// blon po 'a phangs pa 'chi ba 'a gyur// de yi 'gatu rnga mon// 'phangs pa dag kyang ba mibar
'gyur// khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yulayul du ni mchonam yis// phan tshun dag tu 'debs par 'gyur// 'thab padag dang rtsod
pa g.yo// yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing// mi bzad payind kyang 'byung// deyi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang// chos dang ldan pa
ma yin 'agyur// de ya'akher dang byin pa yang// chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos dang ma ldan skya bol// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// tshesadang ldan pa'i som
can la// rtag tu chud pas gcod par 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skyababakur/ chos ldan chad pas bcad pan// dar ni chudang rgyu skar rlung// rnam gsum rnam par 'khrugs
par 'gyur// chos min skya bo bzung bsan// dam chos ro yi snying po mdas// sems can mdangs dang g.ya'i bcud// dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa
rab bkur cing// skye bo ma ra smad pas na// 'chidang rtse 'bab chu bo dang// rnam pa gsum nidir 'byung 'gyur// 'bras bu le ga redang mdangs// de yi 'og tu mad par 'gyur// sams
can nd pa mang bo dag/ yul rnams sun 'byungabar 'gyur// dal zhing chab 'i 'bras bu dag/ yula rnams layang yongapa yang// kha ba dang ni ba dang/ dachung ba dgaminyidadu 'gyur// rtsa
dang dgod dang dga' bdang// sngadachad dga' ba'i dngos po dang// ngaga'abanyams ni mi dag 'gyur// nyon mongs brgyayisa rnam pa 'khrugs// la tog rnams dang 'bras bu// snam dngos
khu ba zad pas na// lus dang khams dang dbang pal// nga ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro// sems can rnams rimadag nazhing// mthu chung shin turadapar 'gyur// kha zas mang po saMkyang
ni rim par 'gyurab ma yin no// stobasadang mthudang brtson 'grusakyang// de yi 'og tu mad par 'gyur// somasacan brtson 'grusanyams pa dag/ yul rnams sun 'byung bar 'gyur//
sna tshog sand kyis gzir ba yi// sems can mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa// gatha'adang sgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min
phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal pochos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khel na/ khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// gang tshe rgyal de sa phyogs gnas te//
nyes byed yal bar 'dar ba'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yula rnams sun 'byung bar 'gyur// dgos pa gang phyir lha dbang gis// rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yi// rgyal po nyid
na mo byed cing// nyes byed yal bar 'dor nani// legs par byas pas samasacan rnams// lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye// nyes par byas bsayi dgas dang/ sems can dmyal/
pa dang dud 'gror skya/ dgang tshe rgyal po yula rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams nas// nyes pa byas pas skur bar 'gyur// rgyal pa nyidi na mi byed na//
da nubuyang ma yin l// lha yi rgyal po pa rnams kyis// gnas lanyis dang bcas par 'gyur/ dgayonIshin tum bsdad pas// gang tshayulal por 'jig 'gyur ba// da phyiralcayi
dbang po yis// ma gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/ gnyis pa byas ra zhi ba'i phyir// legs par byed la u0f8bdzad pa ste// tshe 'di la ni sems can la/ rnam smin sbyod pa rgyal po yin//
legs byas dang ni 'osas kyi// las rnam par smin pa 'bras// rnam pa tha dang bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyu de ra brjod// bdag ga ngenadang gzhan don dang// yul gyi
chos kyi don gyi phyir// lhatshogs rnams kyis byin gyisabarlabs// wa rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang// yul 'kher rnams naslu bon// sdig can g.yon can gaphul ba dang// yul gyi tshes
kyi don gyi phyir// srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang/ dachos mayin pa bzodabyang cing// shes bzhin yal bar 'donan// yul 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// pa'i dugazhan niyod mayas
jiltar g.yo rnams byung ba la// g.yo byed chadapas ma bcad na// yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ g.yo rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyis rdzong chen bzhind/ yul
'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ phyudabang mas kyang khri bar 'gyur// lhayi gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yuladu dngos po thams cad na// ma rungs par yang 'gyur bsan// da phyir sdig pa byed
ba rnams// nyes pa'i mi bzhin gangulapar bya// chos kyisayul 'aler bskyang bar bya// chos m yan pa sad mi bya// srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing// 'a mgon bya bar mi bya 'o//
skya bogatan dang skya bo gzhan// yul 'khor skya bo thams cad la// rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig byayi// phyogs su ltung bar gyur tare// rgyal po chos dang ldan bayis// grags pa 'jig
rtan gsum gang sta// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams su// khyu yi dbang po dga' 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i glinganangod kyi bu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yani// chos
kyis yula 'khor dar bstan nas// legs par byed la skyi po bkod// rgyal po de ni legs byed pas// skya bdag ni 'dapa'i byed de// lha dang lha yi ba rnams kyis// lta gnas gang bar byed snyam
mo chos kyis yul 'khor dar bstan pas// rgyal po rnams n rab tu dga'// lha dbang rab tu dang gyur pas// mi yi rgyal po de la srung// nyi zla dang na de bzhin du// rgyuskar legs par
rgyu bar 'gyur// rlung yang dus su lding 'gyur zhing// char pa'i ng dus su 'bab par 'gyur// lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khor rnams su le legs byed// do lta bas na rgyal
po yas// badrag gi khang pa'i srog gtang// gang gis 'jig jan pad 'gyur la// dkon mchog chos nimi gtang ste// yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa// chos dang ldan pa bstan
par bya// rang gi skya bos ga dga' ba// rtag tu sdig ra rnam par spangs// chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed bsems can
dgod// 'as byed las ni bzlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin 'dul par byed pa'i tshe// yul 'khor dun lolags shing// rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par
ba 'gyur// rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing// skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong/ dgasar 'od dam pa mdorda'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lca'i dbang po'i dam
tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//gang tsho 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams bdang// gang zhi zhachen gang bar
bcas pa yang// sngon gyi rgyal ba dgalangs phul// chos kyi skud yongs su ngatsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing 'phangs pa yi// dngos po de dag ngas ma ma btang mad//
bskal pa du mar 'phangs pa'i srog gyur btang// ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsamayasan/ mchanagatsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i//
bstan la legs byung zhes bya'i rgyal po byung// nga ni gling bzhi dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa larab tu ston// rgyal dbang gsungs phyir rgyal po'i pho brangan dang tshe
rgyal po'i dam pa gnyid kyis leg/ rmilam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos// chos rinan gnas ogs pa gnyid dkyilan// rnam par lcang ngar mdo sA'i rgyal po 'di// rab tu 'chad cing
'dug pa mthong bar gyur// rgyal ba don gnyid kyis legalas sad// daya lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur/ mgunas rgyal po'i khab nasa mngon byung ste// nyan thos dge 'dun
[s ]@#// mchog gi gnas susong// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing// 'phags pa'i dge 'duna'adin rin chen sogs// yon tan ldan pa'i dga' dun gang
sha 'od ces// chos smrarin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshonarin chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhib gnang du 'dug gyur to// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnams ms la// kha ten byed
cing bde bar rab tu bdug/ dag slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing/ phug gzhan zhig gnang du 'dug gyurar// ngas na rgyal po
de la bstan// 'din chos sna rinachen sogs pa 'di// rgyal bo'i dbul zab mo 'dzin pa ste// gsar 'od dam bzhes ni bya ba yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bortag tu ston// rin na
sogs pa'i rkangal phyag 'tshal to// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol// rgyal po legs
a par byung ba de nyid la// rin chen sogs pas khas blangs pas ni// stong gsum pa ya 'jigartan thams cad du// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// de tshomi yi dbang pos phyogs
ni nyogatsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa la// rin chen tshudang spos chus chag chag btab// ma tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal bos khrid gdugs dang rgyala mtshon
dang/ (dpayug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan// rgyal bos khri dar tsan dan dam pa dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor// lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci/ gnod
sbyin dbang dngamakha' lding lto 'phye chos// lcayi me togamanadar ba'i// srid lan mngon par rab tu phab// ches 'a dod lha ni bya ba khrag khrig stong// bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lcags
gyur// rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na// sAla' ma tog dag gis mngon par 'thor// chos rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang// shin tulus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos
tetakhridir nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo sbyar ba byas taphyag kyang 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// bar snang 'dug nas ma togaman dar// char pa 'babs shing/
sil snyan brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis mi khyab ba du sgrog par byed// rin chen sogs pa dag slong chos smades// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong// bsam gyis mi khur
pa dag dran byas nas// da ni mngon par 'dzigs ta'adug par gyur/ dasems can kun l sungabar bskyod nas ni// snying rjes sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te// rgyal po legs bar byung ba
dalani// de yi tshon mdesngo 'di bstan te// rgyal po thal mo sbyar byas 'dug nas su// tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste// chesakyi shugs kyis mi gnas mchim byung// de yalus na/
dga' bsakhyab par gyur// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tsho rgyal legs par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu ni chen rgyal po blangs// sems can ms phyir
smon lam btab ba ni/ ranI nabadun dang ldan pa'i rgyana rnams dang// gang yang badzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor chen peya ]/char pa de rang 'dzam bu'i
gling du khong// da mi na rin chen sna bdun dang// dpung rgyan dang ni do shal na ma mchog/ de bzhin zas dang skomadang gos rnams kyang// gling bzhi dag tu rab tu bab par gyur// rgyal po ligs
padra byung bas 'dzam gling du// chen char pa bab pa de mthong nas// gling bani rin chen gang bar bcas pan// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga//
rgyal po lags pa byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhidagazhirin chonagang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshong yis yongs su btang// gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la// dmomado sde 'dir bstan
ba 3rin chen chos sna ba yi dge slongade// de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs dar gyur to// ngas gang tshemado sde 'di thos shing// tshig gcig gisani rjesasuyi rang ste// nga nidago ba'i las ni
danyid dang// chos mnyan pa dang rjes su yi rang dang// gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgyayemtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tumadog mdzes la// ltastong bya ba rab tu dga'abyed pa// skye
bo mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob// bskal pa dag na byi ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu bsurtsa dgur 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa brgya stong dumamang por yang// ngas ni khams kyi rgyal par
myong bar gyur// bskal pa ngosam gyis ma khyab brgya byin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de bzhin no// gang dgatshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i// stobs bcudapagamed ngasanimanyes par
byas rtangs gangamado bris rjes su rung bar// bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang// bsam pa ji bzhin ngas na byang chub thob// chos sku dam pa yang nings thobab//gsar 'od dam pa/
mdo snga'i dbang pe'argyalapo las// legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba sa bcu gsum pa'o dbal ldan lcamo gisakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la lani/
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ yo byad thamasacad kyis mchod pa chen po shin turgyas shing/ rgya cher bsam gyis khyab pa byed bar
'dod cing/ 'das pa dang/ ma'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul zab yangs su shes par 'dod pa des gtsug lag khang jam/ dge don pa'i/
phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang nagasar 'od dam pa mdosdo'idabang po'i rgyalapo 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa 'i sams kyis rna ba blags te//
gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyisaden 'di nyid bakhor largya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ dab tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di
dgag gsungs so// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la// bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la// zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pas// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas
khang ngam// gang na gser 'od dmapayi// mdosdo dmapa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni'agrobar bya// mdo'adi bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon tan rgyamamomatha'angayas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du
ma las// sems can thamasacad thar par byed// mdzesdaya[“] ni thog ma dang// dbus dang de bzhin tham mthong// mdo sde'i dbang po rab zab ste// 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin// gang+gAdang nis rnams dang//
rgya mtshodang na nam mkha' la// gnas pa'i tshul nigang yang rung// dper bya bar ni ma nus so// chos kyi dbyings la'ajug payis// dayi tshin 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rtan//
tshau rubamo rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod rten de yi dbus na// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong// yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyisasu/ mdo sda'adin reb tu ston// grangs med bsamagyisam khyab paki/
bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par// lha yi dang nimi rnams kyi// bad ba dag ni rjes su myong// gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa// de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi// phung po bsamayas sgrub mnyam du// du
[d/ ]tshe des ni da ltar shes// mas gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yi// dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing// tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas// mdo stanyan par gang nus pa// gtsug lag khang ngam
gnas khang du// zhugs nas de mthagan// sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur// minganamtshan nyid thams cad dang// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang// byed dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang/
zhugs nas de ma thag tuni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni// rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar M// dor ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri// de lta bur yang bshamA
par bya// khrid pa ni 'dug nas su/ mdosgo 'di rab tu bstan// yi gar bros pa bklags par bya// dbazhi yongs su chud par bya// khrid lasan babs nas su// yul gzhan song bar
gyur na yang// khri de la ni yod pa yi// tsho'aphrul rnams n snang bar 'gyur// chos sgrub yi gzugs su yang// dan res 'ga' snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste/
ngos 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang// res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang// de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs su skyo// res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugs su yang// khridi la ni snang ba 'gyur
ris 'ga'a'od ni 'ba' zhig snang// res 'ga'i lha rnams snang bar 'gyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas// de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur//
thams cad du yang grub par byed// 'khru dang bkra shis phun sumatshegs// mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// rgyal dang dpal dang grags par byed// phyir rgol ba yang
zlog par byed// pha rol dgratshogs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dag rnams phung bar byed// mya ngan thams cad zhi bar byed// sdig pa thams cad rab zhi byed// g.yul 'gyod pa na rgyal bar
zla byed 'dzam bu gling 'di thams cad du// grags pas rang tugang bar 'gyur// dpa dgra rnams thams cad na// kanitu pham pa nyid du 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur//
sdig pa thams cad rnamapar spangs// g.yul ngo'i rtse las rnam par rgyal// dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang// de bzhin 'jigarten skyong rnams
dang /[Y]lag na rdo rje ganod sbyin dbang// rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dgashes// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang// de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang// ma 'am ci dbang lha min dbang// du bzhinanam mkha'
lding dpang po// dadag lan sogs pa dang// lcasnyoms de dag thams cad kyang// chos kyi mchod rtan bsam yas la// rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can
rnams// mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag/ thams cad 'disnyam sams par 'gyur// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang// khan tshun du ni sna byed pa/
[z/ ]bsod nams dang la dang gzi brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la ltos// dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yi// ma rnams de dag 'dir lhags to// gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'ad// nyanapa'i
phyingani 'dir lhags pa// dad pa bsam gyisami khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas// de dag 'jig rtan snying ldan// de dag sems can tan byed na// de dag zab mo'i sa
rnams kyi// dam pa chos kyi ri yi snod// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin// gang dag gsar 'od dam pa'i mdo// dag ba dam pa 'di nyan pa// de dag sngon
chadasangs rgyas ni// brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni// mdo 'denyapa de dag la// lha dbang rgyal pod kun dang// dbyangs can dang nId bzhin du//
dpal dang rnam thos bu dang ni// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang// gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong pa dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang/
srung bshanatu byed par 'gyur// dpang pa zla ba gshin rjadang// rlung dang chu lha nyid dngani// skam byed 'jug sol dbyangs can dang// sbyin sreg za dang skyadagu dang// stobs chen bal
gnon byed pa// 'jig rten skyong bad kun kyang// nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// nor sbyin gnod sbyin dbangag dang// sred med bu dang dbang
phyugache// yang dag shas lasogs pa dang/ gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong dpo dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis//
jigs shing sgrogs pa thams cad ni// dudag lan srung bar byed// lag na rdo jaganod sbyin dbang// gnod sbyin dgagan lnga brgyadang// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang/ de
da la ni srung bar byed// gnod sbyin dbang po nar du bzang// de ranIn gang ba bzang po dang// ji'ajigus dang ni'ibrog gnas dang// dmar sar dang nir skyudang// gnod sbyin dbang/
par re yang// gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis// gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa// de dag rnams la srung byed 'gyur// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i rgyal// nor
bu'i mgul dang sa mgron dang// de bzhin char ra'i bdag po dang// kham po cha dang nag po dang// de bzhin gsar 'dra'i skyo dang ni// sa chen dang ni ra shing dang// de bzhin skal ba
chen po dang// yur ba can dang chos skyong dang// sbra'u de bzhin 'khri byed dang// khab kyis dang nyi bshes dang// de bzhin rin chen sku dang ni// yul rkyen can dang lus med dang//
'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan dan dang// mthu bor dang gangs can dang// dad pa'i ri nyid de bzhin to// stobs chen pa la gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang// gang dag
cha0 ]/ mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag la ni srung bar byed// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang// de bzhin du na rgya mtshodang/ dae la'i 'dab dang btang bzung dang// dga' bonya dga' gnyis ka dang/
klun brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyang// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la nasrung ba byed// stobs can sgra gcan mgatong dang///
thags zangs ris dang pad mchog dang// rab sim byed dang phragartsub dang// de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang// lha mi brgya phragastong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis//
'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las// de dag lani srung bar 'gyur// 'byung po'i mamo 'brog pa// lnga brgya'i budang bcas pa yang// 'dug dpanyaladad ra ro'atsho// de dgal ni srung
bar byed/ dgadol pa mo dang gtum mo dang// de bzhin gnod sbyin gdumamo dang// mdung can dang na so brtsigs dang// sems can kun gyi mdangs 'phrog ma// stobasachen pha rol gnon
byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas su// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams// lhamo bsam gyis ma khyab dang//
dang la la sogs pa de bzhin du// lha med na thams cad dang// sa ya lha mo nyid dang ni// lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang/ kun dgatsashing ljon mchod rten la// gnas pa dag dang rlung
lta dang// lha rnams de dag thams cad 'dir// rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni// gang dgamadesdo 'di dga' ba// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// tshod mdog
dang stobs rnams la// sems can dag ni sbyor bar byed// dpal dang bsod namasagawibarjid kyis// phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu brgyan// gza' dang rgyu skar bganod padwag/ da dag
mas cad zhi bar byed// rgyud dang sdig dngamya ngan pa// nga dag thams cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen ldan pa yi// sayi lcamo nyidikyang ni// gsal gyi 'od kyi dam rab ya de mdo sde'i
'a dbang po'i royasem// dpag tshadi dag nibamyaya brag/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas// rdadza gnas la thug bar du// sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel// dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba/
'og tu sa yi bcud song ste// da na phyir yang le gnas nii// sa ya stong dag snum par byed// mdo 'dimnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni// la rnams de dag thams cad kyang// gsar gyi 'od ni
dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros ma'agyur/ mdangs dang ldan par rob 'gyur zhing// de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan bgyur// bad bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i mda'adi
thams cad na// 'bras bu lo teg nags lha rnams// sna tshogs yas mi 'gyur zhing// shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// mdo'abe yis tshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnams dang 'gag dang
me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang// 'bras bu'i shing ljon sna tshob sa kyang// kun nas rab tu bar byed// 'bras bu'i shing ljon thams cad dang// kun da pa Na' dag dang nags tshal rnams// ma rtog
rab tu chags byed cing// sna tshogs drinaMrab tu 'byin// ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang// 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi// rtswa dang nags tshal thams cad dag/ sa yi stangan skye bar byed
'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// kluya bu mo bsamam khyab// rab tu dga' nga'i sams gyur nas// rdzing bu'i drung du nyar song ste// rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du// ku mud dang pad+ma
dang tsaud+ma la dang de bzhin du// pad+ma dkar bo sna tshogs skyes// nam mkha' la ni du ba dang// sprin gyi dra bsad cing dag/ mun pa dang ni rdul med cing// phyogs rnams rab tu do
gsalal// nyim 'od zer stong ldan yang// 'od zer dra bas 'od kyang mdzes// snang bu dag ni zang mo yis// rab tu dga' bar 'char bar 'gyur// dbang po nyi ma lhayi bu/
'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi// gzhalamed khang na 'dug pa yang// mdo sde 'dis ni rab tutshim// dbang po nyim rab dga' nas// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'char byed cing// bod rjer
mtha' yas dra ba yis// kun nas rab tu snang bar byed// dan shar ba tsam gyis kyang// 'od zer dra ba rab gatong shing// rdzing bu sna tshogs legs pa yi// pad+ma dag ni la yang 'byed
'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du// mi ga 'bras bu sman snatshogs// yang dgayongs su smin byed cing// sa rnams thams cad tshim par byed// zla ba dang nyi
ma yang// nga tshokhyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur// rgyu skarayang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing// rlung yang de bzhin ldang bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du// kun tu le yang legs
gyur te// gang namadosda 'di yod pa// yul 'khord ni khyad par 'phrogs/ de gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas zhes bya ba kun tu bsrung ba'i
le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//kad skadwacas bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ rigs kyilhamabyang chub yang dag par bsdus pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal pa la sogs pawa'ibu stong phrag bcu po dag rgyu ga dang/ rgyun gang dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa mi 'dra ba dang/ gang/
bgyis shing bsags pas skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob nas// daltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i slad/
du mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bskal pa bgrangs pa las 'das pa// grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag dum 'das pa na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams gsar du snang bar byan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sto/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bdabar gshegs pa// 'jig rtenamakhyan ba/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamed pa/ lhadang mi rnams kyi ston
pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsar dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngodo/ mitsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar dang rin po cha'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugasad yongs su mya ngan las 'das ba'i dam pa'i chos nub ste/ de'i bstan pa yongs la thams cad du nub bar gyur
pa na 4khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshags pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing// 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshand 'di du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus gsar 'dzamabu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// jitsamanadabazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i gsar gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa yongs ye thams cad du nub pa'i bar du gyurapa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od 'di de bzhin gshegs
pa da'i mtshams sbyor zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
sta de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i b.lo/
sgyur ba/ blunamod ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsar ba'i 'od gsar du snang ba'i snying pa//zhas byabara'ajig rten du 'byung ngo shas de dag thams cad/ bcom
kha sngon 'das kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dulung bstan to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal pa la sogs pa lha'i bu stong
phug bcu po de dag nid tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po cher yang ma gyur/ sngonal rol tu phyin pa drug ba dag la sbyar skad kyang mi gda'/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/
mig dang yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang/ budang/ chung ma dang/ bu mo 'phangs pa dag sngon yongs subatang skad kyang mi gda'/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ 'gron budang/
gsar dang/ nor du dang/ mu tig dang/ 'am dang/ dung dang/ mnashol dang/ byu ru dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram dang/ rin patshanams ston yongs su btang skad/
kyang mi gda'o/ bza' pa dang/ btung pa dang/ bzhon pa dang/ gos dang/ mal cha dang/ khang khyim dang gzhal med khang dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ rdzing bu dang/
lteng ka dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ glang po cha dang/ ba glang dang/ rta pho rgod dang/ bran po dang/ ban mo sna tshogs sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis paphrag du ma de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du lung mthob kyi bar
du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gangs mamachas pa du ma nas/ de bzhin gshags pa bya pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangasam mchis pa du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa/
brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag du ma dang/ yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyid/ yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang yongs su gtong la lag pa dang/
rkang pa dang/ mig dang/ yan lag ga dam pa mgo dang/ budang/ chungam dang/ bumo 'phangs pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gto/ nor dang/ 'bru dang 'gron bu
dang 4 gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ dngul dang/ sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams yongs
su gtang/ bza' ba dang/ btung pa dang/ bzhen pa dang/ gos dang/ mal cha dang/ khang khyim dang/ gzhal mang khang dang/ kun dga' ra ba
dang skyed mos tshal dang/ ljang bu dang/ lteng ka dang/ glang pa dang ba glang dang/ rta so rgod dang/ bran bodang/ branamo yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yos
su gtong zhing/ rim gyis ba rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ ma gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa dbang rdzogs nas deb brgya stong phrag mang bo'ang
myong bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang/ rkyen gang dang/ dge nga'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa mi 'dra ba zhig gis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'abu

yi/ stong phrag bcu po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bad ltar ma 'ongs pa 'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa du man/
'jig rten gyi khamasasA la'i dbang po mthon pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang rus gcig pa dang/ mingagacig tu rim gyis bla namad payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pala'i dro brtsegs bzhes bya bsangs rgyas stong phrag bcu'ajig rten du 'byung sta/ mkhyenapa dang zhabasasu ldan pa// bde bar
[z/]gshegs pa/ 'jig rtan mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su'agyur zhes/ de ltar blan med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i phying chub tu lung bstan/ daskad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lhamo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigasakyi
lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyirgyal palasogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gang byas shing bsags pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ daltar gumasurtsa gsum gyi gnas nas 'dir lhags
pa de'i dag pa'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod/ de'i rgyu yod/ de'i byed pa yod de/ rigs kyilhamo skyes bu dam pa 'di gsum gyis byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag lcagasar 'od

dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu 'am byed cing dga' ba dang dang ba thob par gyur to// datsamadu ba cha mu dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i soms dang ldan par gyur to// drim med pa
shin tu rgya chezhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab pasems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to// bsod nams kyi phung po dpal du yod pa yongs su bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lhamo'abar

ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal polasogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu pa 'di dag de tsam du gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thosamathag tu/ lhag par ri mor byed pa dang rab tu dad pa
theb par gyur to// de tsam du bat+tarla drim med pa ltar yongs sudag pa'i sams dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i phyi'i lung bstan ba'i sarjes su thob bo// rigs kyi lha mo chos
mnyan pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyadapar gyi gzi brjod kyi rgyal pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag de ltar bla na mad
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bu chub tu lung bstan pa'is rjes su thob bo// rigs kyi lham sngon gyi smon lam de dag gangashin/ gser 'od dam pa mde snga'i dbang po brgyal po las/
lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brtselnga pa'o////gsakyilha mo sden byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'iyang grangs med pa// rgyas
pa= bsam gyisamikhyab pa/ tshad med par gyurang de'i ri de da dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgragacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde
bar gshags pa/ 'jigartan mkhyen r// skyis bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na mdang// lha dang mi rnams kyi gan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyun gtsug tor nazhis
du ba 'jig rten du byung nge/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe da'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor cand yongs su mya ngan las
[B14 ]'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/ dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba smos can/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis rgyal srid skyong gi/
chos ma yin pas ni ma yin te/ yul thams cad n gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam lta bur gyur pa zhig byung ngo// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshadi'i dusan rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du myong
dpen ral pa'i dzin ces bya ba sman pa gso bar byed pa// khams la mchog du mkhas pa/ mo rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to// kyi rigs kyi lha moda'i tshoda'i
dus na tshong dpon ral pa'i dzinacos bya ba de'i tshong dpen gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba gzugs bzang nga/ mdzes ra/ bltan sdug pa// kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa// bstan
bcos sna tshogs la mkhas pa// bstan bcos thamasacad rtogs par khong du chud pa/ yi ga dang/ grangs dang/ lagartsis dang/ rtsis rnams shin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byung ngo/
rigs kyi lhamada'i tshoda'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od da'i yul de na/ sems can brgya stong phrag du ma nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir te/
sdug bsngal mi barbad ra/ rtsub pa// drag pa yid M du ma'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar gyur to// rigs kyi lham de'i tshe de'i dusan tshong dpon gyi bu chu'ababasade sems can nad sna tshogs
tha/ dkyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzi'i babargya stong phrag du mdo dag gi don gyi phyir/ snying rjechen po'i sa mas skyes par gyur to// sams rgyun brgya stong phrag du ma de dag
[+ ]nind sna tshogs kyis btabarung de nad sna tshogs kyis gzir tu/ de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rlu ba pa/ drag pa// yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong la/ bdag gi patsheng dpon ral
blob 'dzin sman pa gso bar byed pa/ khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ tsho'i rige bud yan lag brgyad kyi rgyad dang ldan pa 'di'i gas/ 'khogs/ gdugs/ lam du zhugs/ nod rjes
su thob pa// 'khar ba la rtan cing 'dar sil/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su'agremanusan/ sems
can nd sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshegs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshegs las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid bdag gi ba ral pa 'dzin gyi gan du song
la nad kyi phyi'i khams la mkhas par khyab yongs su dus te/ khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pas bdag grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/
rgyal bo'i pho brang dang/ 'khor rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba ba/stong thub/dumadag nad sna tshogs las yongs

[s/ ]thar par bya'o snyam nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i de'i dusanatshong dbon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi ral pa 'dzin ga la bdar song stapan nas// rang gi pha ral ra 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshol
ta 4 thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
khams la mkhas par bya badris pa/ jiltar dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing// khams kyi rnams kyang yongs su 'gyur// gang gi dusanalus can la// nad kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dus
dang dus man chas thos pa// jiltabar na bad bar 'gyur// gang gi lus kyi nang dun// lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur// rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang// 'dus pa las gyur bad na
gyur [0f7c]nad rnams zhi bar bgyi slad du// ji lta bur ni gso bar bgyi// gang gis mi la gnod 'gyur ba'i// rlung ni gangagi dus na g.yo// mkhris pa gang gi dus na g.yo// bad kan
gang gi dusan g.yo// de nas tshong dbon ral pa 'dzin gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bumu 'babasal tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams lamakhas par bya ba rnam pa bstan to// gsum dbyar te
zla gsum ston du shos// gsum n dguta gsum ni dbyid yin no// daltar sgrub go ramis 'di skadus ni drug/ lagacig lan zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod// gsum gsum dun tshigs rnams
dbasdus par shes// zla ba gnyis gnyis shing ni dus subastan// zas dang skom ni da ltar 'jug par 'gyur// sman pa dang ni khams dang dusakyang bstan// dbang
po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang// 'khe gcig nang gi tshigs tshegs yosasu 'gyur/ dbang po dang ni yongs su 'gyur ba na// lus Mcan rnams la sna tshogs nad rnams 'byung// nga nyid lan
sman pas zla gsum bzhi// tshigs kyi bar dang dus drug rnams dwangani// khams drug mkhas par bya ba shas bar bya// zas skom sman rnams go rims ji bzhin te// rlung gi shas mnyid
nadabyar na ldang// ston du gyur pan ni mkhris pagayo// dgun gyi dus na de bzhin 'dus pa ste// bad kanashasama'i nad ni dpyid ldang ngo// duphur na snumadro na tsha skyur pa'idaM/ ston ni dngar dang
snum dang bsilabag go/ dgunani dngar dang sbyar dang snum pa sta// dpyid kyidus na thub droba'o// bdakar chab thos ma thagaduldang// mkhriso da che ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang// rlung
tshau shes tshapa zhu ma thag tu ldang// khams gsum g.yo ba de ni da lta'o// rlung gi bdag nyid la ni bcud kyis gso// bkru sman gyis ni mkhris pa bsal bar bya// 'dus pa la ni gsum dang
mthun ldan pa// bad kan tshigs su baban skyugs smanagatan// rlungashas tshodangamakhris dang 'dus pa dang// bad kanashas che'i tshigasa rnams shes par bya// dus gang khams dang lus gang

0 yin pa// de yi smanadang bza' btung bstan bar bya// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu de tsam zhig yongasasu dris pa des tshe'i rigs byed kyi yan lagabargyad

po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dusanatshong da bon gyi bu tshul babs/ rgyal po khyu'i dbang phyug khyed kyi yulan/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/
ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'kher dathams cad du song nas/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang stong phrag du ma dadab la
khe na smanang bonas bdag nyid kyis khas 'ches te/ kho bos khyedanams nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyungang// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis
'di ltabu'i tshici/bad pa du thos ma thag tu srogachags brgya stong drug dumade dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba chen por skyes par gyur to// dbugs phyin pa rnyed nas kyang dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/
yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshade'i dus nasems can nd so gas kyis btab pa// nad snatshog sakyis gzir ba ba stong phragadu ma de dag nad sna tshogs
las yongs su thar to nadamod bar gyur to/ nad med pa gyur nas snga mkhobazhin du mthu dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// da'i chinga'i dusan sems can nad sna tshogs
kyis btab pa// nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma dadag gnang nas gangasudag nad drag pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshongadapon gyi bu chu 'babs ga la
bder dong nas phyin pa dang/ sems can nd sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ da sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag la tshong dpon gyi bumyu'abebs kyis smanadapyadagang ci bstan pa des/
sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas so// nad med pa dang nad 'bab gyur nas kyang snga mkho bzhin du mthu dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur
to/ rigs kyi lha moda'i tshada'i dusanargyal powu'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yulan grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho branga 'khor thams
cad na/ sems can nd sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag dum de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis nad snatshog salas yongs su thar par byas
par gyur to// gsar 'od dam pamado sde'i dbang po'i rgyal palas/ nad rab duzhi bar bya ba'i le'u sta bcu drug pa'o// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis
rigs kyi lhamogazhan yang rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sems can thams cad kyi nadamed par byas pas/ btung nang snga ma bzhin du spro ba dang
[n/ ]stobs dang ldan pa'ilus su gyur to// rgyal blta'i dbang phyug 'od yulan/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur sbyod do// sbyin pas dag kyang sbyin/ bsod nams dag kyang/
byed da tshong dpon gyi bu khye'amu'abebs la'ang tsheng dpon gyi buchu'adebs rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ sman pa'i rgyal bsems can thams cad kyi nad gso nga mngon sum du byang chub sems

dpar nges pa// tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyud pa thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu'abebs de la/ chungam chu'ipad+ma'i snying pozhes bya ba zhig yod do/

rigs kyi lha mo chu'i pad+ma'i snying po dal khye'u gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni chu'i gas zhes bya/ gcig gi ming gi chu'i steng gnas bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu'ababs khye'u
da gnyis dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i 'o brang 'khor rnams su 'gro'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus
gzhan zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'babs 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin to// de nas 'brogadagon pa der sha za ba'i khyi dang/ sbyang dang/ wa dang/ khu dang/ byadag gang nadagen pan
yod pa der rgyug pa mthong nas 'di snyam du soms// ci'i phyi'i sha za ba'i khyi dang sbyang ki nas/ wa'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te//
bdag khyi dang sbyang ki dang/ wa dang/ bya rnams phyogs gang dang gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs dma'agro bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mya'ababs

mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ste/ dgon panardzong zhig yod padarag la bder phyin to// dzing chen po dan nya tre zhig gnas to/ des der nya khri phrag mang po zhig chudang bral ba mthong nas/ de de la snying rje
chen po'i sams skyes pa dang/ donalhamo zhig shing las lus byed tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/ lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'babs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs legs so//

gangag phyi chu 'bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya'adi rnams la chu byi'ajig/ rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/ gang chu 'bebs pa dang/ gang musbyin pa'o// de bas na rang gi ming dang mthun
glu pa'i bya ba byos shig/ chu 'bebs kyis slar smras pa// lha mo' 'di dag lajisnyad cig mchis/ lhamos snyas pa/ nya khri tham pa'o// rigs kyi lha mong nas tshong dpon gyi bu mu'adebasa mchog
dusnying rdzaba' sams skyes so// rigs kyi lham de'i tshadagon pa na yod pa'i rdzong chen po namulcagam cung bradatsam zhig lus to/ de nas nya khri zhig 'a ba'i sgor zhugs shing/ chudang bral ba de

pa rag rgyug cing rnam par rgyug gi/ rigs kyi lha mo da nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs ba dang/ nyakhri po de dag tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u mu'adebs phyogs gangadu 'gro ba'i

[z/ ] phyogs de legs sumu'abangs la snying rje ltar lta// rigs kyilhamo de nas tshong dpan gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/ chu btsal yang der chum rnyed nas phyogs bzhir bltas pa
dad/ des ha cang yang thag mi ring pa zhig na shing ljon pa chen po mang zhig mthong nas/ shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs tu shing gi yal ga rnams bcad nas/ shing gi yalag de dag khyer te//

rdzong chen bo ga la ba der song staphyin pa dang/ shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri po de dag la shin tu bsil ba'i grib ma byas so// rigs kyi lha modanas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u mu'adebs rdzing der 'babs

pa'i mu'alato/ gan gnas tshul bab cesad phyogs bzhir brgyugs kyang chum rnyed nas/ des r ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi rjes su song ste/ rigs kyi lca mo dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing dor tshul ngab pa zhes

bya ba'i klung chen po dalas/ dar tshu 'bab pa'i klung de'ang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gisaM nya khri po de dag gi phyir/ cinas kyang phyis nya de dag gal chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba deltadu'i phyogs kyi
g.yakhrags chen por klung de phab bo/ danas de mthong nas bsams pa/ klung 'di skyo bo stong gis srol danyid du dbab par mi nus na/ bdag gis lta dbang par ga la nus snyam nas der phyir log go

rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs ris pa rings par rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od g la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal pa lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bos mchod de/ phyogs
gAcig tu 'dug nas/ de dag rgyus nas smras te/ bdag gis lha'i chabs 'og tu grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal thams cad dusems can gyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkum
na gnasachag mo zhes bgyi ba danadagon pa na yod pa zhes bgyi ba'i rdzong zhig mchis pa de mnya khri zhig gnas pa de chab dang bral nas gdugs kyis gdungs shing mchis te/ jiltar ma rnams 2btsal
ba ltar/ cinas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dgala'ang srog rtsol bar 'tshalan/ lhas glang po chanyi shu zhig bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal po
po la grang nga ma'i shu zhag byin cig chos blon po rnams la bsgo'o// blon po rnams kyis smras pa// soms can chen po glang ma'i lhas ga la ba der song la glang po nyi'u 'ded/ sems can rnams

la phan gdags ba dang bde bar gyis shig// rigs kyi lham denasatshong dpon gyi bu mu'ababs rang gi bu chu'i gos dang/ chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu glang de man+ti shu khrid nas/ glang po che'i rdzi bo las

ba lang gi rkyal pa brgya blangs te/ slar log nas chu 'bab ces bya ba'i klung chen po gang du 'bab pa der song ste/ rkyal ba de dag chus bkang nas/ glang po tsha'i rgyab tu tshudakAl taM/ myur ba myur bar

dgon pa nayod pa'i rdzong ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ chud glang po che'i stong nas phab sta/ phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu nus bkang nas phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu'abebs

phyogs gang du 'gro ba de logs su nya khri pa de dag kyang rgyug go/ de nas rigs kyi lhame tshong dpon gyi du khye'u chu 'bebs 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir nya khri po 'di dag bdag ga la ba der logs su
rgyug snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems taM/ nya khri ba 'di dag ni bkres pa'i mas yongs su gnas bdag la bza' ba slongadungs kyis/ bdag gis kha zas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi

lha mo donas tshong dbon gyi du khye'u chu'ababs kyis/ rang la bu chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so/ dbu glangapo che thams cad kyi nang nas mgyogs pa'i mchogal zhen// bdag gi khyim du song la myur ba
myur bar song sta/ mos po tshong dpon l/ kyams pa mu 'bebs kyi mchidanas khyim 'dan pha ma dang/ spun dang/ sring mo dang/ can podang/ bran modang/ las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha
zas sbyar ba gang ci mchis pa thams cad gacig tu bsdus te/ chu'i gis glang po chal non pa'i lagatu myur du rdzongs shig ces ma'o// de skad gyis shig/ danas khye'umu'i gos glang po che la zhen
nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu brgyugs te/ rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ de dag rgyus kyis zhib tu skyas te/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos kyis sngarasmos pa'i zas sbyar bad
thams cad glang po mi'i rgyab tu bkal nasaM glang po chad la zhon te/ dgon pa nayod pa'i rdzong ga lab darasong ba dang/ chu'ababs kyis rang gi dumu'i gosa mthong nas dga' mgu sta bu las bras blangs
nas/ phul te ring dar gtor nas nya khri po de dag tshim par byas te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis dus gzhan zhig na/ dgon pa'i gnas shig na dag slong thog pa chen po klog pa las

su brtsi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug ter can gyi mtshan thos pa dbad 'gromatho sa kyi 'jig rten du skye'o zhes thos kyis/ bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i

chos zab mo'ang bshad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan yang bsgrags par bya'o snyam mo// de'i tshon 'dzamabu'i gling de na sems

can rnams kyi lta ba gnyis su gyur po// bcag na thog pa chen po la mngon par dad de// kha cig ni snod de// de nas tshe dbon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis de'i tsha rdzong der rkang pa gnyis ka'i pus mo nub
ma du 'bogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshal le zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod de/ dad

bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dga'achiba'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lca rnams dang skal ba mnyamapar skyo bar gyur cig cesasmon lam de skyod brtayabo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu'abebs kyis/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnasasu gyur pa da dga' chos 'di bshad
nga 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung/ 'di skyes pas 'ad skyi bas/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rgyun gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam bar shes pa'i
rkyen gyisamang dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rgyan gyis skyo mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rgyan gyis srad pa/ srid pa'i rgyun
gyis len pa// len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa// srid ba'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rgyashi dang/ myang n dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba
dad 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur tu/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur ba nas/

daltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig kyang 'gag par 'gyur re zhus bya ba'ibarangu'o// rigs kyi lha mo da ltar de'i da'i dus na tshong dpon gyi du khye'umu'ababs kyis dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su gyur pade

dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/ rang gi bu chu'i gas dang/ chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig 'tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs

dus ston chan pe zosanas chang gis ra ro snyam lamanyal pa dang/ de'i tshe de'i dusan ltasachen de byung bar gyur te/ mtshan mo de 'das pa dang nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
a@#/// rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma thag tudadag bad ltabu'i tshul gyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag dag ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu
chu gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyam mo// de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling da nanya khrir gyur tu/ bdag cag dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su gyur pa las tshong dpen
gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis tshumang podang/ kha zas kyi na chog gis tshim par byas to/ bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa sa/ dge ba'i chos kyi rgyud dang rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyas kyis// bdag cag tshod

[“ ]dpen gyi bu chu 'babs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ de la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu tra po de dag sumacu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyin pa nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi buchu

'debs kyi khyim du lhags te/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu bababasamalan nyal zhing 'dug pa de la/ lha'i bu de dag gisamu tig gi sa mo de khranemago'i thad kar bzhag/ mu tig gi samo de khrin
rkang pa 'i drung du bzhag/ mu tig gi sa mod tra ni g.yas logs su bzhag/ mu tig gi sa mo de dran gayon legs su bzhag sta/ pus mo nub tsam du me tog mnad ra ba'i char chen pobang
thab lca'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol nas/ das 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang gnyid sad/ tshong dbon gyi bu khya'achub babs kyang gnyid sad do// de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag kyang nam mkha'

la dong ste/ lha'i bu de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gnas dang/ gnas gzhan du'ang yo ga man da ra ba'ichar pa 'bebs shing/ dgon pa nayodapa'i dzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/ de
dag gis rdzong chen ba dar ma tog mnad ra ba'i tshor chen po phabasto/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang lha'i gnas su song ste/ de na 'dod ba'iyon tanalnga pa dag gis dga' zhing rtsa ste/
dga' mgur spyodatsangedapal dang skal ba bzang po dag kyang myong// 'dzam bu'i gling dunam langs pa dang/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis ltas de dag byung ba mthong nas skur mkhan dang blon re
chen po rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir mdang sumaltas 'di dag byung/ dedagags smras pa// lhamkhyen par mdzad du gsolaM/ tshongadapon gyi bu khyi'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu tig gisamo/
da ngan khro'i char bab cing/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba'i char yang bab be zhes thos so// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis blon po rnams la sbas pa/ khyadadang latshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
lasnyan pa'i tshigs gis bos shig/ de nas skar mkhan dang blon po chen po rnams chu'abangs kyi khyimig lab der dong staphyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi du khye'u chu'ababs la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal
pho lha'i dbang phyug 'od 'ad khyedal 'bod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal polha'i dbang phyug 'od gal bder song ba dang/ rgyal
pos smras pa/ bu chu'abebs mdang sum de 'drab 'i ltas byung bad ci'i ltasashes sam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rgyal po lha'i dbang phyuga'od la 'di skad ces smras so/
lhabadag gis 'tshalato/ nya khri po de dag 'chiba'i dus bgyis par nges so// rgyalapos smras pa/ ji ltar shus/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lha'i chu'i gos rdzong der nya khri po de dag
gumam gumaltar stsalato// rgyal pos smras pa// de ltar gyis shig/ dunas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u mu 'bebs kyis/ khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so// du song la dgon pa na

yod pa'i rdzing bu'i nya khri po de dag gi 'am ma shi ltos shig 'dunas khye'atshu'i gos myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzong chen po la ba der song ba dang/ nya khri po de dag sha ba'i dus su gyur cing/

ma tog man da ra ba'i char chen po bab pa'i ng mthong nas slar log ste pha la snus pa/ changa'i dus su gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u rgyu'i gos las tshig de thos pa dang/
rgyal po lha'i dbang phyuga'od ga la pa dar song nas/ de dag rgyusanasazhib tu smras pa/ lhamkhyen par mdzad du gsol nya khri po de dag thamasacad ni shi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi rtsa rnams kyi nang du skyus te/ dadag dang bdag gi mthus mdang sum de ltabu'idag ba'i ltas de dag byung ste/ bdag gi khyim du'ang mu tig gis mo de ba zhi khridang/ lha'i ma tog mnadar
ba'i char yang bab bo// de nas rgyal bo dga' zhing mgu sta yid rang par gyur to// donasabcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ shAkya lag na ba can can de'i
de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo da tshada'i dus na tshong dbon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhigayin/mdu khyod somasan/ da de ltar mi
blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ rgyal debras gtsangam de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rigos kyi lhamo da'i tshade'i dus na tshong dpon gyi du khye'u chu 'bebs zhes

bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyed sams na/ de de ltar mibalta'o// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshoda'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na

chungam chu'i nga drub snying po zhes byabar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ dad ltar mibalta'o// de ci'i phyir zhin/ shAkya'i bu mo sa ma tshom de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu
thug/ 'bebs kyi chung mchu'i bad+ma'i snying bo zhes bya bar grub khyod/ sngagacan zin ni de'i chada'i dus na khyi'u chu'i gesazhes bya bar gyur to da kun dga' bo 'di'i tsha de'idusan khya'u/
chu'i snying se zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dusana' khrir gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du byed samasan/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir nan/ 'bar ba'i khyad par
g+hA gyigazi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs palha'i bu khri po 'di dag de'i tshoda'i dus na nyalaM gyur te/ gang dang ngas tshudang zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shi/ rten cing 'brel par 'byungab
zabamo'aches kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshags ba dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des pa'i
gan du 'dir lhags te/ des na dalta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// rab tu dga' ba dang/ dang ba da/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ gus por chos
mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob par gyur/ rigs kyi lha mo dra' chodi'i dus na shang gi ltamor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yanisnyam du khyod sems na/ dadi ltar mi blta'od

daci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi lha mo khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lhamor gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs 'dis ni 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tsho/ ngas ji ltar sems can mang po byang chub tu/
bya yongs su smin par byas te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par gyur par rig par bya'o// gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo
las chu 'angangs kyisanya btul ba'i sdon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba sta bcu bdun pa'o//rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la na pa'i phyir
lus yongs su gtong ngo// de ji ltazhan/ dram mad cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyu'i 'od khrir sa dang lcayul rnam par 'phro ba/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong pa dang/
stobs kyis pha rol gnon ba'i bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ta/ yul lta len gyi ljongs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/ nags tshogs shig tu
byen ba dad/ dAr des sngon zhing 'jam la mthong kar 'dug ba spang ba des ma rtog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sa phyogs shig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ modang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ 'din gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis/ da nge bzhi'i
gshegs pa'i gdan thangs shig/ de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gdan 'di nge// gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan bdas la 'di skad ces gsol te/ dgadan bting
lags na bcom ldan gtsobo mchog/ mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid bcings grol// bzhugs ta ma la sman slada mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mad dam pa bdud 'i
gsung du gsol// danas bcom ldan 'das gdand la bzhugs te/ ga slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dgaslong dag khyad bya dka' bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dus
pa rnams lta bar 'ded dam/ daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ dag slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol te// drang srongadas pasems can mchog
snying da la// bzodadang brtson 'grus la zhi dadadul dga' zhing// blo rtses dran dga' yon tan dpag med gnas gyur kyi// rus pa bdag cag blta pa'i dus lab sa dalags shod//
de nas baa ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang/ ma tog ka ma la gsan du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i sa la brdabs pabastan ma thag tu
sa rnam pa drug du g.yosato/ do bu dang/ gser dang/ dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshedad ldan pa kun dga' bo la bkab
stsal pa/ kun dga' de mtshod na 'di phya zhig/ de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas modartan phye pa dang/ des der gsar gyi 'phra can
dag kha ba dang ma tog ku mu da dang 'dra ba dag cig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag cig gda' 'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer du shog/ da nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te[） ]sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la phul ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams bsnams te/ drag bdun gyi mdun du bzhag nas bka' stsal ra/ rus ba 'di dag yon tan mtho/rab tshegs ldan blo gros
yin// dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dab slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa// mchog
la phyag 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thalamo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa ni'ajig rten thams cad las
mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid nus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' do nus pa 'di dag gis nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
kun dga' de sngon byung rabs pa'i dusan/ rgyal bshing rtachen pa zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang/ stongs dum dang ldan pa thogs pa tshud pa'i stobs kyig pa rolaganon pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu
lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod do// sgra chen pa dang/ lhachen po dang/ sems can chen po'o// de nas rgyal po rtsa ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyud bdung gzhon nu de dag
skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing/ ma tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu zhing/ nags stug po chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// de nas rgyal po'i bu dag deng ba dang/ gzhenau'i
[s]( rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun dang ste/ kun tu bsungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po 'i nags stug po bcu gnyis su zhugs so// danas sgra chen pos/ nu ba gnyis l smras/
pa kho bo'i snying 'jigs pas nyenan/ 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis gsad du 'ong gis tshur shog lha chen pos skyas pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa nim mchis na/ skye ba sdug pa
dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to// sems can chen pos smras pa/ grub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'di'i// bdagan mi 'jigs mudan ma mchis kyis/ tu/
rgyal mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste// bdug gi snying 'dir rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu dudag nags stug pa bcu gnyis pa de dag gi khrod du rgyu ban/ stagamo bu byung nas zhag bdun
len pa zhig bu lngas bskor ta/ bkres shing skom pas nyams dmadanas/ lus mchog tshunyam chung bar gyur bde 'dra bzhig mthong ngo// mthong nas sgrachen pos smras pa// kyi mnyen
mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam bdun zhig len par gyur la/ da ltar zas ma rnyed pas yang na rang gi bu la zabar 'gyur/ yang nan bkres pas 'ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// soms
can chen pos smras pa// nyon mongs ma 'di'i zasa'i/ sgrachen pos smras ba/ 'di ltar gang sha gsar pa dang khrag dron mo yodan/ de ni stag dang/ dom dang/ drod dang/ sang gi/
rnams kyi zas yin no zhes wer ro// ltachen bas smas ma/ 'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa dang skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus sugyur bas/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad
nyeg lus rta/ rab tu nyam chung pa 'dis gnas 'di zas skomatsholainusan/ 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyi'i sun po rang galus yongs su gtong bar byed cig gu/ sgra chen les
smras pa/ kyi rang galus yongs su gtong ba ni gyad ka' ba'o// sems can chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dadalus la mngon par chags pa/ blo chung pa rnams lan tshula'adi
byed ka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong bral zhugs pa// gzhan la phan par brtson ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la nadaka'apha a lags so// yang/ snying bcu snying rje las
byung 'phags pa'i sems can dug/ lcayul dang ni sa 'di'i rang lus rnyed snyam ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun par dgag pa'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba zad par 'di'i na rnam pa brgya yis
brtsi/ donus rgyal bu gzhon nu de shane mi dga' sta/ stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo// de nas sems can chen po'adi snyam du sams te/ da ni bdag//
gi lus 'di yongs su gtang ba'i dus la bab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cinga'agyas pa'i chos can mthar 'byed mtha' ngan pa/// rnag can lus 'di zas dang skomadang mal cha dang//
(bzhon pa 'os pachen pa dag gis rang ngasrungs kyang// snga med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med// yang thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na de'i 'tshob mod kyis/ da bdag gis

de las bzang pe la sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyin bdag spyi ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtshe las brgal nga'i gru bo cha lta ngur 'gyur ro// yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud
gadren pa// 'bras 'dra'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang dzu sa sa gang pa 'di btang ste// mya ngan med cinge 'gyur mdo phung mad dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i/
chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bralang thob par bya// de snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas da ltar btul nas khyadaganyis gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig
gi slad du/ nags stag pe bcuganyes su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad de// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu soms can chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste/ stag gi gnas su song nas/
nags kyis lag pa gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med bzhin zhi ba thob 'dod de// gzhan gyis gtang bar dka' ba'i lus n blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i
snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtshor btu 'jigs las 'jig na gsum M pa bsgral
bar bya// zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang/ de nas byamasapa dpaldan ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la stag
mos cibang ma byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kyi ma'o 'di ni nyam chung bsaminusaso snyam nas langs te/ snying bcu pa'i blo gros kyis mtshon btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon ma
rnyed nas/ des bod ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa grwa ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gi mgul ba bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyal to// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'idabus
su son pa'i gurlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa dud/ lha'i sngos dang byamadod
'dres pa'i m rtog gi char yang bab bo// de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur ra 'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa// blo gros bzang po khyod 'di'i ji ltar thugs rjes sems
can rnams khyab sta// mayi dbang po rab tudabyas pas ji ltar sku'adi'i btang bas na// skye ba dang ni 'chiba'i den dang bral ba zhi ba gnas kyi mchog/ zhib gtsang ma khyed kyis 'danatshogs
med ring ra ra mi thogs partas// de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dapa'ilus khrag gis sbags pa la bltasanas/ yud tsam gyis shadang khrog chod pa rus pa tsam zhig lus
ca par byas so// da nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas// lha chen po la 'di skad ces sbas so// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho'i mithar thug mtshor bcas pa////
sa 'di'i rab tu g.yos shing nyima'ang 'od namad gyural// ma togachar pa 'bab cing le bo'i yod kyang 'khrugs bas na// dgazod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus n btang yang thag/ lce
chen pos sas pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras la// bkras dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal dargyus gtsos pa// shin tu nyam chung rang ga bu layang// bra bar chas la lta bas/
bdug kyang dogs// de nas rgyal bu gzhonanu de gnyis rab tu myang n gyis non nas/ mchims mig gang sku lamado nyid nas slar log nas// stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang/
gos thams cad ni bod ma'i yul ga la gzar/ rus pa rnams nibya zhing bral/ khragani rdzab tu gyun/ skra ni phyogasadang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong ngo// mthong nas
brgyal te nus pa'i sdong du 'gyalanas ring zhig 'an pa dang/ 'dushes rnyedad lasanas lag pa bsgrung stanyam thag pa'i sgrabyung ngo// khyama'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal pa dang/ da
nga zhan du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma// pad+ma 'dra bamig rang khyod kyis gar bzhag ces// mnibadag cag la yang thachud 'dibor 'gyur/ dkya ma bdag cag gnyis sa phyogs
'di nyid du// shin legs kyis gsonan de ltam yin no// sems can chen po chod par gyur pas bdag cag la// bam dag gis ji ltar lto ba star bur 'gyug
de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis kyis/ sAde rdzaji skad du rnam pa mang por ngusan/dang do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu 'tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs
mtshams su brgyugs pa dang/ gcig gis gcig mthong go/ mthong nas kyang gzhon nu ga ra gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o// de'i tshe btsunamomananyal ba'i rmi lam na/ sdug pa dang bral
ba rmis pa 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang/ so phyung ba dang/ tho ba'i phrug gu skyag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer ba mthong// de nas btsun mos
g.yos pas snying dngas taM/ mod las sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung bo'i nam rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo su zhig gu// nyi ma 'od zer med par
gyur bas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur bar ston// nga yi lus ni zhum zhing migakyang g.yo la rang ginum bcad rmisapa// ngayi bu rnams nags khrod 'di ni rtsor dong ba la dag bar 'gyur ram la//
donas de snyam bsams pa dang/ bran mo'ang snyingamyos ta'ongasanas btsunamo la smras l/ rdzogo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhon nu 'tshal zhing mchis na/ lo stor s gda' 'o// de skad
ces thos ma thag ngu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing migadang gdeng mchims gung sto/ rgyalapo'i gan du song nas smras pa// lha bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so// rgyal po'ang snying 'dar zhing shin
tu myos pa/ kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral bltazhas smra'o// de nas rgyal pos btsunamo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir nga gzhon nu btsal ba lonan tan du byed kyis/ bzangamo mya ngan ma byed cig/ den

gzhon nu 'tshol ba la zhugs pa na/ skyango'i tshogs dag redi rod par gyur to// de nas ring por ma len par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ang// mthong nas kyang snas
pa gzhomanud dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni maya nate/ kyishud bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba nisdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar du dang bralabar gyuran yid na mibad ba// mi rnams du rnyed pa ni dga'
ba mayanano// 'jigartan n ni gang drag du med pa dang shi ba'am// mi rnams gang dag du gsan de dag bde bayunanam ru// de nas btsun moshin tu myang n gyis non nas/ rdza mo gnad du
bsnan pa bzhin du shin tu mibabad pa'i sgra phyung ngo// de ltar bu dag gsum ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te// matog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// ngadag gi bu dag tha
chud 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra nga'i theng da ga ro// de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang/ rgyal pos bu 'dris ra/ ce'u tha chung ga re zhas gzhon nu gnyis 'dres pa
byabya// dang Da de nas mya ngan gyis 2ma thag cing mig mchims gang ste/ kon dang/ mchu dang/ kho dang/ sa bskams nas camizararo// btsun
mas smras pa/ kheme'i du sdug tha chud de ga re// khe mo'i snying 'dogs la thub gyur cing// lus namabazad rab du gzir gyur to// khe mo'i dran pa nyams 'gyur myur du smos/ de

nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de bzhin du smras so// de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo phyes par gyur te/ myos pa sangs nas snying rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs dor song ste/ de nas
rgyal po dang btsunamos rus pa de dag sha dang/ khrug dang/ rgyus pa med cing/ sku phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su'athorong mthong nas/ shing rlung gis bab pa bzhin du 'gyal to// ]
dunas niya phan dang blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pad mthong nas/ chudang rim la ya'i tsan dan gyilde gus rgyal po dang btsun mo'ilus bsil bar byas so/ de nas ring zhig lon pa dang 'du
shes rnyed de rgyal po langs tasnying rje ji skad du 'bod pa/ kyam bu sdug yid 'od mthong dag 'ab// 'tshibadag dbang du ci phyir myur du song// 'a bdag ci phyir nga la sdur ma 'ongs// nga la sdug
bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung// btsun mo'ang myos pa las sangs nas/ sa gzhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungos te/ ta thang laphyung ba bzhin sa'i stabadu 'greldog cing/
ca mahaba'u ster ba dang/ rngamo dza'u stong ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du du'o// kye ma sdug cing gces pa'i bu na pad+ma bad/ su yis sa yi stang du bshig nas rab tu gter// yid 'od mig ldan
zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gdu// bdag gi dgra bo gang gis da rengs 'dir bcom// kums 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong na// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal 'di 'dra
mthong yang m gsar/sa// bdag gi snying bde lcags niyanaya pa dag/ de ring rmi lam dun bdag gnu ma'aga' zhig gisaniral gris bcad// so yang byung bas de ring bdag gi bu stag
ni myur du ma rungs gyur// bdag gis thob phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag gi bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni ring ba mi dge khyer/

kyi ma sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de ya'abras bu grub pa 'dayin// de nas rgyal bo dang btsun mosnying jorje skad du rnam pa mang por sla zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan
cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'di'i bzhug gu/ kun dga' bo de'am de'i dusan rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can n po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
zhig yin snyam du khyod somasan/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir yin/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' po 'dod chags dang/ ]
zha sdang dang/ gti mug las yongs sugagrol ba de'atshayang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal lus ngas 'gro ba thams cad la phan btagasan/
skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sadas rgyus pa daltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can ra ba'i phyi'i yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gzhus
par spro zhing/ skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par bsgralal// soms can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa snatshogs/du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so// de nas b/
ldan 'ded kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byang chub mchog 'di yongs su'u0f00lab naM// bskal mang ra ra ngas ni lus btang ste// ji ltar rgyal po
dar ni rgyal bur gyur// de ltar dus ni lus rnams yosu btang// sngon gyi skyob rnams ni rjes dran ta/ shing rta na be zhes bya'i rgyalapa byung// de la bun gtong pa tshaldan la//
sams na tshan re zhes bya dmar yod// de la pu po dag ni gnyis yod do// ming ni sgratshan bdad lcachanang// dpung tshogs de dag nags tshal stug por ded// de dag stag mo
bkres pas gazla'i ba mthong// dal soms can mchog 'disnying rje skyes// stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gzir gsan// stag phrug de dag zapaMr 'gyur 'ong// de ltar
bdag lus dag ni gtang bar bya'o// shing rta bu sems can chos/ stag mo bkras mthong stag phrug rnams// thar bar bya phyir snying rdzayis// ri gzar na mtshos
dngu san radang bcas su g.yos// bya tshog sa rnamamang rnam par 'ab+ber// ri dgas tshogs skrag 'jig rtan 'di// mun bas 'thibs por gnas par gyur// de yi phu bo
sgrachen dang// de bzhin lha chen du gnyis kyis// nags mchog chen po der bltasun// sems can chen po mchudanas// shin tu mya ngan thugardu'i snying// dran med
nags kyi nangan rgyu// nu bo de ni yongs 'tshol zhing// gdong la mcherbag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha tshan ga/ rgyal bu gzhon nud dag gnyis// stag
ma nyam chung gur nyald// dur nate bar song ba dang// stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi/ stag gi mesmul khrag chags mthong// sku dang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa lo
rnam par 'thor ba mthong// dayi khrag gi thigs pa na// nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i bu nad gnyis kyis// khrag chags pa yis d mthong// rab
