du brgyal pos do la// 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus rnams lan rdul gyis ges// dran dbang nyams shing sams kyang myos// de dag ni 'khor
rnams kyang// snying rjen ngu zhing mya ngan na// da dug chus rab 'thor zhing// lag pa bsgong sta du 'di gnas// de ni 'gyalam thag tu yang// btsun
mo gces mchog skyod pa'i ma/ bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang// pho brang nang na bde 'dug pa// nusor gnyis ka'i rtsa mo nas// 'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dad
yan lag kun// khab kyis gtsags pa bzhin du tsha// snyangen rab dumya ngan gang// bu bral mya nganadrag mdas phog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyar song ste// mya ngan rab gdungasayod
mi dga'// snying rje'i sgra yis rab du zhang// rgyal po shing chung la sbas// mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus myonganamayas 'tshig/ bdag bganu sor rtsa gnyis
nas// 'a ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung// bdag lus khab kyis gtsags bzhin tsha/ bdag gi snyingayang gsal thug/ jaltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyin chad ma mthong 'di
'dra'i ltas// bdag gas bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rjes mdzod da bdag srog stsol// de ring bdag gi rmi lam no// the ba'i phrug gu gsum rludan// bdag
ga tho ba phug gu na/ sdug cang yade 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khramachis bdag gi ni// thi ba phrug gung khras 'tshal// bdag gi rmilam de 'dra ya/ myang n snying 'di'i

skad smras nas ngatsun mo mchog/ brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams// sems kyang stobacing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs
thams cad kyang// snying rje'i skad kyis rab tudu// btsunamo dam po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni// dam thag tu rgyal dbangad/ dbudang bral ba'i mya ngananon//
blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang// gzhon nu rnams btsal phyir dang// grong khyer kun gyi skya bo dag/ tha dad khyim n byung 'ang 'khod/ 'du zhing bdeng nas mchim zag/ 'am kar
snying stobasam de 'dri//gsonanama'on tangashu 'am ci// soms can chen po de gar song// bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong ra dga'// de'ang
misnyan thos gyur cing// yul 'dir myungan mibazad rlung/ sgram phyin cing sgyu mtha' yas// drag po'i sgra bcas ldan zhig gam// rgyal pa shing rta cholangs te// mya ngananonacing
du bzhin du// btsunamo dam pa sar 'grul la// bdag nyid chu rgyunayapo 'thor// ji srid dran rnyeng ldan gyur ra// de srid du ni chu yis gtor// bdag bu gum mam gson
gzhig ces/ zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal pa shing rta chen po yis// btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras// blon de dag dang 'khor rnams
kyang gzhon nu rnams 'tshol phyir dang// khyod na rab tu yid zhum zhing// rtag tu mya n gnas nying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yas/ btsun mo dam pa sbrebasrings te//

nga/ duzhing mtshim brag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams wubatsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi nA mchog nas byung// rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni/ rgyalang 'i rtse bzhin kun tu 'brang//

rnyed de las kyi ngang du ni// bdag cag rnams kyi chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhidag ni kun nas lnga bar ba mthong/ yud tsa 'greng sta slar yangs la 'gyel//
snying rje'i skad kyis sngags rab tu'adon// rtag par lag pa bsgrengs du gnas nas ni// nu bo de ya bsngags pa rab tu darjod/ de rgyal ba da ni reb du soms zhum zhing// ngu dang
pa dral ngas nas sames kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu gdung zhung sgrasngags 'don// rgyal po da ni 'di snyam yongs su sams// bdag bu sdug cing shud bong gcig pun// sem
can chen pa mi rtag nyid kyisazin// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po dadag kyang// mya nganam yis srog ni zad 'ong gis// 'di ltar bdag na myur du deng song 'a//mthong na dga'/
ba'i ngu dag ngalta nga ra byas// bzhen pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu gyur du bkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni skyid pa'i sa yi snying// mya ngan ma/
gas par 'gyur du 'ong/ dbu gnyis mthong nusu zhi ba 'thob 'gyur te// srog dang bral bar gyur pa ma yin no// rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen
zhen te bu rnams blta phyir song// bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis reb ngu zhing// nube'i mong 'dod lam nas 'ongs pa mthong// rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su// rab tu du
zhing khyim du song nas ni// deyas skyon par la gor myur du yang// btsun mo'an rang gi bu rnams bstan/ ]gshAkya thub pa de bzhin gshags pang// sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po

btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu mar gyur// sgrachen pon byams par gyur pa yin// rgyal bulta chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor
gyur pa skyo dag 'i bdag mo che// stag phrug rnams na dregaslong lnga par gyur// de nas rgyal po shing rtachen po dang btsun mas snying rdzabar smra sngagasa rnam pa mang po bton nas rgyan thams cad

gyi mchod rten 'di byas so// sems can chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongs su btang nas/ lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyisam 'ongs pa'i dus/
bskalu pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam skad btab ba// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lhudang mi rabs pa'i skyo

gdugs btsugs ga la ba dpasong sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa gsar dparan po cha'i 'byung gnas gdugs btsugs kyi zhabs lamago bos phyags 'tshal/
du phyogs gcig tu 'khepado// phyogs gcig ltar bed nas kyang byang+gachub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag dum de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshasas pa gsar dang

par gda'// gsar gyi ri dbang lta bu gsar gyi mdogo/ thub pa pad+madakar po gser mdog can/bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus brgyan// dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos/
sku lus smras// gsA gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// seng ge 'i sgra dang 'brug
sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag drug cu bsgrags sgra drimad sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la bing ka'i sgra// shen du dra mid dri bral gabri 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod
nams brgyayi mtshan gyis brgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri mdu dri brol mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ra rab 'dra// sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtsa mchog
'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa sta// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde lu 'dzud pa lags// 'chi ba mad pa'i bde ba stsal ba lta
rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos norang puston// 'ching med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa hUM/ 'dab kun gyi 'byung gnas bad ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar par mdzod//
sdug bsngal rgya mtsho' sani skyo dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i lam 'ab skye dgu rab tu'adzud// skye dgu rnams la bad ba kun stsol// khyed la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te//
ji skad dran pa'i yin tan yo shasamatsho// srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rjod ng// byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang// khyed kyi yon tan ya shas rgya mtsholas//
bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang// yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab ng stan par// lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsholas yon tan thigs blangs te//

dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan// khyed ni rab tu ma ma dzad phan pa mdzad// bda mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung// yon tan thab mo sna

bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdes 'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po// lag bzhi pa la stobs po che// de yi drung na 'khod

dang/ gang pa bzang po dang/ 'phrog ma dang/ tam dang/ zla ba dang/ gaja' dang/ skar ma dang/ ra dang/ nags tshal dang/ sman dang/ shing ljon
pa dang/ klung dang/ lteng ka dang/ mtsho'u dang/ rdzing bu dang/ rdzong dang/ mchod can gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing de bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'iganod
pa 'jigs pa'i gnas nas ji ltar thar par 'gyur snyam du sems shing 'khod pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi las 'phags pa'i lca'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas lha
dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtan dad par gyur ta/ 'dus par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul man par 'du mdzad bsa mngon par 'du mdzad de//
de nas 'bad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/
rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyud dang/ gnod sbyin chen po stobs po cha sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'phrog ma bu dang bcas
'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nub mo 'das pa dang/ dag pa lta bu'i bya rgod phung po'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas to/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalato/ phyogs gcig tu bakhed do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/chig
gcig/ dbyangs gcig/ ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ shin tu 'bar ba'i gsar dang 'dra/// rlabalta ba'i bod dang mtshungs//
dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin brtan// rin chen rnams kyi 'byung gnas lags// seng ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros// glangachen myos pa bzhin du gnon// gsar gyi ri bo dang
yang tshus/ 'dzam bu gling gi gsar rgyan 'dra// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// nam mkha'i zla ba dri med bzhin// nyan thos dge 'dun rnams kyidabus// mtshan/
rnams kyis ni brgyan par gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// thub pa la ni skyabs su mchi// mi rnams lan phan 'i phyir// srung ba dus su nye bar gnas// sangs
rgyas snga mas bshad pa yi// stong chen rab 'jomasumado sde 'di// khor khor yug ri mtha'ibar// mtshams gcod payi dam pa lags//phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag
'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// chos kyi rgyal pa thub chen la// thalamo sbyar taphyag 'tshal lo// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig cung mi gsung bar dgongs nas/ rgyal
po chen po bzhi de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag gang khyed kyi 'bor nga'i 'khor la'atshobar sems pa de nitshulam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i 'jig rtan 'dir sangs
rgyas byung ba dang/ chos legs par gsungs pa dang/ dge 'dun legs par grub pa de la sa bon 'di btab na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas
rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ nyanathos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyodanas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las
lca'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skyabar 'gyur/ rgyal ngo chen po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa dang/ gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i lapar
'gyur/ rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyalur sud byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la'ang bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa// yan lagam chog gi gzugs
dang ldan pa// tshad po che'i stobasakyi shugs bdog pa// pha rol gyi sde rab du 'dzegs pa/ rin po chen sna bdun dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'jig rten
'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur bas khyod cag snying las chung ngur gnas pas gnas par gyisashig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrug
zla ba gcig tu gzar nas/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ bsil long dang/ bu
dang/ sgo khang dang/ rtababs dang/ skar khung dang/ dar gyi lda ldabazang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang/ dril bu dang/ rnga yab dang/ mu tigagi dra
00 bas yongs su bskor ba dang/ pog poranas bdug pas bdug pa dug dang/ mi tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang/ gnas khang dang/ khangapa chen po dag mchis to/ der bdag
cag bud mad brgya phrag stong gas yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tshang bar spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rad du'on
mongs pa bag ma mchis par gnas pas gnas ngan/ 'khor zas dang skom 'tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byor zhing sus pa dang/ bud med dang/ khyabudang/ bu mo dang/
btsas ma thag pa dgadang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chagasa rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'tsho bar bgyid/ bgags bgyid/ 'gum par bgyid/
gsod par bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyid de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du rang rang gi 'khor gyi tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan
par bgyi'o// gang gi 'khor gyi gdon byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugasamachod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te/ nad pas rgyul pa chen po ra'i ming nas dbyupazhing drasna
tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdugs par bgyi'o// dog salam tog sil ma bkram sto/ zhugs ma ra bus la mchod rtan de la mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
[7 ]@#// ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa 'i tshulagyi mtshan mani 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir ched cing 'jigs par 'gyur// sma
bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni gnyid kyang ldog par 'gyur// yang na shin tu bar 'gyur// rtag tu gyen du lta bar 'gyur// skar ma dag lasAgs par bgyid//
nub moshin tu dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu'adurazhing sgra 'byin to// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis//'jig rten mugen po bdag la gson// da la tha don/ sid+haM/
su sid+d+haM/ sat+taM/ a ri a ra Ni/ ba la/ man+to ba la/ dza/ dza Ti le/ a khan/ mkhani/ kha kha na/ kha rad de/ kha rang+ge/ pir ping+ga le/ tamang+gal/
[j]mang+ga lin maM ga la swahA/ bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mingadang/ stobs dang/ dbang phyug dang/ byin gyis
sems can thams cad kyang bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gab+baraM nas pus mo g.yas
pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'dasanyid la phyag 'tshal zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsal te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan mni 'di lta bu lags te/ grulenacing ni bro rdung sta// rgyan rnams la yang
dga' bar bgyid// brkum pa ma mchis mad par sna/ rgod pa rab gyid cing khro bar 'gyur// skom par 'gyur la mig dmar te// rtagatu ramis kyis 'debs par 'gyur//
mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyidad// rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi ga mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po dag la gson// myudayathe dan/
akho/ na le/ rin/ ban/ ba rA NaM tsapale/ ba kha/ bakha na/ bakha na/ akin/ nakhinaM/ ba hale/ b+ha go/ b+ha gan+tale/ ba/
bsha brtenaswAhA/ rgyal po chen po yula 'khor srung gi ming dang/ stobs dang/ dbang phyug dang/ byin gyis sems can thams cad gdon thams cad dang gnod pa thams
cad las thar par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal po tsan po 'phags skyes postan las lasaMtaM/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sar
btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing/ bam ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to//
0/ @#// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor yi dgas grul bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ shin tu skam pas 'dangs par
'gyur// g.yang bas btab cang lta bar 'gyur// bzhan yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// bskams nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur// kha dog ngan cir lus kyang skam//
skra dang san tho rang bsta// drim can la dri mi bda'// brdzun dang basprul pa smra bar bgyid// de la sngagasakyi tshigamachis kyis// 'jigartan magon po bdag la ba/son///
spyod ya tho dan/ kha kha kha ma/ kha lan/ bu ra le/ kha lam/ kha la ma/ khar li'i/ ka ra khe/ kha Tin/ kha ra 'a/ ka ra khaM/ kashane/ ka/
ra// kAle/ kAmini/ bi dz+ha li/ ba d+hiya/ ba d+hiya/ sangashan/ sha mang te/ sha mi/ sham ni swAhA/ rgyalang chen po 'phags skyes pa ri mi dang/
stobasadang dbang phyug dad/ byin gyis sems can thams cad kyi gdon dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ nya par 'tshob thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swAhA/ du nas
rgyal po chen po mig mi bgrang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugathar nas/ phus mo g.yas pa'i nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gA
su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu dang 'dab brlangs kyi
gden gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ skyigs bus 'debs shing dbugs kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur// sprul zhing dbu bakha tshu 'byung/
phyi phyir gnyid kyang leg par 'gyur// kha dog ldan zhing dparab ste// de bzhin 'darazhing rgyug par 'gyur/ gsanamo dag kyang ston ra ra bgyid// dog sar mchis shing dubar bgyidi//
dolasngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// spyod yathe don/ kra gam/ kram Ni/ kra gshe/ kra krashe/ kra kra shas/kru thu me/ kru
ma kru ka ka/ krug khamo/krug a gu le/ na ga le/ sa ma ga le/ ka dum/ rum/ a lage/ ka la makaM/ e re mir/ d+hi ro da a ru ga nga ti swAhA/
rgyal po chen pa mig mi badrang gaming dang/ stobs dang/ dbang phyug dang/ byin gyis bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ de nas ngacom ldan 'das
kyis dbu tsho 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du sang ga'i sgra bsgrags pa/ nga ni stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi'ajigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs shing 'dzags ra med pa sta/ 'khor gyi nang du sang
ge'i sgra khyu mchog lhung rgyachen yang dag par basgrags so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro// sde dang mthu dang bzhonabacas pa'i// bdud kyang gcig gis ba
tubatul// sems can thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rig sngags thams cad nga la nyen// myud ya the ngan/ a sangag/ laThab te/ ba la ba te/ ba la niny+tsal/ shur shu rad+ha
ra/ badzig ma/ badzra d+har/ stam+b+ha dzam+b+he/ drir Da sAr/ bi ra dze/ bag+has/ ba ru grapraste/ a ra Na/ d+harmayut+taM/ dashing g+hAsAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mtshan dang/ stobs dang/ dbang phyug dang byin gyis bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs gyur cig// phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas kyi
zani pagasungathag nas/ 'jigs dang skrag dang dngangs gyur te// thal mo sbyar nasasrakhod par gyur// 'byung po'i tshog sani lhags pa rnams// dngangs bzugs med red por gyur nas//
zhu phyogs bcur rab tu 'byar byed cing/ sgra be cha yang sgrogs par byed/ rgyal po chen pos de shes nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smras// kyem rig sngags rig sngags cha//
stong chen rab tu 'joms byed po// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de// thos nas 'byung po skrag gyur to// dper na rab tu 'bar ma dang/ ti mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin//
go'u ta mas ni ba bshad pa'i// rigs sngags gri'i so dang 'dra// drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa// de la gang zhigamadadan// de yi bu'i thu bon// tshangs pa'i zhags pas
med par 'gyur// ma ni rab tu 'bar byas la// blo dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang// sbyin srag gi ni chus gtor to// nus dang nyungs kar blangs nas su// mar gyi snying po dang sbyar
nas/ma nang du blugs par bya// legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas// gal du myur du mi gtong na// thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni// mar dang nyungs karayer blugs
bzhin// gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba ni rnyed de// de yi rtsib legs g.yas par ni// 'bras chagand kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin nad kyis
btab pan// sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// gzhar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa// khyim yang mthong bar mi
'gyur te// 'byung po mang po tshogs pa na/ stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du// zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur// stong chen rab 'joms mdo
snga la/ gnod sbyin gang ngag ma phyogs pa/ dpal rdo rje 'chang khros te// spyi bo dag ningagams par 'gyur// sku gi'i so ni rtsub mo yis// nga yi lce ni gcong ra ra 'gyur//
mtshon cha shin tu rnon pa yis// de yi sna dang rna pa gcod// 'khor lo spu gri'i so 'dra bas// klad pa robatugashag par byed// thob lcags kyis dkris pa
yis de yi snying yang 'joms par byed// rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag/ daya kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur// rig sngags zhugs pa'i chad pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na//
'khor bar gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du// de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba tshan nga dpal ldan pa// phyogs bdag tu song gyur nas// chos kyi go chab gos gyur to// bzang
po'i khri la 'dug pa ni// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung/ lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes pa// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang// byang phyogs na ni lus ngan ra/dma' dang
zla gadri brjid 'bar ba yin// rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang/ dngatshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen/ bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags// tshangs pas sbrul ra 'igazhalamang khang// der ni
dorA'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan gsur gyi ri bo 'dra// gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs//
ma tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas// sA la'irgyal ra bzhin du rgyas// nyi ma dang 'dra bla nyal// skar ma rnams kyisayongs bskor bzhin// thub sku gsar gyi kha dog la// mtshan rnams
kyis ni yongs su brgyan// 'jigs mes po tshangs pa yis// 'jigartan smon ma bstod byas te// 'jigartan magon po'i spyan sngarani// 'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras//
'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis// rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste// gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang// rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing// 'di lasanyan thos rnams kyang skyid/
lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur// rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin/ 'bram dre rnams kyang skyobar 'gyur// drang srong skal pa chen po dang// dag slong bram ze 'di las skya/khyed cag
snying las chung byed pa// mayo skye dgu gnod par 'gyur// tshangs par ya ni tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong gis tshig smras pa// tshangs pa chen po de bzhin no// thub pa chen po ji bzhin no/
bdag gis rirab bsgul byas shing// sa ya nga rab tu bzlog byas la// rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams// rnam par sbyong ba nyid du bya/ zhags pa dam pa ma nyams ra sa// nyi ma zla
ba rlung rnams nga//skar ma dag ni thamasacad kyang// bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya// gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing/ 'dzag chen la ni phan ma byed// de dag la ni thams cad du//
phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de// 'byung po rnams kyis phyir skyod de// 'byung pa ma yi skya dag la// gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed// gang dag
[ns ]@#// sngags dang sman rnams dang// rig sngagasalasan 'da' byed pa// de la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol gnod pa ston par byed// rig sngags lasani 'da'/
ba'i 'khor// kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar na//yang dag par yang brjod par bgyi//gang gis 'byung po'i dkyila 'khor du// 'du bshad
pa na mnyanar// da dag chud pa bshad par bya// tshangs pas sbrul pa'i mdo sde 'o// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'al te/ phan tshun du ni bltas byas na// baT+Than dang gsar dang
dngul// mu tig rnam sa dang shel dag dang// sdug dang rdzong snying po dang// rinachan bdun gyis brgyan pa yis// rtsibs stong kha drog gsar 'dra ba'i// shing rta rnam pa bzhi
byas ra// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// rgyal pa dganadir bzhugs nas// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dang/ sa ni gsar gyi phyi
ma dang// matog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul par ltung dang skud pa dang// zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la// phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pa 'i// 'byung
pa thams cad khrid shog gcas// gnod sbyin gyin sde dpon kun// phyogosabazhidag tu dgya bar byas// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// mdosdaya'i dam pa 'di// tshangasaM pa'i
[rs/ ]'jig rtan bar du byung// lha rnams kun gyis rnam par ngasams// stong chen po yi lus kyis su// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul// lus ngan pa ya tshig thos nas// gnod
sbyin gyin sde dpon dag/ phyogs bzhi dag tusong nas su// gsang ba po la drag tu sgo// thub ba 'byung po nyi shu brgyud// dring las byung gden gyi rnams// shar phyogs ra na khrakhang pa
dag/ mde snga'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po ngo lanyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyud/ grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs//
lho phyogs ma 'dir 'khodapa dag/ mdo sde'i zhugs pas de dag da kun// bcing ba lngayas bsdams pa ya// 'byung po mang po ngal nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyud// klu las
gdon du gyur pa rnams// nub phyogs 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo snga'i zhags pa su de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga lo nyon// thub pa
byung pa nyi shu brgyud/ gnod sbyin las ni gdon gyur pa// byang phyogs ma 'dur 'khod pa dag/ mdo snga'i zhags pas de dag kun//bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung
pa mang po palanyon// lus ngan pa yo bu thu bo// kun tu rgyal ba ma la zhon// nga yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas//
@#// mdzes pa// nga pa'i rgyal pas bar snang ji bzhin no// khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshams gnas zla ba 'dra// g.yas su 'khyil cing 'ang tshuda'adra ba lags// po
rtam 'dra sku 'od dkar rnams kyis// nam mkha'i dkyilan nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod
pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyishu pa'o////de nas rigs kyi lhag byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'ad dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
bstod pa// rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blomanga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdaganying blomapa' zhing// srid dang srid minamkhyen pa rnam dag blo mngarigs pa// sangs
rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// kyama'o kyi ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yasate// kye ma'o kyi ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra/ dkyama'okyi ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul
mtha' yas te// u dum ba ra'am tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// sems can dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad du// gang gis mdo sdadam pa 'di'ang rang gsungs pa// mdabang
nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po rigs kyi tog/ kye ma'o kyi ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rjeldan// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang pon// zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu
ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang// rgya mtshodang mtsho rnams dang// klung dang 'bab chu lumadang// dba' klong dag nag 'khod dang// skyang mos tshal dang gzhalamang khang// kun dga'i dang ni
nags rnams dang// mchod rten gnas dang grong ga gnas// ljon shing drungan gang gnas dang// grong khyer sgodang grong dang ni// grong rdal dang ni ljongasa rnams dang// rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams
dang/ 'gazhalamang khang na gang gnas dang// dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang// de bzhin lha khang rnams dang na/ mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang// khang stong dang ni grags dang
gnod sbyin gang rnams bla beg dang// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni// rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams// rdza dzad g ni brdungs nas su// la
las rngablumadag na brdungs/ pawang gling bu 'khor ba'i rnga// stobs chen rnams ni sgra byin to// lamo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang// glu dang gar rnams byas nasasu// dbang po ba lha dang//
lhar dra dza skye dgu'i bdag/ maldan pa dang kun tu lta// mngon shos gangs rdzogs pa dang/ tsan dan dang na 'dod mchog dang/ dmagul la mdzes dang mgulangasadang/ dpyadagu'i tha mar gyur/

mdog 'dra ba// dung dang jachen rdza rnga dang// grul bum rnga bran rnams kyis// 'jigs pa'i sgrani rab tu 'byin// mid po che labong bu'i sgra// nag pa sar bo sngon po dang// dmar sar ma ltar

gso mdzad pa// gnod sbyin srin po gang ga rnams// phyogs dang phyogasa mtshams gnas pa dang/ sa yi 'og dang bar dang stong/ nam mkha'adag la gnas pa'i gdon// 'jig rten mgonagyi

ra Ni du ra Ni/ shAr pU ra gra/ pusti sA ra ba te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad phyogs dang phyogasa mtshams thams cad du dag bar gyur cig swA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang// 'jig
rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang// 'brog ma bu dang bcas pa yang// bdag gi ma tog sngos dag dang// sbyin srog 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi nibartson
'grus dang// gatra brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang// nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang/ nye bar 'tsho ba dang/ gnodapa/
thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyed la phyag 'tshal le/
rlung las skyes dngamakhris skyos nad// bad kan skyos dang 'dus las skyes// nang rnams thams cad ngs par bcom// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang 'jigs pa dang/ nye bar 'tshob
dang/ gnodapathams cad las rgyalabar gyur cig swAhA///stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bam po gnyis pa stotha ma//
bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyalasrid gcig g phyir 'jig rten du byung bamayin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
ni grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ greng dang/ khyim nas/ sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas
pa= bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dag sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin du bcas pa'i don dusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
'jig rten du byung ste/ da ni dpar na sman pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ gso ba la brtson pa// sman pas shes par bya ba shin tu bsrungs pa rgyal po gcig gi ngon du byung bam yin/ yul
T+Thi gcig gi ngon du byung ba ma yin pa nas/ sems can gcig gi don gyi bar du byung ngam yin pa dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyire zhen/ phyogs gang nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i
phyogs de dag tumo rnams dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag kyang rnam par 'tshabar ma bya bar sams kyis/ deng yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer
ya chen po'i skya bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don yad byas par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang byas par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs te/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshetshes
[s/ ]gog dang sham thabs mnabs nas lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri sa shod du gshags pa dang/ nga nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas re nas phul la// phul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul la// bul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdul yab kyis g.yobahung 'dug par gyur/
to rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs taM/ bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rdulayab kyi g.yobacing 'dug/
par gyur to// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen de dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sngadapon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyadadad/ gnod sbyin mthu bo chesum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'phrogam bu ljabargya'i 'khor dang bcas
pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dag byungs tra/ nyan thos rnams la phul nus rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de lta bu'i grogs pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ brnyes par bya ba
brnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dag slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shed du babs to/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ba/lab der gshogs pa dang/ yangs
pacan gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul
ba dang zhi gnas kyi dam pa'i parol tu phyin pa bar s pa// dbang po dben zhing lugs pa/ glang po maltar shin tu dulapa/ mtsholtar dngas shing rtog pa med la rnam par gsal ba/ skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu brgyan pa/ shing sAla'i rgyal pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par spras pa/ hum

ltar 'od zer gyi dra nga kun tu 'byed pa// mtshan mo mun pa'i nangan ri bo'i re blo lama'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'drazhing/ bcom ldan 'das gsar gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lhamamo/ltar red
lhang nger rgyungaring po nas gnas der gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas/ sems dad par gyur pa de dag barma
ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por lamagang nas gshegs pa'i lam de 'phyug cing chag chag 'dabs/ byi dor byed/ me tog 'thor/ dar gyi lda lding dang/ dril bu dang/ gdugs
dang Da rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan snatshogs kyis brgyan te/ bdug spos snatshog sakyis bdugasanas/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab der dong ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
0 gnyis lamago bos phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can/ me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/ sngon legs par spyad
pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gzhon shachags shipa'i dzam pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa// 'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phrob/ dri ma med pa'i phyag gis lo
tsaphyi de dag gi mgol byugs te bslang nasarjes su bstan pa mdzad do// nga ni khyung rnams nyid la rjes su brtsangs 'bar bsrang nas/ banamed pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs bar byang chub
pa'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ ma 'jigs shig/ mu'ajigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong
khyer chen po'aning ngugashagasanas/ nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyas kyi gzhi zhebs kyisamanananus phyogs bzhir gathigasate/ phyag gsar gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza'i bla shes
bsigs te bka' stsal pa// phyi ma'i dusan dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dgabastanam 'am/ gang su'ang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam lamachod pa byed pa de dag dang/ stongachan pa rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa'i chos kyi rnamagrangs de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi byamasAd rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing ston/
parang/ kun chub par byed pa de dag la yams kyind dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ 'chob dang/ nad 'go bdang/ 'khrug pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'ching ba dang/ kha//
mtshu dang/ gshags dang/ than phram dang/ sdig pa mi dag ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing/ 'tsho bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// ngaskang chos
bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang
sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga'i klung gi byamasnyad rnams kyi sangs
rgyus kyi phyag rgya de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshas pa de'i phyir khyed kyisashin tu
legs par rab tu nyon la yid lazung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ mimajed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang da
[po/ ]de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// sung ya the dan/ a tsa le/ matsale/ sA ram tsale/ prakri ti/ brta/ pra kri ti/ ni rgyu kaM/ saman+tamu le/ sbir
sbyabar/ bgrub+hashad+de/ pragalan/ pA dra ma/ sAr ba Ni/ sArang+gapato/ ba lemahA ba le 1 mahAnits+tsha swAhA/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus su gtogs pa dran pa dang/
zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong dang/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi
dad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ rjes su dran pa drug dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdunang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ rnam par grol ba'i skyamachod bcu gcig dang/ rten cing 'brelapar 'byung ba yan
lag bcuganyis dang/ rnam pa bcu gnyis dpaldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa rnam pa bcu drug dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa bco brgyad dang/
yi ga bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/ tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyirgyalamogaden thams cad las thar byed pa'i mdo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi byim snyada rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyalta/ sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i// chos sgrub pa'o// dge 'dun sgrub pa'o// tshangs ba sgrub pa'o//

'a nga'ang po sgrub pa'o// 'jigartan skyong ba sgrub pa'o// dbang phyug sgrub pa'o// bden pa sgrub pa'o// lamasgrub pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa sgrub pa'o// klubasgrubapa 'o/ timosgrub pa'o// gatra'asgrubapa'o//
rgyu skar sgrub pa'o// spyod la the dan/ sA lekasin/bid+ha ra Ni/ba rwa grasAr/ Aman Na/ amo gru ba ti/ sa bzhe kA li/ na kA li/ kAshi bar/ b+har Ne/ ka raka/ shakhe/ saman+taM puste/ sAr pAts+tshi/

stam+b+ha put+taM/ badza?d+ha re swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jig rtan 'di 'am gang dag 'das pa dang// mtho ris dag na rim na mchog yod pa/ da
[%]1 bzhin gshags pa lhayi lhar gyur pa// mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med// de bas 'di ni nye cha mchog tu gsungs// bden pade yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi
'dus ma byas// shes bsashAkya thub dbas rab tu phye// bdud rtsi zhi bsa'adus byas ma yin pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med// de bsa'adi ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yi sa

'dir ni dgabar shog/ mchog tu gang 'deng tshul bzhin rang bstan pa// ston pa'i rnala'abyor blamang rtag sgrub pa// de lta bu'i mi gnyis lam mthong ba// ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa de nga ma yin// de bas

'di nirinisha mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dgabar shog/ gang brag chen po brgyad pe rab bsngags shing// gang zag thungabazhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen po gang zagam tshugam da nga
bde ngar gshegs pasasbyin ba'i gnas zhes gasungs// delabyin n 'bras bu cher 'gyur to// zhing rab gshin las bon btab pa bzhin// 'dini dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ dngangan nga nges
'dir na dag bar shog/ gang dag baNan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing// ga'u ta ma'i bstan la rab 'jug pa// da ngag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jugathebasko// mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thong pa/ de
gsum pa dang// cig car sngangs 'phags pa'i bden mthengang/ dadas nu dge 'dun rin chen mchog rtagasungs// bden pade yis 'dir ni deg bar shog/ lus samangagagamenang dkyis kyang//
pa/ mang 4 da du ra'// na 'gand 'ga'azhadag par shog/ lta ba 'di la sbyor mthogatun// 'jig tshogs ltad tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang/ thacom dang ma 'ongs
sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing// globur byas zha'apa'i ba par mi byed la// da ltar de dag lta bsarAdzin mi byed// dbasadge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ bdonapa dayis 'di'i ni dag bar

shog/ ji lta ngamang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa// phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyisani mi g.yo ltar// 'phags pa'i lamagyi dam ba mthong ngs de/ gangajaga' bas nga 'ingag 'dunade bzhinano/ darjes nadage 'dun
'di nya mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab khrab mas shin tu bstan pa yi// 'phags pa'ibaden pa sud rnam sgom zhing// lus kyang sbyin par
yid la byas ba ni// de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur// de bas dge 'dun gnaman mchogatugasungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ jiltar mani rlung gis rab gator bya// lag
smyo tu blangs te bgramadumadabanyid// da ltar kun du sbyor ba zab btang ba// sas rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bangan pa de yis 'dir ni ngag bar
shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ ston mchog lha dngamis ni mchod 'osapa// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dag bar shog/ sams
can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'grong// de dag thams cad bder ni bder gyur cig/ zhing chags bralalcags mchod 'os pa// chos la phyag 'tshal dang 'dir dag bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi
'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig/ tshogs kyi dam ba ltams mchoda'osapa// dag dngunaphyag batshal deng 'dir dag bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'a thob// de dgathams cad
'dir ni bder gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni phyugs gyur te// sa 'amabon dbar snang 'khod dag/ skye dgu rnams la rtag du byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan ng chos kyang spyod par shog/ 'di
na na rgyal bo dag rgyal bden gang gis// shin tu ngadanapa gsung zhing banamadapa// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dgu bar shog/ de kun 'jigs pa ma lus thar gyur cig swAhA/ byug pe pa rdzu nged+hi 132
rgyu Sha/ bal sAr/ sAr bto/ sU ti/ pra b+hUta/ puSh+Tha/ Aratshu/ Ar b+ho/ sArab te/ a ts+tsha te/ b.lad+ha re/ shud puSh+Tha/ sArang+gam/ su'umyab ma su 'ur ni tsha ngas pa dkyil
po rab tu 'jomasab zhes bya ba'i 'go sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las rab tu thar par byed pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshagatang dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is ngas rgyas ba/du'i kang gib
ma snyad kyisangs rgyas kyi phyagargya'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas so// chos kyi gnas aso// dge 'dun gyi gnas so// tshangs pa'i gnas so// dbang pa gnas so// 'jig[E]na skyong
gnas so// dbang phyug gi gnas so// drang srong chen po'i gnas aso// 'byung ba'i gnasaso// mig gi gnas so// rgyu'i gnasaso// phyogs kyi gnas so// bstan pa'i gnas nyid// sa la
rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis reg pa'o// tshangs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dbang pos radatu bsngags pa ga
rten skyong ba rnams kyis mchod pa'o// dbang phyug gisaphyag byas pa'o// lcathamasacad kyis kun tu machod pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o mkhas pa rnams ma
dga' bar gyur pa'o// drang srong rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'o// tshangs bu rnams kyis radatu brgyan pa'o// lha rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'o// khrus byed pa rnams
kyis bsangs pa'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jigartan gyis dga' bar byas pa'o// sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi spyod yul lo// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo// drang srong rnams kyi gnas
so nyan thos rnams kyi myang n las 'das pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// nyon mongs pa rnams 'dzoms pa'o// thag la

Ta'i ]la gyi sdug 'bar bas// 'phags pa'i mdun bar pa'i 'bab tshigasagasalalus 'jig pa 'ong pa'i// glu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skams pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can thams cad sgrol ba'o// bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o// bdung kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o// bdud kyi mchil pa 'dor pago/ nyon
nga da la// nags na ma utustan pa'// thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o// badzagosatshogs la ltadi rnams 'jig par byed pa'o// nga rgyal gyi ri ribate skul bar byed pa'i/

mongs pa'i g.yul las sgrol ba'o// mya ngan las 'dasaM pa'i grong khyer du'ajug par byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o// spyod ya the dan/ kharje/ khan g+hoSha/ u shed+ha na/sA ra shrI/ prab+ha
de pi pulaprab+ho/ sang karaNi/ bkamA Ni/ bishA gra ba ti/ sham+b+hA sAd+ha Na/ ba ru Na ba to/ bA sa bo/ bi bu'ulaMNi/ bi'ang gam/ bshu pa ti/ purlagaN+NaM/ sA lcasu hA/ bdag dngasems
can thams cad 'jigs pa dang/ nye bar 'tshob dang/ ngal ba thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal gden thams cad las

bar byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'das ni lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma7 ngu'aTan

pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer slanamed par zhugs so// de'i don gyi phyi'i sngona mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus nga'i ya ngangag par rdzogs pa'i sangs dang/
rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ pha ma dang/ phyin kazhad dang / a u0f9f bu rnams/
la bstanu bkur to// tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// tshul khrims bsrungs so// sbyin pa byin no// snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskangs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod nga pa bas so
byang chub thob par bsgrubs so// thams cad mkhyen pa thobab// bdud pham par byas so// de nas mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang ngang byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po
dag gis skang gcig dang/ blo gros gcig dang/ dbyangs gcig gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/kyima'o rig sngagasarig sngagasatsho// stong chen rang tu 'dzemag budang sa nga
[cz ]@#/// rgyas phyag rgyu de yis// phyogs bzhi'i sems can thams cad srung// phyag rgya gang gis btab gyur na// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa// stong chen rab tu
'joms pa 'amado// phyag rgyabadag cag stsal bar bgyi// mi gang rab tu sdang ba dang// bstan pa 'di lam dad pa// de dag tshangs pasasbrul pa ya// rig sngags chad pas gcad par dgyi/
brgya byin gyis ni spyi bos blangs// 'jig rgyun skyong bas rgyas btab bo// spyod ya the dan/ kaling+gA/ b+hur de/ tshwa dgra/ dzAya/ sI haMmadre/ sArA gra pra/ saMs gamin/ nA lin/
yul mi tu li pa hu li/ pi shuli/ pi shulam/ haham hanyamahahamahaham su'ud ni/ pa rAgra ba ti/ smin/ rnatsar ma ti/ tsaN+Dali/ tsar ma/tsaro tsa'i sAhA// stong chen mo
rab tu 'dzems pa zhes bya pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bshad pa tshe/ stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig na gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tugayos rang tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab
tu g.yos/ phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin po'abyung pa shal brab rnams kyis sgra skad drag po byung ba/ kye ma'o sdug bsngal/ kyamakho bdag/ bdag cag 'byung pa'i tshog sani pung ngo/
bdag cag 'byung bo'i tshogs ni rab tu phung ngo// 'byung po'i tshog san rang du phung// bdag cag rtag tu dbang gis khrid// srog chags 'byung po thams cad ni// nga rang dgar bcas dbang yod de/ dad
a ngags la 'bod nas// nyam zhing rnam par zhum gyur nas// 'grozhing ldog par rab tu byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi ji rdzir mngon bar sprul pa dang/ de dag kyang phyogs bzhir khyera'o/
de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir malci'i phung po chen pa bzhi mngon par sprul pa dang/ de ngag nam mkha'a' kun tu rgyug ga/ denusam mdzod kyi bdag patshangs pas nam mkha' lag5su
mngon par sprul pa dang/ de dag shing ta la bdunatsam nas nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug gi/ nga nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ral gri dang/ mda' dang/ mdung drung dang/mdung dang
ma kha bo chudang/ shing ljon pa dang/ ri'i cher mngon par phab bo// dgatshog nod sbyin lnga stong mi mjed kyi 'jigarten gyi khams su kun nas 'dus pa rnams rig sngags kyi dmod pas ngatsam lta
rims nad kyis btab nas myos parmazhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis l gtugs te gsol pa// dag sbyong go'u duman sems can thams cad la phan pa darathugasang rje ba can lags
kyis dag sbyong go'u tumasang dag cag bskyab tu gsol/ n gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa de dag la byams pas khyab par mdzad nas bslabang 'dzin du btsud de// bdag cab/
phyagargya srong gyur na// ma gsod payi'agro gang dang// pha gsod pa yi 'gro gang dang// dgra bcom pa yang gsod gangadang// dge 'dun dbyen bgyid 'gro gang du nga/rdzog nad sangs
rgyas la sdang sems kyis// sku mtshur phyung ba ngagyis pa yis// 'gro ba gang lags der mchi'o// aN+Da ka yi dog pa ltar// mgonatshal pa bdun 'gas shing//
gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa dang// bdag lus sha bkra 'byung bar shogo/ gang 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa'i mdo// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// rig sngagasargyal las 'gal bgyis na/
bdag cag 'dod ngazhin ma'agyur ro// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can n yams kyi nad dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nang 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur
doN rngaganang sbyin dang/ srin po dang mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rang rang gi spyod yulalas 'das so// yangs pa can gyi li/ phyi rnams kyang nad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol te/
bde ba thams cad yang dag pa ra 'phel nas/ sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur/ chos la mi phyad pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur/ dge 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan par
gyur nas/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la mngon par dga' ba'i dga' ston chen pos gnasaMso// ngang pa dang/ ne tse dang/ ri skegs dang/ khu byug dang/ rma bya dang/ dur pa

dang 4 ku NA ladang/ shang shang te'u dang/ bya'i tshog sa rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin no// mi 'am ci rnams ni lha'i bu mo bzhin du lus la gnod ba med do// rin po che'iche byad rnams kyang mdakrol

bar 'khrolal// nga po tshe dang/ dung dang/ grwa ja dang/ rda dron dang/ pi wang dang/ gling bu rnams kyang ji ltar gnas su bkong babazhin du sgra byung ngo// bal po sa'udang/ bil pa dang/ skya ru ra dang
n+ya gro d+ha dang/ byang chub kyi shing dang/ spre'u gnas dang/ blug sha dang/ u dum ba ra ba dang/ salatadang/ tam la'i dang/ til ka dang do tsam pa ka'i shing ljon pa rnams kyang dra reb tu 'byin
don lha brgya stong dgagasakyang a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung// bar snang las me tog gi char mngon par phab bo// mi ma yin pa'i dri dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ngo// de nas rgyalapachen po
bzhis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis bslab pa'i gzhi yongs bcu bzung sta gas ngur smig bgos nas/ stong
chen po rab tu 'joms pa'imade snga'irgyal po gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa sangs rgyus kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs shing bsrung ste/ bklags shing shongal/ kun chub par
bgyis shing yi gar bros nas mdud pa bor te 'changan/ de la yams kyi nad dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go pa dang/ 'khrub pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ 'thab mo dang/
ba cing nga dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'byed panas/ phama'i bar gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'is rnams kyisam tshugs par 'gyur lags so// rnam par 'tshong thams cad las rgyalabarda'agyur
galags so// yul 'khor mtshams gcad par 'tshal ba/ khrus bgyis pa/ bras dkar gsum 'tshalab/ bras ngan pa rnam lnga spangs pa/ mi'i bslab pa'i
gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa// shin tu brgyan pa/ gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa des grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul
'khor dang/ sum mdo dang/ khyim rnams nyal nyil gyi phung po ma mchis par bgyis te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi dbus kyi ngeg sa rnams su matog sil mabakram la/ spos sna tshogs
kyis rab tu bdugs par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhir bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ brgyan pa lag na mtshon thogs pa bzhi dang/ phyi bu bzhi dang/ rin po che'i snod dra'i chudang/ ma tog dang/
'bras bus yongs su gang ba bzhi gzhag par bgyi// snga dro'i dus kyi tshe gdugs shar ba dang rig sngags bklag par bgyi sta/ mde sdo brlas shing bklag par bgyi'o/ yi gar bris
mchod rten chen po dang/ shing ljon pa chen po dang/ rgyal mtshan che/pa rtse mo la bstod de btags la/ ma tog sna tshogs dang/ spos sna tshogs dag gis dgung zla phyed kyi bar du mchod
par bgyi'o// gdugs re re zhing rig sngags lan re re bklag par bgyi'o// de ltar na yul 'khor yongs su thar rar 'gyur lags so// de ltar grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal ngad[!]
ljongs dang/ yula 'khor dang/ phobrang ba'or dang/ gnasadang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ lta'i khyim dang/ zhing dang/ las khang dang/ shing ljon pa dang/ 'bras bu dang/ne'u
ga ing dang 8 kun dga' ra ba dang/ gnag lhas dang/ phyugs lhas rnams nyal nyil ma mchis par bgyis te da sang sdong dang rgya shug gi zhugs bawems la/ dog sa lam tog sil ma
bkram sta/ sgo khang g.yas g.yon nas dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/ sa bon thams cad mar gyis bsus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// zhugs la yang gtor bar bgyi'o// chab
sgoratshon skud sna tshogs dro bar bgyi'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa dag ni brten la slar yang gzud par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyang bklag par bgyi'o// yi ge 'bris sam mdud pa//
mdud de mthon po'i de khar btags lamachod par bgyi'o// nad pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel lam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ brgya byin
gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs khri'u 'amazam tog gi steng du bzhag staphyag rgya bzhi ngagyis la gzhug par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshog sangang/ spos sna tshogs dang/
dri sna tshogs kyi tshangs pa dang/brgya byin dang/ rgyal pen po bzhi dang/ dbang phyug chen podang/ gnod sbyin gyi snga dang nadang/ gnod sbyin stobs po chudang/ 'phrog ma bu la sogs
pa'i ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi'o// de rnams kyi stobs dang/ dbang phyug dang/ byin gyis bdag ngag bar gyur cig/ bdag pasrung nga
gyis shig/ nad thamasacud dang gdon thams cad las thar nga ra gyur cig/ nad pa'i zas dang/ skom dang/ sman rnams kyang rig sngags 'dis btab ste stsal bar bgyi'o// rdzogs
sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe// 'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhinas// stong bzhi ngag na blangasanas su// bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang/ mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad nga/ lha
] ]yi snod mchog de dang ni// bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// ston pa'i phyag na bsnyams gyurang// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog M/ de bzhin sgyu
mo 'bag ma yis// lha rdzas dag ba adu ra// blangasanas ston la rab phul pa// bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// nad nga rnams kyi nad salacing// nyes
pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyu par shog/ sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang// gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang/ thams cad skyob kyi bdamatshig dang//
legadad sal gyi ting 'dzin dang//gsar zhes bya ba'i ya shas dang// 'od srungs kyani rdzu 'phrul dang/ shAkyasang ga'im rnams kyis// sman rnams mdung rtsar gyur par shog/ nad
bya pashar phyogs kha bstan la// sman rnams r bar stsal bar bgyi// de yi tshan rig sngags 'di// lag mthil bzhag ste bklag par bgyi// spyod ya tho ngan/ kha ze kha za/ ba kha ze/ tsa le/
btsa le/ pa tsa le/ bi ma le/ bi laM ba/ ba la pa te/ tsan+d+he/ tsar Ni/ amr-i ta nirgyu'i sAhA/ rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur// bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur// nad
rnams thams cad rab bcom ste// bdag la rtag tu ngag bar shog/ byad stams dang ro langs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la skyes pa'i m/ bud med gdugs zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyisab
rab tu khrus bgyis pa// shin tu brgyan pa des dogs lam tog silam bkramasgyu/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/sang ldeng dang rgyu shug rigs gnyis kyi zhugs M busaShA/sa
bon thamasacad phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// zhugs kyin ng du'ang gtor bar bgyi'o// rtsa ba thams cad dang ma tog thams cad tshon skud sna tshogs la brgyus te ral gri 'am/ mdung rtse gsum
pa'i m/ mdung ngam/ mda'ol gdags par bgyi'o// sa chab sna tshogs sbyar te/ bum pa chen po'i nang du blugasal/ gang byad stams kyis phog pa de skud pa de bcings te bum pa'i
chab kyis bkru bar bgyi'o// skud pa yang ral gris bcad de zhugs kyi nang du dor ro// stong chen po rab tu 'dzems pa'i mdo sde 'di'ang brjod par bgyi'o// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/
sangs rgyas rnams kyinyan thos dang// tshangs dbang dang ni 'jigarten skyong// gnod sbyin sde dpon dbang phyug dang// de nga zhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang// 'brogam
bu dang bcas pa dang// de dgamathudang gzi brjid kyis// ro langs 'asa rnams chad gyur cig/ tshurjes rin chen phug pa dang// ma yis bud shing sreg pa dang// rlung gis sbrenani'athor pa dang//
nyims gsatshalaskams byed pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// byang stamasalas rnams tshig bar shog/ spos dang ma tog sna tshog sakyis// sdig pa thams cad nges par sol// tad+ya thA/
bu masum/ ka khalaM khar li/ dzuhAni/ dzab la/ ga rage/ ha Ni/ shAb ri/ shAn+ti/ srashAmI sAhA/ d+ha bani sAhA/ pra d+hA ban sAhA/ gan d+harnga sany+tsa/ pa lang ga ni sAhA/
sarba kAkher da kutabatA DA d+ha ni swA[% ]/ lhathams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi byad stoms dang/ re longs dang/ sman dang/ sngags dang/ dug
dang rnga dug sbyar mo rnams bcang do// bshig go/ pham par byas so// pha rol pham par byas so// sAdAnA/ phywa ba dang/ shu ba dang/ slob dang/ 'bras dang/ 'dum bu dang/ kom
bo dang/ dug 'thus pa las thar bar 'tshal ba shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ shin tu brgyan pa stan bzang po'i stong du mchisate rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang///
0 rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang// dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang// gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang// shAri'i bu yi shes rab dang// mo'u 'galabu yi rdzu 'phrul dang// ma'agags/
ba yi mig dngani// 'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang// ko'u nga mya'i sngar thob dang// kun dga' bo ya thos pa dang// tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang// ba byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang//
'jig rtan skyong ba'i yul rnams dang// dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang// sdadapon rnams kyi mthu dag dang// 'phrog ma'i garlibarjid rdzu 'phrul dang// dadag rnams kyi mthu dang gabris//
bdag gi dug ni dugamadu shog/ dug med dug rnams 'jil byed pa// gsang sngags gzhi rnams ng lags so// sdud ya the dan/ hari ka/ ni ki li/ ro hi/ a ma re/ aSh+Tharo/
bcur/ ka Ta ke/ kayu'u ro/ ha sa ha sa ha// khas khas la sa/ ma rug can sAtA mu muklu sAhA/ hi li sa// mi'i sAhA/ 'bras dang rmadang shu ba dang// g.yin pa dang
ni 'brum bu dang// ldog pa dang ni g.ya' ba ni// bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtamug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dub gsum ste// bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi
mnga'// sangs rgyas gzi yis dug bcom mo// 'dod chagasazhasdang ba gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan chos ni rugami mnga'// chos kyi gzi yis dug bcomamo//
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan dge 'dun dugam mngal// dge 'dun gziyos dug bcom mo// sa ni dug gi ma
sa yin te// sani dug gi pha yang yin// bden pa'i bden tshigs de dag gis// bdag gi dug ni dug mod shog/ dug nas yi nang du song// gang ba'i snod du dug song zhig sAhA/ de nas khrug khrug
dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dgra rnams phas rgyal bar 'tshal bas/ thogamar mchod rten chen po la mchod par bgyi'o// stong chen
'apo rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyalamo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud thamamadzang// chos mayin ni chos kyis so// ngag bdun gyis ni mu stegs pham// dbang
pos lha min pham par gyur// lha min rnams kyisazla ba pham// nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho'o// mo yis shing rnams pham par gyur// chusanam yang pham par gyur// rlung gis sprin rnams
rab tu pham/ 'jo rje yi nin chen phug/ lha rnams bdenapar rab tu gsungs// sayang bden par gnas pa lags//sangs rgyas dang nechos kyang bden// bden pa rgyalagyur rdzun ma
lags// spyad yatho ngan/ amr-i/ a gra put+taM/ bahu pha le/ ni bA ra Ni/ sarma argyas d+ha NaM/ a bar dzati/ d+ha ra d+ha ra Ni/ gu byab tu/ gtam/ gut+ta ma te/ dzam+b+hani
sAhA pa dzam+b+hani swAhU/ ba la pra b+hany+dza ni swAhA/ dzaya swAhA/ bidzaye swAhA/ dza ya bi dza ye swAhA/ phyi'i rgyal ba ni kun las rgyal// sdig pa thams cad rang tu bamasAhA/ de nas ston pa
kun mkhyon gyis// tshigs su bcad pa'i di dag gsungs// mi 'khrugs pa dang snanga mdzad sbyan ras gzigs kyi dbang// rin chen 'od 'phro ri rebamu khyung 'od dpag med// rdo rje rnams kyi
mtshan rnams rtag tu bzung nani// 'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin gnod par mi 'gyur ro// gang gis mthu stobs chen po brgyad po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ni rab
brjod cing// kun tu bskyab pa byas nang yi lus la ni// ma dang dug dang mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas// gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis
na gdab par gzas pa las// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rjes su dran na// mtshan de dag dumadu dum bur 'chag cing 'brul// gal ta mtshon cha rnams thogs par gyur na yang//
lag pa cha gnas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// de lus la cung zad babab par mi 'gyur to// sngon chad lasu byas ngayin pa ni ma gtogasaso// lha rnams kyis mthun par tshigs su bcad pa/
'di dag/gsolato// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tshal// bdenapar rab ston thub pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dang ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi// bdag
dang sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// lasa rnams thams cad 'bras bur bcas gyur cig/ de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen gyis// langs te thalamo sbyar btud nas//
stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di// byis pa rnams la phanabgyid pa// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// gang gis dang por 'dzam gling du/
rig sngags rab tu ston mdzad pa// chos kyi rgyal par snang mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang// tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun dang//
wa sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsolato// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang// drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong// lha
rnams ji snyid mchis pa dag/ de kun mi yi 'jig rten// 'di las skyes pa sha stag go/ thub chen mngalam 'tshal bayi// gnod sbyin srin po 'di na mchis// rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi
nus/ rnga bstan par yang niyinus so// gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang// gang gi mngalan mi gnas dang// skyes pa bud mang 'du ban// dbang po rnams 'i myos par bgyid// mer mar podang nur
nur po// bu yi sa bonam rung bgyid//gang yang mngalamathur du gyur//shamami 'byung gnod bgyid pa/ nga rnams kyi ni mang brjod kyis// 'jig mamagon po bdag la gson// 'jam pa
pa dang ri dgas rgyal// skam byed brjod byed khu tshur can// mamo dang ni dza mi ka/ 'dod pa can dang nam gru dang// srul po dang ni ma dga' byed// bya dang gnya' ba'i lag can dang// bzhin
rgyan dang ni mig 'phyang ba// de dag tham sa cad sa la rgyu// gdon rnams brtse lnga de dag ni// byis ba rnams la 'jigs par bgyid// ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yi// mtshan dang gzugs kyang
brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa posani zin gyur na// mge ni rab tu 'gyur bar bgyid// ri dgas rgyal gyis zin gyur na// skyags pa mi bzad skyug par 'gyur// skamabyed kyis ni zin gyur na//
skam byed pas na posaMba'agul// brjed byed kyis ni zin gyur na// 'gre zhing de ltar sgra yang 'byin// dbu ba dang ni khachu 'dzago/ khu tshur can gyis rab zin na// khu tshur 'chang zhing 'byed par
bgyid// mamo yisani zin gyur na// rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin// dzA mi kas ni rab zinan// nuzhonubar mngon mi dga'// 'dod pa can gyis rang drin na//malan gnyid log du bar
'gyur// nam grus rab tu brin gyur na// lce la sogs na 'cha' bar bgyid// srul pos rab tu zin gyur na// ku co 'don cing sgrayang 'abyin// ma ngaga'abyang pas zin gyur na// rnam pa
snatshogs gzugs su'agyur// bya yis rang tu thon gyuran// mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gnya' lag can gyis drin gyur na// mgul pa rib tu 'gag par 'gyur// bzhin rgyan gyis
ni thin gyur na// rim sa kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur// mig 'phyang bas ni zin gyur na// skyigs bu dang nam ba 'byung// byis pa ji ltar skyag bgyid pa// de yi
gzugs ni brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs// ri dgas rgyal po ri dgas 'dra// skam byed pa ni gzhan nu'i gzugs// brjod byed pa niwa 'dra'o// khu tshur can ni bya rog
gzugs// mamo de ni ra yi gzugs// dzA mi kani rtayi gzugs// 'dod pa can ni jorje'i gzugs// nam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te// srul po phag gi gzugs kyis so// ma dga'
byed pa byi la'i gzugs// bya ni 'dab chags gzugs kyis so// gnya' lagacan ni bya gag gzugs/ de bzhin rgyun 'ug pa'i gabrugs su sti// mig 'phyang ba ni pha wang gzugs//
'di dag byis pa skrag par bgyid// 'di dag bu 'phrog ma rungs pa// byas pa rnams la 'jigs bgyid pa// mdo snga'i zhags pa/sadrangs nas// 'di dagashin tudagub par bgyid// gnod
sbyin sda dpon chen pon// driza tsan ngan zhes bgyi bas// yi ga phyag rgyang stsal de// song la gdenani drag pa pa/ dbatsaldadadag khug cig ces// pho nyar yang nibatang bar bgyi// de dag
rnams ni skad cig gis// bcing ba lnga yis bcing bzhin bkug/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po la// tshangasachen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// srog chags sa bona'ajig bgyid pa// 'byung
bo 'di dag rnams lhags te// mgon po yin spyan snga ru// 'di dag chod pa bshad par bgyi// bud mdagang dag bu mi 'tshal// gang zhig btsas pa'i dzin 'tshal bas// tshes brgyad dang nabcu
bzhil// bslab bzung dam chos skyabasamachis la// mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi// khrus bgyis shin tu brgyan nas ni// sa gzhirayungs kar gtor nas su// ma rtog sbos kyis
brgyan ba bgyi// sna lnga'i tshon gyi skud pa san// khor yug tu ni skal bar bgyi// nam phyed bar du mchis nas ni// spyi bor yungs kar bzhug nas su// tshangs pas rang du byas pa ste//
tshangs pa sa sngalaces brjod par bgyi// 'tsho grang bcuganyis bar dun// gzhan nu rnams la phanabgyid pa// tshangs pas sbrul pa'i mdo sde yis// rig sngags 'di las gang 'dab bo//
am+b+ha ka yi dog pa banan// mgo ngo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// spyad ya tha ngan/ oM ga paMg b+ho ga/ b+ha ban/ inan/ banan di/ mU ladi/ gi ri ga ba ri/ ga ru Ni/ sharu Ni/ gi ri
ga ba re/ latsan/ rolaN/ ro man/ la sani/a lag+ha/ oM ga na/ al phe/ nga la de/ rtalapo/ prakaru ni swAhA/ mngalan bad bar gnas gyur cig/ dbang po yang
dag 'phel bar shog/ mngal na 'a drug pa bdar gyur cig/ btsas pa 'jig par ma gyur cig/ mngalan bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dus bzhin du ni 'byung bar shog/ tshon skud sna tshogs
rnams dang gi/ yungs kar 'bru nis grugasapa// de dag srung bar gsungs pa ste// byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis// rig pa'i sngags
'di dag gsungs// mngalan 'dug pa srung bar shog/ byis ba rnams n bder gyur cig/ srung ya the dan/ bo d+hi bad+hi mahAb rgyu/ brdzu anum to/ pa lin/ ba du pha le shikIshikAsAr
ba taM / sA ga la dur sa de/ shu ra pra ba te/ shu ra ba te/ b+ha ga b+ha gAb+ha ga b+hagan na bar nisAhA/ de nas gdon ni bco lnga po// rtag tu khrag 'thuda rnams kyis// 'jig rtenamagon
la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// grang ngamakhyim mam grong khyer ram// gang na legs par gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di nibazhugs pa der// byis pa rnams ni mchi
mi 'gyur// thub chen khyod na ji bzhin du// rjes su mthun par 'jug par bgyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal la// gsang sngags kyi
tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ grub par gyur cig/ rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig/ tshangs pas bsam par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bus bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalanas 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gang lab la stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di
[4 ]'dzin tum/ bar ngangam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid pa des mang du thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o// mchod rten mchod pa la brtson par bgyi'o// tshes brgyudadang/ bcu bzhi/

dang bco lnga'i dus su mchong rten la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas rig sbrags bklag par bgyi'o// tshes brgyud kyi tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdunan de la sems
bar bgyid// ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do// tshes bcu bzhi'atsho ni rgyal pe nabo bzhi po dag nyid mdunan sams par bgying// ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do// tshes bco lnga'i tshon
rgyal po chen po bzhi bo dganyid mdunan sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang gdon par bgyidado/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sda'ad len pa dang 'tshang
ba dang/ ston pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pad ni srogachags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan 'dogs par bgyid lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la gos dang/ sras dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ naba'i gsos smanadang/ yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyis
kyang bsistangabgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po dag gis kyang bla mar bgyi ba dang/ rim gror bgyi ba dang/ mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stags can dang/ dag sbyong dang//
bram zad ng/ spyod pa can dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ mdza' ba dang/ mi mdza' bdag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu med
sa pa des gtsang mar bgyis te/ lus gtsang ba dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ mal cha dang stanadang/ yo byad khyad par can gtsangamar bgyi/yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyi/ yul ngan pa'i
mdza' bodang bstan par mi bgyi/ yulangan pa ni gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o// gang 'byung bo'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na/ de la
rgyal po chen po bzhi po nyid srung bdang/ skyob pa dang/ stong par bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'damathums/ gang gis rang gi
khyim du mtshan gcig gam nyin gcig kyang rung/ yang dag par bsams na/ de la legacig gi bar du mam lags pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po' tshogs thams cad kyis phyag
bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so// gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/ rgyul po chen po bzhi yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
phal pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ sems can rnams la sman pa'i slad du 'jig rten la gang su dag rig sngags bgyid pa de dag pas/ gsang sngags kyi tshig
bde dag rab mchog/ gtso bo khyad par du 'phags pa/ dmapa thob pa rgya rlab/ tshad mamachis ba/ 'jug par dka' ba/ thun mong ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ni chos kyi
phyag rgya lags so// de nas dbang po mig stong ba// lcayi rgyal po bde sogs bdag/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// 'jig rtenamagor la 'di skad gsol// 'jig rten kun la phan/
bgyid pa// rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs// gsang sngags smanadang ldan pa yi// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// shir sha ma tog a pa ma dang// kata ka yi
'bras bu a ka ru// ngodrag ngang nas da brtsod rnams dang// su ka ra dang dzaya ma Ti/ pa ri ji las 'a bar dang// sa ma ka dang bu sa rgya spos dang// tsanangan a brtu ka ru rta dang//
sngar ma leb kaN+Di bar dang// pri yang ku dang 'dug sug smin bcud dang// yungs kar dag dang ldong ros rnams dang ni// shing tshu'u dag gur kum shing kun dang// lo ma ngag dang ldan pa'ib/
ka zung ngag sbyar tu rang bur bgyis pa na// gdon rnams kun las grol bar bgyid pa ste// 'byung de dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la// mig la nga yis bskus pa bgying nan// des na 'byung nge 'dzoji
dang/ gnam lcags mda' yisazin las thar// ljon shing chadangang bzhin du// mchod rten tshalabaskus bgyisan// gang gis gnas de mthong bde// 'byung pa la ni'ajigs ma mchis//
b+hA@#// rar mi'abyung po mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so// rjenadung dang rdza rje dang// jaban ngag labang bskusan ni// de dag sgra rigar grags par// 'byung
po'i dkyil 'khor skyag par 'gyur// gyong du rgyu ba'i bya rnams kyi// 'dab ma ngagal bskusanani// yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag tu// byad gang du mchis pa der// 'byung po rnams ni mi gnas
nga gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so// chu mig mtshodang ltung ka'am// gang dang gang du bor yang rung// derani dpag tshad khor yug tu// bde ba dang ni da bar 'gyur// pha rol dmag
tshogs nang mchis te// mtshon changag ni 'bab pa na/ de gnas rnams kun tu byugs bgyis na// bde blag tun thar par 'gyur// lnga ba dang gzhang nad dang// me dbal dang ni'abras
tsho byung dang// gdug pas zin dang dug 'thungs pas// 'thungasan phyugs na thar par 'gyur/lus la nga yis phyags na ni// byad stams thams cad gcod par bgyid// rtsod pa
rnams las thar par 'gyur// rgyal po'i gyod las thar par 'gyur/ ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur// dbul po los ni phyug por 'gyur// bum mchis pa bu rnyed 'gyur// nor ma
mchis pa nor rnyed par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gnas bar du yong// 'dis ni gsang sngags grub par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas gyur ba dang// ljonashing rnams kyi 'bras bu dang/
rig sngags 'chang ba thob la yang// 'din zhi ba'i las dag byed// 'di la gsang sngags tshigamachis te// dper na dbang pa 'tshig bzhin no// spyod ya the dan/ a kra ma/ bi kra ma/
b+hA ta g+ho Sha/ b+hU taM ga ma/ dahani/ d+ha d+ha ri/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da d+hi ni/ nakhu ma/ kha kha me/ kha kha kha kha/ sAraM gam/ tsan+do/ tsa pa le/hali ma/ ha7/ hAr Na sA/
bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du dag legs su gyur cig swAhA/ sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas tshangs
pa dbang po dang// 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyugam// gnod sbyin sdodabon thams cad dang// 'phrogam bu dang bcas pa yang// thal mo dag nirang sbyar nas// sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gso ba/
nyim stong ltar gsal ba po// blab nya ltar 'od gsal ba// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jiganan// khyod dang 'dra ba yod mamachis// legs bsams legs par sbyar nan// gnod sbyin srin po rnams
'joms pa// rgyalasrid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba// rig sngags rgyal srid reb sbyor ba// stong chen rab tu 'jomasamazhes// bya ba'i rig pa dag 'byung ba// mtshon cha'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal//
ngagra rnams thams cad rab 'joms ma// stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten na// srung ba'i mdo sdadam pa lags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyed la// thalamo
sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// denyid dunim snang gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub kha'i dus kyitshanang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ dag slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa/ dag slong ngag stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdesngo lepazhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ de ltar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
rten la yun ring po'adon dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro// dag slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo snga'adis shing skam po
la skud pas bcingasan/ de la lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams skyo bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par
smin pani ma gtogasaso// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas la/ dge slongade dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sngachen po lnga/
gsungs pad ngag ni bdalta ste/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa dang/ rma bya chen mo dang/ so sor 'brang banamo dang/ bsilaba'i tshal chen mo dang/ gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin m
chen mo 'gas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zasa rnam pa lngayos su sdongs la chos shig ces kyang bka' stsalal/ zas bsod snyoms la brten te rab tu byung zhig ces kyang
gsungasan/ bcom ldan 'das bras rnam pa ldadang ma 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms ni nyung/ 'di ltar bras rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pad namang lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag
gis ji ltar nan tan dub/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dag slong dag de nyid kyi phyir su stong chen po rab tu
'joms pa'i mdo sta'adi 'chang ba des/ rmamadapa'i nor bu'i gzungs zhes bya bad bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir myongs shig/ des bsod snyomasalen pa'i tshobras lamimathun pa med pa'i
'du shes bskyod par bya// bras rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zasa rnam pa lngadang ma 'dres so snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyod par bya/ 'dus byas thams cad lami rtag pa'i 'du
shes dang/ martag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang/ sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang/ bdag med pa la dge ba'i 'du shes bskyod par bya'o// zas rnam pa lnga po dag
ga la yod/ zas rnam pa lnga po su'iyin/ suzhig zas rnam pa lnga po za/ sems can med do// sems can ga la yod dmigs su med do// de lazas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres na tshes brgyad
dang/ bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga la bdag la bsrung ba byas te/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo legs par bkrus pa/ shin tu brgyan pa/ nyin zhag gcig zas bcad pa/ bslab pa'i gnas
lnga bzung ba/ skud pa dmar po bzhi sgril du 'khal du bcug la/ gsang sngags 'dzin pas rig sngags dran par byas te skud pa de mdud pa mdud la/ skud pa de
mtshon gsar pas bcad ng bsrags larin po che'i snod dam lcags kyi snod kyang rung/ chus bkang stam tog gis khyab par khrem la/ bdug pa snatshogs kyis bdugs to/ snod kyi nang
nas skud pa de slar 'byor te ma byung gi ngar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bya// de yang lag pa la bcings la tshig 'di skad brjod do// bram ze rnams kyis bslus nas su// shAkyasab
ga skyob pa la// dpal sbas kyisan dug can gyi// bsong soms dgan phul ba dang// de las nga ni blangs nas su// ston pas dug ni bsang nas gsol// bden pa'i tshag ni 'di yis
su// bras ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog/ rnam par gzigs dang lha gang dang// gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang// log par dad pa sal ba la// stobs chen lha gang dad pa dang/
gsar dang dpal ldan 'od srungs dang// shAkya ya ni sang gi la// rab dad lcayi dbang po dang// tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang phyug dang// 'jigarten skyong ba bzhi dag dang// nor bu bzang dang
dbang phyug che// srin monagamtshan mo dang// de bzhin gdel ma gtum mo dag/ ma tog dang ni bdug pa dang// bdag gi sbyin sreg 'di bzhes shig/ dadag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas//
bdag gi kha zas byang bar mdzod// zas lnga dag dang 'dres pa yang// bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol// kha thas lnga dang ma 'dres pa/// zas de kun nibaza' bar bgyi// sa bon dag gi tshogs
kun la// sayi bcung na zhugs pa yi// kha zas 'dres pa thams cad kyang// bdag lam 'dres mdzad du gsol// ji ltar skud pa bcu bsregs pa// ngalta bu yang slar 'byor pa// deltar
bras rnams 'dres pa yang// ma 'dres par yang bdag la mdzod// spyod yathe dan/ khakha ma/ kha kha kha kha/ khu khu ma/ shimasham/ shin/ shim shim swaste swasti/
sAsI sAsti/ mamashAn+ti/ sha rA gri/ khabras lnga dang 'dres pa yang// ji ltar ma 'dres bras bzhin du// gangagis ji ltar skud bsregs pa// nga 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol// spyad
ya the ngan/ ka lake/ ka la le/ ba lani/ ka ru NA la ya// la lum/ ag+ni/ sang grum NisAhA/ sangs rgyas rnam par gabrigs dang sangs rgyas gtsug tor can// bde gshog
kun skyob sangs rgyas log par dad sol dang// gser thub 'od srungs shAkya thub pa go'u tam// bsnyangs pa mi mnga' ba la skyabasusumachi bar bgyi// mi mchog bdun pa de dag gi ni sku
rnams la// ma tog dag dang sbos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi// lus ngag yid gsum rab tudang ba'i sems kyis ni// de dag rnams la skyabs su nye bar mchibar bgyi// sangs
rgyas rdzu 'phrul che dang ldan pa dedag la// lha gang mngon par rab tu dang ba yod pa yi// lha de mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dgar gyur nas// rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bdag
la srung du gsol// bdag dang sems can thams cad dag legs su gyur cigasAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs to/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bzags pa stongaman pa rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// slar yang rgyudapa la gdung sanas dag par byas so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ maAyArAbo rAdzI/ bod skad du/ rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'das pa dang/ mabyon pa dang/ da
u0fc4 ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dapa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba rnams la
rab n chogargya cher brtse bo grangs bdun pa// khros shing m rungs klu yi dbang po brad par 'byin byed dug rnams gnon par ba tu grol ba'i sku// gang gi mthu las snatshogs nang la sogs pa dag/
yi so sor 'jigs pa ma lus 'joms byed pa// rma bya chen mo rgyun du yon tan tshogs rnams 'byin byed de la bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// lhumo shi ba gsos byed ma// gdug pa'i
soms na zlog byed ma// rig sngags rgyal mo rma bya ni// bdag nyid che labangag phyag batshal// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyaga'atshal lo// ngag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo//
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dunadang bcas pa bdun pa dag laphyag 'tshal// bajig nanadagra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang
chub sems dpa' sams dang ba chen po rnams la phyag 'tshalale// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams laphyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag
'tshal le// 'jig rgyun na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dedag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
bde la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag la rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ 'byung po'i tshogs gangasu dgas la rgyu ba rnams dang/ mamakha' la rgyu ba rnams dang/ chu la rgyu ba rnams dang/ lha
rnams dang/ sku rnams dang/ lcam yin rnams dang/ rlung lha rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ dri za rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto ba phye chen po rnams dang/
gnod sbyin rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ yi dgas rnams dang/ sha za rnams dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ grul bum rnams dang/ srulapo rnams dang/ lus srul po
rnams dang/ skam byed rnams dang/ smyo byed rnams dang/ grib gnon rnams dang/ brjod byed rnams dang/ gson po rnams bdag la nyon cig/ 'byung
po'i tshogs gabri byin 'brog pa rnams dang/ zos su mngalatsa ba rnams dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zasasu zhag zla ba rnams dang/ zas su sha zab rnams dang/ zas su
sgyu tshilazaba rnams dang/ bras su dang zab rnams dang/ zas su btsas pa bra ba rnams dung/ srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ thasasu gtor m bra ba rnams dang/ zasasu 'phrengabu zab rnams dang//
sbas sudri zab rnams dang/ zas su bdug pa zab mas dang/ susum tog thaba rnam dang/ zas su 'bras bu bya ba rnams dang/ zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang/ thasasu sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang/
zasasu nag 'thung ba rnams dang/ sras su phyis brang rnams ng/ zas su gcin bzungab rnams dang/ brasasu lhagamaza ba rnams dang/ bras susumatshalamaza bo rnams dang/ zasasungar snabs
ba rnams dang/ zas su snabs brab rnams dang/ brasasumigatsang ba za ba rnams dang/ thasasu skyugs paza ba rnams dang/ zas su sbyor khun gnas 'bab pa 'khrungab rnamasudang/ sdig pasams
dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sdong ba'i sems dang ldan po rnams dang/ drag shul gyisoms dang ldan pa rnams dang/ gzhan gyisrog 'phrog pa rnams bdag lanyon cig dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya
pa chanamo 'di brjod nga du bya'o// spos dang/ martog dang/ bdug pa dang/ gter ma'ang sprin no// bdag la sdig pa'i soms dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ drug
shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ bras sumangs khra ba'i gdon thams cad ni dngas shig/ zhi ba'i soms dang ldan pa rnams dang/ byams pa'ims
