dang ldan pa rnams dang/ nga ba'isams dang ldan pa rnams nibangag la nyon/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dga' dun la mngon par dad pa rnams bag la nyon cig/ 'di ltasta/ nag mo bzhin/
sgyuram/ grul bumam/ dung can m/ martogaka ma la lta bu'i mig can/ 'brogam/ samangag ljang gum/ dpal ldan m/ sbra'u ltar dmar sar ma/ 'phyang ma/ rab tu 'phyang m/
dus kyi zhags ba can m/ bum ltam/ gshin rje'i pho nya mo/ gshin rje'isring mo/ 'byung po za bamo/ mkhob dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang gtor ma'ang dbul gyisabazhes shig/ 'jig
pa dang gnod pa thams cad las bdagadang sems can thams cad la bsrung du gsol/ leng rgya 'tsho bar gyurag/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ bdag la rig sngagasakyi tshig rnamasu grub par gyur

cig sut+tA/ 'di skad bdag gisathos pa dusagacagan/ bcom ldan 'adasamanyan yod na rgyal bu rgyalapyodakyitshalamagonamad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na ngag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems
dpag dum dang thabs cig tubazhugs te/ de'i tshomanyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalamagonamad zas sbyin gyi kun da pa ba ra bano/ dag skyong sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu blor bu/

sa lang tsho'abab pa/ rab tubyung nas ring po ma len pa/ bstan bar rdzogs nas ring po ma 'don pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dunagyi srogang bya ba'i phyir shing

sgyu ga shags pa dang/ shing rul pa'i ser ga zhig nasasbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthebang lazin pa dang/ lus sbrid nas sa la 'gyel te sbrubar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal ba/

la dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri nad kyis btab ste/ sdug bsngal zhing nang tshabasache nas sa la 'gyelatu lca bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong
zla nas kyang ris pa nges par bcom ldan 'das ga lab der song staphyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom
ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'daskad ces gsol te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mnyenayong na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba bdinadag skyongs
zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po malags nga/ bsAn par rdzogs nas ring pom lags pa// chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring por ma lags pazhig

pu gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi srigang bgyiba'i sladadu shing gshegs pa dang/ shing rung ba'i sar ba zhig nas sbralanag patshon pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bangaladrin pa dang/ lus sbrang nasadegs
pa 'gyel te lbu bar skyugacing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing mchis na/ ngatsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar nan ton du bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis//
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khyod song la/ rigasngagasakyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo 'di lha'i gangenangang/ klu'i gdenadang/
lcam yin gyi gdon dang/ rlung lha'i gdon dang/ nam mkha' lding ga gongonadang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ mi 'amachi'i gden dang/ lte 'chan pa'i gden dang/ gnod sbyin gyi bden dang/ srin pa'i
gangen dang/ yi ngags kyi gdon dang/ sha za'i gdon dang/ 'byung nga'i gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ srul po'i gden dang/ lus srul po'agadon dang/ skam byed kyi gdon dang/
smyo byed kyi gden dang/ grib gnon gyi gden dang/ brjod byed kyi gdon dang/ gnon po'igodonadang/ skar ma'i gden dang/ gshadabyang dang/ sgyur ba'i las dang/ byad dang/g.yengs
bod dang/ re sa dang/ sems bsgyur ba dang/ stong gtong dang/ bza' nyos dang/ skyag nyes dang/ gnod sgrib dang/ gnod bltas dang/ brinyis dang/ sgom nyes dang/ smad
dpa dang/ rims nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ nyin bdun pa dang/ drub byed pa dang/ zla ba gcig pa
dang nyin mo pa dang/ yudatsam pa dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ rims drag tho dang/ 'byang pe'i 'oms dang/ rims ldang dub pa dang/ mi'i rims dang/ mim yin pa'i rims dang
shu rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur ba dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ rims thams cad las ngag slongs/ra la srung ba gyis shig// sba ba dang//
yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba
dang dug bsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba gyis shage/ klad pa na ba med par gyis shig/ gzhogs phyedazhub dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ migand ngang/
snanang dang/ kha nad dang/ mguland dang/ snying nad dang/ lkogama'i lha gor na ba dang/ rnab na ba dang/ so na ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ rgyang na ba dang/
lton ba dang/ mkhur ba nab dang/ chu so na ba dang/ skyo gnas na ba dang/ rab tu skyo gnas na ba dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/ bar na ba dang/ byin pan pa dang/ lag pa na ba dang/ rkang pa
ca na ba dang/ yan lag na ba dang/ nying lag na pa med par gyis shig/ mtshan mo dge dang nyin modag/ nyi 'i gung gi dag bdang// nyin mtshan kun gyi dag bdag// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag
lastsol// tad+ya thA/ a Di ba/ kiDaho// miDi ti// A// g+hA// duDi/ ra Ni/ ba gu lnga/ pAn su pa shAtsi/ ni bar Ni/ ArehoNi/ adre Ni/ a lam la/
rta lo/ til ti'i da ma le ma lo/ ti ma ti mo/ du ma du ma/ du dum/ ade Ta/ mid Ni/ biny+tsan+taM tsapa le/ pim la/ hu lu lu/ ashwamuki kA li kA li/
ka rAl/ mahA kA la/ prakArAka'i 1 ku lu ku lu/ bang bu lubab yulu/ ke lu ko lu/ lu ba hu lu ba du lu ba du lu/ bos/ dub/ do dob/ du mdudA/ go lAyA/ b.lA
ya pa ra ba lAyA/ pi shu sil pol hi li hi lo/ hili hi li pilo si/ hal hili/ mi li ma lo/ ma li mi lo/ mi li mi 'a/ mil ma la/ mi 'di ma la te lang/
ti li te la/ ti la ti li/ tilo to lo/ ti li dolo/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu'u tshu lu/ musumu shu/ mu sumu shu/ mu bumu'u/ mu dumushu/
mu ru mu hu/ mu lu mu lu/ mu ru mu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ mulumu lu 1 mu lu mulu/ hu chu/ gu/ hu hu/ hu'u/ hu hu/ pAbA/ bA bA/ b+hAbA/ bAdA/ bAbA/
pA pA/ pAsU/ pAhA/ bA pA/ pA dA/ dzAl/ dzAl/ dzAl/ dzA la/ dzAl/ dza/ dzAya/ dzA la/ dzAl/ dzAl dmadam Ni/ ta pa ta pa ni/ dzA
la dzA lani/ btsas tsa/ dunub+higasmin / bar Ni/ gro Tan/ rta ba ni/ tApa ni/ pa tsani/ pA tsa ni/ hA/ kAr Ni/ kaMpa ni/ mni/ ma/ maN+Diti/ ka ke dmaM
ka'i ma ka ri/ shAkari/ sha ka ni/ shaskar/ kakar/ sha ba ri/ kaM ka ri/ dzA lan/ dum ni/ du ba ni/ su ku sume/ go la yA/ bo lA yA/ pa rab lAyA lhas
a kun tu char phob cig/ i li ki si sAhA/ nganayul 'khor srung la byams// sa srungabu la'ang nga byams te// ngan mig mi bzang la byams// go'u ta mnanag po dang/ ngani klu rgyal nor bu dang/ nga ni

nor rgyas bu la'ang byams// dbyug pa rkang ga klu dag dang// gangab bzang la'ang nga rtag tu// klu gang dga' bo nyi dga' bo// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing lha man dang// lha yi
g.yul yang myong bar byed// madros klu dang mu khyu dang// 'jam pa lenang la yang byams// 'dzeg bo dang ni mtha' yas dang// de bzhin nor gyis dang ni// gzhan las rgyal lang byamasate// gcod
dang ldan pa'i bu la byams// rtag bar gzi can chen po dang// gzican la yang de bzhin no// phub ma mdadang dus can dang// longs sbyod ldan dang ngag tshul dang// khan zho dnganor bu dang// pad+ma
dkar po phyogs dag dang// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung rkang dang// la bdanganamagyogs mchog dang// klu yi rgyal po de dag la// ngani rtagatu byams pa yin// gnas bcas chusun kud+hi'o// de bzhin
khabakye sdu dag dang// brang 'gro'i bdag po nag po dang// drang srong la yang nga byams so// de bzhin rnab tshang ba dang// shing rta'i bzhin 'byams pa ste// gzings can dang ni rab dga' dang//

bAd sA'i bu'i nga rtag tu// nga ni a la'i 'dab la byams// 'phyang ba'i tshul la'ang nga byams te// miin klu ni gang dag dang// de bzhin ma yo bla ma dang/ dakla chen tshol ba'i tshul can dang// btang byung
zhes ni grags pa dang// klugang sa la rgyudag dang// de bzhin chu la gnas rnams dang// gang dag bar snang rgyung dang// gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang// mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa// de
dag la ni nga rtag byams// rkang pa yod la nga byams te// nang gnyis pa la'angang byams so// rkang bzhi pala'ang dbyamasaso// rkang mangs laya ngang byams so// rkang chad nga la med mi byed/
rkang gnyis nga la gzed mi byed// rkang bzhing la gnodami byed// rkangam ngas nga laganod mi byed// gang dag chu la gnas pa yi// kun ms kun la du byams so// gang sus la gnas pa yi//
'byung po kun la de byams so// sems can gang dag gnas par bacas// soms can kun lang byams so// mas can kun dang srogachags kun// 'byung po dag ni thams cad kyang// thams
[–]bya@#// cang bde ba 'ba' zhigashog/ thams cad nd nim gyuracig/ kun gyis bzang re ra mthong bar shog/ gang yang sdig pa ma gyur ga/ byams pa'i sa ma sa la gnas
nas su// dug na reng tugasad par ng// srung dang yongs su gzung ba dang// da bzhin yongs su bskyang bar bya// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chung phyag 'tshal le/ grol gyur phyag 'tshal

grel la phyag 'tshal lo// zhigyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tsha'i le// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal 'ad 'bram dra gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la ya nga nga drug
latshal 'a// de dag gis nga dag la srung ba gyis shig// 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ rnams thams cad dung/ nad
thamasacud dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ dug thams cad las srung ba gyis shig/ lebargya 'tsho bar gyurag/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' ba sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal pa
gangs ri'i lho ngugs kyi ngos la rma bya'irgyal po gsar du snang bzhes byung zhig gnas te/ nganang pa ra rig sngags kyi rgyal mi rma bya chen mo 'dis bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te zin mo dag bar gnas/
nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ngar byas te mtshan mo dge bar gnas so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalale//tshes la phyag 'tshalale// ngaga'adun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dasam/
bab rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal 'do// dpya thA/hu hu/ hu hu/ pu'u/ nAg le le le/ du pa le le/ nAg la le le/ puya huya/ bi dzubi dza/ thusu su/
gu lu gu lu/ su po dzano/ tse dzin/ a ga lu/ alAmo lA// A lim wA/ dile ma la/ Al mi to/ ti lim te/ ul til ma te/ dub/ su dub/ dusu ngosu/
go lA ba lA/ tsa bawA/ bimalA/ iN+Di'o/ b+hi raM/ riTi'i/ namo bud+d+hanan/ cil ki saM/ go do hika/ namo atAn/ hAl pAl/ lcas phyogs bcu kun tu char
phob cig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'atsal lo// sAhU~M/ des dus gzhan zhig ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba ma byas par/ 'ded pa
rnams la zhen cing chags te rgyugs pas myosaras rab tu rmongs shing brgyal ba dang 'dra ra gyur nas rab tu zhen te/ nags kyi bya ba gzhenanumang po dang lhan yig tu kun dag 'a ra ba nas kun dga'
rab r/ skyed mos tshal nas skyod mos tshal du/ ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu zhing song songab las/ dbag med par gyur pas lo'i ra gzhig tu chud nas der rigs ngan gzhen bu pun ring/
du phyir rgol ba/ dgrar gyur pa// 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya rnyis bzung sta/ dmimadzol ba'i nang du son pa dang dran pa subasnyadanas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
rma bya chen mo 'di nyid la byas so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma rig sngags kyi
rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ de tad+ya thA/ hu'u/ hu'u 1 hu shu nA gale le le du ba leye le/ nug le le le duya huya/ ba dzib/ thu su jusu/ gu ru
gulu rta hu tsadzin/ tse ni/ a ga lu alAm la A limalA/ ti li ma wA/ I limit+taM/ tili mit+taM/ I tridi lomitaM/ dub/ su du de/ su tosu/ gol//
bal tsapalA/ bim lA/ iN+Dir/ bib+hUr/ rinaM/ namo bud+d+hanAn/ il ka si/ go de haka nam a ra patA/ hA ladA la/ lhas phyogs bcu kun tu marangeb cig
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal la// swAhA/ de nas de sdug bsngal nga 'a sa thar to dag ba dang bde bar bdag gi yul du phyin nas/ gsang sngags kyi tshigs 'di dag kyang bzlas so//sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun 'du byag 'tshal lo// rma bya'i rgyal mo gsar du snang pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chan mo la phyag 'tshal lo//

tad+ya thA/ sid+d+haM/ susid+d+hi/mo tsani/mo ni/muk+She/ bimuk+ti/ a ma la/bi ma le/ ni le/ at+tA re paN+Dir/ maM ga la/ maM ga le/ siraN+NaM/ hir rgya gats+tso/ ratsArad+ma gadz+he d+hadangu/ sud+d+had dre
0 saman+tab+had dre/ gang an+d+ra sA d+huni/ par mAn+tA sAd+hani/ sarba a nan+d+ra pra shamani/ sajamaM ga la snyani/ sajamaM ga bAn+tani/ man si/ mAn si/ mahAmAnasi/ ad b+hute/
ad khyad b+hu te/ mgyu/ ba muk+ta mtshani/ mokAn/ a ts+tsa te/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ bi ma la// amr-i te/ a ma ra/ a ma ra Ni/ bram/ bram su ri/ pU/
pUr+Nam nor the/ grongasany+dzipa ni/ ba phyud de/ tsan+d+ri/ tsan+d+ra/ pu b+ho/ sUr/ sUr+ya kAn+taM/ bA da b+hayaM/ su ba/ basmag+hoSha/ brag+ha dzut+taM/ sarbad dra a pra ti ha du bag la
srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// dge slongs ro ding/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad ngago bar mdzad du gsol/ le brgya 'tsho
bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ dpya thA/ hu tshigatsi glu tsi/ mu tsi AgA/ kun dga' bo da'i tshe de'i dus ni rma bya'i rgyalam gsar du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
zhig yin sAmangu sums na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyo'i zhin/ kun dga' bo nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dusan ma bya'i rgyal mo gsar du snangab zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi
rgyal mo rma chen mo'i snying po 'di'ongad bzlasaM par bya'o// dar+ya thA/ A li mid // ti lo ming ti/ nga la mi li/ mid ti lo mi li mi li/ til du yi mili mit+ti/ pi li
mi le mit+ti'i li/ mi li mi li/ ti li mi li de/ su tuM dA tuM bA/ sub tsa/ phyi'i ka se ya// b+hin nam tI/ namo bud+d+han+tan/ rtsil ki si/ pranAmUl/
kyi A tihor/ lo hita mU/ tshubAsutuM bA/ ku/ kun/ ku kun n+ti ti la kuny+dzana'i/ lcang lo can gyi lhas zla ba dgu'am/ zladabcur kun naso char phob cig/ I lim lo
ki limi la/ kilim la/ ke tumul/ duru ba/ sudo// Dalim/ sarab/ bu sa ba bu sa ra bus ra/ rnyan bsta la ko/ cha lA/ narkali me/ la me
gte/ rakha la/ Astisad dzulo/ tub/ su tu pa/ an+d+ho gtu/ phyon/ a man/ tA NamAle/lhas kun nas chusar pa'i char phob cig/ nArA ya Ni/
pA rAya NaM hAtAl/ kun li/ A lamiste/ kilo miste/ ki li ki li mas+saM/ A li// 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur cig sAhA/ kun
dga' bo 'di ni rig sngags kyi rgya lim rma bya chen mo'i snyinge pe yin no// kun dga'abo rig sngags kyi rgyalame rma bya chen mo 'di grong na 'dug pa'i ng yod la bya'o// dpaM na pa na 'dug gam/
lamin 'dug gam/ lam gol ba na 'dug gam/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/ chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ me'i nang na 'dug gam/ chuwinang na 'dug gam/
dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ phyir rgol ba dang dang bo'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ rtsod pa'i nang na 'dug gam/ sbrul gyis zin tam/ dug 'thungs sam//
'jigs pa thams cad 'dus pa na'ang yid la bya'o// rims kyis btab pas kyang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyurapo dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang 'dus/
pa las gyur pa dang/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nad gang yang rung bas bab par gyur pa dang/ 'phongs par gyur pa na'ang shin tu yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo
gsad pa'i rigs panichad pas thar par 'gyur ro// chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhub tsog gis so// gzhubatsog pa'i rigs pani sbyabs so// sbyoba'i rigs panas bcas
pas so// dam bcas ba'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so// sbyazing zhes bya ba'i gos pazhid bzhin du thar par 'gyur// 'anang thams cad kyang ldog par 'agyur ro// kun dga' bo'i ge
sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshigs 'di'ang yong la bya'o// tad+yathA/ tsi'i/ hili mi li/ kilami li/ katumU la/ bus ga/ bus ra ti bu sa ra ts+tsha/ ka btwA/ ka ban+d+ha ka/
mAle/ A ti/ sha ba ri/ Tub tu pi/ pra yaM kA ra/ a ba// pa ri ba/ lhas kun tu musar pa'icha' phebacig/ namob+ha bo bte/ A ya/ iN+Dagomis kA ya// Ashan/
dpA shan/ pA pa na ku le/ kapi la mad te/ A limit+taM/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis gsang
sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsus pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rna buchan ma 'dis dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ soms/
can thams cad la srung bar gyis shig/ sgra ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang// zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/
chad pa snang ba dang/ mtshon mang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sabacing bgyis shig/ le brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong
bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba byas shing sbab dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba
dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshonam srangang dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsadang dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par
a 'tsho ba'i phyi'i khong ba lta 'om/ lhamo'am/ lha'i bu bo bam/ lha'i bu mo 'am/ lhargan po 'am/ lharganamo 'am/ lha'i khor phebam/ lha'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'am/ klu mo
0 'ag klu'i bu ye kham/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu rgan re 'am/ ku rgan mo ba/ klu'i 'khor bo'ag/ klu'i ga songamo 'amalham yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ lcam yin gyi bu po 'aa/ lham yin gyi bu/
mo'am/ lha mas+sinargan po 'am/ lhamayin rganamo 'am/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor po bas/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ rlung lha'am/ rlung lha me 'am/ rlung lha'i bu po 'am/ rlung/
lca'i bu mo 'tsho/ rlung lha rgan po'am/ rlung lha rgan mo 'am/ rlung lca'i 'kher pho 'am/ rlung lha'i 'khor mo 'am/ nam mkha' ldingangam/ nam mkha' lding mo 'tshe/ nam mkha' lding gi bu
o'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo'am/ nam mkha' lding rgan po 'am nam mkha' lding rgan mo'am/ nam mkha' lding gi 'khor pa'i m/ amakha' lding gi 'khor mo 'am/ dri bra chem/ dri bra
ma bam dri bra'i bu tho 'am/ dri bra'i bu mo 'am 2 dri brargan pa ba ma/ drir rgan mo 'am drikhrulis lor po'am dri bra'i 'khor mo 'am/ mi 'gaci'am/ mi 'am ci mo'am/
mi'am ci lu pa las/ mi 'am ci'i ngu ma kham/ mi'amacargan pe// mi'amaci rganamo'am/ mi 'am ci'i 'khor phe 'am/ mi 'amaci'i 'khor mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am lte'abya
na mo'am// lto 'bu chen po'i bu pho 'am/ ltel phye chen po'i bu mo'am/ lto'apachan po'i rgan po'am/ lto'athun po'ang+gan ma'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor tho 'am/ lto'abyin
dpo'i 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nas// gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sgen gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo kham/ gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin
rganamo 'am/ gnodasbyin gyi ba'og bo bam/ gnod sbya'i gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pa 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po rgan po 'am/ srin/
brgan mo las/ srin beba 'khor bo'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ yid gs sam/ yi dgasamo'am/ ya rigs kyi bu pho bam/ yid gs kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rgan po'am/
yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor po 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha zamo 'am/ sha za'i bu ba 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha thargan po ngam/ sha za/
na rgan mo 'am/ shabra'i bakhog pho 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ 'byung pobs/ 'byung po mo'am/ 'byung po'i bu po'am/ 'byung po'i bumong ma/ 'byung po rgan po 'am/ 'byung
po rgan mo 'am/ 'byung po'i 'khor pa 'am/ 'byung po'i 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bumamo'am/ grul bumagyi bu po tsam/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'om/ grul bumargan pe 'om/
grul bumargan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho bam/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srul po'am/ srulapo mo'am/ srul po'i bu po'am/ srul po'i bum ram/ sulapo rgan po 'am/
srul po rganamo 'am/ srul po'i 'khor lo 'am/ sul pa'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul re mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo kham/ lus
srul pa rgan po 'am/ lus srul po rgan mo 'ag/ lus srul po 'khor po rag/ lus srul po'i 'khyer mo 'am/ skam byed dam/ skam byed mo 'am/ skam byed kyi du tho 'am/ skum byed/
kyi bu mo 'am/ skam byed rganape 'am/ skum byed rganamo'am daskam byed kyi 'khor pho 'am/ samabyed kyi 'khor mo 'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed mo 'am/ smyo byed kyi bu de 'ag smyo byed
kyi bu mo 'am/ spo byed rgan po bas/ sgo byed rgan mo bam/ sbyo byed kyi 'khor lo 'am/ so spyad kyi 'khor mo lam/ grib gnonanam/grib gnon mo 'am/ grib gnon gyi du bo
kham/ grib gnon gyi bu mo kham/ grib gnonAnanapo'am grong gnon rganam bam/ grib gnon gyi 'khor lo 'am/ gribaganyen gyi 'khor mo'am/ bdabyed dam/ brjod byed/
'am/ brjod byed kyi bu de ma brjod byed kyi bu mo'am/ brjod byed rgan po'am/ brjod byed rgan mo 'am/ brjod pyod kyisakhor po 'am/ brjod byed kyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnon pa
khag/ gnon be mo 'am// gnon pa'i bu mo bam/ gnen po'i bu mo'am/ gnon po rgan po bam/ gnyen po rgan mo bas/ gnon po'i 'khor pho ma/ gnyen po'i 'khor mo
'am 'ga' yang 'ong bar ngas lcad ng bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dag sbyong dang bram zo'i skyadagu dang bcas pa/ lha dang//
mi dang/ lhamayin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtaganama mthong ngo// glags mol bar 'dod cing glags lta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags te so sor gnas par byed de/ da nas bar lhags te so sor gnas

balhagasatsholabu'adod cing/ rgyugs lta 'daglags mi rnyed do// lhani lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ klani klu 'duba'i gnasasu ma yin/ lham yin lha ma yin 'du ba'i go nas sum yin/ rlung lha'i rlung lha 'dura'i gnas sum yin/
nam mkha' lding ni nam mkha' lding 'du ba'i gnas su mayan dri ba ni dri za 'duba'i gnas sum yin/ mi'amacin mi 'am ci 'du ba'a gnas asum yin/ lto 'phye chen po ni lto 'phye chen po 'du
ba'i gnas su ma yin/ gnod sbyin nuganod sbyin 'duba'i gnas su ma yin/ srin po nasrin po 'du ba'i gnas sum yin/ yi ngagasaniyi dgas 'du ba'i gnasasumayin/ sha dza nisha zla
'du ba'i gnas sum yin/ 'byung po ni 'byung po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ grul bumani grul buma'adu ba'i gnas su ma yin/ srul po nasrul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lus srul
pa nilus srul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ skom byang ni skam byang 'du ba'i gnas sum yin/ sbya byed ni skyo byang zhi 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/grib gnani grib bganon 'du ba'i gnas su
0 mayin/ brjod byed ni brjod byed 'du ba'i gnas sumayin/ gnon po naganon po 'du ba'i gnas su me chud do// gang la la zhig rig sngags kyirgyalamo cha bya chen mo 'di las 'gal bar byed
na/ de'i mgo a ka'i rig pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du lags so// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang yid la bya'o// tad+yathA/I li mi li/ kilimali/ kin dugad+he/ mug ste//
sumud+d+he/ A/ nA/ sunADa/ lcang lo can du mchog tu lhas chur phod cig/ A rA pA nA/ ga do/ hIkA/ A li su la/ b+hidz+dzal kA/ u du kU/ u du kAta/ud
dukA/ kare ka kI la ma ti/ tilo mi lo/ saman+tatakr-idat+tA/ shulu hu lu/ hi la lo/ ma limali/ sa la pa li/ ki li ki li sa la ca/bats+tsaM/ bu
lu bu la/ tsa' tshal/ phyil tsal// tsu lu tsulu/ gi rjob Ti/ li shi khaM/ i tob ti/ kho'i kha la hudzubu dzu hu dzu dzuhu dza dzu sudzubu dzu dudzubudzu/ haratar/ har
Ni/ dzats+tshA/ bra dzam+b+he/ susdadun pa du b+hanA/ dzam+b+hami dgoslongasari dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sbra ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang
yongs su bozung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang bodang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa sbang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad
pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba gyis shig/ 'gro brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya thA/ tsitamA le/ tsati tsi tra mA
le/ ta da laA le/ pha le phalamA le/ khu ru khur/ ba rub ru Na/ bi rab+ha ba/ su ru su ru budaM/ mu gum du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis sdong ba dang rab tu sdang ba rnams kyi
dugadang mche ba'i dug dang/ rtsa ba'i dugadang/ kha zas kyi dug bcomamo// su ru su ru ga/ pa ra pa ra ka/ tsa ra tsa ra ka/ tsarak+ka/ ba ri hi ri ha taM/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan
tsa thos kyi ngag 'dun dang bcas pa bdun pa dag gigazi bad kyis dug bcomame// dug nges par bcom mo// dugamangade// alAm lA I li ma// dil/ mal/ ti ha duha/ duli//
drim// blun/ d+hi/ d+hu su kul+lA/ su hU~M// tuM dA/ samatuM dA/ ADan!/ d+hil/ kany+tsanar/ I'i kisi/ ngasems can thams cad la byams pas lhas bla nga dgu
ma[· ]zlab bcur kun ngumar phab haM/ bus/ sha pa ri Na/ budAr Ni/ ka bat+taM/ keb Da ka/ mul Ati sha ba re/ tup+pay+Yo/ sriyaM ka re/ A btsA/ par ba/
a lhas kun nas musar pa'ichar phob cig/ namo b+ha ga bto/ iragomi/ sa kAya/ in+d+ri ya ge dehikA yaM/ g+hi gAr kA ya/ a le tal/ kun le/ a/ ma bun/
Asan/ pA shAn/ pA pan kule/ pratig le/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal la// rgyal ba ma gabrigasamya ngan 'tshangal gnas// rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar

bab drung// thams cad skyob pas la'i drungana gnas // bram bya 'khor ba 'jig nisher ba'i drung// sangs rgyas gsar thub u dum+ba ra'i drung// 'od srungs rgya gro d+hayi drung na gnas // shAkya thuba mchog
khyad par gnas drung du// phyin nas byang chub thob gyur go'u tam// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshon bodi dag la// mngon par dad pa lha gang 'khed pa dag/ lha rnams de dag yid gabamagu gyur nas//
rtag tu dag dang zhi bar 'gyur bar byos// tad+ya thA/ i limali/ ki li mi li/ ki'i la/ kal bo la/ u du ru/ su mo de/ bus ra/ hu'u/ ka lawe/ ka pak+Sha/ mu le/ a
te san ta/ ku li/ kun tA/ nArAya Ni/ pA rAya Ni/ ba ni/ gash+ya pa shani/ ka ba la bstani/ e ri pAsi/ 'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi tshog rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA//
kun dga' bo sman mor rabo 'di dag ni gad kyi bdag be tshangs pa dang/ lca rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhidang/ gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad
pa ste/ kun dga' bo gang smanachen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la'aga'azhig rab tu sdang ba'i sams kyis 'ong na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdunang bas so// tad+ya thA kItiyA
pa ga/ le rdzae'amU le/ eraN+DamU le/ saman+tamUle/ na Ta nAk+She/ a NanaDa/ kun/ it+taM mit+taM/ gA ru/ ar Ta kA/ mar kra ka/ i li ki shi/
zag de la le// ud dun/ nga// byin nas lnga/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal la// rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkangabazhi byed cag bde legs shog/ lam du zhugs rnams
zla bdalegs shog/ phyir bong ngag kyang bang lags shog/ mtshan bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing// khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ ngadag sdig par ma
gyur cig/ khyim thams cad dge ba yin// rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yani// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrulache// dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med// bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun tu bde
legs su gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal go rma bya chen m 'das dge slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad ' srung bgyisashig snga
ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bad legs su gyur pa dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/
dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsung pa dang/ mtshams bcad pa dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ labargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin
gang dag rgya mtsho gnas pa'i gnong sprin chen po dag dang/ gang dag ri'i rgyal bo rab dang/ gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang/ 'brog rnams dang/ 'brog chen po rnams dang/ krung
rnams dang/ klung chen po rnams dang/ sman ljongs rnams dang/ sman ljongs chen po rnams dang/ 'bab chu rnams dang/ ltengaka rnams dang/ lu ma rnams dang/ ri'i phug rnams
dang dur khrong rnams dang/ dur khrodachen po rnams dang/ bzhi mdo rnams dar/ bzhimado chen po rnams dang/ sum mdo rnams dang/ grong rnams dang/ grong khyer rnams
dang grong khyer chen po rnams dang/ lhas rnams dang/ skyed mos tshul rnams dang/ nags rnams dang/ nags tshal rnams dang/ grong stong rnams dang/ las rnams dang/
lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang/ kun ngaga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag lcangal can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bu chen mo 'di dag slong sa dang// bdag
dang sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sbyab dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur
ba dang/ chad pa spang pa dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams bcing ba dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ le brgya 'tsho bar gyur
0kha@#// cig ston brgya mthong bar shog cig// tad+ya thA/ pa rihAr Ni/ tsali li Ni/ sbrum Ni/ blum Ni/ mopAni/ stam+b+hani/ dzam+b+hani/ swa yaM b+hub swAhA/

kun dga' ngo shar phyogs na dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung nas bya ba drib thams cad kyi bdag nga 'a khor dri ba 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma yod pa// dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/
ya gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yong bu dang bcas/ tshango dang bcas/ sman dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/
be'u dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal ma rma bya chonamo 'dis dgoslongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis
shag/ sba ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshe nam/
sbang ba dang/ dug gzhi'il ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ su bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya thA/

dz+hadz+haru/ dz+hadz+haru/ dz+hadz+haru/ dz+hadz+haru/ tshur dzu ru dzu ra dza ru mo sAhA/ kun dga' bo lho phyogasan grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa zhes bya bgrul bum thams cad kyi bdag po/
0 'khor grwa'abum 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma yod pa// grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang lho phyogs su zhing yongs su myong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang
bcas/ nadad pa cas/ blon po dang bcas/ go dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pa nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags
kyargyalam rma bya chen ma 'dis dag slong su ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang/ yongs su bskyang pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su
bskyang ba dang/ zhing dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang bdang mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/
[.. ]sa bcing ba gyis shig/ brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ dang/ ba lu ka/ pa lu ke/ a/
mi tu gyu/ ba ru Na bti/ so ma ba ti/ ba cha mA li ni nga la ni/ bu dri ka/ tsatsu tsi tsusAhA/ kun dga' bonub phyogs na klu'i rgyal patshan pamag mi bzang zhes bya ba klu thams cad
kyi bdago pe 'khor klu 'bum phrag brgya stong dum yod pa// gu rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa nga yang bu dang bcas/ tshapo
dang bcas/ snyanudang bcas/ blon po dang bcas// sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag la dngabacas/ yon dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor
dang bcas pas rige sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'adis dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/
yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshonacha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsud
pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sabacing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ dpya thA/ bdur bdu ra/ bdurI/ bdu ni/
pan+titaM/ mate/ ka Ta/ ki Ti/ bi dru mata ba ngum te/ dutu/ u hu/ chu shu/ hu'u/ ru ra/ ru ru/ ru ru/ rur/ tshu tsu/ tsutsu tshu tsu/ tsu tsu/
tsaphyi/ tsatsasu sAhA/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyalapachen po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag pa 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong
du ma yod pa// gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas to/ gangabyang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dbang du dang bocas/ tshabodangabacas/ snyan ngang bcaso/
blon po dang bcas/ sdadaban dang bas/ na gapa dang bcas/ phanyadang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo'adis dab slong
sa 'dung/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sgrub dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung bdang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/
bdalegs su 'gyur ba dang/ char ba spang ba dang/ mchon pa spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsadang dad/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba gyis shig/ le brgya
'tsho bar gyur cig/ stanang rgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+yathA/ sor sor/ shi ri shi'o/ mit+tim ti/ hiri hi ri/ ma ti/ kiri ra/ hidir/ me lu pa lu/ dr-i ga le/
tsu lu tshul/ han+tob// d+hanad+ma ma ti/ na hatsab/ banad+hu ma ti sAhA/ shar phyogs niyul du der srung// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes ba// nub phyogasan ni/gami bzang
byang phyogs nan lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong bgrags dang ldan// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed// sdeb chol stebs re rgyud/ pharel dbu rnams rab tu
'joms// gzhan gyis mi thubathub par dka'// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul zhang lcamin dang// lha yi g.yu yang myong bar byang
ngang gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rmabya chen ma 'das rig slongs radang bangab dang/ sems can thams cad l srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang/ yongs su
phas bsgrub pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyangs dang/ zhi ba dang/ bang legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang bdung/ dug gzhil ba dang/
dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad ba dang/ sa btsang ba gyis shag dal brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston bargya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+yathA/ a le ma le/ kal tali mil
shil/ pAshe dub/ du dung/ lhas kun tu char phob cig/ hi li mi li/ tshung dub/ a paN+NaM/ bar ma dub/ lcasa'u 'ur kun du char phob cig/ guT+Thag
yanata/ sudaka/ pa da tAya/ a/ na/ puN+Di/ duduN+NaM/ tsuk+ka/ buk+Sha/ ak+Sha/ ar// ma'i Ti/ nir sngo/ pa ra Da/ hir Di/ hi ra Ni/ hi'i lo
lubulu/ mi li mi li/ tule/ tata le sAdA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyis sde dpon chen pa rnams kyi ming thung zhig/ 'di 'u sta/ lus ngan gyi bu thubo// kun durgyal ba
mal zhen// phugs su ldan na gnas nig ste// lcaya bangan ba gsol ba pa// des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis ngag slong sar dang/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la
0 srung ba gyis shig/ 'bargya'atshobar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ du/ b.leb la kale/ ma taM gi/ tshatsAl/ pu ru rANi/ birili ni/ gor/ bar ri/mAti/
gi rnatsats+tshAli/ mA lin/ dilihi li/ ma la/ A ga ti/ gte/ gor/ gats+tshari/ keT+Ta ka btsa ri/ bihari 'deli hi li/ ku sAhA/ skya snang na bter ba'ajig
gzhan gyis mi thu ka ban// grong khyer bzang na gnod sbyin brag shad kyi bu ni byang phyogasan/ lag na dojo/ la pa'i khang// phyagod phung por gnas bcas pa// rgya mtsho'i mtha'ayA bar gyi
sar rngalan gsum bar du 'gro byung// stobs mazhing ni gzi brjid che/ dbag tshe dang cur ni rnam pa'i gnyen// gnod sbyin makha' lding rgyas pa na// sna tshogs sbed pa gnas sgo nas//
gnod sbyin ng kulargyal khab na// sngapo che la stobs po ni// gnod sbyin nag po ti gnag bo// ser skya ya ni gnas na gnas// thub chen ng shAkya'i tog/ sangs rgyus thung ba gar bltams
ba/ rkang bkra bon dgra can na/ tsar tan dbang phyugamo// mnyanayong mni phur bu'o// gnas bcasunan rgya mtsho gnas// yangs pa can nadojo'i mtshon// spre'u ltar dmar por gyad yulan/
wA rANAsir nag po che/ dbaltan sdug pa ma pa na// gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sgo can na// 'dzin pa de ni sgo srung na// 'jigs byed thos kyi 'dabaman// brang gis 'gron 'dzoms pa pa//
'brogan gnod sbyin 'brog gnasas// ser skya pa ni 'brumungasan// 'phags rgyalags nor srung ba// srung byed mananir 'byor pa// gso ba'imathub nagaso ba po//
dga' po nying khri grong khyer gnas// 'phreng ba 'dzin pa chu mchogan// kun ngaga'achemadas zhag na// mang ba dkarapa dangos bzang naM// ming brtan pazhi gawi can na// mi rin ri ldan grong
khyaran// nor gyi bani phyogs mtshams gnus/ smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes// 'jig rten grabs paskyayong na// 'od ma'i 'graman lag brgya pa// ka ling ka na shing rta che// thul bar dka'
ni 'gro'adzems na// srang sgrub nagasan srang sgrub pa// gnod sbyin 'dzoms 'dun khang na// 'phrang bsrung nir brtsags pa// rtangamar na bzang mo pa// ma rdzogs pan thams cad
dadrang// snyoms pa can m skyongang pa// dong dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go/ ma rgyal rgyal namacher ba/tshigs// gnas can nani nor badrang pa// zhi ba zhi ba'i grong len na// zhi ba bzang
po 'jigs byed na// gnod sbyin dbang po dbang grong na// ma dag rig niji grongan// shing/ shing gi grong khyer na// kha reg tsam nasar skya gnas// nor bu dbang dang gang ba bzang// sman
gnyis tshangs paldan pan// ba lang 'dzin na 'dzems pa po// rab tu 'jom sang rdo 'jog na// gnod sbyin chen po bong srungasal// skyugs payi ni ri la gnas// gsum sbas 'gram pa
[s ]ldan ngogasan// ra ru kan 'od byed pa// dga' ba can du nga 'phel byed pa// dga' ba 'phel byed grong khyer na// rlung gisan rlung ldan pa// 'phyang bar gyur na 'thab dga' ga/ bcom brlag na/
nibong bu ba// lang ka na ni bum pa'i lto// gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyamasun// kas lan rimago bo/ rnam bar rgyal dang rnam rgyalaldan// dkar po bcom brlag yul gnas// gnong
gang bas layur// tis gsum ma'i mchi/ sngon 'phreng na pin+tan// rad tu gnas niadum bu ba// btang ger yang dag byed// rlabs dang ldan n bde byed pa/ snanas 'byung
naganod sbyin mdzes// gso ba'i mthaban ma chags pas// dga' byed dang na pho dgu'adang/ dpa' dang gsar gyi lag po dang// kuling ka na lto'abyung po// ko sa na nag po che// dgo ba/
dag pa'i pho brang na// wA rA NA sir skyongab pa// 'gram ldan bung ba rna ba bzang// grong khyer drug na grong gzhan pa// gnod sbyin stobs can matha' ma la// srungad can n mthong dga' ba//
pa langa'adzems na gtsug phud can// phyogs mtshams na thel mo dga'// gdugs 'dran nadikris pa ra// grong khyer gsum na chusrin 'dul// tshang tshang gcig na mig yangs pa//
u dum ba rar sgongabi'od// yangs pa can na lhun gyis grub// rnam bar snang byed zhi ldan na// sbrul gyi bdugs na dga' ba pa// g.yo ba 'dzin n sar skya 'o/ dbyen du 'gro na nga ku la/
u@#// gang pa snying pathob byed na// grong rdal tshol ba lngams na// glang chen brjod par 'dub mchog/ rulha'i yulan gzhu brtan pa// g.yul 'gyang ldan par grang
khyer rgyal/ sgrangan zhing na gnod sbyin dbang// nyid skul ngan rkyal nyin// gnod sbyin mor grags de nyid na// gtumachan gsal gyi 'od dpag can// gnong nga ra byed dang don grub dang//
'byung par byed pa nags na gnas// 'gro ba drug pa 'gro 'joms na// kab nani ka ba nyid// sang ga'i stobs na gnod sbyin gang// song ga stag stobs med byed gnyis// bya ba 'baban
snga bo che// de bzhin gzhan gyi grong las rgyal// ma togasani tsam pa na// mnyam dga' ba ni ri spangs n// b.lang sbyor na gnod sbyin ri// grong khyer nani sde bzang po// gnas dang
bcasan lag pa ba/ ]khal byin na bde byed pa// ke sha b+hin tshegs med nga// babrang po can na bzang po pa// skyesnar can gyi bu na ni// gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdong zhes bya// 'ching bu
nA ni myang named// nama gnas niashathung ba// tshang tshing gtsagan don grub pa// margyal rgyalan dmanapa po// chu mchog nanimuny+dza'i sgra// sanang pa ni nor bu'i nags// gnod sbyin
mi bzad 'groldan dag/ sang skyayi ni gnas na gnas// b.la'adzin dang gzhan ban+tas dang// slob gnas can rtog pa dang// dbu ma pa yi gnod sbyin dag/ grags pa chen po bzang
0 mdzes na// grong khyer snying por dgas dogs pa/ myang ms rmongs byed pa// byung bgron gnod sbyin grags// mtshungs pa yang de bzhin te// dga' bral dang lha rtse ba// 'gas/
byin nan ying 'gas pa/ kha che'i yul 'od byed pa// gtum po ral pa can grongano// si yul gyi sa mtshams na// lngasatsanazhes ni bya pa gnas// de la du nilnga brgya ste// sde bo
tshel stobs po che lcas can gyi na bu thu bo// rgyayul gyi nis la gnas// phrag pa'i mib/ ces bya ba ni// mdzod ldan nani spyan dang bcas// kaladekanamtshang rkang// dkyil
'khor stananadakyil 'khor// kapangeg na lang ka'o bag bod can dga' ba'i tshang tshing na// nam mkha' srungan tshos skyong nga// leg pa chen po ngan pa na// rnam thos bu yi bu dpal lda
rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu// gnod sbyin bya bas yongs bskor cing// blo gar gyi ni yul na gnas// 'gror bcas ri dang gangs can dang// sin yin rgya mtshor gnas// grong khyer
gsung na rtsa gsum lag/ ka 'bing kun rob 'dzoms pa// tshigs sngasar ba'agro ldingan// sing ga lan nor gyi bdag/ natso'i bzhin ni 'brog nis// 'gro 'am ci ni'og na gnas/
pad+madakar po 'od gsal ba// grong khyer chen bco ba can// 'gos pa sbyin nar ba'ajigs pa/ dachudang ldan n dmar sor gnas// bats+tsa Da bskyang btsuT// 'dod pa sbyin n ma/
dang ldan// bu mo 'jugan rab sad nga// kAbi shin lta bar// parol mdaba med dngul mun// nus pa'i gnas nan byed pa// balhab na thugs zangs ris/ ka
ta ka na dmar saso// 'phral ris 'phelan bzhin rgyas pa// u rgyan yul nam rungs pa// 'ongashelangan na bum lteb// chu srin rgyal mtshan manganan// snatshogs sdanabak+kan/
dgu'adang ldan n sgra sgrogs bu// phung po'i bdag par ngam sar pa// chu macan na mthong dga' bo// gnodasbyin musrin rgyalapo'i khab// yangs pa nani gnas pa ste// brgya stong phrag mang
pa yi/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis bston bkur byas// ba langaskyong ba sbrul gdug na// lcang lo'agrongan lcang li ba// dga' ba'i grong na dga' ba can// grong gi lhasan stobs chen gnas//
lha las babs na rnam thos bu// rang gi staniyings su skyong// lcang 'acon na gnas pa ste// gnod sbyin bya bas yongs su bskor// gnod sbyind ngagani rdzu 'phrulatshab/ sda tshab/ stongs
rmob parol gyi dgu thang tu 'dzoms pa/// thubapar dka'ashing gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rdzu 'phrulangang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa// kha dog dang ldan pa// grags pa dang ldan pa// lha dang
lhamayan gyi be yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa// rdzu 'phrul che ba dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi lamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thag
cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sgra ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung pa dang/ yongs su bskyang bdang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur dadang/ chad pa spang nga
dang mtshonamasang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lebargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong
bar shog cig/ tadu// a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ hariNaM/ hA ri Ni/ d+haraNi/ d+hur/ buk+ta/ huk+ka/ bukaM/ bu kaM/ hanatan/ han han/ han han/
pa nang na/ tan tan/ bdag lamamadza' ba rnams/ dpyad ta// dahad haM/ datadi ha/ da tadang/ dahadahaM/ bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams/ pa tsa pa tsa/

pa tsa pa tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tsu tsu tsu tshutshu tshu tsatsu tsu tsu/ dzA Ni dzA dzANidzA Nodza Tedza rodza Todza TA dzA dzA No/ bdag la bying rgol ba rnams d+ha[E, ]/ d+ha d+hu//
d+hu/ d+hu/ d+hud+hu/ nashAyA/ bdag la mi phan par 'dod ba rnams/ hang/ par/ haha/ ha/ haha/ rdzo'i ngo/ dziDi dzi'o/ dziT dziTaM/ dziTadziT/ rdzoTo
dzi/ bangag gi ngagabo rnams/ sha ya// tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tshulu tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tshulu/ hilo hal/ til hil/ hi li hi li/ hili hili
hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ phu du daru/ phuru du ru/ phu ru du ru/ phu ru buru/ phur phuru//
mi'i tsaT/ Ti ciT/ tsiTi tsiT/ Ti tsiTaM/ tsa tsi'i/ bdag gi dgra bo rnams/ nAshu ya/ k+kaka/ mako tsik+ka/ tsak+ka/ shubyung dri/ maM galce/ sa man+tab+had du/
rgyu/ hir/ rgyu/ sawa am+ba/ sArnyani a male/ ba ma le/ tsan+do/ tsan+d+he/ phra b+ho/ sUr+ya/ sUr+ya kAn+ti/ dud+dadzAye/ dum/ dub/ dongung/ phyi
yaM ka ro/ dge slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig de ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis

gang dag phyogs bcu srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po chungeshu rtsa brgyang po 'di dag ming thung zhig kun dga' boshar phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi snga dpomachan pe
gang dgashar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnasatu/ 'di ltaste/ ring po dang/ migabazangadang/ gang pa dang/ ser skya'o// da dag gis kyang rig sngags
kyi rgyal morlabya chen mo 'dis dag slong sa ri dang bdag la srung bgyisashig dalo brgya'atshobar gyur cig/ ston bargya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' belho phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon
chen po gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ 'dit+tasta/ sangag dang/ rtaba'i sang ga dang/ dung can dang/ dga' phe'o// de dag gis kyang rige/
sngags kyi rgyal mo rma khachen mo 'dis ngag slongs ri dang/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lab 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bonub phyogasan gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen pebang rag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed ba bzhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ sangago dang/ song ga'i ral pa dang/ bla ma dang/ sor skya'o// de
dag gis kyang rab sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang/ bdag la srung bgyisashig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston ba mthong bar shog cig/ kun ngag la
babyang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon na de gang dag byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed babazhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'dzin dga' dang/ btson
skyong dang/ khyab 'jug go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dag slong sari dang/ bdag la srung bgyis shig/ lobastsa'atsho bar gyur cig/ ston
brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun ngaga'abo gnod sbyin gyi snga ngapon chen po gang dag phyogasa mtshams na gnas te/ gang dgo phyogs mtshams srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa
bzhi po 'di dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ lngas spyod dang/ rigs lngasar de dang/ rimanyam dang/ gsar can no// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi
rgyalamo rmang chanamo 'di dag slongs ri dang/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ le brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston rgyu mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga'abo gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon
rinapo gang dag sa la gnasato/ gang dang/ sa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag// 'di lta sta/ sa pa dang/ shin tu sapa/
dang 4 nag po dang/ nyer gnag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chedamo 'dis dag slongs ri dang/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig da brgya'atshog r gyur cig/
sten brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' brogadod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po gang dag bar snangal gnas te/ gang dag bar snang la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la srung zhing yongs
su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di drag ste/ 'dit+tasta nyim dang/ zlab dung/ ma dang/ rlung// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalumorma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong
sa ra deng/ bdag la srung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston bargya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i chos kyi
[74/ ]rdzun gang dag sems can rnams srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa rnams med par byed pa// 'jig rtan
la na gangags ra'i phyi'i 'jigan na sgrub rnams kyi mnge zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po dang/ zla ba dang/ skyadagurtsibadag po dang/ chu lha dang/ d+ha ra d+ha dza dang//
dbang ldan dang/ tsan dan dang/ 'gong po'i gtso bodang/ mgrin ngan dang/ mgulanges dang/ btu dang/ nor bu dang/ nor bu spyod dang/ sgra rab dang/ rta lnga po dang/
ri mnyam dang/ gsar can dang/ gang pa dang/ sang ldan pa dang/ g.yon can dang/ gnod sbyin ba lang skyong dang/ 'brog gnas dang/ mi'i rgyal po dang/ rgyal
ba'akhyug mchog dang/ tshigasalnga ser po dang/ bzhin bzang dang/ gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ dri bra sna tshogs sdudang/ 'bras bu gsum bdang/
mgulo gsum pa dang/ lcags mdung ring pa dang ma ldan// gnod sbyin dadag ni gnong sbyin chen po'o// snga rnams kyis yongs su 'dren pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa// 'od dang
ldan pa/ khadog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa dag ste/ rgyal pechen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spunate/ rgyal po chen po rnamadzes kyibs gnod sbyin 'di ni pale rnam par 'tshe'i//
gnod sbyin 'di ni nga migatong bo nas gang dag lagebar byed pa de dag ni la le chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spyanate/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
dge slongs ri deng/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ le brgya 'tshabar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mtshang 'brub dang/ shags dang/
'thabamodang/ 'gyid pa las yongs su skyobs shig/ ma'i gangonadang/mam yin pa'i gdon dang lha'i gangen dang/ klu'i gdenadang/ lhamayan gyi gdon dang/ rlung lha'i gdon
dang mamakha'adzing gi gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ mi 'am ci'i gdan dang/ lto'adze skyen po'i gdon dang// gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ srin po'i gdon dang/ yi dgas kyi gdon
dang shaza'i gdon dang/ 'byur 'iganadang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ srul po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'i gdan dang/ skamabyed kyi gdon dang/ smyo byed kyi gdon
dang grib gnon gyi gdon dang/ brjod byed kyi gden dang/ gnon po'i gden dang/ rgyuskar gyi gdon dang/ byug pa'i gdon las yongs su skyobs shig/ zas su mdangs brab
dang zlasasumangal rbabadang/ zas su shatho ba dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba dang/ zosasu zhag rbab dang/ zas sutshelaza ba dang/ zas su kangaphra ba dang/ rdzas su btsas pa
[/]thang dang/ srog 'phrog pa dang/ zas su gtor maza ba dang/ zas su 'brang ba za ba dang/ rjes su dri za ba dang/ zas su su bdug pa phra ba dang/ bras sum rtogazab dang/ zas su 'bras
bu bra ba dang zasasu letog zabadang/ zasasu sbyin sreg za bdang/ bris su rnag 'thung ba dang/ dras su phyi sazapa dang/ zas su gcin 'thung ba dang/ zas su mchil ma 'thung pa dang/
bras sung snabasazabadang/ bras su snabs zabadang/ bras su lhag ma za ba dang/ zas su skyugs pa za ba dang/ rdzas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang brasasu stogarung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba
las dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ le brgya 'bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ gshang byed dang/ sgyur 'i las dang/
khyadadang/ g.yo ngas khyodadang/ sbyin srog gi yo byad dang/ sbyin srog dang/ 'dzoms pa dang/ pho dang/ rolas dang/ sems bsgyur ba dang/ stodagatongadang/ bza'anyis dang/
skyug nyes dang/ gnod sgrib dang/ gnod bltas dang/ brinyis dang/ sgomanyis dang/ smad pa dang/ skrag pa dang/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang//
mo'o'ajigs pa dang/ chu'i 'jigs pa dang/ pha tshe bgyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang/ mug 'jigs pa dang/ dusamayin par 'chiba'i 'jigs pa dang/ sagayo bas
'jigs pa dang/ yul bdam gas 'jigs pa dang/ gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang/ mimadza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ 'chiba'i 'jigs pa dang 'jigs pa
pa thams cad las dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad l srung ba gyis shig/ bdang/ g.ya'abad/ mdzad ng/ 'brum bu bramo dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang//
la mig dang gzhang nang dang/ 'bras dang/ rdzongang/ g.yan pa dang/ mo dbacad ng/ lcog ba'i 'jigs pa las srung ba gyis shig/ klad pa na ba dang/ gzhogs phyed nabadang/ yig
'jus pa dang/ mig nad dang/ snyand dang/ khand dang/ mgul nad dang/ snying nad dang/ lkog ma lha gonganab dang/ rnabab dang/ sonab dang/ snying nab dang/ rtsing lobs nab dang/
rgyung na nga dang/ steng na bdang/ mkhurab nang dang/ chuso nang dang/ skyo gnas nub dang/ rab tu skyo gnas na ba dang/ bshang lamanab dang/ rgod pa na ba dang/ brlan ba dang/ byanang na ba
dang lag pa na ba dang/ rkang pa rnab dang/ yan lag na ba dang/ nyengalaganab med par gyis shig/ rims nadamad par gyis shig/ nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin ganyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa
nga/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ nyin bdun pa dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ zla ba gcig pa dang/ zla ba gnyis ba dang/ yud tsam pa dang/ rtag pa'i rim sa dang/ rims drag po dang/ mi'i rims dang
[78 ]mi ma yin ba'i rims dang/ 'byung re 'i rims dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa/las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ rims thams cad dang/ nyes par
brog pa dang/ nad thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ dug thams cad dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad ngang/ 'jigs pa thams cad bang dang/ dgo slongs ri
dang sems can thams cad la med par gyis shig swAhA// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bya chen mo bam po gnyes pa statha ma'o/// kun dga' bo sha
banam bcug nyis po 'di dag ni gang dag byang chub sems dang la ma'i rum du zhugs pa na'ang srung/ btsa' kho dang/ btsas ba na'ang srung ba dag go/ bcuganyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'phyang m/
dang rna rnam par phyung ma dang/ rab tu 'phyang mdang/ kun tu 'phyang ma dang/ 'brog ma dang/ song ba'i ral pa dang/ snga'ultar ngamasam dang/ nagamodang/ mi bzad m dang/ dungam grin ma dang/
bya rog mdang/ bum bu lto ste/ shazachen mo bcu gnyis pa 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ khadog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan ba/ rdzu 'phrulatshab/ lhadang lham yin gyi
g.yuladag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go/ dedag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis da ba/slongs ridang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sbab dang/ yongs
su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzungab dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chadapa spang ba dang/ mtshon chasbang ba dang/ dug gzhil
budang/ dug gsadupa dang/ mtshams bcing ba drang/ sangacing bar gyis shig/ khobcu 'tshongar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no// dang thA/
zla bar/ kha ro/ khu ro/ mal/ mi la/ ma le 1 mngon+ti/ man+te/ man+tita/ laphulu/ yulu phulu/ hu lu hu'u/ hulubulu/ hulu gulu/ lu lululu/ mo DamaN maya Di/

ma sato sad+d+hibasad+d+hi sid+d+haM/ sAsti sA sti sAsti sAhU~M/ dag slong sa dang// bdagadang/ sems can thams cad la srungab bya se shige sAhA/ bdag la dag bar gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' ngobashazam chen mo

rgyu shadang brag thob mnems la rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa brgyad po 'di dag ni gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rumadu zhugs pana'ang srung/ btsa' ba dang/ btsas pana'angasrung ba dgag/ brgyad po de dag/
kyang gang man 'dilta sta/ rgyugs ma dang/ rgyags byed m dang/ rgyugs pa shas chon modang/ nyer rgyags mngang/ yid gasam dang/ mdangs zum dang/ thang mo dang/ 'cha'i ba mo ste//

ga gshathamtshan mo brgyad po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ khadog dang ldan pa// grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ lha dang lhamayin g.yu la dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go
0 de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bu chen m 'dis dge slongs ridang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sgrub dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs sugazung ba dang/
yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhib dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spangabang/ mngon masangab dang/ dug gzhilab dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad ng dang/ sa bcing pa
gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston bargya mthong bangashog cig/ dpya thA/ har/ khar/ khur/ ma le/ mele/ mul/ mden+ti/ mat+taM/ maN+Diti ka/ shulu hu lu// huluyulu/
suluyulu/ yulu yul/ hulubulu/ lu 'du lu lu/ mi Di mi TamiTam Ti/ sipisid+d+his sid+d+hi/ sAstisAsti susI sAsti/ dag slongs ri dang saMms can thams cad la srungang gyis shig swAhA/
bdagaladag par gyur cigasAhA/ kun dga'abo sha zachayoshadang khragazab/ mid la rnam por 'tsho babadun po 'di dag ni gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pana'ang srung/ btsa' kha dang/
btsasapa na'ang srung ba dag go/ bdun po de dag kyang ga zhen/ 'di lta sta/ rab 'char ldan dang/ srung ba mo dang/ shatha dramo dang/ gang ba bzang mo dang/ ma srung ma dang/ mdza'i monag mo dang/

drang srong srung bam sta/ shawa mo chen mo sha dang khrag tho ba mi rnams la rnam par 'tsho bar byed pa bdun podi dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa// 'od dang ldan ng// kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/
rdzu 'phrulatsheg lha dang lham yin gyi g.yuladag kyang myong bar byed ba dgage/ da dgagis kyang rabeg sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dgaslongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems
can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lobargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston bargya mthong bar shog cig/ dang bu/ hare/ kha re/ khu ro/ ma lo/ ma le/ mu le/ mad/ maN+Da/ maN+Di ti ka/
hulu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ hulu hu lu/ hu lu hulu/ hu lu hulu/ lu lu lu lu/ mo Dam Ni ma Nim Da de sid+d+hisid+d+haM sid+d+hisats+tshA/ sAn+ti susI sAstisun+ti/ dgoslong sa ra dang sems can thams cad
'tshol srung ba gyis shigasAhA/ bdag la dge bar gyuracig swAhA/ kun ngaga' posranemo gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i ma'o rusaMdu zhugs pa'i ng srung/ btsang khadang/ btsas pana'ang srung nga lnga yod
[5/ ]lnga po de dag kyang gabazhin/ 'delta ste/ gtum modang/ ngos gtum mo dang/ gu'amo dang/ khyab 'jug len dang/ sar skyamodang/ srin mo lnga po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan po/ 'od dang

tha lngam pa/ ladog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul che ba/ lha dang lcam yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag ge/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma ba chen mo 'dis dge
pasku slongs ri dang/ bdagadang/ sems can thams cad lasrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyuratshayi// ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya thA/ hango/ kha/ khur/ ma le/ mi le/
[z/ ]mu le/ mang+gAn+ti/ mat+ti/ maN+Diti ka/ gulu hu lu/ lubulu/ hu lu hu lu/ tulu yulu/ sulungulu/ lu lu lu lu// ma Ta ma Ta ma Dim Ti/ sid+d+hisang+gIsid+d+hisid+d+haM/ sAstisAgI sAstisAn+ti/

ngag slongs ri dang sems can thams cad la srung gyis shig swAhA/ bdag la dag bar gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' bo sun mongonamo sha dang khrag tha ba/ mi rnams M la rnam por 'tshong brgyadapo 'di dag byung
chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na'angasrung/ btsag khi dang/ btsas pa na'ang srung ba dag go/ brgyad po dengag kyang gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ nam dang/ mtshams babrang ma dang/ kusha
lApu'amigacan ma dang/ sgra gcan dang/ kam po dzi dang/ rab mdzab ma dang/ mig ngamang modang/ mi bzad ma sto/ de dag ngesha dang khrag rdzab/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khyarudang/

ngu mo ngagakyang 'phrog pa/ dpeng du zhugs pa'i khyim dag dang bangastong la ston pa/ mun pa'i 'ong 'gro ba'i rjesasu'agro ba/ sgra 'byin pa mi rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog pa bye ba chen po'o// dngagazhi snying

rjemadatsange mi'i dgu skyag pa byed pa sta/ srin mo chen mo brgyad po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa// 'od dang ldanupa/ kha dag dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul chub/ lcangang lhapa ya'i

gyi g.yulab kyang myong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang ragi sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis ngag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cang lasrung ba gyis shig/ lebargya 'tsho bar/
'gyur cig// ston bargya mthong bar shog cig/ tadu thu/ hare/ khare/ khur/ ma le/ mile/ mule/ mden+ti/ mat+te/ maN+Diti kaM/ hu lu du lu/ yulu
yulu hu lu su'u/ buluyulu/ yulungulu/ lulu lulu/ maDi ma Da ma Dim Da Da sats+tsesid+d+hisits+tshasid+d+haM/ swahA/ swastisu stasAsti susti/ bdag la dag bar gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga'
bo srinamo chen mo bcu po 'di dag ni gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na'ang srung/ btsong khadang/ btsas pa nabang srung ba dag go/ bcu po de dag kyang ganganan/ 'diwaste//
srin mo 'phrog/mdang/ srin mo ngaga' podang/ srin mo dmasaram dang/ srin mo dung can ma dang/ srin mo lus las byung ma dang/ srin mo lcabashasamadang srin mo bum par ma dang/
srin mo ma tog kun da'i mareb can dang/ srinamo 'phyang ma dang/ sranemo ma/ srin mo chen mo bcu po 'di dag nirdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang sngon ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa// grags pa dang
ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrulareb/ ltudang lham yin gyigayul dab kyang myong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can
thams cad la srungob gyis shig/ spa ba dang/ yongs su bskyang pa dang/ yongasasu gzung ba dang/ yongs subaskyang ba dang/ 'be dang/ bang legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/
mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsadapa dang mtshams brtsing ba dang/ sa bcing bar byos shig/ lebargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ sonabargya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya thA/ha red/
kha re khur/ ma la/ mi/ ule/ mngon M man+ti/ maN+Diti ka/ hu luhu lu/ bu lu hu lu/ hulu hu lu 1 dulubu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ lu lululu/ ma Tam Dim Tim Da/

sats+tshisadz+dzAsid+d+hasad+d+haM/ grwa ste sAsti sA stisu// bdag la bde 'gasasu gyur cig swAhA/ kun ngaga' bo srin mo chonamo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rumadu zhugs pa
ma'ang sung/ btsa' kha dang/ bas pama'ang srung ba dag go/ bcu gnyis po de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ srin momagonamad ma dang/ srin mo rgya mtshom dang/ srin ma drag mo dang/ srin

mo srog 'phrog ma dang/ srin mo rig 'dzin m dang/ srinamog g.yu'adzinam dang/ srinamo mang ba 'dzin madang/srin mo lagri 'dzin madang srin mog shel 'dzim dang/ srinayo rAkhor le'adzinam dad gsum yokhor yug
mdang/ srin mo 'jigs byed ma sta/ srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag nirdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rgyags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul chapa/ lhadang lcam
yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myongab byed bdag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma chen mo 'angs ngag slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig sbab dang//
yongasasu bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bdalegs 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon tshasbyang ba dang//
dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsadapa dang/ mtshams bcang ba dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ leb 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston rgyu mthong bar shog cig/ tad+yathA/ har/ kha re/ khu re/
thamal mi la/ mu le/ mden+ti/ mat+ti/ mad+hIti ka/ hu lu hu'u/ hulubulu hu lusulu/ huluhu lu hu lu lu/ lulu lulu/ ma DamaDi maNi ma Da/ sid+d+hisid+d+hisad+d+hasad+d+haM/ sAn+ti
'tsha sAsti sAstisusti/ dag slongs ridang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la dag bar gyur cig swAhA/ kun ngaga' pomamo bcu gnyis po 'di dag gang dag byang chub sams dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs padabang/
srung/ btsa'i kha dang/ btsas pa rna'ang srung zhing/ gang dag sems can la gnod par byed pa// skrag par byed pa// rnam par 'atshob byed pa dgago/ bcu gnyis pa de dag kyang gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/

h+pha tshangs pa'ichung ma dang/ drag po'achungamadang/ gzhon nu'i chung ma dang/ khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang/ dbang po'inangam dang/ phag ba chungam dang/ lus ngan chung ma dang/ rlung lha'i chung ma dang/
gshin rje'i chungam dang/ rlung gi chung ma dang/ mo'i chung ma dang/ nag mon mo ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma pachen mo 'dis ngag slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams
cang la srung ba gyis shig/ sdu bdang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhing dang/ bde legs su'agyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon chusbyang
gdang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug bsad pa dang/ mtshams bcing ba dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ lebargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ dpyathA/ ha re/ kha re//
khu re ma 'a ma le/ mu le/ mang+gAn+ti/ maN+DitIke/ hu lu hu lu 1 hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ phulu hu lu 1 hu lu hu lu/ lulu lulu/ maDim Dim Da ma Ni/ sid+d+hisod+d+hAsid+d+hisid+d+ho//

sA sIsA sti su stisu sti/ bdag la bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' bo srin po'achungam sha zachen mo ral pa gcig pazhes bya ba rgumatsho'i ngegasan gnas pa gang khrag gi dri tshir na mtshan gcig la

ngag tshad brgyad khrir 'gro ba yod de/ de'ang byang chub saMms dpa' ma'i ramadu zhugs pa na'ang srung/ btsa'akha dang/ btsas pa nababasrung ba'o// ngas kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slongs/
ri dang bdag dang/ sems can thams cad lasrung ba gyis shig/ spa dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongasu bskyang ba dang/ ni dang/ bangalegs su'agyur ba
dang/ chung pa sang ba dang/ mtshon cha sungab dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsadapa dang/ mtshams baming pa dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ lebcu 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgyam thodabar
shog cig/ tad+yathA// kha re/ khur/ male/ mi le/ mule/ mang+gani/ ma/ maN+Diti kaM/ sulu hu lu/ huluyulu/ hu lungulu/yulu hu lu/ hu lu
lu lu khu khu khum i Dim Ni ma'i/ sid+d+hi sid+d+higats+tshasits+tshA/ susti bsti sA stisAsti/ dge slongs ri dang/ bdag dang 2 sems can thams cad la swAhA/ kun ngaga' bo khyod kyis srin mo rnams kyi

ming cung zhig/ 'di lta sta/ srin mo sor skya mozhis byang dang/ srin mo d+ma zhes bya bangang/ srin mo ma hamozhes bya ba dang/ srin mo dkar mo zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo sbugu can zhes bya bdang/ srin mo

'bar ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo gdung ma zhes bya ba dang/ srinamobum pa can zhes bya ba dang/ sin ma drimang ces bya ba dang/ srimamosazhes bya ba dang/ srin mo sang ga'i blo ba zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo

snar ma zhes bya bdang/ srin mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo desrag za ba dang/ srin mo chu lha'i chung ma dang/ srinamo nagamo dang/ srinamo glang chan ma dang srin mo gshol ma zhes bya ba dang/
srin mo stobs chen m dang/ srin mo rba ba mo dang// srin mo lag 'gro ma dang/ srin mo matangag dang/ srin mo dmar ser mo dang/ srin mo thigs pa 'dzin dang/ srin mo gtugamo ma dang/ srin mo

a nga kar mo nas bya ba dang/ srinamadri 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo grul bumam dang/ srinamo tshon ngamam dang/ srinamo zlag byed ma dang/ srimamo rgyags ma dang/ srin mo zabam dang/ srinamo mngalaphra mdang/

srimamo khrag rtsa mdar srin mo so stom dang/ srin mo sngangs byed ma dang/ srinamo tshangs pa ma dang/ srin mo lteng ka skyong dang ]sunemo jo rje 'dzin dang/ srin mo skam byed ma dang/ srin mo mun pa dang//
srin mo char 'bebs ma dang/ srin mo 'brug sgrogs ma dang/ srin mo 'gams ma dang/ srin mo snang byed ma dang/ srin mo 'gromadang/ srin mo sgromam kha dang/ srin mo nor 'dzin ma dang/ srin mo
mtshan mo nag mo dang/ srin mo gshin rje'i pho nyamo dang/ srin mo dri ma med dang/ srinamo stobs bzangam dang/ srin mo gtsang lenamadang/ srin mo ral pa 'greng dang/ srin mo mgo brgya ma dang/
sumamo lag brgya ma dang/ srin mo mig brgyam dang/ srin moganod byed ma dang/ srin mo 'dzoms ma dang/ srin mo phyi lam dang/ srin mo blub mo dang/ sranemo mtshan ma rgyu dang/ srin mo nyin mo rgyu
dang srinamazhags pa mdang/ srin mo khri mo dang/ srin mo rnam par 'tshe dang/ srin mo ral gri 'dzin dang/ srin mo lag na gtun shing 'dzin dang/ srinam lagan rtsa gsum ma dang/ srin
mo so brod mdang/ srin mo yid du 'ong pa dang/ srin mo des ma dang/ srin mo gtum mo dang/ srin mo so dang/ srin mo'agro 'khrug ma dang/ srin mo sngon mo dang/ srin mo khramo dang/ srin mo chen

mo bdunacu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa// grags pa dang ldan pa// rdzu 'phrulatshang/ lha dang lha mayan gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa ngag go/
u0f00 rnga de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis rig slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sbya ba dang 1 yongs su/
bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bdalegs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha snang pa dang/ dug gzhilab ra/ dug gsadang/
glu dang mtshams bcinge ba dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya thA/ tilehil/ la hol/ mi li malo/ mi li malo/ mi'i
mi'i/ mi rim li/ milami la hur hu ru/ purungur/ hur hur/ huruhu'u/ du hu ra/ mi tshe rngatsir tsir tsir ci lnga tsi Na Ta miT/ hikAheka hikahika/ ta Da ba du Dab/ bak+Sha
glabakye/ hor ha ri/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ har har/ tsal tsal/ rtsolu tsu lu swAhA/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// swAhA/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la swahA/ dgrab tse
pa rnams la sud+hu/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la sAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sA/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la sa// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la sAhA/ rgyun du zhugs pa/
rnams lasAhA/ yang dag par song ba rnams la sAhA/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la sAhA/ tshangs pa la sAhA/ dbang po la sI/ dgu'i bdag po la sAhA/ dbang ldan laM swAhA/ me

[p/ ]lha lasAhA/ rlung lha la sAhA/ muny+tsal sAhA/ gshin rje la satwA/ nye ba'i debang po la sAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyipu la sAhA/ dri za'i bdag po yul 'khor srung lasArA/ grul
bum gyi bdag po ring gis skyes pa la sudA/ klu'i bdag po mig mi bzang la sAhA/ lha rnams las// klo rnams l sAdA/ lcam yin rnams la sA/ rlung lha rnams la sA/ nam mkha' lding
rnams la sAdAdriza rnams las/ mi 'am ci rnams la sAhA/ lto 'phye chon pa rnams la satA/ gnod sbyin rnams la sAhA/ srin po rnams la sahA/ yangegs rnams le swA hA/ sha za rnams
la sAdA/ 'byung po rnams lasAhA/ grul bum rnams la sU/ srul po rnams la sAhA/ lus srul po rnams la sAhU~M/ skam byed rnams lesAhA/ skyo byed rnams la sI/ grib gnon
rnams la sAhA/ brjed byang rnams la sAhA/ gnon bo rnams la sAhA/ blang dang nyim la sAhA/ drag po rnams la sAsh+tsa rgyu skar rnams la sAhA/ gza' rnams la swAhA/ skarama rnams la
suhA/ drang srong rnams la sa// brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la sAhA/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la sAgA/ dkaramo la AhU~M/ sa 'dzin ma la sAhA/ dug sel mal sAhA/
'tshamadam la sAhA rmugs byed ma la sAhA/ rongs spyod ma la sAhA/ rlung mo la sAhA/ thal mo rdegam la sAhU~M/ 'gro lding ma la sAhA ]she ba re la sAhA/ a thang sha ra ri la swAhA/
gdum mo la swAhA/ baglang chen mo la snyahA/ klu'i snying po la swAhA/ nam mkha' lding gi snying po la sAhA/ yid las byung ba la swAhA/ yid las byung b.ren po la swAhA/
yi ge drug ma la swAhA/ nor bu bzang laswAhA/ gang pa bzang pal swAhA/ kun tu bazang po la sduu0f09 kun tu bzung pe chen po la sAhA/ dmatshig la sAd+d+haM/ mtshig chen po la sAhA/
zlab na pe las// so sor 'brang ba chen po la sAhA/ bsel ba'i nags tshal la sAhA/ bsil ba'i nags tshal chen pe la sdudA pa bon 'dzin m la sA/ brten 'dzin chen po la swAhA/
btang bzung la swAhA/ btang bzung chen po la sAhA rgyal byed ma la sAhU/ zhim lasAgA/ lngas can lasAhA/ gzhan gyis mi bam la sAhA rmabya'i rgyal mo gsar du snang ba las/
sgyu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma byatshaname la sa/ rig sngags chonamo la sAhI/ gsang sngags chen ma la sAhA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal rma bya chen mo lo suhA/ rma bya gnon pa la swAhA/ sosor 'brang
pa chen yodang/ srung ba chen mo dang/ gsangasngags kyi tshig chen mo dang/ rig sngags chen mo 'di dag gis ngag slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad kyi gshid byang rnams bam
mo sgyur ba'i las rnams dang/ byad dang g.yeng byed rnams dang/ rolangasa rnams dang/ sams bsgyur ba rnams dang/ bod gtong rnams bcomamo// skam byed rnams dang/ smobyed
rnams dang/ gling gson rnamasu dang/ brjod byed rnams dang gnon pa rnams bcom mo// snyam pa rnams dang/ lkug pa rnams dang/ dbyig dug rnams dang/ dug rnams bcom mo//
bawa'anyes rnams dang/ skyag nyes rnams dang gnod sgrib rnams dang/ gnod bltas rnams dang/ bris rnams dang/ ngago chos rnams dang/ smad pa rnams bcom mo// rims
nyin gcig pa rnams dang/ nyin gnyis pa rnams dang/ nyen gsum pa rnams dang/ nyin bzhi pa rnams dang/ nyin bdun pa rnams dang/ zla ba phyed pa rnams dang/ zla ba gcig pa//
rnams dang/ nyin mo pa rnams dang mtshan mo pa rnams dang/ yud tsam pa rnams dang/ rtag pa'i rims rnams dang/ rims drag po rnams dang/ rlung ra sa gyur pa rnams dang/
mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ 'byung po'i roms rnams dang/ mi'i rims rnams dang/ mimayin pa'i mu
rnams bcom mo// rims thams cad bcomamo// shu ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ 'brum bu phragong mdzodang/ pholamig dang/ 'bras dang/ rdodang/ ma dbaladang/ lhag pa
rnams bcom mo// klad pa na ba dang/ gzhogs phyung na ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ mig nad dang/ snand dang/ kha nad dang/ mguland dang/ snying nad dang/ lkog ma'ilha
gor na ba dang/ rnab na ba dang/ son ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsibs logs na ba dang/ rgyab na ba dang/ rten ba dang/ mkhur ba na ba dang/ mtshan bar rdol/
ka ba dang/ sku gnas na ba dang/ rab tu skyo gnas ni ba dang/ rkang pa nab dang bar n ba dang/ phyin pa na bdang/ lag pa na ba dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/ yan lag na ba dang/ nying lag na
b rnams bcom mo// gdon thams cad dang dug thums cad dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang/ nang thams cad btsamamo// dag slong sa ri dang/ bdam/dang/ sems can thams cad
bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ mtshan mo bde lags nyin bde legs// nyima'i gung gi bde legs dang// nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol// sangs

(rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chung phyag 'tshal// grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi'il phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal le/ dram bre gang
gasdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag lo'ang phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag dang sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ yongs su skyong bar gyur cig/ pha bde legs
su gyur cig/ mabade legs su gyur cig/ mngal bde legs su gyur cig/ rkang gnyis pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig/ rkang bzhi pa rnams bde legs sugyur tsag/ rkang mangs pa
[4/ ] rnams bde legs su gyur cig/ srid pa gsum du gtogs pa 'i sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swA/ kun daba' ba khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyimang zung zhig 'di ltaste//

klu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas dang [. ]klu'i rgyal potshangs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po tshangs chen dpaM/ klu'o rgyal po dbang po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rtaba'i dbang po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshodang/

klu'i rgyal po rgya mdo budang/ klu'i rgyal pa dug med bcas dang klu'irgyal pe mtsho chen dang/ klu'i rgyal pamatshochen gyi budang/ klu'i rgyal po musrin dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal

pa dga' po dang/ klu'i rgyal ro mi zhum pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po nye bar mi zhum pa dang klu'i rgyal po ltan mdzes dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyalaMl po 'jog pa dang/ ka'i rgyal po sku

yas dang/ klu'i rgyal po lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po pA ts+tshar dang/ klu'i rgyal po sor mo drug pa dang/ klu'i rgyal pa snying por 'gro dang/ klu'i rgyal po sor skya dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang kyu'i
rgyal po dpal mgrinadang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal 'phel dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs bzang dang/ klu'i rgyalar ngosha nga la dang/ klu'i rgyal po shin tu stobs dang/ klu'i

rgyal po sha la b+ha dang/ klu'i rgyal po chu skyes dang/ klu'i rgyal po stag re dang/ klu'i rgyal po log bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal ra log pa brgya pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po ra ring dang/ klu'i rgyal po'i
bod dang/ klu'i rgyal po zlakhod dang/ klu'i rgyal po bzang sdug dang/ klu'i rgyal ra ngar ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang/ klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang/ ku'i

rgyal pa rgyas byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po char 'bebs dang/ klu'i rgyal po dri med dang/ klu'i rgyal pa stobs chen mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po lcang lo can gyi mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po rta mgo dang/ klu'o/

rgyal po ba glang mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal pa ri dgas mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po glang po che'i mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po rAn stobs can dang/ klu'i rgyal po mi'i sang reg dang/ klu'i rgyal po skya po'atshong/
klu'i rgyal po ris bkradang/ klu'i rgyal pamigabakra dang/ klu'i rgyal po sna tshogs sdadang/ klu'i rgyal po mig gtong redang/ klu'i rgyal po gtong ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po btung badrung dang/ klu'i

rgyal po btang bzung chan po dang/ klu'i rgyalA pe sgra sgrogs kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po rtogs pa'i bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal dang/ klu'i rgyal ba dpal can dang/ klu'i rgyal po ri brtsagaso dang/
klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po srin bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang/ klu'i rgyal po gsar dang/ klu'i rgyal po glang po che'i rtsal dang/ klu'i rgyal bo dkaMr gsal dang/ klu'i
[”]rgyal po sar skya dang/ klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab dang/ klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang/ klu'i rgyal po nga dang/ klu'i rgyal po sog mamad dang/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang/ glu'i rgyal po nag dang/

kA'i rgyal po stobs lnga dang/ klu'i rgyal po srod mad kyi du dang/ klu'i rgyal po la ba dang/ klu'i rgyalape sgra byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'jigs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'jigs byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po

srin po dang/ klu'i rgyal po brag lag dang/ klu'i rgyal po gad+madang/ klu'i rgyal po sin d+hu dang/ klu'i rgyal po bkru dang/ klu'i rgyal po sI dang/ klu'i rgyal po rta mchog dang/ klu'i rgyal po bkra
shis dang/ klu'i rgyal pem dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rab brtan dang/ klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang klu'i rgyal po mngog

'dzin dang da klu'i rgyal pa bzang po dang/ klu'i rgyalapo rab tu bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu 'gul dang/
klu'i rgyal po nag po gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal po sar re gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal po dmar bo gnyis dang klu'i rgyal pa dkar pa gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal de 'phreng ldan dang 8 ku'i rgyal po dam 'phrang
pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po nga'u dang/ klu'i rgyal po khrums stod dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnga dang/ klu'i rgyal pa 'dradang/ klu'i rgyal po amra mu stogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu'i du dang/ klu'i

rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'phags skyes pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po shing rta' bzhin dang/ klu'i rgyal po tsam par
skyes dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'u dum dang/ klu'i rgyal po lnga len dang/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug phud lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po bdud dang/ klu'i rgyal po khrigs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal

po 'o ba'i thigs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal pa bung ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po dus las byung ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs can dang/ klu'i rgyal po cung byad can dang/ klu'i rgyal po cung phrad pa dang/ klu'i rgyal

po tsam pa ka dang klu'i rgyal po ga'utam nag mo dang/ klu'i rgyal po nam mkha'i bong bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po snod can gyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po me bzang dang/ klu'irgyal po mi dang/ klu'i rgyal po/

mi'i rtsa ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po mi'i thogam dang/ klu'i rgyal po mi'i bla ma dad/ klu'i rgyal po glang po che dang/ klu'i rgyal po lcang lo can dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor bu can dang/ klu'i rgyal po mi ma yin
( pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzings dang/ klu'i rgyal po mchog dang/ klu'i rgyal po ba luka dang/ klu'i rgyal po u lu ka dang/ klu'i rgyal po hu lu dang/ klu'i rgyal po e la can dang/ klu'i rgyal

po a la'i lo ma dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'gro sgradang/ klu'i rgyal po pa 'chis+saM dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzi tsan dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang/ klu'i rgyal po ser skya dang/ klu'i rgyal re zhi ba
'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po me tog ut+pal dang/ klu'i rgyal po son mo can dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po yongs su nag po dang/ gru'i rgyal po 'phel ba dang klu'i rgyal po
pa thar pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po blonan dang klu'i rgyal pe rab thar dang/ klu'i rgyal po la ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po mgyogs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po a la dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'dus pa dag dang/
klu'i rgyal bo dga'i bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po bstan dga' bo dag dang/ gru'irgyal po gsal kha ma dang/ klu'i rgyal po blta mdzes chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal po mchog can dang/ klu'i rgyal pa
mchog ldan grog ma dang/ klu'i rgyal po bzhin bzang dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma leng gdeng dang/ klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po sang ga 'dzin dang/ gru'i rgyul pa 'gro lding dang//
klu'i rgyal po nag po gnyis dang/ klu'i sprul po dkar po gnyis dong de klu'i rgyal po 'o dkar gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal po de dag dang/ gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus
su 'brug sgrog pa/ dus dus su glog 'byin sa/ dus dus su char 'bobs pa/ dus dus su la de ga sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ gsum la
skyabs su dong ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang/ ma dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal po'i las kyi 'jibs pa dang sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa las thar ra/ sa 'dzin pa//
rin po che'i gzhal mang khang chen por gnas pa tshe ring/ bskal par gnas pa// dbang cha bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrulatsha ba/ lengs stong chang/ 'khor phal che ba/ dgra'i
'dapung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dpaldanu pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa// grags pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrulachob/ lha dang lham yin gyi
g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag ste/ klu'i rgyal po bu dang bcas pa de tshabo dang bcas pa/ spyan dngabacas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ sde dpon dang bcas pa/ phonya dang bcas
pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can
thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sbya bdang/yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang nang pa spang
k+kA ba dang/ mtshon cha sbyang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsar dang/ mtshams bcing pa dang/ sa bcing bar gyis shig/ le brgya 'tsho bar gyuracig/ ston rgyu mthong bar
shog cig/ dag slongs ri dang ngadab ngag bar gyur cig/ gtsang sbram byas pa dang/ gtsang sbra byas pa dang/ myos pa dang/ rab du myos pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'breng ba dang/ 'dug
pa dang/ la ba dang/ mil ba dang/ 'ongs pa dang/ ma'ongs pa jag bar gyur cig rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang/ ma'i 'jigs pa dang/
chu'i 'jigs pa dang/ mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ gsod pas 'jigs pa dang/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra'i 'jigs pa dang/ 'joms pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag
tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang/ mu ga'i 'jigs pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chiba'i 'jigs pa dang/ sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ gcan gzan khro ba'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde
legs su gyur cig/ lta'i 'jigs pa dang/ klu'i 'jigs dang/ lham yin gyi 'jigs pa dang/ rlung lha'i 'jigs pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang/ dri bra'i 'jigs
pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i 'jigs pa dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'jigs pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa dang/ srinapa'i 'jigs pa dang/ yi dgas kyi'ajigs pa dang/ shazang
'jigs pa dang/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang/ grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang/srul po'i 'jigs pa dang/ lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang/ skam byed kyi 'jigs pa dang/
smo byed kyi 'jigs pa dang/ grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang/ brjod byed kyi 'jigs pa dang/ gnon po'i 'jigs pas bdago bad lugasas gyur cig/ gshang byed dang/ sgyur ba'i las
