dang/ byad dang/ g.yos byed dang/ rolas dang/ soms bsgyur ba dang/ sdod gtor dang/ paza' nyes dang/ stug nyes dang/ gnod sgrib dang/ gnongaltos
'bri nyes dang/ rtsomanyas dang/ smad pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ sha pa dang/ g.ya'u budang mdzodAng/ 'brum bu phra mo dang//
phal mig dang/ g.yun pa dang/ mo dngal dang/ lcog pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bangalegs su gyur cig/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gung ga bde legs dang//
nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub thuga'atshal lo// grol gyur phyag 'tshal brel la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhi gyur phyag
'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo// bram thu gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la khang phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag dang
!sums can thums cad la srung ba dang/ skyob pa gyis shig swAhA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs
shing rjes suyi rang ba'o// dbya thA/ a la/ ka ra Da/ mad/ ma da bam// a pa re/ shapa re/ tu re tu re/ tsu re tsur/ shab re ba shabar/ hu tsi ri/ ku ci
ku tsa mutsimu tsisAhA/ kun ngagatsatho ragi sngags kyi rgyalamo rma byarmanamo 'angani yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs gtsugato'o can gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+yathA//
ing te/ ming te/ khu ra/ pi khur/ hi li hi ma la mi la/ katu mu'u le/ am+pa re/ amArAb ti dub/ dadung/ hili hi li/ kutshikutsi/ mutsi mukyi
sAhA/ kun dga' bo gi sdugs kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA/ ma ri mor/ kabad ti/
mats+tshA/ maN+Di ti ka/ hare hu ra/ g+ha ro g+ha re/ kha ri kha ra/ phal le/ pha li ni/ dan/ ngan+tani/ nil/ shaka Ti ma kAT/ na Da/ na Ni// shi ri shi ri/ shi ri shi ri
gi rashi ri sAhA/ kun dag 'a bo rig sngags kyi rgyalame rma bya chen mo 'din yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang bgatad+ya thA/ hi Di mi Di/ ku mu tre/
duDi/ A NA din/ la/ shaka ra tsakar/ tha ga ri/ takari/ kAny+tsan/ kAny+tsanA ba ti/ bar/ bar/ ba re/ ba/ dan/ sats+tsha swAhA/ kun dag/ba rib/
sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA/ tan tu le/ ta ta le ta ta lo to ta la/ dale bI re/ bi
dzaye bidz+dzad+har/ a ra dze/ bi radze/ piradza/ masi/ ma tis la/ mA lin/ muN+Da/ grimu'u/ rwa la dz+wa le dza le/ dzAle b+hadra ba ti/ sid+d+hiswAhA/ kun
dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+yathA/ aN+Dal/ paNA'i
kar+Na re/ maN+Dare/ khaNA'i/ dzam+b+ha dzam+b+han ti/ dzam+bu ba ti/ ga/ mad+d+hAte ke/ a ma re/ sid+d+haM/ ha ra ha ra ha ra ha ra/ pa shu pa shu pa shu pa shu/ pa shu sid+d+hi satwA/ kun

dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalam ma chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir da ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA 3hil
mi li kili mi la/ i li la/ kang la 1 ka du ba le/ aDa ma la// 2Tabye/ bu sa Da ka/ bus/ nor kAnaM/ kAmin/ ka/ da ra ki/ ru ru ta ra bo
ra Ni pra kri tingaH/ mi li tu le/ itihAs/ a ba le/ chu ba le/ ba li ge/ baTi ban+tika/ a Na y+Ya/ ba'i dus+sa/ phyogs bcu kun tu lcasachar bo cig/ bcom ldan 'das la
phyag 'tshal la// sa la dga' bas chus dbab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal la// i roji ya/ go dedi kA ya/ ts+tshi ga ri kA ya/ arutsi/ ma ru tsi/ naN+NaM/ badzinaN+Da/
ud yan pra me/ a le tA le/ kun dwa le ku la tA le/ nArAya Ni/ mA rA ya Ni/ ba ni/ sbar shani/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshiga rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ ji ltar
00 de bzhin gshegs ba ngas bstan cing rjes su yi rang nas/ dge slong kun dga' bos dag slong sa ri la bad legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/
sba ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon[]spang ba dang//
dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsud pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi
rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas bshad cing rjes suyi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri shi ri/ d+had dri 3[S]ti/ ti/ [S]ti/ phyud dre/ hare ha
par/ pAr Ni/ dan+tisha pa ri/ shi ba/ shul pa rin/ bo d+hi ba dri/ ba d+ha bod+d+haM/ badz+has/ bo d+hi par tsA ri Ni ya sAhA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo 'di ni mi
mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes suyi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA/ ha la hil/ mi li mi li/ mAli ni/ tsang kar/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ra ka ra/ kar/ kal ye brah+phayo/ ratu ka
raN+Da ka/ gi Do phub phus so/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ har ha ra/ phu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru phu ru swAhA/ dug bcomamo// dug nges par bcom so// sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dub nges par btsogamo//
rangasas rgyas kyi gany+dzi brjid kyis dug bcomamo// dgra bcom pa'i gzibarjod kyis dug bcom mo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i gal+li bad kyis dug dacom mo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i/
gany+dzirjid kyis dug bcom mo// rgyun du zhugs pa'i gzi brjid kyis dub bcom mo// bden par smra ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo// tshangs pa'i ma dbal gyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo//
dbang po'i rdo rje'i gaN+Di brjid kyis dug btsam mo// khyab 'jug gi 'khor los dug bcom mo// gshin rje'i be cen gyis dug bsam// tshulta'i zhags pas dug btsem ma/ lcam yAn gyi rgyus dug
bcom mo// klu'i rig sngags kyis dug bcomamo// drag po'amadung rtsis dug bcomamo// skam byed kyi mdung thung gis dug datsam mo// ra yi sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo// dug/
nges par bcom mo// dug sa'i nang du song zhig/ dag slong sari dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad dug thams cad dang/ ba'u lta bu'i dug dang/ lte ba'i dug dang/ tang da la'i dug
ngang/ nag po btsugs pa'i dug dang/ mar ba'i dug dang/ rtsa ba'i dug dang/ kha zas kyi dug dang/ phyi ma'i dug chung/ lta ba'i dug dang/ glob ga dug dang sprin gyi dug dang/
pa'i sbrul dang/ byi ba dang/ srin bu ki ta dang/ lu ta dang/ kan d+ha ba dang/ sbal pa dang/ sbrang bu dang/ bung ba dang/ pa ta ri dang/ rngam bu ga dang/ rol ta'i dug dang/ mi'i dug
dang sdig pa'i dug dang/ mi ma yin pa'i dug dang/ dog pa'i dug dang/ sman gyi dug dang/ rig sngags kyi dug las bde legs su gyur cig/ dug thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig
sAhA/ kun dga' bo ragi sngags kyi rgyalam rma chen mo 'di lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sbas shing rjes su yirang ba'o// tad+ya thA// dzA lAdzacu la/ mAlAdzAn+ta la/ tsA pa Tadzin le/
ma thani/ gru ta ni/ gra sa ni/ hari shi ri/ d+hu tigar/ taru ta ru/ Na ba ta hehA hA hAhA/ sing ha/ d+hu ti bi dzIti/ ku ru ku ru/ ba sa re/ tu Ta tu Ta si/ ba rngo ba Ta
sa mi lomi lo/ ka pa la// ka pi la mu'u le/ hA hIhU/ sdang ba dang rab du sdang ba thams cad rab tu rmugs par bya// lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ yan lag dang/ nying
lag dang/ sum cu pa'i lha dang bcas te tshud pas gcad par bya'o/ @#/uts+tshing g ci/ sur btaM/ brta/ badzrab dzra/ badzra badzra/ badzrapa ta ye swAhA/ kun dga' bor bed sngags kyi
rgyalam rma bya chen mo 'din rgyal po chen pa bzhis sashinge rjes su yi rang ba'o// tad+ya thA/ dz+wa ladzA lan/ tapa nata pa na/ d+ha ma dz+ham na/ sa ra sa re Na/ A kAN+Di muTi mu To ma Ti
mi Ni sa ra sar/ ma ra ma ra/ har har/ ta ra tar/ tir tir/ DaT kr-i Na snga/ dA dA dAdAdA/ bA bAbA pAbA/ hal ha la ha la ha la ha la/ sid+d+hisid+d+hi sid+d+hi sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/
da sa/ @#/ swasti sAsi sAsi swAsti swasti/ dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/ chedagatong dang/ gshin rje'i pho nya dang
kyi mtshan monag mo dang/ dus kyi zhags pa dang/ 'chi bdag gi chad pa dang/ tshangs pa'i chad pa dang/ dbang po'i chad pa dang/ drang srong gi chad pa dang/ lha'i chad pa dang/ glu'i chad pa
ts+tso dang lham sprin gyi nad pa dang/ rlung lha'ichad pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gi chad pa dang/ dribra'i chad pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i chad pa dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i chad pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi
chad pa dang/ srin po'i chad pa dang/ yi dgas kyi chad pa dang/ shatha' chad pa dang/ 'byung pa'i ched pa dang/ grul bum gyichad pa dang/ srul po'i chad pa dang/ lus srul po'i chad pa
dang/ skamabyed kyi chad pa dang/ sgo byed kyi chad pa dang/ grib gnon gyi chad pa dang/ brjod byed kyi chad pa dang/ brten pa'i ra pa dang/ ro langs kyi chad pa dang/ rgyal po'i
tshabya chad pa dang/ chom rkun gyi chad pa dang/ ma'i chad pa dang/ chu'i chad pa dang/ chad pa thams cad lus dag srung sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/

lobargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun ngaga' bo khyod kyis klung gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung zhig// 'di lta sta/ klung gi rgyal po garlag dang/ klung gi rgyal po sa d+hu dang/
klung rgyal po bkru dang/ klung gi rgyal po sA ta dang/ klung gi rgyal po mnga' 'byung dang/ klung gi rgyal pa khyim ldan dang/ klung gi rgyal po gshin rjesal dang/ klung ga rgyal po bya rgya dang//
klung gi rgyal po rgyus 'bab dang/ klung gi rgyal po brgya 'bab dang/ klung gi rgyal po zhags bral dwang/ rlung gi rgyal po na gi 'dzin dang/ klung gi rgyal po sa ldan dang/ klung gi rgyal
po bla ba'i ma dang/ klung gi rgyal po dbyangs can dang/ klung gi rgyal paru sbal can dang/ klung gi rgyal bo chu drin can rang/ klung gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang/ klung gi rgyal po zangs
'dabang/ klung gi rtsol pa sbrang rtsi can dang/ klung gi rgyal po sa ldan dang/ klung gi rgyal po bu ramashing dang/ klung gi rgyalapa rdzongebuldan dang/ klung gi rgyal ba pa grong ldan dang/
klung ba rgyal po pags pa can ngang/ klung gi rgyal po rtsa sbyin dang/ klung gi rgyal po mdza' bzang dang/ klung gi rgyal po kun gyi bshes dang/ klung gi rgyal po 'chimad dang/ klung bskyel/
po me tog pad+ma dang klung gi rgyal bo ja'i na dang/ klung gi rgyal bo dngos bzung dang/ klung gi rgyal po rab bzongadang/ klung gi rgyal po dka' thub sbyin dang/ klung gi rgyal pa dri bral dang/
klung gi rgyal po skyon bral dang/ klung gi rgyal po klung chen dang/ klung rgyal pa gsar ldan dang/ klung gi rgyal pashanga'i bdag dang/ klung gi rgyal pa ba lang sbyin mchog dang/
klung gi rgyal po gsang srung dang/ klung gi rgyal po ba lang can dang/ klung gi rgyal po de dag dang/ gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'bab pa'i chu klung de dag
thams cad la/ gang dag rgyumadu gnas pa// gzugs tha dad pa// gzugs mi sdugam/ gzugs mang ba/ gzugasamatha' yas pa// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gajugs can//
gzugs sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ lham yin rnams dang/ rlung lha rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ dri za rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams dang/
'tsho mi'am rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ yi dgas rnams dang/ shaphra rnams dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ grul bum rnams dang/ srul po
rnams dang/ lus srul po rnams dang/ skom byang rnams dang/ smyo byed rnams dang/ grib gnon rnams dang/ brjod bying rnams dang/ bonon po rnams dang/ zas su
mdangs zab rnams dang/ zas su mngalaza rnams dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su sha za ba rnams dang/ zas su tshil dra ba rnams dang/ zas su zhag phra ba rnam
dang zas su rkang bra bo rnams dang/ zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dar/ zas su srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ thas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang/ bras su 'phrang badra ba rnams dang//
zas su 'bras bu bra ba rnams dang/ zas sum tog zapa rnams dang/ zas su dri za ba rnams dang/ zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang/ rgyas su lo tog bla ba rnams dang/ zas su sprin
srogaza ba rnams dang/ zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su phyis zla ba rnams dang/ zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su mchil ma bra ba rnams dang/ zas su 'o
snabs zla ba rnams dang/ bas su stabs bra ba rnams dang/ zos su lcag ma za ba rnams dang/ thas su skyag pa bab rnams dang/ zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang/ zas su
stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba nga dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma pachan mo'adis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga'
khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ ri'i rgyal ba gangs can dang/ ri'i rgyal po spros kyi ngad ldan dang/ ri'i rgyal re rtse brgyab dang/ ri'i
rgyal po sang ldong can dang/ ri'i rgyal po gsar legs dang/ ri'i rgyal po 'o'adzin dang/ ji'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang/ ri'irgyal po khor yug dang/ ri'i rgyal po khor yugachen
pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po dbang po'i brag dang/ ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa ldan dang/ ri'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang/ 'i rgyal po bstan sdug pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po shin tu rgyal dang/ ri'i rgyal po
rig 'byung gnas dang/ ri'i rgyal po srin bu can dang/ ri'i rgyal po ne'abu rdzas dang/ mi'i rgyal po thags bzungs ris dang/ ri'i rgyal po derje'abyung gnas dang
ri'i rgyal po 'gram po ldan pa dang/ ri'i rgyal bo lha min 'bab nga/ ri'i rgyal po glog 'od dang/pa'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang/ ri'i rgyal po zla 'od dang/ ri'i rgyal po drug bzang dang/ ri'i rgyal
po 'am mdzes dang/ ri'i rgyal pa thogs pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po 'bags byed dang/ ri'i rgyalapa zla ba'i brag dang/ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang/ phyi'i rgyal po ma la ya dang/ ri'i rgyal

pa gsur gyi rtse mo dang/ ri'i rgyal po kun nas 'gro ba dang/ ri'i rgyal po lag bzang dang/ ri'i rgyal po nor bu ldan dang/ ri'i rgyal po sde bzung dang/ ri'i rgyal ra tshangs pa'i chu dang/ ri'i rgyal
ba rige byang sung dang/ ri'i rgyal de ba lang rna dang/ ri'i rgyal po snatshogs 'phrong ba dang sku'i rgyal po ma'ajigs sna tshogs dang/ ri'i rgyal po ral gri dang/ ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang/ ri'i
rgyal po mig bskudang/ ri'i rgyal po muSh+Thadang/ 'o rgyal po che degs can dang/ ri'i rgyal po 'dzoms byed dang ri'i rgyal pa do so dang/ ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang/ ri'i rgyal bo rta kar

tshag+ha dang ri'i rgyal bo tsan dam 'phrang dang/ ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin dang/ ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang/ ri'i rgyal po dus 'dris byed dang/ ri'i rgyal po skom ri dang/ ri'i rgyal po nyir gnas/

[m2///]can dang/ ri'i rgyal po da lang sung dang/ ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang/ ri'i rgyal po koka'i sgra dang/ ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang/ sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang// gzhan
ngag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ lham yin rnams dang/ rlungawu rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ dri za rnams dang/ ma 'am mi rnams dang/ lta' chen po/
rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ yi dag/sa rnams dang/ shabra rnams dang/ 'byung ba rnams dang/ grul bum rnams dang/ sul po rnams dang/ lus
srul po rnams dang/ skam byed rnams dang/ sgo byang rnams dang/ grib gnon rnams dang/ brjod byed rnams dang/ gnon po rnams dang/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang/
rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun du gnas pa do dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'adis dge slong sa radang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/
la brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ sdig pa thams cad sol cig/ dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig/ mdag bsol cig/ don rnams la snang bar gyis shig/
gnod pa rnams sol cig/ dag slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad kyang/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyima'i gung gi bde legs dang// nyin mtshan
kun gyi bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol// sAhA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyu skar ba nga dag nam mkha' la rgyu shing snang bar byed pa rnams kyiyong/
zung zhig/ 'di lta sta/ smane drug dang ni snar ma dang// mgo dang lag dang nub so dang/ rgyalani bkra shis phun sumatshogs// de bzhin skag ste bdun pa yin/ de ltar rgyu skarab dun pa bde
dag ni shar phyogs kyi sgen gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dag slongs ri dang/
bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ mdu ni mi mdzad 'joms pa dang// de bzhin gro dang dngo gnyis dang// me
bzhinag pa sa ri dang// sa ga stani bdun pa yin/ 'di ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag sta/ gang dag lce phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed padag go/ de dag
gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma byachen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ soms can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/

lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang// de bzhin smonadang sgrubs dang ni/ (chustod dang ni chu smad dang// deltar byi bzhin gro bzhinano// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas
ba dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs skyong bar byed pa dug ga/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma byachen mo 'disadage slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad
la srung ba gyis shig/ lobargya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston pa rgya mthong bar shog cig/ man gru dang ni mon gro dang/ de bzhin khrums stod khrums smad dang/ rnam gru dang na tha skar dang/ bra
chung na bdun pa yin// de ltar rgya skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang phyogs kyi sgon gnas bdag ste/ gang dag byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed ba dag go/ de dag bag kyang rig sngags
kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa mingang/ bdag dang 2 sems can thams cad la srung po gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig de ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun de na
bo khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khrod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang/ 'phel ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ lo legs pa dang/ lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams
kyi ming zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ gza'anyam dang/ gza' zla ba dang/ gza' phur bu dang/ gzu'i pa wa sangs dang/ gza' san pa dang/ goza' mig dmar dang/ gza' lhag pa dang/ gza
lhaminadabang po sgra gcan dang/ gza' du ba mjug ranges so// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no// skar ma gza' bdund bzhinato/ sgra gcan lnga dang
mjug ringes dang// rdzu 'phrulam zhing dka' thub ro// nyimadang na zla ba dang// sum cu rtsa bdunatshang pa dag/ 'char bu dang ni nub pa dang/ khor le mtshon/
chab zhin du rgyu// 'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/ gze na rdzu 'phulachen po dang// rab tu dang pa'i sems kyis su// rig sngags rjes su yi rang byos// de dag gis kyang rig
stags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo 'dis dag slongs ra dang/ bdagaM dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/
kun dga' bo drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/ jig sngags grub pa// grags pa 'bar pa dang/ klung dang ri la gnas pa// dmod pa'i mtshonam can/ dka' thub drag pa/
rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa// rnam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag dI ming brjod kyis/ khyod kyis zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po rgyus pa zhes/
bya pa dang/ drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen
po 'ong ba can zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen nga do bdud mda'i bu zhag bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gnas 'dzeg ces bu pa dang/

[ns/ ]drang srong chen grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'drong skyong ga ru zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'drong skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pa ngan sbyong zhes bya ba dar/

drang srong chen pa ngan song duga' zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang/ phrang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'jigs nyan zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong

chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs ra zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pa g.yon phyogs lhu zhes bya ba dang/ drang

srong chen po ba tshul can zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pomadun du bdar zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mgo bo rmazhes bya ba dang/ drangasrong chen po gshin rje'i ma nyis bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po

gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ldang so'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsa bo zhes bya drung/ drang srong

chen bo ngag mnyam zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po yang dag bshags po zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po babrod pa sna zhes bya bdang/ drang srong

chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po bla ma zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po grub pazhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gru 'dzin tsos
za @#// sbya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gsang can zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mgo dmar zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen bo ma byung

'dzin ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gos ngan zhus bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'ong cis

u/ bya ba dar/ drang srong chen po pa khyu sangs zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pa ston pa zhes bya ba dang/

drang srong chen po ba/za' lcag pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pa dug sel ces bya ba dang/ drang srongachen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba dong/ drang srong chen po dra ba/chig pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang

srong chen podrang srong ra zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rga zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gzhu'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gyur med kyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen pa

gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po 'jigs byed gling pa zhes phyu ba dang/ drang srong chan

pa ser skya zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po go'u ta ma zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po gling pa zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mag bzangs

zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po lha'i mu khyud ces bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po a shI ta zhes bya ba dung/ drang srong chen po byas dang rtse zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po mas byin gyi bu
zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po ra po zhes bya ba dang/ drang srong chen po srin bu'adzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rig byed rnams byed pa// gsang
sngags rnams byed pa// dmed pa 'dor ba/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ gabri bde che ba grub pa// pha rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
bya chen mo 'dis dag slongs ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tadu thA/hi
ha 'a ra kho/ mi ri mi ra/ mu ra mu ra/ hi li hi li/ mil ma li/ sA yaM b+ha DahU/ Da/ Daza/ gru san/ ma thani/ du mni/ da hani/ g+haT
ni/ pa tsa ni/ pAtsani/ ta pa ni/ pApa ni/ han ni/ nga hani/ da had ha/ daha/ da la dA la/ dI la ni/ pA rnganA/ mo hAni/ hUM b+hani/ dzayani
yum+b+has// kun dga' po khyod kyis skye dgu'ibadag po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ rlung lha rnams dang/ lham yin rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnamos
dang dri ba rnams dwang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa//
dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas pa dang/ mtho ris dang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang/ mi dag pa la sogs pa'i dag pa'i khyad par grungs med pa dag gis 'jig chen gsum/
du rnam par gzhag pa rnams kyi ming zung zhig/ 'di lta ste/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang/ skye dgu'i bdag pa bu can dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po zu tshul gyi bu dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po
ma dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang/ rgyadagu'i bdag pa mdun du bdar dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po mo dang/ skyadagu'i bdag po go byad
dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po drin ngo dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang/ rgyadagu'i bdag po mkhas pa
zad ng/ skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod dang/ skye dgu' bdag po kun 'gad gzhon nu// kun dga' bo skyodagu'i bdag pa bdag nyidichen po 'di dagan gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs
srung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho
[ns bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang dag slongasari dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/
hiri hor/ kha ra kha ro/ mir mi'i/ si li si li/ sir so ri/ hal hril/ mi li mi li/ sa'i 'bru// gsan/ ma than/ da han/ g+ha tani/ pa tsan/
pAtsani/ hanani/ da ha da ha/ du la dal/ dA lani/ pANani/ mo hani/ stam+b+hani/ dzamaniya sa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dugachen po rnams kyi ming zungazhig/ tad+yathA/
anA/ paNArA/ ka ra// kayu rA byAtaM ga ma/ bu'ud pati/ redu pa taM/ si ri pa [”]ti te dzapa ti/ tadzo gru pati/ ya sho pa ti/ yashe gra ba ti/ a rat+tA/
turak+Sha/ ta ra ta ra T+Tha/ dand da da/ @#dzaha/ dza lA/ ma lA/ pha lA/ gu hU/ ru tsir/ daM tu ra/ kir ki tsikA/ ka ri ki tsi kA/ ka// sha ti du bu/
ba sul/ na ku lu/ kirid+d+hi/ tArang gArin/ A mramati/ dzayumati/ ma du mati/ kem le/ bi ma le/ kuN+Da le/ a nyid duhi/ bak+kA/ bag du to/ bang san hUM/
mahAg re/ tu lal/ dul du lam+b+he swAhA/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri dang/ bdag dang/
sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ sbyab dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bad lags
su gyur pa dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mchon spang ba dang/ dug gzhil pa dang/ dug gsodapa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur
cig ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shing ljon pa rnams kyimange thung zhig/ 'di ltasU/ shing ljon pa chen po gsar shi zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po/
sar skya zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon

pachen po sar ba zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen pa mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po sa la zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang/ shing lcen/

pa chen po rgyas byed nas bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po brtsi ba zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa rin po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po man+ti ta zhes bya ba dang/ shing ljon pa chen po
dag dang/ gzhan dag la lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dgo slong sa ra deng/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la srung ba gyis shig/ lo
brgya 'bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo bdin/ yang dag par par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi gsungs shing rjes su yi
rang ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyi gsung/
shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis bsu//
shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs shing rjes/

supa reng ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bstan cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya mo 'di byang chub med pa'i sams dpa'
chen po byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po pargya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi
rang bgo/ rgyal po chen po bzhi pa dag gis kyang sgrus shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ dri bra'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// grul bum gyi bdag po 'jags/
[j ]@#/ 'askyes pos kyang sbas shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam zlos kyi bus kyang su

shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// dri su'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad deb dang/ grul bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyadodogadang/klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dponenyi shu

rtsa brgyud drag dur/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtson dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing rjes suyi rang ba'o// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/
'di ni lha'i gdon dang/ lu'ogaden dang/ rlung lha'i gden dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ mi 'am ci'i gden dang/ lto
lho 'phye chen po'i ba/don dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ srin po'agangon dang/ yi dgas kyi gden dang/ sha za'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gadren dang
srul po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'i gdon dang/ skam byed kyi gdon dang/ smo byed kyi gdon dang/ grib gnon gyi gdon dang/ brjod byed kyi gden dang/ gnon pa'i gdon gyis
'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// gdon thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya bam yin pa'o/ @/sras su mdangs za ba rnams dang/ zas su gzi byin 'brog pa rnams dang/ zas su mngal za ba
rnams dang/ srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ zas su gtor ma tho ba rnams dang/ bras su sha za ba rnams dang/ zas sukhrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su zhag bra ba rnams dang/ zas
su tshul bra bo rnams dang/ zas su rkang phra ba rnams dang/ thas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang/ zas su 'brang ba za ba rnams dang/ bras su du bra bo rnams dang/ bras su mateg za nga
rnams dang/ zas su 'bras bu bro ba rnams dang/ thas su lo tog za ba mos dang/ zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang/ zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang/ bras su pu sa bu nga
rnams dang/ zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang/ sras sumachil mtha pa rnams dang/ zas su ngar snabs rba pa rnams dang/ zas su snabs rba ba rnams dang// bras su phyug
ma grwa ba rnams dang/ zas su skyag pa za ba rnams dang/ rgyus su mi gtsang ba sra ba rnams dang/ thas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar du nga mas na//
gshed byang dang/ sbyar pa'i los dang/ byang dang/ g.yang byang dang ro langs dang/ sems bsgyur ba dang/ rtsod gtong dang/ bza' nyes dang/ grug nyasung 3pa dang
sgrib dang// gnod ba ltas dang bri nyes dang/ sgom nyes dang/ sbyang pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// mas nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ shun/
gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ nyin bdun pa dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ zla ba gcig pa dang/ nyi ma phyed pa dang/ nyin mo pa dang/ yud tsam pa
dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ rims drab pa dang/ 'byung po'i rims dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa dang// badra kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur
bas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o//rims thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// kud pa na ba dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ yi ga 'dus pa dang/ ma nad dang/ snanod
dang/ kha nad dang/ mguland dang/ snying nad dang/ lkog ma'i lha gar na ba dang/ rna ban pa dang/ so na ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ chub n ba dang//
lton ba dang/ mkhur nga na ba dang/ chu so na ba dang/ skya gnas na ba dang/ rab tu skyo gnas na ba dang/ bar na ba dang/ byin pa na ba dang/ lag pa na ba dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/
yan lag na ba dang/ nying lag na bas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// shu ba dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ mdzodang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ 'bras dang 2 pal
mig dang/ g.yan pa dang/ mo dbal dang/ lhag pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yabyin pa'o// nad thams cad dang/ dug thams cad dang/ sdong ba thams cad dang/ 'jig/
pa thams cad dang/ yums kyi nad thams cad dang/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ngam na pa'o/
kun dga' bo gang zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo bde las 'gal bar byas na lag na rdordzasu de'u mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gems pa/ ra 'gyur ro// sangs
rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos thams cud kyi gany+dzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro// sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro// 'phags
pa'i gang brag rnams bslus par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi pa dag gis kyang klu ra zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi mtshon cha rnams kyisodra la sdug bsngal chen pa byed par 'gyur ro/ lho
rnams kyidabang bo brgyakhyin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor to/ derdzos nga'i mag 'gams par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i galjibarjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyur re//
kun dga' ba su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas sam/ skud pa ba rtagasan di gsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro// chod pasu gcad pa'i rib sa
pa ni gzhu btsog pas so// gzhu btsog pa'i rigasang ni spro bas so// sbyoba'i rigs pa ni dom bca' bas so// dam bca' ba'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so// spu bring zhes bya ba'i
rigs ni da bzhin du tharasar 'gyur ro// de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung dar mu 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs ba mi 'byung ngo// me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo/ nus
ba 'chiba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la dug gis mtshugs te/ mtshon gyis kyang ma yin no// bde ba'i gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur re// bde ba dang/ gnod pa med paM
dang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang/ dgra chems par 'gyur ro// smras pa mad par 'gyurar// 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// bad bar yun
ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so//kun dgu'aborag sngags kyi rgyalamo rma bya chen mo 'don ha cang char chab 'am/ cha'adakon pa'i ri
bklag pa/ra bya'o// des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tsherigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu modra'i bsam pa ji srid par char 'bebs par
'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal po rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgu thums kyang zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba tsam/ bde legs
suu0f38gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyalam rmabya chen mo 'di zung zhig/ 'khor bzhi pa dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bstan ngang/ dge
bstan ma rnams bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/
dpya thA/ ya ba ti/ d+hA ba ti/ bar kakulu/ dulum sAhA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug bad pa// sangs
rgyas bden pas dug btsom mo// 'dachagasazhe sdang gtumug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste//bcom ldan chos n dug med pa// chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo// 'dod chags
zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nga dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan dge 'dun dug mang pa// dge 'dun bdon pas dug btsam mo// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang// dgra bcom
rnams kyi grags gang dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gup+pabad kyis// ngasan bad legs 'gyur ba byas// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo// dge slong sa ri
rang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig/ de nas chedang ldan pa kun dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/ bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dag slongs ri ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dag slong ri la chad pa spang ba byas
te/ sba ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ longs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang// bde legs su gyur pa dang/ chad pa spang ba dang//
mtshon pa phyung ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/ dug bsad pa dang/ mtshams bcad pa dang/ sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas
pas/ tshodang ldan pa dag slongs nang de las sos so// nga nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rmongs ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sta phyin nas// bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ jiltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bal bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'amathuthong ngam/ kun dga' bos btsem ldan 'das de bzhin du
gsungs pa de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rit+taM slad du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yong bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo'ang ltar rgyu mtshon
['/ ]pa bzhin skam yang srid/ sa gzhi ni nam mkhar la 'phags kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi man sa la ltung yang srid/ klung na rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi
[0 ]/gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na rig sngags kyi rgyalam rma bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi
po dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyan dang/ dge bstan ma rnams mos par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam nas/ 'khor bzhi pa dag so dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bstan dang/ dag bstanam da rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas
so bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ chodang ldan pa dag slong sa ra dang/ 'kher rnam pa bzhi dang/ lce dang/ glu dang/
lcam yin dang/ rlung lha dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi rang/ mi ma yin pa gang
ngag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod ba de dag thams cad yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'dasam rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i
gzungs rdzogs so//kargya gar gyi mkhan po shAlin+d+ra bo d+hi dang/ dzAn sid+d+hadang/ shAkya pra b+hadang/ zhachen gyi lo tsa pa ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad
gsar bcad kyis kyang bzhes nas gtan la phab ba/ rgya dab la gtugs nas zhus dag byas shing sngagasa rnams rgyu dpe dang mthun par bcas pa'o//
blo rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma yu ra bcu gang+genAm/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal ma rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan
'das rma bu chen m la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pas 'jigs pa 'am/ 'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs
pa 'am/ bgags kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dusam yin par 'chibs dzags pa 'am 1 sbrul gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs
pa 'am/ mas 'jigs pa 'am/ chus 'jigs pa 'am/ rlung gis 'jigs pa 'am 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa 'am/
mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa 'am gdon gyis brin tam/ rims kyis btab pa 'am/ dug 'thus sam/ nad thams
cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ i Tid rgyu ya/ in+d+ra go ma si kAyaM/ Ashu na/ pAsha na/ pa pa kU le/ ka pi la mit+taM/ il marti sAhA/ gsang
[4]/ sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub bar gyur cig/ nArAya ni/ pA rAyan/ hari ta tA le/ kun+tal/ i li mi sti/ ki li kyi li mi'i swAhA/ rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/
haha/ hi hAhA[”]/ khor/ mA ra kha la gyi/ d+hAhU~M/ paNaM phaT swahA bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de/ gter ma ri chen po la gtang bar bya'o// des thams cad zhi zhing phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pra ti sa ra ba ru rAdzI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang nga rganamo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal le// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun pe chen po'akhriman/ khang pa brtsigs pa dedzin pa'i dang de 'dzin gyi
sa'i gnas// rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rjecan pa'i rdzong gi na po che dang pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma brdal
pa redzingan por byin gyis brlabasapa/ 'kher gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyisaderje'isang ga'i khriman po byepa khrag khrig brgya stong gis rnam par mdzes pa//
[4]@#/// chos bstan pa dar tsho'aphrulacan/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis 'arlabs pa// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la'ajug pa// thams cad

bsamkhyen panyid kyis nges par 'byung ban/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gisathogs pa// dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rodzachan po'i rnam par thar pa dad/ ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/
somasakyi skad cig thang cig yudatsam zhig la sems can thams cad kyi sams dad/ spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya tshal zabacing yangs pa dang/ sobs pa dang/
tsho'aphrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbang
dar/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ sa dung/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs lamakhas pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos pa dang/
bska byams pa dang/ snying rjedang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ bden pa dang/ yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la'ang lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po derje'i snying po dang/ rdo rje'i sbran dang/ radz+dza'i lus dang/ derdza'i blo gros dang/ gnaje rjod ng/ rdo rje bdus pa dang/ de rjemathu bo dang/ rdo rje ma
par 'phrul pa dang/ de rje brtso gas pa dang/ rdo rje phung po dang// rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rjedabyangs dang/ rdo rje bzang bo dang/ rdo rje sde dang/ byang chub sems dapa' saMms dpa' chen po
rdo rje'i tog dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khri'i 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang/ nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa brad pa/ srid
pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs suchad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas soms shin tu rnam par grol pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrulagyi stobasadang cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas
rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthu chen de thob pa/ ye shes dang lta ba chags pa med pa/ thamasacad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/ kun nas nyon mos pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha

stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshod ldan pa pa byams ma'ibu gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan paka pa na dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshedung ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu

chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bzang dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang/ tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan/
pa ga ya 'od srungs dang/ tshedapaldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang/ dengag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang 2 lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas
gtsang ma'i 'os kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang/ mimarjod kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu
rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang/ yongs su dga' ldan dang 'phrula dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad
kyi 'khor can dung/ lham yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris dang shu stobs can dang/ rab sim dang/ sgra gcan dang/ rnam par snang byed dang/ de dag la sogs pa lham yin gyi dbang ba tshad
mad grangs med/ dbag tu med pa rnams dang/ klu'i rgyal pa rgya mtshodang/ 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ dung skyong dang/ stobs kyi rgyudang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/
de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshang med/ grangs med/dpag du med pa rnams dang/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang/ dri za'i rgyal po brur phud lnga pa dri ze'i

bka rgyal bo g.yog du mnyan dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rten thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog dumanyam dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gsar mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal/
pha g.yog du ma can dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyul po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ nor bu bzang dang/ gang ba bzang po dang/ lngas rtson gnod sbyin gyi rgyal pa g.yog du macan dang/ 'brog ma bu lnga brgya'i
g.yog du ma can dang/ 'jig rten gyi mchen mo bdun dang/ srin mo chen mo bdun dang/ drang srong gi mchogachen po bdun po dang/ bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang/ gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams
dang [5 ] phyogs kyi lha rnams dang/ phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang 2 sa'i lha dang/ dbyangs can dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ bgegs rnams dang/ log 'dren rnams dang/ yi
ngagasa rnams dang/ 'byung po rdzu 'phrulachen po rnams dang/ ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang/ 'jigartan skyong ba chu lcagayog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/
phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ lags ba tsen dang/ bden bralo dang/ mo'i lho dang/ rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang/ dbang bdge chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog byab khrag khrig
'bum phrag du ma can dang/ srung mad kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang/ byin pa po dang/ 'phreng ba can dang/ zla ba na dang/ lcags can dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po rin po dang/ sprinata
la la dang/ log 'dren gyi dbang po bgags log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang/ shing gsab kyi lha drug shu dang/ sring mo bzhi mang po dang bcas pa dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/
'do'i lu gu rgyud dang/ derje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ de rje'i sde dang/ lag bzang dang/ gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa drang/ de
[A ]las gzhan pa sangs rgyasudang/ tshes dang/ dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drizad ng/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen pa dang/ 'byung po dang yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ grib gnon dang/ skyo byad dang/ brjod byed dang/ sgom byed dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sbrul
'dzin bcas pa dang/ gnon tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag dang lha'i bu nyi ma dang/ lce'i bu blu ba dang/ lha'i bu zla ba bzang po dang/ nubaka'i lha dang/nod
par gyi lha dang/ dus kyi lha thams cad dang/ sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lonoshin tu bskor/ sangs rgyus kyi mdzad pa shin tu
yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzo gas/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung/ byang chub chen po'i phyor pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa
ni banas/ skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpa byad bzang po brgyad nyus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug
sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong/ bdud kyi las thams cad la mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi soms dang spyod pa ni shas/ sbyin rnam pa ldan mang/ ma ba
thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags
pa dang/ sgra dang 2 tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang sangaga' sgron sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs mad
dpag du mang par sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang//
ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ bya dka' ba'i spyod pa lasani phyir ma log/ sun skyas buchen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan taM/ rab tu mdzes

shing jorje'i rin pa tsho'i pad+ma'i snying po'i sang ga'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang/ mu tig dung/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stags bu du ma shin tu
brtan par gnas ba/ rdo rjerin po tsho'i chu srin du ma'i khams byung ba'i mutig dmar po'i 'phrangab bres pa'i phang bshams pa[“]rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po mu kake'u
dang/ ka ka ru chen po dang/ and rnyil dang/ anang mIl chen po dad/ mdun las kyi med zer rman po 'tshar bas snang bar byas te ku nas mdzes pa// gdugs
tsho ba dang bcas pa// rdo rjerin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bya ba khrag khrig 'bumaphrag dums rnam par brgyan pa/ bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bsgrubs pa/ dpag
bsam gyi shing dums brgyan par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri'i reb tsam la bzhugs te/ gsar gyi ribo'i rgyal po ltar dpalani rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyis stong bas lhag
pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug par snang/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams na shin tu rgyas shing
chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa// thog mar dge ba/ bar du dgo ba/ tha mar dgo ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su
dug pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smina mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od thor gyi drab sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkyi

la ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhingagang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ngag seng ge 'i khri
bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i gzhalamed khang mnyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ dag slong dang/ dag slongam dang/ ngag bstanadang/ dag pasnyan m
dang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dritha dang/ lha mayin dang/ rnam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung ga bya masnyad dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa// soms can kun la snying
brtse'i phyir// ltos par byas dang pa nod pa kun// rang 'joms so sor 'brang pa yi/gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang// sdig pa kun ni thad par 'gyur// sams
can kun la bde ba sbyin// nadade rtog las grol bar byed// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang// de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// bajigartan dag gi
mgonabos gsungs// 'di yis bsrung bar byas n ni// lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug/ de bzhin lcang lanan dang ni// srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro// 'byung po klu dang sha za rnams// mi
bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'byed par// 'byung po' tshogs rnams thams cad dang// dgra bo cig gis mi tshugs so// ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang// skam byed brjod byed sgo byed dang/
mkha' 'gro ma dang 'dra dang// gdon rnams rab tu rlag par 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// gami tshon mdangs rnams bri ba dang// mi yi skye dgu
rnams 'tsho ba// de dag thams cad res khyad 'gyur// byud stams mi bzad gang yin dang// ba rol dmag tshogs phung par byed// sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i las las rnam
par grol// dug dang dug sbyaramasamatshugs// mtshan dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// lce 'bab glog gis mitshugs te// dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi
brjid kyis// dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur// nye bar 'tshong zlog par byed// nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub// rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur//
ts+tshi gang gis rtag tu mgul pa 'am// lag par rig pa brtags na ni// de yi dgos pa yod do cog/ 'brub 'gyur 'di la the tshom mang// byang chub sems dpa' chin pa dang// sangs rgyas
rnams dang rang 'dren dang// de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang// lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung// so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la// nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang// rig pa'i lha mo rdzu

'phrul che// rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// lag na rdo rdzoganod sbyin dabang// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang// de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su// srung bar byed de tha tsom mad// brgya byin lha

007 ngang bcas pa dang// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang// dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che// smin drug bu dang tshog sakyi dbang// ma ma'i tshog sa rnams thams cad dang// de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams
dang/ drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang// rdzu baphrul chen po'i lha rnams dang// de kun so sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang//
rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang// bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang// lham sgrolam lcags kyu dang// rdorje lu gu rgyud dang dkar// de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang// nag mo che dang po ltadang// nga
bzhin jo rje pho nya gzhan// zhags pa bzang dar rdo rjenags// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rig pa lham rdorje'aphrang//bdud rtsi thabs sbyor byed pa dang// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo cha/ rnapanag
mo stobs chen mo// dpal yon ldan pa skalachen dang// rnam gdub kor pad+ma'adra// ma tog su can nor bu gtsug/ sku mdog mdzes dang khob pa mo// lham gzi brjid chen mo dang//
dpal yon ldan pa glog 'phreng can// srin mo ral pa gcig pa dang// sangs rgyas bsrungs zhes bya ba dang// skal ba chen po ma thed can// lang ga'i bdag po dpal yon can// gzhan
yang lha mo mang po rnams// sems can rjes su 'dzin byed dag/ rig pa gang gi lag na gnas// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// 'phrog ma dang ni rdzas rtson dang// dung can dang ni so brtsigasam/
dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang// de yi rjes 'grortag tu srung// so sor 'brang bden mo 'di// dud med gang zhig rtag 'chang// nga yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
rtag tumangalan bu po chags// mngal rnams na yang bde bar skyes// sbrum ma dag kyang bde bar 'gyur// nad dang sdig pa thams cad kyang// 'jigs par 'gyur te the tsom mad// bsod nams
ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ nor dang 'thu yang rtag tu 'phel// tshig kyang gzung du 'os pa dang// mchod pa'i 'osasu 'gyur ba yin// bud med dang ni skyes pa'i ng rung// gtsang ma gang zhig
'chang bsolan/ danisems can thams cad dag/ thar par bya phyir brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin// nad do cog kyang rnam par spangs// sras kyang skyo ba mang bcas
pa'i[0f09 ]rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur// phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa
yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du// ngani kun tu dmatshig shes// rmi lam ngan pa rmim 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa rnams dngade bzhin du// dgra yang
rab tu phung bar byed// gzo' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ ka shes dbang phyug chen po gsungs// 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed// de phyir rtagadu bcang par bya// 'byung pe'atshogs
ma rnams nga la nyon// ngan rang tu 'di brjod do// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal 'a// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal// tad+ya thA/ oM ba su la ga bi pu la ba ma 7 bi ma la ga/
pa ma le/ dzaya gany+nyo/ badzra dz+wa lA gArdzu/ ga te gahan/ grwa gni bisho d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ oM gu na pa ti/ gra gnatsA yin/[”]ga ga ri Ni/ ga ga ri NaM/ gi ri'i
gi ra Nig ri Ni/ ga ma ri/ ga mar/ ga tag ha/ gnar 1 gsaraM/ gag ni/ ga ga ra/ saM b+ha ri/ saM b+ha ri/ gab+hu ga hU~M/ ga tig ti/ ga mni/ ga ma ni/
ga re ga ro/ gu ru gu ru/ gu b+ha gusgyu/ gu rtagu ha/ gu ru Nimol/ gu haNi kA gu paNi/ gu ru Na/ gu ru Na/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa le tsa la/ mu tsalo/ dzaya bi dza ye/ sarba
ya bi ga taM garba saM rak+Sha Ni/ si ra sa'i/ b+ha ra b+hi'o da mir ma ri/ gi'i gir/ rgyur rgyur/ bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/ kum nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams
car 'dzoms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad dang/ nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsung du gsol datsor
phyir/ si ba ri/ ri d+hi'o/ mi gad/ a ba ra No 1 ban rgyan/ bsi d+ha/ a ba ra Na/ nA gnaM/ mu ri chu ra/ mutsi mu tsi/ mul mu la
tsal tsalaM da ka lo ka la/ mi lo ma la/ ka ma la dbam la/ dza ya bi dzaya/ dza yA ba haM/ dzaya bti/ bi dza ya ba ti da bsha' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rin po/
ma'i cod pan dang 'phreng ba mnga' ba/ chu byang rnam pa sna tshog samanga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo sdig pa thamasacan rnam par sbyong ba/ bdag la thamasacad du kun nas bsrung
du gsol bsrud du gsol/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mgonamamachis pa de skyob pa mamachis pa// gnas mamachis pa/ skyabasamamachis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa//
bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par mdzad du gsol/ tsatitsa/ tsa tsaSh+Tha/ tsan+d+rin/ tsan/ ba ga ba ti/ sarba duShAn/
bA raNi/ bi tsaya/ bAn/ chu ru du ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tu ru tur/ A yupA lani/ su re ba ra pra ma thani/ sa cha de ba gan/ pU dzi to/ ci'i phyi ro/ d+hi'i ro/
ba/ sa man/ a b.lo ste/ prab+hi sra hU~M/ supra b+ho/ su pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bi // sarba pA ba big// sarba pA pa pishats+tshani/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ rnyor ni/ d+hare/ chu ra d+ha ra/
000 su mu sumu/ mu su mu su/ ru ru tsale/ tsA la ya/ su mu sumu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ ru ru tsa le/ tsale tsa le// dpal gyi sku mnga' ba/ bdag la gnod par sems pa
las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ dzaya saja dut+tan/ pu ra ya AhU~Mshi ba ku gyur/ dzaya ka male/ kI no t+ton/ bar da/ ang+gasha/

oM pad+ma pa shud+d+ho/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bud+d+hashud+d+ho/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi'i b+hi ri/ d+hu ru b+hu ru/ mang+galaM bi shud+d+ho pa badra mu li/ khA ni/ khazo ni/ kha ra kha ra/ dzA li to/
khar sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bihu/ saman+ta/ pra sar taM/ a ba b+hU ti ta/ uts+tshadzul/ dz+wa la sarba de ba gan/ samAka ra NaNi/ spyad bya bra rta/ oM
phyid+haM ta ra tar glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gabrigs ma/ bdag la mi'i gnod pa las bsgral du gsol/ lasul gu/ shulu hu lu/ hu du hu du/ tu ru tu ru/ ka Ni ko Ni klu ts+tsha/
Ni puNi puNi/ sarba gra d+ha b+ha k+Sha Ni/ pa gol/ paM gal/ mu tsumu tsu/ tsu mu tsusu/ sumu su mu/ subatsor/ ta ratur/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po ma'alta
stadas kyis gathugs ma thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang/ derdza'i 'i ba dang/ rdo rje'i zhags pa'i bcing bas bdag mi badrad pa'i 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol/
[n ]@#// badzradzul ba buT+TaM/ b+hur gyur/ b+ha ga ba ti/ brgyu ba saM sho d+hani/ kukyi samAr Ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la dzA li ni/ lha'i nus kun tu char
dbab tu gsol/ a mi ta banatsod ba ta a ba tAr Ni/ bde bar gshams pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ 'thab pa dang/ 'thab
modang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ rmilam den pa dang/ ltasangan pa dang/ bkra ma shis pa dang/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ klu
thams cad 'joms pa// gnod pas 'jigs skrag pa bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang/ nad thams cad las thams cad du chug/
par bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dzaya bi dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun tu bdag rgyalabar mdzad du gsol/ bdag la rig pa can/
mo 'di 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub du gsol/ gsang sngagasa rnams bsgrub tu gsol/ bgags rnams gzhom du gsol/ dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+hAsi
si d+d+hasi rgyu/ buN+ya bu rgyu/ pu ra ya/ mu ra ya/ pu ra Ni/ pU ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogasaM par mdzad du gsol/ rig pa thams cad las byung ba'i sku can/ rgyal ba lhag
bar rgyal ba can/ da bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig ngaskyang du gsal/ 'jigs
pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyud las bdag la gab+higs su gso la/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'jigs pa chen pa las bskyab tu gsol/
sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra/ phra sar/ sarba a pa ra Na/ bi sho d+han/ sa man+ta/Ar/ mad+d+hAl de shud+d+hA/ ba gtaM/ ba ga da/ ba ga ta mtshe/ sarba ma la bsho
rdzun sang mad la bi shud+d+hA/ sarba mang+ga labi sho d+han// klu Ni/ sar+Na pA pa ba ts+tshA/ mA la pa ga ta/ dza ya ba taM/ de tshe ba ti/ badzra ba ti/ 'jig rten gsum
du byin gyis brlabs pa la sAdA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la sAhA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la
sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ga nga pa dag pa la sAhA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis snying pos byin gyis
brlabs pa'i snying po la sA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig grub pa la sAhA dbang pe dang dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pal sA/ tshangs
ba dang tshangs pa la gnas pa la sAhA/ khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pal sAhU/ dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa lasAhA/ rdo rje 'dzin lag
naderdzob stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la hAhA/ yul 'khor srung la sAhA/'phags skyos po la sbahA/ mog mi bzang la sAhA/ rnam thos kyi bu la sAhA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis
phyag byas pa la sAhA/ gshin rje la swAhA/ gshin rjes mchod cing phyag byas pa la sAhA 2rmulha la sAhA/ rlung lha la sU// rlung lhachen po la sAhA/ ma lha la sAhA/ rlung la
sAhA klus rnam par bltas pa la sU 1 lha'i tshogs rnams la sAhA/ klu'i tshogs rnams la sAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la sAhA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/
driwa'i tshogs rnams la sduhA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swAhA/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la sa/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la sAhA lta'aphye chen po'i tshogs
rnams la sAhA/ mi'i tshogs rnams la sAhA/ mi ma yin ba'i tshogs rnams la swAhA/ gdon rnams la sA/ 'byung po thams cad la sAhA/ yi dgas thams cad la sAhA
sha za thams cad la sAhA/ brjod byed thams cad la sAhA/ gnon po la sAhA grul bum thams cad la sAhA/ sul pa thams cad la sAtwA/ lus srul pa thams cad la sAhU~M/
gdug pa dang rab tu gdug pa thams cad la sdu 1 o rlu'u chu ru sAdA/ a tu ru tu ru swAhA/ o ku ru ku ru swAhA/ e tsu ru tsu ru sa/ o mu ru mu ru swAhA/ han han sarngasha tshwa A// da nga

da pasarba duny+tsanasAhA/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra taN+Di ka pra tu mi d+hAn sAhA/ gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dzu khaya/ dzA la ya sarba dut+tatsit+tanaM swAhA/ 'bar ba/
la sAhA/ rab tu 'bar ba lasudA/ sgron ma 'bar ba lasehA/ dorje 'bar ba la sAhA/ ma lce 'bar ba la sAhA/ kun tu khar ba la sAhI/ nor bu bzang po 'pha sAhA 2 gang ba bzang ra
la sU/ nag pa la sAhA/ nag pachen po la sAhA/ mamo'atshogs la swahA/ gnod sbyin me rnams la sAgA/ srin mo rnams la sAhA/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ mkha'
'gro mo rnams lasAhA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams l pAhA/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba mo rnams la sA/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams la sAhA/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams las/ nyin mo rgya ba rnams
la sAhA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la sA/ dus su rgyu ba rnams la swAhA/ dus ma yin par rgyu ba rnams la sAhA/ bras su malazla ba rnams la sAhA/ mdangos 'phrog pa rnamos la swAhA/
mngal 'dzin pa rnams lasAhA/ yulu hu lu swAhA/ oM swAhA/ saHsAhA/ snusAhA/ b+hu pa/sAhA/ thurtsub sAhA/ tsaTi tsiDi sAhA/ piDi bi Di sAhA/ d+ha ra NisAhA/ d+hAr Ni//
swAhA/ ag+ni sAhA/ ti dzobA yu swAhA/ li tsi li swAhA/ si li si li swAhA/ mi li mi li swAhA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA s+yAhA/ sin+ya sits+tsha AtA/ maN+Da la btse swAhA//

sI A bim sAhA/ dar Ni bamaswAhA/ sam+basha hUM b+hany+dzaya b+hany+dzaya sAhA/ dzaM b+ha ya/ rdzob ya sAhA/n+taM b+ha ya/ stob+ha ya sAhA/ tsan+de tshan sAhA/ b+hin+da b+hin+d+ra sAhA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dzaswAhA/
ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhI/ mo ha ya mo ha ya swAhA/ ma Nipishud+hiswAhA/ su// sUr+ya biSh+Tha sAhA/ tsan+d+he tsan+dA pa ri pUThatsane swAhA/ she d+ha ni swAhA / bshod+ha ni swAhA/ gra hi thAsAhA/
nak+Shi khro hehA/ gzhi bi h+phasAhA/ shAn+ti blut+tA/ buTi/ sAhA/ saM sbyayanab+huny+tsasU/ shiyaM ka ri swAhA/ hUM ka ri swAhA/ shAn+ti ka ra swAhA/ bu likari sAhA/ phal
badz+hani swAhA/ bal brnyan ka ri swAhA/ shAka ri swAhA/ shi brdzun sAhA/ bi dzAl misAhA/ mutsisAhA/ namutsisUt+tA/ ma'u tsi sAhA/ ri ga ba ti swAhA/ abcom
ldan s 'dis mde bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde logs su gyuratsig @#/o munimuni//

sku bi munimuni/ d+har tsa ri tsa lan/ lhag pa ti/ b+ho ya bi gto/ b+ha ya ha ra Ni/ po dz+ha bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+haya/ bud+d+hil bud+hili/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da yaM dzu'u sAhA/ oM mu ni munimuni/
ba re de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag ladabang bskur du gsol// sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/
ad+hiSh+Tha te badzra sAhA/ des na yang dus slar yang bram ze chen po de'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus pa der 'dug par gyur pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bram zengon po la bos par gyur te// bram rba
nang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen po/ kun nas me lce'i 'phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang/ snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu
kham rigs kyi bu mos blos ma brag tu sdig pa thamasacad lasa rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// bram ze chen poragi ba 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i
lus la ma sa mi tshugs so// ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po se ra skya'i gnas ni/ gzhonanu sgra gcan zin bamang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i shakya'i bu mo sa 'tshom bdag nyid
ma'i nang du mchongs pa dang/ dar pad+ma dug byung ste/ de'i mo gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po ma'i mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so// rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis
ma de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to/ @#/nga nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshoma'i lus la mas ma reg go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyis phyin gyis
bar ngs pa'o// bram ze chen po myudan mas mi 'tshig go/ dug gis kyang srog dang 'brel bar mi nus so// de ci lta zhan/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po/
bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to// de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog pa bkug go/ bku gnas kyang bag mad pa'i
dbang gis bcings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang da tsher ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji ltar yang bdag ni srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so// de nas skya ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga'/
tsam gyis kyang dus las gso bar mnus so// de nas grong khyer chen po bad bar pha rol du 'gro ba na dag bstanam dri ma mang par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des rig
pa'i rgyalam chen mo 'di kha na du shes so/ dad pa'i gnas su song ste phyin pa dang/ rig pachanam 'di brjod do// des de la lan cig bad pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing da dran pa
rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal n po de las yongs su thar bar byas nas/ rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di chog ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshod dang na gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par
byas so// bram ze chen po gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su shes na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po wA rA NA si na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe/
[4/ ]ngalishar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer chen po wa ra Na si kun nas bskor nas gzhom par bshams
so/ do nas rgyal po chen po tshangs pas byin de la/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lhapha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'phrogal thugen/ thabasu gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
da gzhom par bgyi bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal pos khyed 'tshor 'gribachung ngur gyis shig/ rig pa'i rgyalam so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod do// ngas des
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya// thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang/ blun po rnams kyis mgo btud de/ rgyal po chen po sngon bdag gis nam yang ma
thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos ngas des mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgod/ de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin sos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus taM/ gos
gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chan mo 'di mag bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi sku'i nang du brazhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chan mo 'di nyid kyis gomubs te
g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang/ gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ rjesring skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyis
@#// b.ler les sbyar ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo// bram ze chen po de ltar n rig pa'i rgyal mtshan mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgyas/
byin gyis brlabs pa/ mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur tosnyam du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar
bya'o phyima'i tshe phyi ma'i dus nasoms can tshe thung ba rnams dang/ bsod nams chung ba rnams dang/ lengs sbyong chung ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bad bar 'gyur par blta'o// bram the
chen po gang la la zhig gis rig pa'i rgyalam chen mo so sor 'brang pa chen mo 'di tshig bzhin du bris te lag pa 'am mgul du btagasan/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o// da rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can
yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o// nga rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bar ba'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par
bya'o/ de mishigs pa'i go chacan du rig par bya'o// de dgra thams cad rab tu 'dzems par rig par bya'o// da sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'dzoms par rig par bya'o/ gang sems can
ngamyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram zachen po phyogs gzhan zhigan dge slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes
la bsrubs pa 'dral ba/ ma byin par len pa// bza' ba dang 'du ba'i sgo'athog pa/ dga' dun gyi dang/ phyogs bzhidang/ tshogs kyi rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang zug gir byin
gyis brlabs te tha ba zhig/ dus gzhan zhiganand tshabs chen pos btab pa dang/ sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo// nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku thob sgrachen po 'byin te//

dram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dag bstan zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so// thosanas kyang dag slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rig pa'i rgyal mo mnam so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris dod/
slong de'i mgul du btags so// rig pa'i rgyal me so sor 'breng ba chen mongag slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/ nad thams cad las ni yongs su thar te sos par
gyur nas/ nga'i mtshan mo brad pa dang dran pa shin dunye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so// lus de bor ba dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyas so// de'i ngo de'ang dag slong dag gis
sga bu zhig la bzhag go/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de'ang nga' mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so// dge slong de mnaramad pa der skyes ma thag du sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi
sdug bsngal m/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu gnas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis tshemapar gyur to// mtshams med pa'ima'i phung po/

ka chan po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to// de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do//
sems can las las sus pa yi// sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tun// shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni//// sems dmal nyam nga rnams n gdab// sems can lus la rtag gnas pa'i// mam mu
de rab tu zhi/ gsog le rnams kyis bgashagam mchis// spu gri'i sos kyang gcod mi bgyid/ 3lcags sdong shul ma ra yang chag/ lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi// ral gri'i lam can nags
na rngalas skyes la ma gnod mi 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod// mi rnams la chos kyis ston// rgyu 'di mi nyung bdag cag la// khyodakyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs// de nas chos kyi bdag
nyid can// chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des// snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi// 'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyuranas/ myur du 'di ni ci yin smos// 'di 'drwayang smyos shig/ de nas mi bzad
AH gshin rje'i mo// gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la// 'di skad kyi tshig smras so// mnar med rab tu nyam nga ba'o// sems can chen po 'di skyes lha// gang g.yang
nimanar med pa// des na nga ni nyam ngar brjod// gang gi sems can bde bgyis pa// rnam pa sna tshegs lasal pa/thigs// 'di ni kun tu bad gyur na// slar yang lha yi gnas sumami/ chos kyi
rgyal po gshin rjes kyang// mthong nas ngo mtshar lcasu pa/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste// 'di nirabs snga lus tshe// ji ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos// ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar// so
sor 'brang ba mgul da rtags pas// de yi lus ni di bzhin mdzes// de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung mde dag gis/ chos kyi rgyal po ba shin rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lha ji ltar na 'diso
sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran// de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba sgom pa yi// shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro//
sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma khyed// rab tu rgyus dang ldan par dong// der ni sgang bu mthon po la// lha rnams kyisazhib skor ba ltos// de mthong sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i sams su

'gyur bar gyis// de nas ga shan rje'i med dag de nyid kyi nubamo rgyas pa dang ldan par deng ngo// de tshadar ni de dag gis// rgyal po'i pho brang nyang na// sgang bu de yi khor yug na// 'bar ba gcig gis gang
bar mtho// i re tshug gi mgul pa na// so sor 'brang ba btags pa'i ng mthong// lha dang klu dang dri ba dang// gnod sbyin srin pe ma 'am nyis// kun nas 'khor bar bskor nas ni// ban med pa'i
mchod pa byed// de la gnod sbyin de ngag gis// so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags// de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te/ slar log
nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes pa nas rgyas par brjod de// de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshig du smras pa'i tham la sams na chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i lus de bor nas/ sum cu

rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o// bram ze chen pa des na sngon chad yongs su shes so// de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdonami=
bar gzung bar bya'o// yi gar bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o// chog bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang bar bya ste/ de rtag du sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams khyad las yongs su thar par
'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du sa khom pa brgyad rnams las yongs su thar re/ 1 glog gis 'gyol bar byed ma nus so// glog gis ji ltar
zla mi nus sha na/ bram ze chen pe sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun rdzi ba na/ tshong dpon chen po dra mad dung zhes bya ba/ nor mang ba/ gsar shin tu 'byor pa/ mdzod

pas+sa dang bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas rta/ ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so// de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang/ nyaming rnams
kyis de'i gru de bzung nas// rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go/ glogadang skar mnga' yang gteng ngo// derje'i lci babebasas par yang bltams so//
de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems don to// klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang de glog dang/ skar mda'i dang/ derdzo'i lce 'bebs pa dang/ nyamed de dag gis kyang gru be ru re bzung
bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton tu'u de dag gis lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur de// donas de dag tshong dpon sams rab tu brtan
pa'i gan du song nas/ de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smras so// sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyabacing 'jigs pa chen po las thar par mdzad du gsol// de nas deng
dpon chen po sems rab tu brtan pa blo grosachen po des/ tshong pa 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong ra rnams/ 3tung rug brtan par
dengs shig dang// khyod rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi// rgya mtsho chalas ngas bsgral la// nga nas yang ni brtan gyur nas// tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras// sems can chen po 'di tsalags
bgags bral myur du bka' stsol cig/ blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus// bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe// yo shas che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs//slong na khyod kyis ci wased bgyi// ro nas
ka'agro'amang bdag po yis// de dag la nitshig 'di rjod// nga la so sor 'brang ba yi// rig pa chen por grags pa yod// gnod byed thams cad sol bar byed// stobs/
rgan pha rol gnon byed pa// des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i// 'jigs pa tshe las ngas bsgral lo// de nas ded dpon chen pos de'i tsho 'deg pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang mchanamo 'di bris nas rgyal

mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang/ rig pa'i rgyal mo tsha mo so sor 'brang bachen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo lubatagasam brag tu nyamed de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che dam rtse gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo/

nga nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhagasanas mchod pa bya bar bshams so// nyamid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang bachen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshog nas byer tu zhi

bar gyur te// 'gron pa phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin pa chub gling chen por phyin par byas so// de ltar na ya shos dang ldan parig pachen mo so sor 'brang ba chonamo nad bzhin gshog/
pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des n 'dirig pa chen mo nas gragasAso// 'danangs par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcang bar bya'o// rlung dang/ glang
ba dang/ dus ma yin pa'i s+sanedang/ glog dang/ lce'obab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yin gyi 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa las yongs su thar par byed
de rna sbyang bu mchu ringes dang/ sha sbrang dang/ phyi ba dang/ srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rungs par byed pa thams cad mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ri
dgas dang/ bya dang/ gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lam dang/ nags tshal dang/ sman dad/ le tog/
la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro gang zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang char dkon pa 'i nyes pa rnams
yobasu mi 'byung ngo// mar dus su 'bab cing dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// yul dang klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus sumar gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so// yul gang
na rig pa'i rgyalamo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang/ bdug pa sna tshogs dang/ me tog sna tshogs kyis
mchod cing bsti stang du byas la// tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtsa mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang rol mo sil snyan phyas te/ bskor ba byas nas lha rnams dang// brgya byin dang
tshangs pa la sogs pas sems tsan chen po de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga ji lta ji lta ba bzhin du bris na nga lta de lta bur 'grub ste//
bu pho 'ded na'ang khye'ur 'grub// mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur// mngal na bad bar skyo ba dang// mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur// mngal nas dus
bzhin skya ba dang// dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyuraM// cis mngon zhun/ bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig/ yul ma ga d+hu 'di nyid na rgyal po lag bkyang zhes bya ba dbu med par gyur
te ( ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zho la babyung ste/ nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thungs so// nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gsar
gyi khangug tu gyur te/ dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur to// des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to// gzhan yang gang gi tsho rgyal po de'i gan du skye ba slong mo pa 'ongs
pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po dalag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brlung ba dang rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' d rgyudas sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa
gsar dang/ nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed de// rgyal po des kyang skye bo srong mo pa lcags pa rnamos la rab tu byin go/ bsam pa tsam gyis slong mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bdab

phun sumatshogs pa thams cad byin te// pu lo 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang bsti stang cher byas kyang bu po martan gnas / ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du
