bsti stang bya bar brtsams te/ mchod pa dang bsti stang chen po byas so// sbyin pa'i ng byin to// bstan gnas la'ang nye bar gnas so// bsod namasachen po byas so// sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi

brad par byin no// de ci'i phyire zhan/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyidan/gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer gu sha'i tshong dus chen po'i mchogan/ bcom ldan 'dras rinatshanamang gibastan pa la zhugs
pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos sams pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad la snying rdzachan po'i soms zhabar bzhag nas/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di ni

las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thosanas tshongadang na chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o// chos kyang nyan to// gang gi tshe bdag gis cung

zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshabadag chos la mchod pa bgyid do zhus lcas nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to// dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des na nga gcig phyin pa dang/ des sems
can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chupa kyi sems peskyang nas/ sems can thams cad dang thunamong du byas nas/ rin po che snyam pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas/ sbyin pa'i
'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal kun gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo// rgyu ngos na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to/
de ltar bsod namasa mngon par 'dubya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma lus te/ lha rnams kyang m chod pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang/ de'i tshig nas

gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmi ltas su bstan du 'di skad du/ kyi rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang bachan mo zhes bya ba kun nasam lci'i 'phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang/

snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin du tsheg bzhin bris la btsun mo ngam pa smyungabacas la/ tshog bzhin du lus la btagasan khyed bu bo
yod par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po de sad dmtshan mo de thad nas 1 rtsis dang/ yi ge'i 'bru dang/ rgyu skar dang/ gza' rnamo par 'byed pa'i ril/sa kyi bram phra rnams bsogasazhasachog

las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te sbyang ba byas s rig pa'i rgyalamo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'ang tsheg bzhin du bris te/ btsun mo
dam pa'i mgul du btags so// sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so// rinapo ma khyad par can du ma'ang sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin no// de nas zla ba dgu len pa dang/
bu pho gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa// kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// bram ze chen po de ltar shes nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis mchod pa// 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba/ gzhan gyis ma thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen m dkon mchog ces grags so// 'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu ya na// gapagi tshalhu'i
dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang g.yul chen po 'byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te/ lham yin thams cad pham par byas/ pha rol pham par byas
nas dag pa dang/ bde bas bad bar lca'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no// bram ze chen po de ltar na soms dang po bskyed pa nas bzung sku/ rig pa'i rgyal mon
mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// 'di gang gis lus la btags sam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par srung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i blon po dang/

bram cu dang/ khyim bdag thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto'aphye chan
pos brjod cing mched par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdud kyadepung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsung ngo// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la yams kyi nad
[r] ]@#// dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang
bya rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbad par byed par 'gyur ro// des gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di dag bris te/ rtag par rgyun du lus samamagul du gdags
( shi bcang bar bya'o// rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// bsam pa thag pa nas bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal ba dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa'o/
dngos po thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dan gsang sngags kyigazhilas thams cad byed pa dag ba rnams grub pa'o// dpya thA/
amr-i ta ba ra/ ba ra ba ra/ bra ba ra bishud+d+ha hU~MhUMphaT phaT swAhA/ oM a mr-i ta ba le kan ga saM rakA Ni/ AkarA Ni hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o// e bi ma le/

bi pu le/ dzaya ba re/ a mr-itu/ h+phapAphaT phaT swahA/ o b+har b+ha ra saM b+ha ra saM b+har/ in+d+ri ya ba ya bi sho d+hani/ hUMphaT phaTe ru ru tsa le b+hA hA/ nye ba'i snying pa'i rig pa'o// om Ni d+har/

tsabadzra d+himahA pra ti sa re hU~MhU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ rib tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad thabs cig tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig du gzungs kyi gsad

00 sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so// gsang sngags 'di dagazhi rig pa'i rgyal o chen mo so sor 'brangab chen mo'i snying po dang go cha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa'o// 'di thos
par yang rab tu dka' na yi gar ba dang/ tshig tu 'don pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ gzhan la'ang ston pa lta ci smos te/ nga rjesangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o// 'din d bzhi zhi
gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so// rjes su yi rang ngo// lung bstan to// so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs dud mchog tu dkon pa'o// sa sor 'brang ba chen mo
'di'i ming thos par yang shin tu dka' ste/ gzungs chen pa 'di ni sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ stobs chen po pha rol gnon pa/ gzi brjid ma ba/ 'od chu ba/ yon tan brjod par chung//
mthu tshab/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa// bag chags thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor pa 'joms par byed pa// bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad gcod par byed pa// ba rjel
gyi sdugs dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dug dang/ byad dang/ g.yas byed kyi sbyor ba dang/ gnod par bya bo dad/ drug shul du spyod pa dang/ gnod pa'i samasdu dang ldan pa rnams rnam par
['joms par byed pa// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad lamachod pa dam po byon par mngon po/ro dga' ba'i sems can rnams layodos
su skyong bar byed pa/ theg pa chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ yi gar 'dri ba dang/ klog pa dang/ tshig tu 'don ba dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ 'chang ba

mngon par brtson pa rnams la yongs su skyong ba'o// bram ze chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo dag pa'i rgyalam 'don sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed ba ste/ gang du yang thogs pa
mad do// ston pa dgra las rgyal ba du ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// ci mngon zhen/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bgags dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms
par byed pa 'di na sngon yongs su shes te/ gang gi tsho bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang/ gsar dang/

Ats+tsha dzan po ma'abar ba'i 'od thor snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal ba dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs to/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags
pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed ba de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'dasar la bdung g.yog dang bcas pa// bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba/ gzugs sna tshogs mi sdug pa/
pa sku 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ sgrayisnyan ba/ bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrulapar byin gyis rlob pa/ mtshom rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa mngon par sprul nas lhags ngo//

[ro/ ] phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang/ gsar dang/ rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags
pa'i rgyal po yud tsam zhig gcang mi gsungs bar zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di yod kyis lan bdun brjod do// rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'thung ba chen po 'di brjod

ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ral gri dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa
dang/ dri ba dang/ rtsa gsum pa 'bar ba lab ru thogs pa shastag tshig 'di skad du/ gangadag bcom ldan 'dasal gnod par byed pa/ bdud gnodasamasacan rnams zung zhig thung zhig/ mingasashig rmis/
shig gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tungoms shig/ gnod sems can dang/ gza' dang/ bgags dang/ ldog badram thams cad kyi srog phyemar gyis shog ces 'dzer cing 'thon pa mthong
ngo/ n gnas bdud gnod sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ral grisa mngon par btul nas// la lasani bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas/ la las ni bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o// de la mthu che ba la gzhan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga nas 'thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong nas/ grong khyer de nyid du snga gong bar gyur/ rdzu 'phrul/
yongs su nyams/ sdobs pa dang/ stobs dang/ rtsa la med par gyur cing/ mda' gzhu dag kyang cha gnas phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bgags dang/ log
'dren dang/ bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nus/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta bu bzhin du chos kyi 'khor la rab tu bskor to// brgal to// pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so// bram ze chen po

de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo stobs kyi drag shul che ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di dran pa tsam gyis sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams dang/ gzhan gno
sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal bdad/'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yongasasu thar par byed de// bram ze chen po de lta bas na rtag par rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pas yang la bya'o// yi gar bris te

jug tu lus samamagul dug dugasashing bcang bar bya'o// ci mngon n na/ sdum bzhin du nyon cig/ rgyal bo tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du ma zhig la nyes pa byung nas/ rgyal po
bo tshangs pas byin gyis gshing ma'i mi rnams la khyed kyisum 'du song cig ces bsgo'o// de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin du mi de khrid de ri sul zhig tu phyin nas/ ral gri
shugs nas phyung ste gsad par bshams pa dang/ de'i tshe mi des rig pa'i rgyalamo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'ad yid la dran no// yi gar bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go/ sems

can chen po de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus/ ral grim lce ba/cig tu gyur nas rdul gter ba bzhin du dum bu dum bur gyur to// nga nas gshedaa'i mi de dag gis nges pa 'ang rgyal po la zhib du bsnyad do// de nas rgyal de'i rang

tu 'khrugs nas/ byami 'di dgas phyogs shiganaganod sbyin gyi phugayod ngo// de na gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang po sharje bral gnas kyis/ der khrid de khor ge ces bsgongo// de nas mi de gshodamaN+Di'i

dag gis bag chod sbyin gyi phug der bor ro/ gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ma thag tu de nas gnod sbyin ng dag thams cad yide dga' sta/ misha za 'o snyam nas rab tu rgyugs pa dang/ de dag gis so sor 'brang ma'i

ba'i rgyalaoM chen m 'di'iathus mi de la ma rtse gcig tu gyur ba'i 'od 'phro bar rab tu ba bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang thams cad dang sa nas rang rang gi lus tshig paro yang mthong ngo// de nas gnod sbyin de ngag ngo

mtshar skyes nas med khrid de sgo'i phyir rol du bzhag nas bskor ba bya bar brtsams pa nas/ gshadama'i mi de dag gis rgyal po lazhib tu bsnyad pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas rgyal po de cher 'khrugs te dngang nas

ba la tang ltar khyed cag deng la mi 'di bcings te chur bor cig ces bsgo ba dang/ gshed mas mi de khrid dachur boraro/ ming chur bor ma thag tu me de ji ltar thung la 'dug pa bzhin dumu klung gi mad par gyur to//

tshang ma de dag kyang dum bu dum bur chad de// rgyal bas de skad thos pa dang/ de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig tshugs su bltasata/ kye ma'o ma 'di ngo mtshar to// 'di la sgyur 'og yod snyam du rnam par
07 @#// rtog par gyur to zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po des mi de bkug ste/ kyai khyedaci zhig shes zhes de skad smras so// mides smras pa/ rgyal po chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo rmanamoso
sor 'brang ba rmanamo 'chang ba las gzhan ni bdag la tse'ingam 'tshal te/ lha de ni de'i mthulags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ mtshar che'o// rig pa rmanamodag bar gsungs// 'chi bdagazhanatur rmongs
byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol// nad dang sdug bsngal thar par byed// rig pa chen mo gzi brjid che// dus min 'chi las rab tu sgrol// nad

chon rnams ni zlog byed pa// mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs// de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ rig pa'i rgyal mo mun mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo la mtshod nasa mngon par bstod do// ming 'ang

blon thabs byin te/ rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur te// bram thon pa de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ba chanam 'dis thams cad du'angamachod pa chen mornyed de// sams

can banong sems can thams cud kyis kyang 'gal bar mi bya'o// de ltar na rigapa'i rgyalamo chonamo 'di sngonayongs su shes te/ gang du'ang thogs pa med do/ de lta bas na gdon mi bra bar rtag tu lus la gdag/

rgyu/ shing bcang bar bya'o// bram zachen po skar ma bzang pa latshog legs par byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bri bar bya'o// de nas bram ze chen pad yid bdudag 'anas/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag/

lngas phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal moso sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'i phyob ji ltar ba gyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bram ze chen po khyod nyon
cig/ sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// ngas ni khyod la bshad bar bya// gang gis sems can bde byed cing// nyam nga ba yi las las 'grol// gda rnams las kyang thar bya dang// bud med sbrul mar

'gyur ba dang// sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi// smayas gso bar bya phyir ro// bstan pa nas dag la gnas gyur nas// rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te// byang chub ri ni

sems kyang bskyed// snying rjes kun tu bar n sems dang// byams pa dang yang ldan gyur na// rtag tu sa mas can thams cad la// phan pa brgyad pa brtson par bya// tsan dan dang ni gur kum dang// gla rtsir bsres
pa'i chus bkrus te// bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa yi// gos gtsang masan bgo bar bya// sa dang lci ba bsres pa yi// de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya// bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhug ste// ljapadakyil
'khor dbus su gzhug/ de la rin thang chen po yi// me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol// tsan dan ka de pa nIn du// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ shekha ra dang lta sbyar ba'i// 'dug pa tshog bzhin du dbul
chog ji bzhin dus bzhin bya3/ lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ me tog 'bras bu sa bon dang// spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang// nas thuga'o phrug la sogs pas//
gter ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya// mtshan ma shin tu bkra shis pa// phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhug/ sos kyis bkang ba'i yur bu
rnams// gru bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram sogs su/ sang ldeng phur bu bzhi btsugs la/ tatshenaskud kha dog sna lnga yis// 'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya/gal te bdag
'grub 'dod nani// bram ze de ltar byas nas bri// kha bras dkar po bros nas su// phan par 'dod pas bri bar bya// dar ram ras sam grog 'am// cing yang rung ba gzhan la bri// bud med dag la bu bdod/
! gi wang gis na legs par gi/ dbus su khye'u zhig brisanus ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod// lag pa g.yonan thogs par bya// pad+ma rab
tu rgyas gyur cing// brgyan pa la nyid 'dug pya// nor bu do shalagaser dag dang// rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// gdul bar shin tu dka' ba dris// gru bzhin dag tu ra ba bo// gal te bde bar

'tsho'adod na// rang tu bsgrims te de ltar dri// phyi brag tu ni skyes pa rnams// gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya/ de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di'athu tsem med// pad+maganyis sam yang na gsum/

bzhi 'amayang rnalnga bris te/ pad+ma lan phyag rgya'imtshan// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su dro// de bzhin du ni pa rma rnams/ zla bas kun tu 'khor bar bri// pad+ma 'dangam ring rgyas la// stod budar gyis/

[oze/]bcings pa gi/ pad+ma la ni rtsa gsum pa// thur brgyad lan dar dpyangs bri// de bzhin pad+madagra ltar bcas// 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan par bris// pad+mar bcas pa'i ral gri bri// pad+madan dkar por byas//

pad+ma'i steng du dung yang bri// thams cad du yang rgyas par bya// kun du tshog 'i mtshan ma rnams// mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya// gang la gnod pa'i sams 'byung ba// byis pa'i gzugs rnams mi bri'o//

sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// lha ya gzugs bri bar bya// dag slong phyir ni jo rdzo'achang// gnod sbyin bsdigs par brtson par// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang/ ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya//

bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldan no// rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che// dmangs rigs phyir ni rtag zhi ba// khyab 'jug legs par bri bar bya// rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu// lha yi dbang phyug dbang po bris//

khya ba'i phyir na skye dgu'i bdag/ blo gros napo dri bar bya// sngo bsangs mdog ni gang yin pa// de yi ched du khros pa bri// dkar mo'i phyir ni grags ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugasu bri// sbom mo'i

phyir ni nor bu bzang// rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// sam ma'i phyor ni long ba bzang// du byung nga yis bstan pa bri// sbrum ma'i phyir nag pa na// tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya// gzhan yang ji lta
tsho ga las// gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri// las kyi chog mdzeng nas// rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri// rtag tu mgul du po tags na ni// de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad+mal/
yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri// pad+ma'i snying por zhags pa dang// de bzhin 'khor leb bri bar bya// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje dang// pad+ma'i snying por thob gi/ cho ga las ni 'byung ba bzhi//gnas

ka pad+ma'i stang du mdung thung gi/ mog lasan brjod pa bzhin// nor bu thams cad rtsa me 'bar// bod brar 'phro bas rgyas pa dang/ 'dar gyis bcings pa bri bar bya// klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la// nor bu
rab tu 'bar pa dang// de dag kun gyi snying khar ang/ 'do rdzo gnas par bgrims te bri// rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang// ded da pon mkhas pas rtag tu// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi//
rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang bri// zla ba a rgyu skar bcas// sgra gcan majug ring gatha' brgyad bri/ tshog bzhin du rjes bris ga/ blo gros ldan pa'i mis bsralanag/ za ma ngang ni mning yang// bu yo
rnyed par 'gyur ba yin// 'dage ni thams cad 'grub par byed// shis shang sdig pazhi bar byed// rang byung ba ni bka' bzhin du// gnas kyi dag pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rtan 'ang na'ang mchog
tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol shan tu bde// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas la sogs// lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur// 'dzam gling bzang zhing nyams dang/'bar// khyad par can 'dis grags pa/
in/ dang/ rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang// thamatho khyad par 'phags rnams su// bdag nyid chen po de skyes te// rtag tu rig dang bde bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ma 'chang ba'i mas// pasod nams
thob pa gang yin pa// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// bsod nams phung bo brjod mi nus// sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad// mtho ris sgo rnams rab tu phye// bde ba phun sum tshogs/
pa dang// blo gros chen por 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sams dpas kyang// rtag tu dbugs 'byin par 'gyur// lus kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs// stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yin/
rgyal bas ji skad gsungs ba ltar// 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba yin// mi dang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te// gnod par sems pa skrag par byed// gang phyir rige pa legs bshad pa// de ni
ring po ma thogs go// de ni mtshon gyis mi tshugs te// dug dang mas kyang tshugasam 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang// de las thag ni ring du 'gro// rnam pa kun tu nyan pa 'am//
mthong ba dang ni rig pa'i ng rung// 'byung po gdon dang rtsod pa dang// chu dang ma yis 'jigs pa dang// gcan gzan sbruladang sang ga dang// klu dang nad ni mi bzad rnams// gang la rig pa
legs bshad pa// de la de da pa/ kun ma 'byung// de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur// bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du// mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te/ de yang dag bshad kyis
mnyan par byos// rig pa'i rgyal mtshan mo so sor 'brang pa chen mo'i tshog dang pa rdzogs so// kang nas sems can thams cad la snying brgya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang bsrung
[}]/ ba'i tshul gyitshe ga bshad par bya'o// srung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis// dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ba// gang dang gang du srung byas nas// don yod 'gyur tu tha tshemamad
'jigs med rims kyisami btab ste// gza' rnams thams cad zlog par byed// rgyu skar rnams kyang mthun par 'gyur// las kyi lu gu rgyud kyang gcod// bza' nyes pa dang sgom nyis dang//
sgyu dag tshegs kun gyis byas pa dang// gnod bar bltas dang bri nas drang/ byad dang gang yang ma bzad dang// phyi ma sngags kyis btab pa dang// dug 'thungs pa dang sbyar ba'i dug/ gang zhig
srung ba 'chang da la// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa// yan lag rnams la rnam par smin// so sor 'brang ba'i dmod bsdigs na// pha rol 'khor ni mi bzad
dang// 'jigs pa chen padagra yi rnams// de dag thams cad rab tu 'byos// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' des pas srung// nyan thesadaka' thub chen pa dang//
rang sangs rgyas kyis srung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnam pa mang po ya/lha klu rdzu 'phrulachen po rnams// 'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di//
aspu thos pa tsam gyis ma mchog rnams// kun tu 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes// thub pa yin nd skad gsungs// rmila mngon dang ngan byas dang// gangayang nad 'go mi bzad dang// nad kyis
btab dang nad chen gyis// gang dag zin cing khrag skyugs dang// gzhan yang rnam pa mang po'i nad// 'bras dang shu ba som po dang// gang yang gnod pa mi bzad pas// mi skye dgu zin pa dang/
mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i phyir// mchog tu mi bzad gnod byung rnams// srung ba stobs chen ga la bar// da drag thams cad mi 'byudang// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// bcings pa dag kyang grol
bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba bris pas kyang// bgal te dus kyi zhags pa yis// bzung nas gshin rje'i gnas khrid pa// de yi tshani rnam bar 'phel//gang zhig chen zad gyur tam// zhas/
bdunan ni 'chi 'gyur ba// mig bris ba'i bar tsam gyis/ 'tsho bar 'gyur te the tshom mang// tshog bzhin du bsrung ba byas// yang na thos pa tsam gyis kyang// kun tu dag pa thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa

bzhin du ngadabar 'tsho// gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha// stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyud dang// bya ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang// brgya byin mdun nas 'gro ba kun// sems can de la srung ba'i phyir// spyi

bzhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed// 'jig rten skyong ba bani bro dang/ nyalag rdorje stobs chen yang// rig pa'i rig sa ni brgya dag dang// lhan cig rtag tu srungabar byed// zla ba yid bzang nyi ma dang//

tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshe// nor bu bablang dang gshin rje dang// stobs kyi lhan stobs chen dang// gang ba bzang po dpalatshan dang// 'phrog ma bu dang bcas ba dang// lnga 'dzin pa dang lngas
gA@#// gcan dang// smin drug bu dang tshogs dbang dang// lha mo chen mo dpal can dang// rnam thos bu dang dbyangs can dang// dung can dang ni ma tog so// de bzhinaral pa gcig

ba drang// gnod sbyin+tan no dpalayon can// rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur// za ma rnams kyi bu yung skyed// mngal na gnas pa bdu bar byed// de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'ibar// 'din srung ba chen por 'gyur//
'jigs mang 'tha' mib g.yul 'gyed par// dpa' bo mos lortag rgyal stson// chos la nges bang lha rnams la// 'dis gnangab sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// gus par byas M
tabras ni// de bzhin gshags dang de bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur// de yi grags pa rnam par 'phel// bsod nams dang mi tshe yang 'phel// nor rnams dang ni 'brudag kyang// 'byor
par 'gyur te the tshom med// bad bar gnyid kyis log ba dang// bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur// 'byung po'atshogs rnams thams cad dang// dgra rkun gyis kyang mi brdzi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa yin
ma yang 3[0f09]rig pa bsgrub par byas// srung ba byan mang ba 'dis// rtag tu rgyal bur 'gyur bar byed// bde bar rig pa sgrub byed cing// dal bgags na 'byung gi 'gyur// de yis bsam pa thams
cad 'grub// dkyil 'kherakun du zhugs pa yani// skyob dag khrims cad du// de ni myur du dmatshigashes// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i phyir// nganiyang brtan pos yab go/ ngakra shis thams cad
rab tu rdzogs// khasams kha thams cad klub par byed// 'di ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang// bde ba thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur// bdapar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/// mtho ris sun 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab pa

dang ni rtsod pa dang// 'gyud pa mchog tu mi bzad par// 'jigs pa kun las sgrol 'gyur te// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhinano// skye ba rnams su skyo ban// rtag tu sku dran tho tsamamad// rgyal po btsun mo
la bor bcas pa// 'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yin// 'jig rten dag bar glab gsal yin// rtag tu thun mong 'gyur ba yin// ngani kun la sdug par 'gyur// lha dang ma ni gang yang rung// nyin dang mtshan rnams
rtag par yang// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags tshig 'di dag 'dir 'grub bo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge
'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dpag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs
bkr-i sangs rgyas thamasacad la phyag 'tshal ga/ sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir// de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas// sems can kun la snyang bcu ba phyir// de ni nga yis brjod par bya// ril
pa gzi brjid chen mo 'di// stobs chen pha rol ban pa ste// rdo rje gdan la thub ba gi/ 'dini gsungs yathag tu yang// bdud dang bdud kyi rigs rnams dang// gza' dang leg par 'dren pa dang//
za @#/ bgegs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa// thams cad de yi mod la bsreg/ dpya thA kA ogi ri gi ri 1 gi ri Ni/ hU~Mri Ni/ gi ri ba ti/ gu Na bte/ A kA sha ba te/ A//
ba kAsha bi shud+d+haM/ sam+ba pA pa ba gte/ A kA she/ ga gnata le/ A kA sha btsA ri Ni/ dzA la ta ngagi ka ra/ mni mog ti/ kha tsita/ mo la d+ha ri/ su ku sha/ sukhe she/ su bak+Sha/
sun te/ sub// su baN gi ra a tItaM/ an ga te/ mu khyud pan+te namaTha sam+b+ho Ta bud+d+ha nan/ dz+wa li ta/ te dza swA/ bud+d+he su bud+d+hA/ b+ha ga wa ti/ surakA Ni/ su kAm/
su bra b+he/ su du ma/ su tAn+ti/ pa re pa rade/ b+ha ga ba ti/ d+ho dra ba ti/ b+ha du su b+ha dra/ bi ma le dza ya b+had dre/ pra tsaNaM/ tsaN+Di/ tsaNi/ tsa/ badzatsa ts+tshA/ ma hAtsa 1 gor/
gi rtsa'i/ go ri/ tsaNA li/ ma taM gi/ brtse sa/ pukas/ sus ti/ sha ba ri/ shAbar/ shika ri/ bamiDi/ b+hAm Di/ ri dri tsha/ sarba saMrdza sAd+ha ni/ han han/
sajasha hU~M/ daha pa/ sarba dut+taM/ bro ta pi shA tsa/ b+hAki NInI/ mnu a mnu b+hU NaNatsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ phyid ya na/ bdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi srog gzhom du gsol/ bcom
bskuldan 'dasaMm bdag gi sdig pa thams cad gzhig tu gsol/ gzhig tu gsolaM/ thamasacang ngu 'jigs pa dngaganod pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsuradu gsol/
mdungs pa thams cad bcing du gsol/ badzra ka7Sha nAkani/ mAn+te/ rma khyadacha ni bA ra Ni/ mnyin/ mahA ma ni/ rtsale bi tsal/ tsitra tsaNaM/ bi Ti ba rdzogs/ miTani Te/ ni te/ g+ho ra Ni/
dI ri/ brab ra sa mur/ tsaN+Dale/ ma taM gi/ rud+d+hA sa/ sa ra si/ brtsa/ su ma ti/ puk+ka si/ shi ba'i/ sha' ra/ sho kar/ drwa mi Di/ dram Di/ nga hani/ pa tsa
ni pAtsani/ mar na/ sa ra la/ sa ra la/ sa ra lo b+he/ hinam rgyud kritAbi dA ra Ni/ bi d+hu ra Ni/ ma sile/ mahA ma la/ na ga Ni/ rig Da/ b+hate/ sat+taM/ mat+taM/
maN+Din/ dAny+tsa/ tsa'u/ kra pA kin/ pA le dza le/ dzA la yA/ dzA la ya/ dzA li ni/ dzul la/ sha ba ri peshAb ri/ saju bya d+hi pu ra Ni/ nuDa cu Di// tshuDa nitsu Ti ni/ mayAtsA
ni/ nim ni mi ni min rlu ri/ dri leka da ldan/ tri lo ka dzan na/ til ka/ lo ka ka ra byad+ha tu bya ba lo ki ni/ badzra ba rashu/ pAkaM mung+gor/ lang+ga/ tsakra/
shang kha/ rta/ dri shu la/ tsin+ta ma nI/ mahA bir+ya d+ha ra Ni/ bdag thams cad du gnas thams cad na gnas pa na ma rungs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ mi dang mi mayin pa'i
'jigs pa thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ badzebadzra ba ti/ badzrapA Ni/ rgyu ra/ kil hal/ mi la ma
la ka la ki la/ tsil tshol/ sa la sa/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra de sargya dra dzaya/ lats+tshA sAdA/ sarba pApa ba de ra Ni sAhA/ sarba bya d+hi har Di sAhA/
sam+b+ha ra NipAhA/ sawag tu b+ha ya ra Nis/ spuserlu btu maMswAhA/ shAn+ti ka ri swAhA/ buTika ri swA/ba la ban+d+ha ni swAhA/ dzam du/ dza ye dza ya ba ti/ kam le bi ma le sAdA/
o bo su le sAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta mUd+d+ha satwA/ o b+hAro moshAn+ti pAhA/ o b+hud+d+hAhA/ oM b+hu ba sAgA a swaswAhA/ oM b+har b+ha bawa sAhA/ oM b+hu ra badzra bti sarba ta thA ga ta stod

la sa pu ra Ni 2 A yu/ sa myur Ni/ ba le ba la/ [“]ba la ba ti/ dza ya ba bya dit+taMphaT phaT sA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ra Ni bidzi ahApra ti sa re hU~MhU~M phaT phalnga pAhA/ bram the chen po gang la la zhig
gis de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs 'dis yongs su bsrung ba byas shing yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzud pa dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhwa de
dang bad legs su 'gyur ba dang/ dbyug pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug sun dbyung ba dang/ dug gzhom pa byas na/ datsho yongs su zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phal taring du
ma bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dran paphun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sprad pa tsam dang rdo rjes byabs pa tsam gyis dusam yin par 'chib dang/ nad chen po las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'a
nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyan ringes sun ba la'ong byabs pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du kha don du shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// gadri brjid dang
stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ spobs po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur go/ de'i sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyang ma lus par yongs su rjod par
'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sam dpa' dang/ lhudang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyang debalus la gzibarjod dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus snon
par 'gyur ro// dga' ba chen pamang bar 'gyur ro// bram ze chen po ban rig pachabo gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dwags dang/ bya'i rna lam du thos na'ang de dag
thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na/ sosor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong
ma/ dag slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyen nam/ dge bstanam 'am/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po'abu 'am/ rgyal bo'i blon po 'am/ bram za'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ de las
gzhan ba 'ga' zhig gis lan cig thos te/ thos nas kyang dad pa chen po dang/ gus pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'dra'i 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/
klog gam/ yid drag pos sgom mam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos te/ bram ze chen po de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnam pa brgyad/
rnam pa thams cad du 'byung dum dogs shig pa'i bus 'phanang chen po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mos mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin// mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug sbyar
mas ma yin/ byad kyis ma yin/ g.yas byed kyis ma yin/ sngags kyi las kyis ma yin/ phye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/ ma lag na bar mi 'gyur/ rims kyis btang par
mi 'gyur/ klad pa na bdang/ nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis ba dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi po dang/ nyin bdun ba'irims rnams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// na
bzhin du bde bar gnyid kyis leg cing dran bzhin du bde bar sad par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ lan cig gis chos dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen pa
thob par 'gyur// de gang dang gang du skyo ba'i skye ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang byams par 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal
pa/ bar/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba thibs po kun dang/ yi ngogs su skye ba rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// ji ltar nyi ma'idakyil 'khorasems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de
bzhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi ba mthus sems can thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa da bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsis sems can thams cad
kyi rgyud sims par byed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal mtshan mo so sor 'brang pa chen mo'i mthus de la gnod sbyin dang/ srinapo dang/ 'byung pa dang/ yid gs dang/ sha thadang/ skam
khyad dang/ smyo byed dang/ brjod byed dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gdod ma rungs pa thams cad dar bgags dang/ log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad kyis gtsabar mi nus so//

ra dag khongs na'ang rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di dran par bya'o// 'on kyang 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus ma rungs pa de dag thams
cang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du ngas/ nyun bar 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pas 'byung ngo// dgra'i tshogs thams cad dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i blon po
chen po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// tha na gsad bar 'os pa zhig la gshad ma mi rnams kyis mtshon gdab par gzas na yang mtshon rnams rdol
bzhin du dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// denyid kyi dusan de la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ de'i dran pa'i stobs kyang cher 'gyur ro// 'di ni srin po 'joms pa'i mchog
gtsang zhing sdig pa 'jig par byed// dpal du byad cing blo yod byed// yon tan thams cad rnam bar 'phel// 'di ni bkra shis thams cad byed// bkra shis ma yin rnam par
'jig/ rmilam bzang po rmi bar byed// rmi lam ngan pa rnam par 'jig/ rig pa mthu stobs chen m 'di// skyes pa bud med suba'i mchog/ 'brog dgon dang ni mya ngan las// rtag du de yi mod
la thar// rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas bka' bzhin du// 'dod pa dub/ni kun kyang rnyed/ lam las lam gol zhugs n yang// rig pa 'di ni rjes dran n// myur du lam dang bza' ba dang// bdung
ba mchog kyang med par 'gyur// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis mi deg mang po gang yang rung// tshorabs snga mar rtsi byas pa// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// dran pa dang ni 'chang ba
dang/ 'dzin dang yi gar 'dri pa dang// tshig tu 'don tam klog pa dang// bzlas brjod byed dam gzhan ston na// dan ring por mi thogs par// chos kun rtogs par khong du chud// de ltar chos kyi
rnyed na// sdig pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur// yid kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed// 'chinga'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang// rgyal po dang ni ma dang chu// glog
dang de bzhin kun 'dzoms las// 'di nid las skyob par 'gyur// rig pa 'bum du bzlas ni// g.yul 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa dang// gang yang gcan gzan ma rungs pa// de dag thams cad
00 'thus bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dngos gruba medrog gi rig pa 'di// brjod na skyid lug mi 'gyur bar// byang chub tshogs rnams rdzogs par byed// bdag dang gzhan
gyi don sgrub phyir// gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad du// rig pa 'di la spyir na ni// 'dod pa'i las rnams gang yin pa// sgomami dgos par rig 'di las// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/

namasadzita thA ga te b+ho ya tiSh+Than+tid sha su da oM ma ni badzra hrid ya badzra mA res rgya ba dA ri Ni tan tan sarbasha hUM ka ra A badzra badzaM badzra gan+d+he tra sa ya dus ya sajamAr b+ha ban ta na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT sam+b+har sam+b+ha
ba por gru bzhi lham par bya// tshen gyi phyamasna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya// mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin// bum pa gang ba bzhi ya nga gzhug/ de la ma tog sil mus
gter// bdug pA mchog gi bdugs par bya// sems can chen po gadzul bar phyir// gter u yun las kyang bya// sdom bzhin du ma rtog sngos// cho ga bzhin du 'di la mchod// dar gyis
bcings pa'i mda' bzhi yang// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir gathug par bya// de yi thog tu nad pa yang// dri zhim spos kyis lus bskus te// gtsang ma'i gos rnams bskon nas gi/ dkyil 'khor
dbus su gzhag par bya/ de ni shar phyogs kha bstan te// rig pa 'di ni brjod par bya// lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas su// mkhas pas de la bsrung bar bya/
de nas nad pa'i don gyi phyir// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// rig ba 'di ni brjod byas nas// dasan nad kun zhi bar 'gyur// de nas gtor ma'i bum pa la// lan bdun legs par sngags
kyis gda'// ra nas ngashos kyang sngags gdab ste// gtong sa ma tog tshe ga bzhin// dultar lho phyogs ngos su ni// lan bdun kho nar gtor bar bya// nub phyogs su yang bdun nyid de// byang
phyogs su yang de bzhin go/ 'og dang du'ang lan bdun te// bsrung du byas par 'gyur ba yin// bras bu dam pa de lta bur 'byas na sdug bsngal kun las grol// skyob bshAkya seng ge yis// srung
[% ]ba 'di ni yang dag bshad// 'di ma gtogs par khams gsum na// srung ba'i rig sngags gzhan med do// dani mi 'chimigs so// nad kyis mi botab mi sdug min// sdug pa dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur// rig
sdugs ba'i ni bdag gi lus// shin tu bsgoms pa byas na ni// de la 'chi bdag tshogs kyisamachod// chos kyi rgyal bo dam pa gshin rje yang// gus dang bcas pas de la mchod par 'gyur// skad cig

a nga yis sems myal 'di byas l// lha yi grong khyer song zhes smra bar 'gyur// de nas gzhalamang khang ba namamang pos// rdzu 'phrul chen po lha gnas bzang bor 'gro// de ltar derani lha mi gnod sbyin dang// srin

b rnams kyis de la rtag mad 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang// bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang// 'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsan dang// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che// zla ba nyis rgyu skar bcas// mchog tu

mi bzad gza' rnams dang// gang yang klu chen thams cad dang// lha dang de bzhin drang srong dang// lha minamakha' lding dri zad ng// mi maci dang lto 'phye cha/ srung phyir rtag tu 'brang bar byed// gang gis rig pa
stobs chen mo// rdzu 'phrul chen mo bris nas ni// shes rab can gyi lag la gdags// mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur// rtag tu bun sum tshogs par 'ong// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so sor 'brang
tshanama'i bsrung ba'i cho ga'i brtag pa rdzogs so// ka rgyagar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi ta dang/ dAn shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban rgyu yongashes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis
kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// slar yang yuladabus kyi rgyad pa gnyis dang bstun nas sngags rnams dag pa bu ston lotsan pos bcos pa la phyi mo //
@#// lcagar skad du/ mahAshita bka su tu/ bod skadadu/ bsil ba'i tshalachen pe'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogasasangs rgyas// gang
gis thog mar rig sngags rnams// 'dzam bu'i gling du gsungs ba yi// sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal la// da ltar byur dang 'das pa dang// mgyog sangs rgyas gang lags pa// thams cad la yang
'badag phyag 'tshal// de dag kun la skyabs su mchi// wakhor lo bskor ba byamad pa// mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa// thams cad gnon la/

phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyan ba grags ldan pa// pad+ma'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan dang ldan pa skyob mdzad pa// rab 'byor gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// ded dpon blan med pa'o// grags pa'i bla
cha phyag 'tshal lo// mizla lta bur 'od mdzad pa// pad mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi ma leng ston ba po// don gzigs la yang phyag 'tshal lo// dul ba'i tshul khrims 'jigs med pa// rgyalanus
bya la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// skar rgyal la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbal ldan pa// rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od can bzi
brjid ldan pa po// gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// legs par mchod pa grags ldan pa// thams cad skyobal phyag 'tshal lo// bdud dpung rab tu 'joms pa po// leg ngang sol la phyag
'tshal lo// bram ze dpal dang ldan pa po// gsar thub de la phyag 'tshal lado/ sems can kun la thugs bcu ba// 'od srungs de la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya sang gcod mdzad ba/ dwagasar
mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo// ser sna med pa thugs rje can// byams pa la yang phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal// dadag lan bdag skyabs mchi// gang dag gis ni ches
bstan pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la sangs rgyas gus mdzad pa'i// chos la bdag phyag 'tshal le// gang la phulan don che ba'i// dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos shes
rab mchog gyur pa/[7]ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog gyur pa// mo'u 'gal bu la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi gtam la 'jigs med pa// ka t+ya'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo//
nyan thos sbyas pa'i mchog gyur pa// 'od srungs la yang phyag 'tshol lo// skyob re yin dbang gyur pa// ko'u di myal phyag 'tshal lo// mang du thos pa rig sngags bachang// kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal
lano rnalus nganadang ni yul 'khor srung// mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// phyogs pa'i kher khor yug gi/ rgyal chen rnams la phyag wAtshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi zhe snga dpon mchog/ nyi bu brgyad
'phyag 'tshal lo// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang// lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal la// de dag la ni phyag 'tshal nas// rig sngags 'di ni grub gyur cig/ gang gi don du bya ba yi// don de bdag la
grub gyur cig/ sdang bar soms shing gnod byed pa'i// mi ma yin rnams gud du dang// gnod par 'dod dang glags lta rnams// ston pa'i bstan pa mnyan par gyis// byams par sems shing
pasu 'dod pa'i// ma ma yin pa gang yin rnams// thams cad 'dusashing mthun gyur nas// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis chig/ ston pasardzas su yi rang ba// dga' ba'i sems kyis bdag la
nyon// bsil ba'i tshal gyi bde chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung bachen po ste/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa'o// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang//
kludang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ gsang ba pa dang/ 'byung po dang/ grul bum dang/ yid gasang/ srul po dang/ sha za dang/ lha ma ya na dang/ rlung lha dang/ skam byed dang/ 'tshe
rgyu dang/ skyo byad dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gyenang rgyu dang/ rgyubang/ 'dunab dang/ ngan byed dang daM gzi byin 'phrog pa dang/ brjod byed dang/ rims drag po dang/ rims zhag
gcig pa dang/ zhag gnyis pa dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang/ ma dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sams pa dang/ glags lta ba dang/ mi phan par 'dod pa dang/ gnod
bar byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lami dga' ba drang/ gnod par 'dod pa dang/ 'an par mi 'dod pa dang/ bde bar mi 'dod pa dang/ grub pa dang bad bar mi 'dod pa dang/
lor bzhi po rnams lami dga' bdang/ gnyid par 'dod pa dang/ phan par mi 'dod pa dang/ bde bar mi 'dod pa dang/ grub pa dang bde bar mi 'dod pa dang/ ming 'di nas bya ba la mi dga' ba dang 3gnod
par 'dod pa dang/ phan par mi 'dod ba dang/ bde bar mi 'dod pa dang/ grub pa dang bde bar mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas dengs shig/ skrag par gyur cig/
dngang bar gyur cig kun tu dngang bar gyur cig/ 'dan ma 'khod cig/ n gnas ams dang gnod sems kyi mgo bo tshal pa bdunangu bogs sa re/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin bo dang/ dri bra dar/ klu
dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ gsang ba pa dang/ 'byung pa dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ srul po dang/ sha za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rlung lhadang/ skam byed dad
'a rgyudang/ smyo byed dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gyon du sgrub dang/ rgyu ba dang/ 'dun ba dang/ ngan byad dang/ gzi byin 'phrog pa dang/ brjod byed dang/ rims drag pa dang/ rigs ga
gcig ba dang/ lag gnyis pa dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhi po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems ba ma yin pa rnams dang/ glags mi lta ba dang/ phan par 'dod pa dang/ gnod
par mi 'dod pa dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' ba dang/ ngon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang/ pan par 'dod pa dang/ bde bar 'dod pa dang/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa/
dang/ ming 'di zhes bya ba la dga' ba dang/ don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang/ phan par 'dod pa dang/ bad bar 'ded pa dang/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi
mde chen po 'di thos nas 'dir bkod cig/ ma skrag cig/ ma dngang zhig ]kumatu ngangang bar ma gyur cig/ mi'ajigs pa kho nar gyur cig// ming 'di zhes bya ba'ingan dang/ ban pa dang/ bde
podang/ bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo na po 'di bdagagis bstan cing bshad par bya'o// dal bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po bdag la srung ba/
ni 'di yin te/ spyad yatho dan/ kha rje khaT// laskyus/ pa la ka ba 'u/ rog blud dra ba ga NA/ hI la hil/ dum ti/ gti/ u dzataM/ ka thur/ masAr ka la pi/ sa mnatsa
turadapisha/ ya dzan sha ta atA rakA/ ani ti kaa NI/ sarba bi hathakaM b+hu/ namo b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+has+ya/ sid+d+han a padA/ ta ra tu bid+d+hA 1 brasgyuNo/ man+yatu swAhA/ 'di skad bdag
gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba skyo lung zhes byed pa na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dag slong ba deb//
'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi pa lus ngan dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ 'phags skyes pa bu dang bcas/ blon pa dang bcas/
'khor dang bcas/ mangs/gzhug pa dang bcas/ phonya dang bcas/ g.yog dang 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nam phyed na lhags nas gros mthun par dur khrodachen po bsil ba'i
tshal du dong ste/ rangabazhin gyi kha dog dang mthus 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs la cig tu 'khod nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// go'u ta ma khyod kyis gangamkhyen pa/// de'i lha rnams
mkhatshalato// lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad nas bstod ra/ 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpa' chan
khyod la phyag 'tshal la/ go'u ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen du// da ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad sa pa/sol to//
btsun ba bcom ldan 'das yul dang 'brod lags sam/ 'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sku bde ba lags sum/ bskrun mi mnga' lags sam/
nyamang pam mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gnod pa mi mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang/ srin pa dang/ dri bra dang/ klodang/ namama'
ldong dang/ gsang ba ba dang/ 'byung po dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ srul po dang/ sha za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rlung lha dang/ skam byed dang//
'tshargyudang/ byed ngang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gyenadu rgyu dang/ rgyub dang/ 'dun pa dang/ ngan bgyid dang/ gzi byin 'phrog pa dang/ brjod
byed dang/ rims drag pa dang/ rigs zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gnyis pa dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang/ midang mi ma lags pa sdang bor sems pa dang/
glags lta ba dang/ phan par mi 'dod pa drang/ gnod par bgyid pa dag las/ gnod par bgyid par sems pa ltam mchis lags sam/ de skud ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kyirgyal po chen po dag nga lani thams cad yod de/ yul dang yang 'phrod/ 'tsho badang yang ldan/ lus kyang bde/
nad kyang mad nyam ngaba'ang med do// kyi rgyal po chen pa dag nga'i lus la no gnod pa'i ng med do// kye rgyal po chen po dag ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud ngang bcas pa/
tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dag sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang/ lha dang mir bcas pa'inang nu gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus la gnod
pa byed par sems pa yang dag pa'i ma mthong ngo// kyi rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi/ khyed kyi 'khor rnams pa'i 'khor la gnod pa byed par soms so// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/
khabcom ldan 'dasal/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis te/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ phyag/
bgyi ba ngang/ bsA bkur bgyi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu pa'i slad du bdag cag btsem ldan 'das kyi span sngar mchis lags so// de ru'islad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
khangs ngagon pa dang/ bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag ni shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin pa dang/ driza dang/ kludang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ gsang ba pa drang/ 'byung po
dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dbas dad/ srul po dang/ shatha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rlung lha dang/ skam byed dang/ 'tsho rgyudang/ sgo byad dang/ mi 'am ci dang//
rgyan du rgyu bdang/ rgyub dang/ 'dun pa dang/ ngan byed dang/ gabri byin 'phrog pa dang/ brjod byed dang/ rimasarngog pa dang/ rims zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gnyis
pa dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang/ mi dang mi ma lags pa sdang bar sems pa dang/ glags lta ba dang/ pan par mi sems pa dang/ gcod par bgyid
ba dag mchis so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dedapag kyang de na gnasato/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas lags
gso// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin nas srin po nas/ gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni
sa ltung zad cig mchis pa lags so// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lam dad pa'i samus dang ldan pa ni ches mang lags to/ de dag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srod dang tho
rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par bgyid par sems lags te dang dgag pa'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rus pa mdod pa rnams dod par bgyi ba dang/ dad pa
rnams sur zhing dad par bagyi ba dang/ 'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang/ bde bar gnas par bgyi ba dang/ ma lus nga ra shin du nyam par gzhog par 'gyur ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
chen po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo// mam yin pa sdang sems can// rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya// rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon// mngon 'di ni this
nas kyang// mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed// gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang// nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa// phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung// de dag thams tsang bzlog par bya// lha
sku dang lha min rlung lhadang// lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi// gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni// mdang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing//wim zla ba'i tshul 'dra ba// rin chen las byas shin tu snang//
[z/ ]bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang// rab sdang gdan rnams rnam par spangs// mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i// 'byung po grul bum srin pa dang// yi dgas srul po de dag gis// rmad byung

de dang mi mthong ste/ dgadri byin ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi// grong khyer duyang d mi 'gro// 'byung po chen po 'du ba na// dar yang dodag 'dur mi dbang// stan nam yang gdu yang rung// zas dang skom yang

mi dbang ngo// lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du// nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur// rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ 'byung po gang zhig mnyan pa// de yi kha nas khrag dron dag/ myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur/
deyi brlab g.yas rel nas/ 'phel mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyurato/ 'di ni nad kyis 'chi'agyur zhing// gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// 'jig rtan skyong gis bshad pa yi// mdolas
gang zhig 'gal byed ba// 'jigs pa thams cad de la shing// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// rgyal po na pa rnams kyi tshig/ gnod sbyin gang dag mnyan pa// 'byung po srin po gang yin pa//
dun dang lhag pa'i ngen 'brang rnams// lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi// mtshon chas gri'i so 'dra bas// gnod sbyin de dag brlag par bya// rgyal po chen po dang lo dang ldan// go cha sra
zhing mtshonardzol/ stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag/ shar phyogasan niyul 'khor srung/ lho phyogs nani 'phags skyes pa// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzad/ 'byang phyogs na ni lus ]
nganupe// de dag de na 'khod pa yi/la 'khor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas// sung ba'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs// mi sdug pa dwag 'gro zhing rgyu// glang chan gzugs
dang rta yi gzugs// kha cig ma de'i gzugs can la// drod mo dang ni wa yi gzugs// lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams// rnab 'phung dang nub// rnab gcig pa za dang po// sgracher 'byin cing

'jigs byed pa// sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed// bong bu dang ni rngamo khyi// cha lugs gzhan yang nya 'khor 'khod// rgyal po chen po stobs po che// de dag bkatshun 'du ba na// lcayashing rta bcas pa yin/
namamakhar las ni 'gro bar byed// gnod sbyin dag ni bdag po yang// mi rnams la ni bde legs byed// spyod ya the ngan/ pakajumul/ pa ka dumul/ hashin/ ha shin/ bam mu b.le//
sa mu da le/ u dusu le/ sa mu pale/ pra sham mi/ rAkus/ a mnu/ rtsa ba re ma 1 yakani/ bar mi/ pra tam ba hi/ tha dum nut+tA mA sa ba ta dA/ mun pa tiSh+Thati/
rgyal pochen po rnamathos bu// mi la zhon pa sngar bcas pas// 'di/sanas ni tshub ma langs// de bzhin ri yang g.yos par gyur// rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'o// rin chen shing rtobacas 6na//
lha dang mi yi sgra skad grags// rgyal po chen po mamib// dbang po rnams kyang 'bar bar 'gyug/ srin pa 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gadrugs// de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid// ma ma yin pa'i gzugs ]
mas kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa spyad par bgyid// ma zhing gtum lami bzad pa// drag cing mthong na mi sdug la// sgyu yang ring zhingesanamarang// lag na ral gri blo ba thogs// sonazas can/
'jigs bar bgyid// snachen rngamo stag 'dra// drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba// yan lag mtshang phyed tsam lus// mag sar lus kyang shin tuser// dris can la lus skam pa// sgra brdzas
lcags kyi mchu can la// mtshon mtshabs cher 'debs par bgyid// rnab gzhu 'dra gsus pa che// sbrul gyi gzugs can nga'u gzugs// pag gi gzugs can lto be tshe// mgo bo mal lag range ba//
na 'apyadabal num 'phyang// du badra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dgaman lam leg can// g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/
bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mtsha/go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis//drag cing chod la gtum pa dang// mgo bo che la sgra ring ba// mi rnams dngan ri dgas dang//
bya rnams gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid// ma 'bar zu dung mang du bla// mig pa/cig pa dang mgar dang// sna dang rnababacad pa dang// chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang// mgom mchis dang mgo bcad
dang/ rngalus kyang sgyur la gnyer ma gdong// mgal me 'bar rkang med pa// mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste// phal ka che la rgod bag can// de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid// de 'dra'i gnod
phyag 'tshal srung du mchis// golutam dba' dag bdag gi g.yog lags te// dag phyag 'tsha ma nag mo zhes bgyi dang// sngon mo khag dza dgakun dang lhan cig tu/
sbyin mang po yod// g.yog 'khoradag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/ dang da ga mnarkun m lags// g.yog 'kher dodag lhan cig tu// bdag ni
phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u tam dba' bo khyod la// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mngos// bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na// shing rta zhes bgyi de ma mchis// de la bu pa stobs ldan
pa stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyad mchis// de dag bdag gi g.yog lags te// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'utu ma dpa' bo khyod la// chog bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// bag
cag gi ni gnas rnams// mgrin ranges zhes bgyi sron mo mchis// srazhe mashin tu gnag pa dang// srin mo nab/mo gangs brgya dang// srin mo rab gnag rnams mchis te/ da dag go'u ta ma mthun par
blta rtas yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid cha// de dag sa stong gnas pa ste// g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis// yongs su bskor tu 'dir mchis lags// de dag kun dang lhan cig tu// bdagan phyag
'tshal slad du mchis// go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// bdag gi mdunan rgyug pa yi// yi dgas gnod sbyin srin po rnams// lus chon shugs kyang drag po
gsal shing 'jigs par bgyid// glang chen mgo dang bum rna can// mgo bo stag dang seng ge 'dra// lcags kyi so can lcags kyi sku// gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa// lag na lcags kyi gtun/
bu thogs// lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs// so chen lag pa ring ba ste// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can lcags kyi chu// mgo bo tsho la skra g.yos pa// gnag cing mog se ra sma nom pa// bum pa'i 'gran
dang mig dmar dang// mig gcig pa dang lto bon// mchu 'phyangs pa dang lag gcig pa// rkangagacig pa dang rkang gnyis pa// khamed kha gas drag po ste// mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid//
lag na 'khar ba dbug pa thogs// mdung rtse gsum pa skrag cing 'jigs// skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste// gdon rnams rnam par skug bgyid pa// skrag par bgyid cing skya bar bgyid// sems
kyang 'khrul par brgyud pa ste// skyobar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid// dunas gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid// de dag 'jig rtan 'jigs pa ste// stobs po chel stan par dka'// stong phrag drug cu rtsa
bzhi po// rgyal po chen pa'i mtshon rgyug/ de 'dra'i gnod spyin mang po yi// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/
go'u tam dpa' bo khyod lani// chos pozhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// sa ga ldas rtson zla ba dang// sang gi sde dang rab gnon dang// ma la sbyin batsan drag pa dang// gang pa dang gan 'dzan dang ka
u@#/// tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang// sna tshogs sdadang gtor mal// yid bzhin rang 'byor bzhin babang dang// 'dam bu can dngashin tu rgyal// 'dod pa thams cad 'byor
ka pa dang// dbang po rgyal ba khyu mchog dang// nor bu bzad sras rdzogs bzang dang// 'dam bu sa mchog 'damathus dga'// khab kyi spu can ring bzang dang// laga mchog skye dgu'i bdag po dang// 'dam

lca bu'i rgyud dang mdung ring dang// rig pa stobs can nor bu dang// 'jog po nag po po dang// la ba can dang dro'u dngaganyis// klu yi rgyal po sa srung du// yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che// nam mkha' lding
ba ni shugosachen ldan// 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa// bya yi gzugs kyis mchibgyid cing// rgya mtsho kun du 'khrug par bgyid// khyu dang lha min dri za rnams// 'jigs par bgyi de dang dab bshad
[$,/ ]rung/ rnam dad pa dang dad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te// go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la na// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// 'thog ma zhes bgyi gnod sbyin mo// 'jigs par bgyid
pa stobasachen mo// de yi bu ni lnga brgyanams// 'jigs bgyi gtsod spyin mthu rtsal can/bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u ta ma dpa' po khyed la ni// rtog
tsha/ bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// mag d+han thams cad mthong// kashi tshun pad+ma'achang// yangs pa can na rgyala mchog gnas// gyad yu'e nan grags 'dzin gnas// rgyal po'i khab na ku be ra// sor

00 skya'i gnas niu drag po ste// ta ma lan 'byor pa gnas// mi ti lan kun tu rgyal// ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad// gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dang na mchog/ rdza 'phrul chen po skal ba che// stobs chen de dag
thams cad ni// yid dag dad pa'i sems dang ldan// rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pas// de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang// rgyalapo chen po stobs chen gyis3/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas
bstan la// mi rnams lan snying brtsa'i slad// gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dwags dang// sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang// mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi// srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyis/// n gnas

rgyal po rnam thos bu// thal sbyar 'dug stasmas pa'i// len dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa// rnam grol brag ra mi mnga'// go'u ta ma dpa' nga khyod la// chos bzhin ma thun par lta zhing na chis// khyed la lha
dang grub pa dang// bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshalaT// gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang// ba'i stong dag kyang lhags nas// lor khor yugayo ngas bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags// bdag

nargyal po rnam thos bu// byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i nya 'khor du// gnod sbyin rgyu skar smyo byed dang// brjod byed dang mi 'am ci// skam byed dang ni rim drag dang// da bzhin
mas nang zhag bzhis// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// spyad wa ngan/ u haham/ utaham/ mahAhol/ mahAu ha ram/ u hamahAham/ sa la mu ji/ i li mi li/
ki le ma le/ cirati tub+he/ u tu b+haM/ dri ti li yu/ ma tam la/ mni yi sAhA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur

cig/ gnod sbyin dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skyo byung dang/ brjod byed dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gyen du rgyudang/ rgyu ba dang/ 'dun pa dang/ ngan byed dang/ gzi byin 'brog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig// lha banangan wu'i

rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// dbang bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyago'atshal to/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// yang dag dbab

bo khyed la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par ltazhing mchis// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa// chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpa' la bdag phyag 'tshal// go'u ta ma dpa'

bo khyod la na// chos bzhinamathun par lta zhing mchis// go'u ta mkhyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// nga ni khyu rnams ma 'tshal te// srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams// kho ra khor yug yongs

bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'bod gyur lags// bdabad ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung// shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du// srin po rnams drang sha za dang// dri za dang ni
rlung lha rnams// dngag bo dag gis bzlog par bgyi// spyod ya tho dan/ i Ti mi TI/ khur khro/ phur te/ mati/ bamitaM/ am ti/ agaM/ mag/ nage/ a tu mi/ bcu mi/ mad+hi/
[rc/ ]i ri ti/ pir ti sArA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/ srin po dang/ yi dgas dang/ dri ba dang/ rlung lha dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par
gyur cig/ lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi bamachis taM/ dol bdag phyag 'tshal 'ako/ de'ang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo sta// kun mkhyen
kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// yang dag dpa' bakhyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// de nas rgyal po 'phags skyes po// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa na// 'jig rten mgon po
skyabs mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun la phan pa mdzad// ba 'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod lani// chos bzhin mthunapar lta zhing mchis// grul bum yi dgas srul po rnams// stor phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
rnams// kher khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar to'akhed gyuralags// bdugani rgyal po 'phags skyes po// lho phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du//
'byung po rgyu ba gzi byin 'phrog/ grul bumayi dgas srul po rnams// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// spyod ya the dan/ a la a la le/ ki le ka lo la/ ku pa ku pas/ si li saMli
lA si li li lil li li lilo/ potisi limati/ su ma ti/ su sumati/ susu/ su su/ susu/ mati/ dilisha li sha swAhA/ rgyal bo chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs/
[t]ga// skyong bar gyur cig/ gru 'bum dang/ yi ngags dang/ srul po dang/ 'byung po dang/ rgyu dang/ gzi byin bzlog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang nas lha'i
pa rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis ti de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// de'ang bcom ldan 'dasanyid la phyag 'tshal te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo sta// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud//
yang dab/dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhinamathun par lta zhing mchis// de nas rgyal po mgu mi bzang// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa na// mun nga ra gyur pa'i 'jig rten la// bcom ldan lam rnams ston

mdzad r// go'u ta ma dpa' bo khyod la// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// 'jig rten dag na nyi 'dra/ de rinatshanasnying po stobs po na// kludang mkha' lding gsang ba nga// stong phrag drug cu rtsa
bzhi rnams// kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags// bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang// nub phyogs skyong bar bgyidi pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du//
klu dang mkha' lding gsad ba pa// wa min dbang po stobs po che// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// spyod pa bla na/ da ga du// su ba ti ye/ kA pa a N+Da ka/ mdu tAM/ ba ma ba nga ma/
bi dad mang+gA/ bid da ma ni/ a b+hi na ma/ gab+hu te/ dal yi yA/ ba ra sur/ ra dra tsi tsal ril li lil li lo sad// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/

[2/ ]klu dang/ mamakha' lding dang/ gsang ba pa dang/ lham yin dang/ gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'anangan lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal/
kha dang 'dabcom ldan 'das da la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// yang dag dpa' bo khyed la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// de

nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nus/ busamo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te phralaso sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing grosamathun pa dang/ tshig mthun pa dang/

skang mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsunapa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'itshal gyi mdo chen pa 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba stag 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs sukhyab pa lagaso/ gnod sbyin
dusun po nas/gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyib dang/ bakhor bzhi po rnams la srung bdang/ skyobab dung/ srid pa dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ bde bar gnas dra ra bgyid pa lags so//

de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal po chen po dag rig sngags kyi rgyal po tshan po bzung zin no// bsilapa'i tshal gyi mdotshan

bongs yongs su bzungabrin no// kyargyal po chen po dag gzhan yang ngas kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mngomon bo la rjes su yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po brjod kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
gzung zhig dang ngas bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal le zhes rgyal bo chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalastsal pa ltar mnyanato// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyug/

sa rin pa cha g.yas pasun bzang chos gos nas// 'byung po'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas 'dabastan par bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la dbye bar bya'o// thams cad khra go bar
bya'o/ 'dunas bcom ldan 'dus yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// spyad pa pho ngan/ hilI ho lA/ b+hi sin/ bke/ a har ya/ dam ni/ ril
ba ka rnalab tu kA/ da ri ton/ da d+hidan/ pu rgyu/ phu'u rgyu/ gu gu/ hi kAn rngu/ nam kinati/ sA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/
dus 'di kun tu g.yos 'byung po thams cad nirab tu bdar nas/ kyam kyidud/ kye ma sdug bsngal la nas sgra chen po byung ngo// srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras to/ 'di ltar yang dag
rdzogs sangs rgyas/ 1samasAtsan kun la thugs brtson// 'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi// rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad// de nas kun mkhyen ston ba pa// sems can kun lathugs bcu
bas/ gnod sbyin srin bo dri wa dang// klu dang mkha' lding gsong ba pa// 'byung po rgyub gzi byin 'phrog grul bumayi dgag srul po dang// ltamin ga shod byed ro langs dang// brjed byed dang ni mi
kham// skam byed dang ni'ims drug dang// de bzhin bram zosrin po dang// smyo byed rims nang zhag gsum pa// de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams// skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur to// phyogs bcur rgyug pa
gzigs nas kyang/ 'dod lan thugs brtse'i phyir// rig sngags 'di ni brjod par mdzad// spyod ya b+hadan/ harim/ kha dri/ da kha kha katusataM/ sid+d+hA ma hatAr/ u Ta tani ]Da
khan/ da rnga la/ r+ya mad bya/ du ma tha/ b+hud+d+hari/ dadar/ dmamar ka ri kiya/ ka tha ba ranI/ susum li sahA/ gsang sngags chen por sngags chen po 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig

bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi chos la yang dag par so sor rtogs shig/ khyad kun lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngasong ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor bar 'gro bar/ da

nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po sngonam thos pa 'di thos nas skrag cing darangs dum dag la skyo bung zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag
'tshal zhing gros mthun ba dang/ tshigamathun ba dang/ skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sdang ba'i 'byud pa zad bgyid pa// rig sngags 'di naligs par gsungs// mi
'jig rten bad bgyid pa'i// rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal// de larig sngags 'di lags te// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// spyad ya thadan/ u dupal/ kul dza ba a sgyu
g.ya/ ma sur po la/ ad bya bad/ nad bya bad bye/ ad tsa ba ti/ ma rud bya/ ma rud bya bti/ ma rad r+ya pa la sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog
pa 'di ga zung bar gsol/ spyod ya tha dan/ i la i li/ mi limi li/ ki li ki li/ pan ra ni la ba ya/ b+hu b+hu b+hur/ ba ra'u/ bu phu thur/ ga khang phyi ro'u/ kha dayaM/ ma la/ khu pa khu
la pa ya sAhA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di na la gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang/ don thams cad grub pa lags so// de nas gnod sbyin dang/ srin pong/

drizanas/ gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mochen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di'ang thos/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba sngon ma thos pa 'di'ang thos nas skrag

cing dngangs la mi dga' sta/ skye bung zhes byas nas sa la 'dzul/ kun tu 'dzul/ kun du rab tu 'dzul bar byed de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas/ de dag phyogs bzhir rgyug go/ da

nargyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir malce'i phung po chen po stsal to// danas de dag nam mkha' la rgyug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha'i gsur du sbal to// de nas 'ajig rten skyong brgyal bo chen po rnamathos
kyi bu lha dang drizas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sdang ba nam mkha' bar snang la 'apags nas gnod sbyin dang srin po nas/ gnod par byed pa'i bar mos gzhom pa dang/ soms can thams cad la snyade
bcu ba dang/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog bdang/ 'khor bzhi po rnams bsrungab dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir gi sngags 'di
brjod do// spyod la thadan/ gi mi gi tshogi mi gi mi/ gin go ni/ gin gni/ na len li/ ni bani kha ni/ uts+tshaa dA/ disha di/ pi pi sha sachadi[–]sha a da pa te/ gir ba sa dzan/ b+hu mi
bti a lal/ kal le/ ki li kyi li li/ ki li ki li li/ ki li ki la la/ ki li ki li li ki li ki li li kil li li li lil/ ki li li li si li lil 'a/ ad byi/ nad r+ya/ ku nad gyi/
gta ku nad byi/ ul du khu khu/ lad byi/ mang khu/ lad t+yaM/ yulu tshululu/ bu lu lu lu/ mulu lu lu lu/ dulu lu lu lu/ lulu lu lu 'bu lu lu lu lu/ dal/ skahal/ hil/ baipali/
par la/ dul/ i ku tu dul/ uld du/ di'i/ u tilal/ hal hi le/ dul haM/ hu lu hu lu/ ngulu ngu ru su le 2 pa da ha pa ha ha hasAny+tsa/ rgyalapocham rnam rjes kyi bu phyogs skyong

bar gyur cig/ lha rnams kyin ng na lha'i rgyal pa nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// de 'ang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshalato/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun
mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud// go'u tam khyod kyis gangamkhyen pa// de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// yang dag dpa' bo
khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri wanas/ gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa

las gung du dengs shig/ gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du ma dngan/ de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang/ nad drag pos 'dabs par 'gyur la/ de'i rgyun gyis mgo bo dang snying rgyal pa
brgyar 'gas par 'gyur rta/ de'i mod la sdug bsngal dug 'byung ba dang/ rlag ba dang/ mtha'abadepar 'gyur ro// 'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang/ skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang/

grib gdon gyi gdon gang yin pa dudag thams cad kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la myur du gud du dungs shig/ gal te myur du gung du mngong na de dag la myur du 'jigs

ba chen po dang/ nad drag pos 'dobs par 'gyur la/ de'icun gyis mgo bo dang snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur nga/ de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang/ drag pa dang/ mtha' mdu bar 'gyur 'ogo/ gzi

na dang ni khrag za ba// nyin mtshan rgyub gang yin pa// de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i// mdo bshad thos nas btang bar gyis// go rbalus 'phags skam byed dang// 'byung po 'jigs byed sul po rnams [}]

de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas thong// lha dang lha mine rlung lha dang// dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla// 'byung podang nishaza dang// de bzhi gnod sbyin srin po rnams// kun

du' khrug pa shing kun tu g.yos// skrag cing kun tu rab tu 'gul// gdon sdang gnod pa byed pa rnams// ltung zhing rab tu pham par 'gyur// sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos// sgra bo che dag sgrogs par byed// yaM
dgas dang ni grul bum rnams// sdang ba'i gdonani zlog byed pa'i// mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur nas// 'jigs pa drag pos 'debs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang dab 'dun la// dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang
pa// de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas// legs par rjes su yi rang ngo// de nas rgyal ba chen po bzhi bar snang las babs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang/ tshig mthun pa dang/ skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdogonapo 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhis zhapas la phyag bgyi ba dang/ 'khor bzhi pa rnams srungab dang/ yongs su skyob pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po nas/
gnod par bgyid pa'i ngar rnams 'joms pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bsan dang/ dag pasnyan ma de dag gis kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mden po 'di
bzung bar bgyi/ bcong bar bgyi/ brjod par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngas/dge slong ma 'am/ dag bstan nam dag bsanam gang la la bdag bsrung ba
dang/ bdag sla ba dang/ gzhan bsrung ba dang/ gzhan sba ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/khamadab dang/ rjod pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid bde la ni
gnod sbyin dang srin panas/ gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du'ang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ gnod par bgyid pa lta ga lasamasal gas/ de gang du mtshan gacigatsama gnas pa darayabaganod sbyin

dang srin ponas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar rnams sro 'khor du'ang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ de gad du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smosakyang ci'atshol lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang lami ma lags pa'i gnod pa thebs

pa de'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyimado chen po 'di brjod na/ d myur ba kho nar bad legs dang/ nad mamachis pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur zhing thar par 'gyur la/ mi ma lags pa rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing myur
du gung du mchi bar 'gyur lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bstanams/

dag bsan ma gang la la bsIl ba'atshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ brjod pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ sbyor bar bgyid pa de 'a ni dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsAn rnams rgyal po

chen po bzhi'i gnas su mchis nang sa ming smos par bgyid dekya rgyal po chen po dang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan namaM/ dge bsnyam machag mo zhig bdag bsrung ba dang/ bdag smra ba dang/

gzhan bsrung ba dang/ gzhan smra ba'i phyi'i bsil ba'i tshal gyi mngon n po 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ rjod par byed/ kun chub par byed/ sbyor bar byed de zhes sgrog par bgyid lags so// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dag bstan rnams rgyal po' pho brang lcang lo can du mchis na// rgyal pochan po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing 'byung po thams cad
tshogs pa'i nang du'ang bsgrugs nas/ dar de dag mngon bar dga' bar 'gyur ta/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'don da ltar denang ba lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan
'drasu dag slong ngam/ deg slong ma 'am/ dgabasenanam/ dag bsnyan ma pang la la ba dag bsrung ba dang/ bdag sba ba dang/ gzhan basrung ba dang/ gzhan sbaba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po
ba'adzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ rjod ba dang/ kun chub par bgyidab dang/ sbyor bar bgyid pa de tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// nang mi bdung ba dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin can dumachis pa dang/
zas rnamar lngal 'di lta ste/ bu ram dang/ sru tshu dang/ ta'e dang/ sha dang/ nyasha rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi// da ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcos ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang srin
panas/ gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ rjod pa dang/ kun chub bar bgyid pa dang/ sbyor bde ba de'i skabs kho nar rlag pa dang/
mtha'am mchis par bgyid pa dag mchis te/ de dag gzhom pa'i slad du yi dam 'di bgyi 'tshal lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma kham/ ga

ka bstananam/ dge bstan ma gangal la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ rjod pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ sbyor bar bgyid pa de ni dang pacan gyi gnod sbyin dag bsnyan
rnams gos dang/ zas dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ bro gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis ljob skyed par bgyidad/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar dmar ba
lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mu stags can bcom ldan badas kyi gsung rab lam dad pa dang/ mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ gnod par 'tshal ba dang/ sman par 'tshol ba dang/

grub pa dang bde bar mi 'tshal ba gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'amang ba dang/ rjod pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ sbyor bar bgyid pa de lan dond 'grub par mi bgyidado/
mam lags r rnams kyis bar ma dor 'gum pa dang/ sdug bsngal dum 'byung ba dang/ rlag pa dang/ mtha' ma mchis par bgyidab lags so// dbu'i sladadu zhen/ don de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba dang/

pa// sman par mi 'tshal ba dang/ grub pa dang bde bar ma'atshalaMb lags pa'i spod du ste/ de dag la ni leg par lta bgang lags pa de rlag par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten nas mas//

man rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbuba'i slad du rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba bgyis pa gang ci'ang rung ba'i bsrung ba de dag gzhung nani 'di mchog dang/ gtsobo dang/ rab mchog lags so// de
nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo chen po bzhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// mi mchog gang zhig ma 'di dag/ yongs su rdzogs pas srung ba dang// bdalegs bgyid pa de la// srin bo
rnams kyang 'tsho mi bde// su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag/ mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa bzhin// yongs su rdzogs shing ma chad par// shin tu tsha bar 'tshang bgyid ga/ de la gnod spyin yi dgas dang//
'byung bo grul bum srin pa dang// so byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang// da ltabudag 'tshomibagyade// de las ma lags dang bgadon// myur dugud du mchi bar 'gyur// de la cis kyang mi tshugs ta// dal 'tshabar
yong minus// rgyal po chen po bzhi bo yis// btsom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod d// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshalanas// de nyid du ni mi snang gyur// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i mtshan mo 'das
tanam langs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs te/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas/ blun bo dad bcas// 'berangang
pas/ mdog gzhug pa dang bcas/ nga nyadang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'ang gas ba dag nam sros nas lhags nas gros mthun bar dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshul du bedas ngo//
[– ]u@#// rang gi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas lus ngan dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ mig mi babrang dang/ 'apags skyes pa rnams da ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas// ngab rkang pa la mgo

bos phyag 'tshal tu phyogs gcig du 'bod de// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhisanga'i thad du bsil ba'i tshal gyimado chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo// khyed kyisade legs par rab tu nyon la yid

mtsha lazung zhig dang ngas bshad do// btsun pa de ltar 'tshal le zhes gsol te/ dag slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/
dgabastan dang/ dag bsAnamA rnams la bsil ba'itshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyag pa/ra bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong dang/ dag slong mngang/ dag bsnyan
dang/ dag bstan ma de dag yi rangasatwA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'di'i tshig ni ngas dkar gsum za pa dang/ legs par khrus bus pa dang/ skyang ba byas pa
dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang/ bsam pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs ldang nges sam btsag gis brog la/ sbos thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor grubozhing dus

nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du brjod par bya'o/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rdzogs so/// sngags rnams yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis dang bstun nas/ bu ston lo ts+tsha brtson pas dag par bcos
rgya gar skad du/ ma u0f97ma an d+hu ra sUtra/ bongaskad du/ gsang sngagasachan po rjes su'adzin pa'i mdo/ dkona mchog gsum la phyag
'tshala'ago/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lako/ chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas k+kadun nyan thos dang bcas pa// yang dag par song ba/

yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshol na// sdomig sngags 'danadan du sgrub// rabe sngags 'di dag grub gyur cig/ gang phyir don du sgrub pa yi// don de yang ni grub par shog/

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris
