kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal bzhi'i 'os kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde
dbon nabo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa ba/yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong snga lhags nas// bcom ldan bdas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mi mdzad kyi bang pa/ po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//
btsunapa btsemaldan 'das bdag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'tshalan stong gi/

'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung ba dang yongs su skyob par bgyid/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bang legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags de// btsumapa bde bar gshegs pa chos kyimanga' bdag btsem ldan

N+NaM 'das ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags nga bcom ldan 'das kyang bzheng na stong gsum gyi stongan pa'i 'jigartan gyi khams rnams susung ba
yongs su skyob pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad pa lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sto nga gsum ga stong chen nga shi' dzag rten gyi khams rnams su
bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ nga nasabcom ldan 'das kyis// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la
cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo// de nas ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pasu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba gnang bar rig nas de 'ong du mi snang par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dag slong dag mdang sumam mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs rigs la rnams dang btus pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas

dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dad/ gnod sbyin du sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// 'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yo ga 'khor dang bcas pa rnams nga ga la bder lhags
te 'ongasan//mimajed kyi bdag po tshangs bas nga la 'di skud ces smasas// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdagan stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags te/btsun ba bcom ldan
'das bag 'tshalan stong gi 'dzin gyi khams rnams su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su skyob par bgyid/ yongs su gzung ba ngang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su bsgyur bar bgyid lags so// btsun pa bde bar gshegs/

pa chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das kyang stong gsum gyi stong chan pa'i 'ajig chen gyi khams rnamasu su ngangang phrug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das d bzhi d na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams rnams su srung ba dang/ yongs su skyob pa dad/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bdu u0f38gas su 'gyur bar mdzad lags na/btsun pa bcom ldanubudas stong ba gsum gyi stong chen po'abajig rten gyi
khamasa rnams su bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bsgrub pa drang/ yongs su gzungab dang/ zhib dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsolazhes gsol to// dag slo bdag ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
pa la cang mi gsung ba gnadango// dmasamamad kyi bdag patshadas pas nagasacangam gsung bas gnang bar risade nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// dag slong dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo
[– ]rgyu@#// rjes su 'dzin pa 'di/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// ma 'ongs pa'id bzhinagshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar byung bana'ang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ da ltar ba nyid kyis bshad

ts+tshad/ 'dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chanamos su 'dzin pa 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/rtog
shig shod cig/ kun rub par gyis shige/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyalam gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bde bar gnas

tsho par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thu/ u dud+d+ho/ nibud+d+haM/ ba hupuN+NaM kA sa ma bud+d+haM/ bab bud+d+haM/ A dbud+d+ho/ tad+d+ha bud+d+ho/ niyaM ga mtsha ba la/ u pu la/ dpu la/ da la/ ngam la/ mngag mang ga/ ma
nan/ a mam bid rgyu/ dung ma/ dungum/ pU pra haro kun dga' bo yun ring panas sbyad ba'i gsang sngags stobs dang mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di ni/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

mi yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs bar 'gyur ro// daltar

byung pa na'anga'adilta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir daltar nga nyid kyis bshad do// ngas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung

por bya'o// mtshams gcad do// shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du'ang rgyang grags gcig tshun chada mtshams gcad do// bya thA/
sa mutsa/ bi mu tsu/ pa lamu tsa/ dza g+ha d+har/ mdastsal/ nal ka ma ka/ sa mu sha bti/ ri muk+ti/ yo ga/ nas ga ma// a rA Da mu la/ bihU~Mg mi Idi phyir/ nga tim khayo/ la ga bo d+hi
ba ni pra ti pra yo ga/ a tsakra ba ti/ sa ma tha ba ti/ a la ya// mi laya// ba susadabya/ an tam/ ap+pabati/ gu ra bto/ tu khin/ hi pi/ a kanati/ sa kanati/ sa mi di ma/ bsu ba'i/
aTo u Ta/ tad du khadu sbyin/ tha ru smin/ la tAn/ laputan/ saM ba ra/ saM bar nga du/ nar tan/ niru na/ il/ ta i la 1 sar pa la/ ba shub la/ sa ta ma te/ dbyim ta/kun dga'

bo yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags stobs dang mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'ed bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// ma 'od
padi ban ga shogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba ba ngas bshad do// mimajed kyi bdag pa tshangs pas kyang bshad do// lha'i
dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bshad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyadangashad de// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chan bat+taMshu rtsa brgyad kyis kyang bshad do// 'brog ma bu dang bcas g.yog 'khor
dngabacas pas kyang bshad do// kun dag/bde dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan nam/ dgabasAmam gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su'adzin pa 'di bzung nas ji ltar

bstan pa dang/ jiltar kun tsub par byas pa de bzhin du shes sam/ mthong ngam/ las su byed pa de la ji srid 'tsho bar dubasrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su brdung ba dang/ zhib dang/ bde pag

su gyur pa byas par 'gyur ro/ kun dga' bo 'das ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis

ming 'ong zhes bya ba la bsrungabar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung bar bya// yongs su zhi bdang bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// mtshams gcapa de// shar phyogs su rgyang grab sa gcig tshun
chad mtshams gcad do// de bzhin du nub phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chada mtshams gcad de// lco phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad namasagad de do/ byang phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun
changa mtshams gcad do// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du rgyang grags gcig tshunachada mtshams gcad d// kun dab/'bo rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lam dang lam ma yin pa na gnas pa bzhi yod de/
de dag bgad zhan/ 'dil ste/ bkra shin ldan dang/ kun bashes dang/ gang pa dang/ dga' ba'i dang la rnam gto/ gang de dag gi med shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de lan rgyal po chen po de'ajigs pa mi
'byung dog/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang/ chu'i 'jigs pa dang/ ma'i 'jigs pa dang/ mi'i rdzogs pa dang/ mus yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo/ kund 'bo lab na dordzo'i phu bo lag myur zhes
bya bo grong khyarabor yug ces bya ba na gnas pa yod de/ gang de'i ming shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de la ni des srung bar byed/ yongs su skyob par byed/yongs su 'dzin par byed/ chad pa zlog par byed/

zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do// ma 'di zhes bya ba'i phyi'i lag na rdo rdzong phu ba laga myur la gsol la// gsol ba 'debs so// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'isangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas gang ming 'di zhes bya ba la skabs tshol bdang/ gragasalta ba'i gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dwags sam/ sha za 'am grul bum 'am/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po
rnams kyis bdag la glags rnyed par ma gyur cig/ bdag la kun ka rnyed par ma gyur cig// kun dga' de srin mo chen mobcu bzhi yod du/ de dag ni byang chub sems dang kayum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa mang

srung srung/ bltams ba'adzina'ang srung srung/ bltams zin pa'i 'og tu'ang sud srung/ sku 'khrungs pa na'ang sung sud ste/ bcu bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ stobs ldan dang/ drimado dang/ sgra chen dang/
rab mnyanadang/ 'jigs byed sa dang/ 'dzam bu'i mgrin dang/ mchog lanadang/ blam dang/ grug mdang/ rmad grags dang/ 'thab dga' dang/ rtsodacho dga' dang/
sa 'an dang/ 'thag 'jug rnams// gang de dgagang shes pa dang/ rus shes pa de lan de dag gis srung bar byed/ yongs su skyob par byed/ yongs su 'dzin par byed/ zhib dang bde legs su 'gyur

ba byed do/ kun dag ba de srin mo brgyad yod// de dag ni skyes pa dang bud med gnyid log kyang rung/ galegakyang rung ste// gzi byin 'brog par byed de// dedag bgang zhe na/'dalta ste/ rwa dang/ thung mad dang/
naslob dang/ phumacan dang/ sranamadamar mo dang/ rab chen dang/ mingeg bzang dang/ brgyad pa ste 'jigs byed do// gang de dag ga mongashos pa dang/ rus shes pa de la nadi dag gis srung bar byed do//
yongs su skyob pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa zlog par byed d// kun dga' bosrin mo bdun yodad/ de dag ni khrag gi dri tshor nad ga tshad brgyur yang
rgyug go/ de dag gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ gzi brjida mchog dang/ dga' bar gas dang/ sna tshogs sbyin slong dang/ bran mo dkar mo bza'adang/ 'jug 'dod dang/ grong khyer khor yug dang/ bdun

pa sta ra srung ngo// gang de dag gi zhing shis pa dang/ rus shes pa de lan dadag gis srung bar byed do// yongs su skyob pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ da pa zlog

bar byed do// kun dga' bo sunemo nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba bu stong yod pa rgya mtsho'i gramun gnas pa mtshan gcig gse dpag tshad brgyadazhir phyin pa zhig yod// gang de'i ming shes pa dang/ lus shes pa de la ni

des srung bar byed/ yongs su skyob pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa zlog par byed do/ kun dga' bo sunaso tshanam lnga gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun

dang lhan cig tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams srung zhing skyob par byed/ de dag kyang gang zhen/'di lta ste/ rtag tu myos dang/ rjes su myos dang/ stobs kyis rgyugs dang/ dma'i sgrubs dang/ lnga pa ste 'byor

ldan no// gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang/ rus shos pa da lan de dag gsesrung bar byed yongs su skyob pa dang/ yos su'adzin pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa zlog bar byed do//
de bas bdag gis ming 'dazhes bya ba'i phyir/ srin mo lnga gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang bcas pa de dag la gsolu la// gsol ba 'debs so// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung
ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas mong 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab bdar/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa zlog
par gyis shig/ tad+yathA/ ba sud/ nitir/ bi tsa ri ti/ bka ra ti kar bar/ sAri/ ma d+ha ra b+hon/ sha ta da nita/ b+hAshita ka/ a// na/ ri [”]ka DitaM/ bo ku ti/ bar dza/
thig shub+hiti/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngagasachen de rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis gang la bsrung pa byas pa dang/ sba ba byas pa dang/ yongs su bskyab ba byas pa dang/

yongs su bzung ba byas pa dang/ zhi bdang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang ]chadab bzlog par byas pa de 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang bdud dang bcas pa rang/tshadas ba dngabacas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang/
bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang/ lha dang mir bcas pa dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa ji'i rten nami'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod spyin nam/srinubo 'am/ lham yin nam/ dri za
gam klu 'am// nam mkha' lding dam/ gsang ba pa 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha rtsa kham/ ro las sam/ byad stems sam/ gshad byed dag/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ sgo byadangam
bad byed gla bas lta ba dang/ klan katshol ba rnams kyis gragasad pa dang/ glogasard pa'i sems can gang na'ang med la/ dasayang dag par ma mthong sta/ de ni gnas med do// los kyi rnam par smin ngani/
gtogs so// dba gnas 'das nga dang (ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas ri'i sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chonamo rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis mi ma/ ma ma
yawa yin pa'i m/ gnod sbyin nam/ sinamo'am/ shaza 'am/lhaa yin nam/ driza'am/ klu ram/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ gsang ba ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ shadra 'am/ golas sam3
byad stems sam/ gshad byed dam/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po'am/smyo byad dam/ brjod byed rnams las ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ grub dang
zhob dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa bzlog par bya/// dug med par bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin ba 'asi sdang bar sems pa thams cad dang// gno bar u0f7a
ba thams cad dang/ mi phan bar sams ba thugs khur dang/ rab tu sdang bar sags pa thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad dang/ gsal ba lam srung ba thams cad dang la gcan srung ba thams cad dang/ shog m gyi
gnas srung ba de dag thams cad rgyas par bya'o// rnam par myos par bya'o// rengs pa dang/ rmugs pa dang/ lag pa gzung ba dang/ rkang pa bzung ba dang/ soms gzung ba dang/ lce gzungabar byago/ rig
sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang gsachen mo rdzos su 'dzin pa 'dis ni gang dang gang du'ang thar par 'gyur ro// khyim bram ze rgya ngan 'das// 'jigan dgan srid 'as brgal// khan dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa/
ring po zhig nas gzod mthod go/ bzod pa dka' thub mchog ste bzod pa ni// spyan 'das pa mgaces sangs rgyas gsungs// rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa ni gzhan l 'tshob dag sbyong m yin no/sangan

mig dang ldan pa dgag/ mthu rtsa la dag kyang yong pa bzhin//mkhasabs 'tsho ba'i 'dzag rten 'dir// sdig pa dag ni yongs su spang// da ltar byung dad 'das pa dang// ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin pa// thams
cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal// de dag kun la skyabs su mchi// 'jig rtan dgra bcom bde gshags la// zlob skyabs su mchi lags kyis// sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs

khartse rnams// zlob thar mdzodasgragan las// sgra gcan ba mun sal ba// nam mkha' dag la 'od byed cing// lham mar 'dug pa dkar ba dang// rnam par dag pa'i 'od ldan pa// bar snang dag la ma bzung bar//

skye dgu'i sgron de myur du thong// de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan da// lus kyang rdulatsang skrag gyur la// nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis// zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed// mi yi phyi na sgra gcan khyod// lus kyang rdul

zhing skragagyur la/ nad pa bzhin du brjod pa yis// rings pa'i zla ba gtong bar byed// sangs rgyas tshig bcad 'di brjod pas// b.lata blo ba ma btang na// bdag gi mgo bo tshal bdun 'gas// gsonayang bad
bar ma 'gyur ro// kye ma bden par gzigs paya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'byung ba rmad// de dag gis ni tshigs su bcad// brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gtong// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis
'jig rten du sems can bad das pa med pa'i chos can byung ba nade bzhin gshags pa'o// zhes yang dag bar skyabs snapa ni dus su yang dag bar zla bas sla ba yin no zhes bya ba dang/ kun dga'

phaA kho gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pasatshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de ngago dang/ kun dga' bo gzhan yang tshig de dag gis bya ba gang byed pa'i don
[•]0 dwang na ba dang// bde ba'ang 'dis khyad par 'gyur te/ spyod yu ze ngan/ sAsti/ ma ti/ ba lu ma ti/ phru har ti/ ki shu matsu/ naN+Dam taM/ pa dgra 6/ bdu mati/ ar kri ta/ at+pa/ su
driT bud+d+haM/ badz+ham ti/ shu bu dum/ a la ku ma/ al ma ti/ tig ra/ sha ra a shu ha/ brag gi ni/ kun dga' bo sa bon gyi rtsa ba bcu dang sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshog bcud bzhin gshog gs
pas gsungs pa yod do// kun dga' po tshog de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsung bar 'gyur ba dang/ ston par 'gyur ba'ang yod de/ dadag bstan pa 'dil zhugs pa'i mi rnams kyi bar brjod na/ gnod

sbyin dang srin po rnams kyang bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur go/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tshig gi mchog dang/ dge sbyong rnams kyin ng
'dag sbyod skyed de ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa ma mnga' ba bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba ste/ mi skragami 'bros la 'jigs pa mdachung/
'jigs pa dang 'jigs par byed pa dang bral ba/ 'jigs ba dang 'jigs par byed pa spangs pa// skye bung zhes byed pa med pa'o// zhes yang dag par sgrubs sgrub ni dus su yang dag pa skyabs skya ba yin te/
bden pa dang bden pa'i tshogs ming 'di zhes bya pa labade legs su gyur cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub dang/ tshangs par spyod pa lo
gnas pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag gi nang na ni 'phags pa dgos pa'i tshul khrims mchog cig bu ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur cig/

gnas brtan rgyal po'abu 'dang 'dra par rab tu byung nasaring po ma len pa tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyod pa rnams kyi mchog 'di lta sta/ dag slong kun shes ko'udi myang/ 'dod pa nyung ba dang sbyangs pa'i yon tal

gnas pa dang/ chog shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srungs chen po dang/ shes rab che bdung spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog shar dwa ti'i bu dang/ rdzu 'phrulatshab dngamathu chung rnams kyi mchogamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa dang

lta'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ma 'gags pa dang/ mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog kun dga' bo dang/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog nyib 'kher dang/ chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog byams ma'i bu gang po

dang rnga bslab pa la gus pa rnams kya mchog sgra gcan zin dang/ mal cha dang stan bgo ba rnams kyi mchog gyad du nor dang/ sung ba'i sgra sgrog pa rnams kyi mchog g+har d+ha dzabasod snyoms len dang/ rtsig pa dad pa skyed

ba rnams kyis tsheg nag po 'char ka dad lca deng mas mchod pa rnams kyi mchog legs mthong gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig dus ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung
bdang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa bzlog par bya'o// rgyal po 'am/ chom rkun nam/ me 'am/ chu bam/ dgra'am/ rimadza' ba 'am/ lam du 'gro ba 'am/ lam/
gol bar 'gro ba 'am/ gnyid log pa'i m/ ra ro babam/ bag med pa las bsrung bar bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rkang pa med pa 'am/ rkang gnyis pa 'am/ rkang bzhi pa bam ( rkang
mas sam/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs can m yin pa 'am/ 'du shand can nam/ 'du shes can m yin pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sams camajisnyad yodapa de dag gi nang na ni di bzhin
gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mo 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab ba dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/

chad pa bzlog par bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i
tshig ngesam 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa bzlog par bya'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i
tshig gang gis tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ ma bo 'am/ 'khor dzasod cig yod pa de dag gnang na nid bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog ces bya ste/ bden pa dang bden pa'i
tshig des rgyal khams sum/ yul 'khor ram/ gyong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong khyer rom/ khyim mam/ gnas sam/ zhing ngam/ nad pa 'di la bsrung bar bya'o// yongs
su bsgrub pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur pa dang/ mtshams gcad par byago/ 'byung pa thams cad bzlog par bya'o//

gzi byin 'brog pa rnams bzlog par byago/ bden pa dang bdunapa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngasa'adod tshogs dang/ zhesdud dang/ gti

mug zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ brjod pa'i bden pa dang bdenapa'i tshig dag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhizad paragyur cig/ med par gyur//
zhingar gyur cig/ rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ mimajed kyi bdag po tshas pa dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha
mayin dang/ drizar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo rdzogs so///

rgyagaragyi mkhan pogaul bo dz+haded/ dzAn sits+tshadad shAkyapa byudang/ zhungan gyi li ts+tsha ba banang+ge ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcom nas gtan la phab pa// slar yang bu ston thams cad gakhyen pas rgyu dab zhal mthun du
bsags pa la gtugs nas hor khong nyung bradalas pa rnams bsgyur/ sdogs rnams dag par bgyis pa'i//bdun cu tham pa bzhugs
